[\[22a.6\]]rnams su gnas par ma zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chen po dag mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/_spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu lag na spos snod gcig thogs pa de las spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri 
[\[22a.7\]]shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /_nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang /_rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang /_ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang /_ri'i rgyal po 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang /_gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lha bye ba 
[\[22b.2\]]phrag brgya dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad na lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i 
[\[22b.3\]]tshogs rnams kyi rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/_spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/_lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang 
[\[22b.4\]]lha'i khang pa rnams snang ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa'i 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i 
[\[22b.5\]]dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir mi'i rgyal po des spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 
[\[22b.6\]]kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri 
[\[22b.7\]]shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/_de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/_gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po dag cho 'phrul de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa 
[\[23a.2\]]legs so legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di lta bu/_zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa dang 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa khyod yang legs so legs so zhes bya ba 
[\[23a.3\]]sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/_gang dag 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_'chad pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'khor la rgya cher 
[\[23a.4\]]yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_skyes bu dam pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 
[\[23a.5\]]'gyur ba'i phyir ro//_//'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po gsum pa/_de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_de bzhin 
[\[23a.6\]]gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshig gcig dang ngag gcig dang sgra skad gcig gis dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs 
[\[23a.7\]]pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/_shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/_sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po legs par brgyan par byed par 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[23b.2\]]khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug ste bdud kyi sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa mi sdug pa ston pa/_gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/_skyes bu 
[\[23b.3\]]dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe med pa rab tu zhi ba rdul dang bral ba zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/_chos kyi 'khor los 
[\[23b.4\]]sgyur ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/_mchog tu zab pa bla na med pa rnam pa bcu gnyis rab tu bskor bar 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na med pa rdung bar 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung bla na med pa 'bud par 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod chos 
[\[23b.5\]]kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bar 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi sgron ma bla na med pa 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi char bla na med pa 'bebs par 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra stong phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod sems 
[\[23b.6\]]can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma shin tu 'jigs su rung ba 'jigs pa chen po'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongs su thar bar byed par 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod sangs rgyas 
[\[23b.7\]]bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]po'i yon tan tshe 'di dang ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong ba sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin par mthong nas snying brtse ba'i slad du/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[24a.2\]]cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang /_gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi khang pa na mchis pa dag spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs kyis bskul ma thag tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/_mi'i rgyal po de khang pa brtsegs pa phyag 
[\[24a.3\]]dar ma mchis pa legs par phyag dar bgyis pa/_spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par btab pa/_rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang 
[\[24a.4\]]po brgya byin dang /_lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang /_lha mo chen mo dpal dang /_sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag 
[\[24a.5\]]na rdo rje dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang /_'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/_mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs 
[\[24a.6\]]kyis brgyan pa ga la ba dang /_chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/_me tog bkram pa'i sa la bshams par 'gyur ba ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang 
[\[24a.7\]]g.yog tu bcas pa/_gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad mthun par bgyis te mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa/_dge ba 'thob par bgyid pa/_bla na med pa chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la/_chos kyi bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur ma thag tu/_mi'i rgyal po de 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal po'i pho brang de dang grong khyer de dang yul de yang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyab pa 
[\[24b.2\]]dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/chad pa spang bar yang bgyi'o/_/yul de yang 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang nad 'go ba dang 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi'o/_/btsun pa 
[\[24b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur te/_mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di byung la/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po de dge slong dang dge slong ma'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i 
[\[24b.4\]]dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la bsti stang mi bgyid/_bla mar mi bgyid/_rim gro mi bgyid/_mchod pa mi bgyid na/_bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma chos nyan pa 'di dang chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi 
[\[24b.5\]]bgyid/_rim gro mi bgyid/_lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid/_bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs kyang mi bskyed/_bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid do/_/btsun 
[\[24b.6\]]pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang /_gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis yul de yal bar bor na yul na gnas pa'i lha'i 
[\[24b.7\]]tshogs thams cad kyis kyang yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/_rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/_yul na gnas pa'i 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]sems can thams cad kyang 'thab pa skye ba dang mtshang 'dru ba skye ba dang rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/_rdzogs pa dang 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang gza' dang nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur/_phyogs tha dad pa nas skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur/_gza' dang rgyu skar rnams 
[\[25a.2\]]kyang phan tshun mi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/_dgung zla 'char ba de'ang nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/_zla ba'i gza' dang nyi ma'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/_nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' la gnas pa yang rtag par rgyun du sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_dus dus su nam 
[\[25a.3\]]mkha' la 'ja'i kha dog lta bu 'khyil bar 'gyur/_sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur/_sa la gnas pa'i khron pa yang sgra 'byin par grag par 'gyur/_yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/_char drag po 'bab par 'gyur/_yul du mu ge'i dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_pha rol gyi dmag 
[\[25a.4\]]tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur/_yul de phung bar 'gyur/_sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/_yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[25a.5\]]brgya stong phrag du ma dang yul na gnas pa'i lha dang klu rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/_yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dang gnod pa sna tshogs stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/_de bdag nyid 
[\[25a.6\]]la kun tu bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/_rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong bar 'tshal bar 'gyur/_bde ba thams cad bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/_yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal 
[\[25a.7\]]bar 'gyur/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad pham par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/_yul thams cad yun ring du yongs su skyong 'tshal bar 'gyur/_chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/_rang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang nad 'go ba dang 'khrug pa 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma mdo 
[\[25b.2\]]sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang bgyi/_bla mar bgyi/_rim gro bgyi/_mchod pa bgyi/_bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim 
[\[25b.3\]]par bgyi/_bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi chen po yang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[25b.4\]]ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang /_drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna 
[\[25b.5\]]tshogs dag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slad du 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag las ches mchog ches khyad par du 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[25b.6\]]tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya phrag stong de dag dang brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong thams cad pas ches mchog ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par 
[\[25b.7\]]bshad pa lags so/_/ji ltar na 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar rang gi yul kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang /_yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]ji ltar yul thams cad na gnod pa dang dgra ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar yul de dag na nad 'go ba ma mchis shing 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar yul thams cad 
[\[26a.2\]]chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar mi'i rgyal po de dag gis rang rang gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha dag dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[26a.3\]]ji ltar bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang /_gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po 
[\[26a.4\]]rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang stobs dang mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad 
[\[26a.5\]]lo legs shing nyams dga' ba dang skye bo dang mis gang bar 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar sems can thams cad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[26a.6\]]phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag thams 
[\[26a.7\]]cad de lta na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag pas ches 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]gi lha'i shes pa bas ches 'phags pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thams cad pas ches 'phags pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[26b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do/_/mi'i rgyal po'i dgongs pa dang rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang rgyal po'i 
[\[26b.3\]]bgyi ba gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang /_gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang 
[\[26b.4\]]po 'di nye bar bstan/_yongs su brjod/_yang dag par rab tu bshad do/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu de dang rkyen des mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par bgyi/_gus par rim gror bgyi/_gus 
[\[26b.5\]]par mchod par bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas gdon mi za bar mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 
[\[26b.6\]]nyan pa dang rim gro byed pa dang mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir spro ba cher gyis shig_/rgyal po chen po dag_/dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chu gcig 
[\[26b.7\]]dang /_de dag lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur te/_rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis ci nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma bsrung ba dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_nad med pa dang /_'khrug pa med pa dang /_sems bde bar 'gyur zhing /_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur bar dge slong ngam dge 
[\[27a.2\]]slong ma 'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/_yongs su bskyab par bya/_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_rgyal po chen 
[\[27a.3\]]po yul 'khor srung dang /_rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /_rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_de'i tshe 
[\[27a.4\]]mngon sum du tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/rgyal ba zla ba dri ma med pa'i sku/_/rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'od/_/rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan/_/rgyal ba me tog pad rtsa rdul med tshems/_/rgyal 
[\[27a.5\]]ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste/_/rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis gang /_/ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang /_/rgyal ba'i zhabs ni 'khor lor bris pa ste/_/khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong /_/phyag dang zhabs ni 
[\[27a.6\]]dra bas spras pa ste/_/zhabs kyi dra ba ngang pa'i dbang po bzhin/_/gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu gda'/_/rgyal ba dri med gser gyi ri dbang po/_/yon tan thams cad ri rab 'dra ba ste/_/sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba nya ba 'dra/_/
[\[27a.7\]]nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bu chags med pa/_/rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_stobs bcu dag gi gser 'od dam pa yi/_/mdo sde'i 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]dbang po'i rgyal po rab mchog 'di/_/'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyis ni/_/brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang bar bya/_/'di ltar mdo sde dkon mchog zab mo 'di/_/sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed pa/_/sems can rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyir/_/
[\[27b.2\]]'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur/_/'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi/_/'jig rten dag na ngan song sdug bsngal dang /_/sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi ni/_/sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o/_/gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling ni 
[\[27b.3\]]'di na yang /_/'dzam bu'i gling gnas rgyal po thams cad kyis/_/rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni/_/chos rnams kyis ni yul dag bskyang bar gyis/_/gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di bde ba dang /_/shin tu lo legs nyams kyang dgar 'gyur zhing /_/'dzam bu'i 
[\[27b.4\]]gling ni thams cad dag na yang /_/sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar gyis/_/'di ni mi yi dbang po gang rnams ni/_/yul na dga' dang bdag bde dga' ba dang /_/rgyal srid rnam par 'byor pa dga' ba des/_/mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya/_/pha 
[\[27b.5\]]rol dgra ni yang dag zad byed pa/_/pha rol dgra tshogs zlog pa dge byed pa/_/mchog tu 'jigs pas phongs pa sel byed pa/_/mchog tu dge byed mdo sde'i dbang po 'di'o/_/ji ltar rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes pa/_/yon tan kun 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar/_/
[\[27b.6\]]rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang /_/mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de ltar blta/_/ji ltar chu grang skom pa sel byed pa/_/tsha bas nyam thag che na rnyed pa ltar/_/yon tan dag gis skom pa'i rgyal po la/_/mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no/_/ji 
[\[27b.7\]]ltar rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/_/rin chen snod ni lag mthil yod pa ltar/_/mi yi dbang po'i tshogs la gser 'od mchog_/mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no/_/'di ni lha yi tshogs kyis mngon mchod pa/_/mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyag byas pa/_/
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po la/_/bzhi po dag gis kun tu bsrungs pa yin/_/phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /_/mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs/_/mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad pa na/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes 
[\[28a.2\]]brjod pa byin/_/gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis/_/phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang srung bar byed/_/rab tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis/_/mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed/_/'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par gyur pa yi/_/lha yi tshogs rnams 
[\[28a.3\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas/_/mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed/_/chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni/_/gzi brjid dang ni stobs dang brtson 'grus thob/_/gzi brjid chen po yi ni lha yi lus/_/shin tu rgyas shing 
[\[28a.4\]]rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du byung bar gyur dga' bar gyur te/_de dag chos kyi shugs kyis yud tsam zhig ngus nas mchi ma phyis te/_de dag lus 
[\[28a.5\]]'phar yan lag 'dar zhing dga' ba dang bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag gis gtor mngon par gtor to/_/gtor mngon par gtor nas kyang stan las langs te gos phrag pa gcig tu 
[\[28a.6\]]bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal po chen po re re yang gnod sbyin lnga 
[\[28a.7\]]brgya lnga brgya dang chos smra ba de bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du rtag tu dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas lha mo chen mo 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]dbyangs can gyis gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag 
[\[28b.2\]]gis kyang dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan pa'i slad du spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/_gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi/_nges pa'i tshig gi brjod pa kun tu gzhag par bgyi/_dge slong chos smra ba de la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po bgyi'o/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang 
[\[28b.3\]]po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig gam yi ge gang yang rung ba dag cig yongs su nyams par gyur tam/_bskyud na bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang tshig dang yi ge de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong dag la dge 
[\[28b.4\]]ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sems can du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas shes rab 
[\[28b.5\]]rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang /_shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /_tshe 'di la tshe phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_srog la phan gdags pa dang /_bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'dzin par 
[\[28b.6\]]'gyur ba dang /_thabs sna tshogs rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang /_bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_bskyud pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du de la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[28b.7\]]dge slong chos smra ba de dang sems can chos nyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste/_gza' dang /_rgyu skar dang /_skye ba dang /_'chi ba'i gnod pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_rnyog pa dang /_'khrug long dang /_khrag khrug dang /_
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]rmi lam ngan pa dang /_log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang /_byad dang ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du stsal ba'i sman dang sngags ni 'di dag ste/_shu dag gi'u wang 'u su dang /_/sha myang sha mi shi ri sha_/dbang 
[\[29a.2\]]po'i lag dang skal ba che/_/dz+nya ma shing tsha a ga ru/_/shi ri be sta sra rtsi dang /_/gu gul ra sa sh+la la ki/_/rdo dreg lo ma rgya spos dang /_/tsan+dan dang ni ldong ros dang /_/gi wang bcas dang ru rta dang /_/gur gum gla sgang yungs kar dang /_/sbyi mo sug smel na la da/_/nA ga ge 
[\[29a.3\]]sar u shi ra/_/'di dag cha ni mnyam bgyis nas/_/skar ma rgyal la btags par bgyi/_/phye ma la ni sngags tshig 'di/_/lan brgya mngon par gdab par bgyi/_/tad ya thA/_su kr-i te kr-i ta ka ma la nI la dzi na ka ra te/_haM ka rA te/_in+d+ra dza li/_sha kad dre ba shad dre/_a brta ka 
[\[29a.4\]]si ke/_na ku tra ku/_ka bi la ka bi la ma ti/_shI la ma ti/_san d+hi d+hu d+hu ma ma ba ti/_shi ri shi ri/_sa t+ya s+thi te swA hA/_lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas ni/_/me tog sil ma dgram par bgyi/_/gser gyi snod dang dngul snod du/_/mngar ba'i khu ba gzhag par bgyi/_/skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni/_/bzhi zhig der 
[\[29a.5\]]yang gzhag par bgyi/_/rab tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bzhi/_/bum pa thogs pa gzhag par bgyi/_/rtag tu gu gul bdug par bgyi/_/sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du stsal/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis/_/lha mo de ni legs par brgyan/_/bar bar dag tu me long gzhag_/mda' dang 
[\[29a.6\]]mdung rtse rna brang gzhag_/de nas mtshams kyang gcad par bgyi/_/de yi 'og tu dgos pa brtsam/_/sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis/_/mtshams bcad pa yang brtsam par bgyi/_/s+yad ya the dan/_a ra ke_/na ya ne/_hi le/_mi le/_gi le/_khi khi le swA hA/_bcom 
[\[29a.7\]]ldan 'das kyi snam logs su khrus bgyis nas sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na khrus kyi zhi bar sbyor ro/_/tad ya thA/_sa ga Te/_bi ga De/_bi ga ta ba ti swA hA/_phyogs bzhi dag na gang gnas pa'i/_/rgyu skar dag gis tshe srungs shig_/btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang /_/
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]phung po'i las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang /_/'byung po'i khams rnams 'khrug bgyid pa/_/'jigs pa mi bzad zhi gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_sha me/_bi sha me swA hA/_sa ga Te/_bi ga Te swA hA/_su kha ti na te swA hA/_sA ga ra saM b+hU tA ya swA hA/_skan d+ha ma tA ya swA hA/_nI la kaN+ThA ya swA hA/_a pa 
[\[29b.2\]]ra dzi ta bIr+yA ya swA hA/_hi ma ba ta saM b+hU tA ya swA hA/_a ni mi la bka trA ya swA hA/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_brah+ma Ne/_na maHsa ra swa t+yai de byai sid+h+yaM tu man+t+ra pa da/_daM brah+ma a nu ma n+ya tu swA hA/_dge slong chos smra ba de bsrung ba dang chos mnyan pa de dag dang /_yi ger 'dri ba de dag gi don gyi 
[\[29b.3\]]slad du khrus kyi las 'dis bdag nyid der mchi bar bgyi'o/_/lha'i tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig tu grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal lam/_gtsug lag khang der nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/_/ji ltar dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen 
[\[29b.4\]]ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la phan gdags par 'gyur ba dang /_'khor ba las 'byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[29b.5\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar gza' dang /_'thab pa dang /_rnyog pa dang /_btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang /_byad dang /_ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha 
[\[29b.6\]]mo dbyangs can la/_lha mo chen mo dbyangs can khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/_khyod kyis sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra ba bshad pa ni legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/lha mo dbyangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[29b.7\]]la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di n+yas lha mo dbyangs can de bkug go/_/lha mo chen mo dbyangs can mchod 'os dka' thub che/_/'jig rten kun tu rnam grangs mchog sbyin yon tan che/_/rtser gnas mdzes ma dar ba rtswa 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]yi gos bskus pa/_dar ba rtswa yi gos gyon rkang pa gcig gis gnas/_/lha rnams thams cad lhags nas 'di skad ces smras te/_/sems can rnams la dge ba'i tshig shod lce khrol cig_/s+yAd ya the dan/_mu re/_tsi re/_a ba dze/_a ba dza ba te/_hi gu le/_
[\[30a.2\]]mi gu le/_pi ga la ba ti/_ma gu she/_ma ri tsi/_sa ma ti/_da sha ma ti/_a gri ma gri/_ta ra/_tsi ta ra/_tsa pa ti/_tsi tsi ri/_shi ri mi ri/_ma ri tsi/_pra Na ye/_lo ka dz+yeSh+The/_lo ka shriSh+The/_lo ka pri ye/_sid d+hi pri te/_bi ma mu khi shu tsi kha ri/_a pra ti ha te/_a pra te ha ta/_bud d+he/_na mu tsi/_
[\[30a.3\]]na mu tsi/_ma hA de bI pra ti gr-ih+na na ma ska raM/_bdag gi blo thogs pa med par gyur cig_/bstan bcos dang tshigs su bcad pa'i rgyud dang /_sde snod dang snyan dngags la sogs pa bdag gi rig sngags dngos grub tu gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_ma hA pra b+ha bA/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_
[\[30a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dbyangs can gyi mthus bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig_/ka ra Te ke yU re/_ke yU ra ba ti/_hi li mi li/_hi li mi li/_hi li hi li/_sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /_chos kyi bden pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang /_dbang po'i bden pa 
[\[30a.5\]]dang /_chu lha'i bden pas lha mo chen mo dgug par bya'o/_/gang dag 'jig rten na bden pa smra ba de dag gi bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis lha mo chen mo dgug par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hi li hi li/_hi li mi li/_hi li mi li/_bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig_/bcom 
[\[30a.6\]]ldan 'das ma lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag la gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/_de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di n+yas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/'byung po'i 
[\[30a.7\]]tshogs rnams thams cad nga la nyan par gyis/_/lha dang dri za lha dbang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/bud med dam pa lha mo mchog gi rab gang yin/_/lha mo dam pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i zhal la bstod/_/yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pas yan lag brgyan/_/dbyangs 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]can zhes bya spyan ni yangs shing bsod nams 'bar/_/dri med ye shes yon tan rnams kyis rnam par rgyas/_/rin chen sna tshogs tha dad lta bu blta ba'i phyir/_/mchog rab ngag gi yon tan khyad par de bstod do/_/dam pa mchog gi dngos grub byed pa dang /_/yang dag 
[\[30b.2\]]bsngags dang yon tan byed pa dang /_/dri med mchog dang pad+ma 'bar ba dang /_/mig mchog dang ni mig gi dam pa dang /_/dge ba'i gnas dang dge ba mthong ba dang /_/yon tan bsam du med pas brgyan pa dang /_/zla ba 'dra dang dri ma med 'od dang /_/ye shes 'byung 
[\[30b.3\]]gnas dran pa dam pa dang /_/seng ge mchog dang mi la zhon pa dang /_/lag pa brgyad rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang /_/zla ba nya ba lta bur snang ba dang /_/yid du 'ong ba'i ngag dang dbyangs snyan dang /_/shes rab zab mo dang ni ldan pa dang /_/dgos mchog sgrub byed sems 
[\[30b.4\]]can dam pa dang /_/lha dang lha min dbang pos mchod pa dang /_/lha dang lha min tshogs kun gnas brjod dang /_/'byung po'i tshogs kyi gnas rtag mchod pa'i phyir swA hA/_/bdag cag lha mo 'di la phyag bya'o/_/bdag la yon tan khyad par kun stsol cig_/dgos 
[\[30b.5\]]pa kun tu bdag la dngos grub stsol/_/dgra rnams khrod na bdag la rtag tu srungs/_/yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag ni/_/nang par langs nas gtsang mar brjod par bya/_/bsam pa dang ni nor 'bru thams cad rnyed/_/dngos grub dge ba rgya chen thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[30b.6\]]gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_dbyangs can gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo chen mo dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dpal bdag gis kyang /_ci nas chos smra 
[\[30b.7\]]ba'i dge slong de yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /_brel phongs ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /_sems brtas par 'gyur ba dang /_sems bde bar gdugs mtshan bas par 'gyur ba dang /_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig dang yi ge 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]rnam pa tha dad pa dag chub par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam par rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par brjod par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 
[\[31a.2\]]'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing /_myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[31a.3\]]mu ge ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_lo legs par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rnams kyang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[31a.4\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu chad par 'gyur ba gang 'di gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad dang /_'tshog 
[\[31a.5\]]chas gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong chos smra ba de spro bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang /_gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la lha mo chen mo dpal 
[\[31a.6\]]gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/_des da ltar phyogs gang dang gang du sems pa dang /_phyogs gang dang gang du lta ba dang /_phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang der sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur/_
[\[31a.7\]]zas dang /_skom dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_dngul dang /_sa le sbram dang /_yo byad gzhan dag gis kyang mi phongs par 'gyur/_sems can de dag yo 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]byad thams cad kyang 'byor par 'gyur ro/_/lha mo chen mo dpal gyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bya/_spos dang me tog dang bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/_lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nas lan gsum brjod cing de la spos dang /_bdug pa dang me tog kyang byin la ro bro ba 
[\[31b.2\]]sna tshogs kyang byin na de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_sa la sa yi bcud dag rnam par 'phel/_/lha rnams rtag par rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/'bras bu lo tog ldum sdong ljon lha rnams/_/lo tog shin tu sna tshogs 
[\[31b.3\]]rnams kyang bskyed/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming brjod pa'i sems can de dag la lha mo chen mo dpal sems par 'gyur/_de dag la dpal chen por byed par 'gyur ro/_/lha mo chen mo dpal ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na skyed mos tshal dam pa 
[\[31b.4\]]bsod nams kyi me tog 'od ces bya ba na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa dam pa gser gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba na gnas te/_mi gang la la 'bru'i phung po spel bar 'dod pa des rang gi khyim phyag dar legs par bya/_khrus legs par bya/_gos dkar po gtsang 
[\[31b.5\]]ma bgo bar bya/_gos dri rab tu zhim pa bgo bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang /_gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal zhing mtshan nas kyang lan 
[\[31b.6\]]gsum brjod/_lha mo chen mo dpal gyi lag nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par byed/_me tog dang bdug pa dang spos kyang dbul/_ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang dbul/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming yang lan gsum brjod/_bden pa'i tshig kyang 
[\[31b.7\]]brjod/_lha mo chen mo dpal la yang mchod cing me tog dang bdug pa yang 'bul/_ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'bul na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus/_de'i tshe lha mo chen mo dpal khyim de la sems par 'gyur/_de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po yang 'phel 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/lha mo chen mo dpal dgug par 'dod pa des rig pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag dran par bya'o/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 
[\[32a.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/_rig pa 'di dag la sbyor bar bya ste/_rig sngags 'di rnams bdag la 'byor bar gyur cig_/s+yAd ya the dan/_pra ti pU ra Na bA re/_sa 
[\[32a.3\]]man+ta dar sha ne/_ma hA bi ha ra ga te/_sa man+ta/_be da na ga te/_ma hA kAr+yaM pra ti pra ba Ne/_satwa ar+tha sa maM tA nu pra pU re/_A yA na d+harma tA ma hA b+ho gi ne/_ma hA mai tre u pa saM hi he/_he tai Shi/_saM gra hi te te sa mar thA nu pA lA ni/_'di dag ni spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i chos nyid kyi gsang 
[\[32a.4\]]sngags kyi tshig gcig tu de kho na yang dag par sgrub par sbyin pa mi slu ba'i don gyi tshig ste/_sems can bar ma la sbyor ba rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dag gis lo bdun du 'don cing 'dzin pa dag yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen par gnas pa la bsnyen te/_bdag dang 
[\[32a.5\]]sems can thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir snga dro dang phyi dro sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang spos rnams kyis mchod nas/_des bdag gi bsam pa 'di 'byor par gyur cig_/myur du 'byor par gyur cig_/gtsug lag khang ngam dgon pa'i 
[\[32a.6\]]gnas kyang rung ste/_khyim de shin tu gtsang mar byas la lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/_spos dang bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/_stan gtsang ma yang gding bar bya'o/_/sa la me tog sil ma bkram nas bsdad par bya'o/_/de nas skad cig de nyid la dpal 'ongs nas der gnas par 'gyur 
[\[32a.7\]]ro/_/de phyin cad khyim mam/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_dgon pa'i gnas su nam yang brel cing phongs pa med par byed do/_/'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_rin po che dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_yo byad thams cad 'byor pa dang /_bde 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag byed pa de dag thams cad las lha mo chen mo dpal la shas kyi mchog sbyin par bya ste/_des na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de na gnas par 'gyur/_phongs par mi 'gyur/_de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs 
[\[32b.2\]]su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_lha mo chen mo dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o//_//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[32b.3\]]dri ma med par 'bar ba rin chen gser gyi 'od zer snang ba'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu gser gyi rgyal mtshan gser du snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser du snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[32b.4\]]nyi ma brgya'i 'od zer snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser rin chen 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgron 
[\[32b.5\]]ma chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od dam pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi snying po zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[32b.6\]]sems dpa' rtag tu ngu zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags zhes bya ba dang /_shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba dang /_lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba dang /_nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[32b.7\]]tshe dpag med ces bya ba dang /_byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba ste/_su gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'di dag 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_khong du chud par byed na de rtag 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal 
[\[33a.2\]]lam/_ljongs sam/_dgon pa'i phyogs sam/_ri'i sman ljongs sam/_pho brang 'khor gang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_dgon pa'i phyogs sam/_ri'i sman ljongs sam/_pho brang 'khor der btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[33a.3\]]'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba dang /_sa phyogs gang dang gang na dge slong chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri shom par 'gyur ba dang /_gang dang 
[\[33a.4\]]gang du chos smra ba de stan la mchis nas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag sa phyogs de dang de nyid du mchi bar bgyi'o/_/lus 'di mi gda' bar chos kyi khri'i 
[\[33a.5\]]'og logs su mchis te/_yan lag gi dam pa mgos dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang mthil nas brten par bgyi'o/_/bdag kyang chos mnyan pa dang chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/_yang dag par rim gro bgyi/_yang dag par mchod par bgyi'o/_/bdag 
[\[33a.6\]]tshim par gyur/_rim gro bgyi ba bgyis par gyur/_rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/_sa'i phung po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad po 'di nas sa'i gzhi rdo rje la thug pa'i bar du sa'i bcud kyis rnam par 'phel bar bgyi/_yang dag par rim gro bgyi yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/
[\[33a.7\]]steng du yang rgya mtsho'i mtha' la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di sa'i bcud kyi snum gyis brlan par bgyi'o/_/sa chen po 'di rab tu mdangs dang ldan par bgyi'o/_/des na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal sna tshogs rnams mdangs dang rab 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]tu ldan par 'khrungs par 'gyur/_kun dga'i ra ba dang /_nags tshal dang /_shin ljon pa thams cad dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyang rab tu mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/_dri dang rab tu ldan pa dang /_snum 
[\[33b.2\]]dang rab tu ldan pa dang /_ro zhim por 'gyur ba blta na rab tu sdug pa dang rab tu che bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag kyang btung ba dang bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag 'tshal nas/_tshe dang stobs dang kha dog dang dbang po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/gzi brjid dang stobs 
[\[33b.3\]]dang kha dog dang gzugs dang ldan par gyur nas kyang sa la mchis pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa brgya stong du ma dag bgyid par 'gyur/_brtson par 'gyur/_'bad par 'gyur/_stobs su bgyid pa'i las rnams bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu 
[\[33b.4\]]des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad zhi ba dang lo legs pa dang rgyas pa dang nyams dga' bar 'gyur/_mi'i skye bo mang pos gang bar 'gyur/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur/_dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/_sems can de dag gzi brjid 
[\[33b.5\]]dang stobs dang kha dog dang gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i slad du dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa de dag chos kyi stan la mchis pa'i gan du mchi bar 'gyur/_
[\[33b.6\]]mchis nas kyang sems rab tu dang bas sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba dang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi ba'i slad du chos smra ba de dag la gsol ba 'debs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[33b.7\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rab tu bshad na/_sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag g.yog dang bcas te/_rab tu mdangs dang ldan pa dang /_rab tu stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bdag cag gi lus la stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur/_bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang dpal dang /_phun sum tshogs pa yang 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur/_gzi brjid dang stobs dang /_
[\[34a.2\]]brtson 'grus dang mthu dang shugs chen po thob par gyur na/_sa chen po'i dpag tshad stong phrag bdun pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i sa'i bcud chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_sa chen po mdangs dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa la brten pa'i sems can de dag 
[\[34a.3\]]thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur/_chen por yang 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i sems can de dag chen por gyur nas kyang /_longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa sna tshogs la spyod par 'gyur/_bde ba yang myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag thams cad bza' ba dang /_
[\[34a.4\]]btung ba dang bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_gos dang mal cha dang /_gnas dang /_khang pa dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_chu bo dang /_rdzing dang /_chu mig dang /_mtshe'u dang /_mtsho dang /_lteng ka dang /_'di lta bu'i yo byad bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs sa la 
[\[34a.5\]]gnas pa sa las byung ba sa la brten pa 'di dag la spyod par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des sems can de dag thams cad kyis bdag la byas pa gzo bar bgyi'o/_/gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du bgyis te/_mnyan 
[\[34a.6\]]par bgyi/_bkur stir bgyi/_bla mar bgyi/_rim gror bgyi/_mchod par bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe sems can de dag chos smra ba de'i gan du mchi ba'i slad du/_rigs tha dad pa dang khyim tha dad pa dag nas 'byung ste/_mchis nas gser 'od dam pa mdo 
[\[34a.7\]]sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par gyur la/_thos nas kyang rang rang gi rigs dang /_khyim dang grong dang grong rdal tha dad pa dag tu zhugs nas/_rang rang gi khyim na gnas pa dag phan tshun du 'di skad ces bdag cag gis de ring chos mnyan pa zab mo thos so/_/de ring bdag cag gis 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ngo /_/bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa des de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag mnyes par byas so/_/deng bdag cag gis chos nyan pa 'dis sems can dmyal ba las yongs su 
[\[34b.2\]]thar to/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul las yongs su thar to/_/deng bdag cag chos nyan pa 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_tshe rabs brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mir skye ba yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes gtam zer 
[\[34b.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/khyim tha dad pa na gnas par 'gyur ba de dag sems can gzhan dag la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na dpe gcig brjod dam/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na le'u gcig gam/_sngon byung ba gcig 
[\[34b.4\]]gam/_tha na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig gam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig gam/_tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/_tshig gcig gis sems can gzhan dag la thos par bgyid dam/_tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal 
[\[34b.5\]]po 'di'i mtshan gzhan dag la rab tu ston tam/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na sems can rnam pa tha dad pa de dag sa phyogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag tu mdo sde'i gtan tshigs rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta bu 'di dag gcig la gcig brjod dam/_thos par bgyid dam/_
[\[34b.6\]]gtam brgyud brjod na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs de dag thams cad shin tu mdangs dang ldan pa dang shin tu snum par 'gyur ro/_/sa phyogs de dang de dag tu sems can thams cad kyi phyir/_sa'i bcud rnam pa sna tshogs dang yo byad thams cad rgyas par skye bar 'gyur/_
[\[34b.7\]]rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_shin tu rgyas par 'gyur/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/nor che ba dang /_longs spyod che ba dang /_sbyin pa la mos par 'gyur/_dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dad par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig gcig nyan na de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris 
[\[35a.2\]]kyi nang du lha'i ris gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/_gnas de dag legs par brgyan par byed dam/_tha na gdugs gcig gam/_ba dan gcig gam/_
[\[35a.3\]]ras bcos bu gcig gis g.yogs na sa'i lha mo rtag tu brgyan pa'i gnas de dag 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris bdun po de dag tu lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang rgyan thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa dag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe sems can de dag 
[\[35a.4\]]mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos te/_rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang de dag tu skye ba de'i tshe/_sa'i lha mo rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang re rer yang lan bdun bdun du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad 
[\[35a.5\]]ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das des na sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag dge slong chos smra ba chos kyistan la mchis pa de'i chos kyi stan gyi 'og logs kyi sa phyogs de dang de dag tu gnas par 
[\[35a.6\]]bgyi'o/_/ci nas kyang sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam 
[\[35a.7\]]pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu chad par 'gyur bar lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/_dge slong chos smra ba 
[\[35b.2\]]de'i rkang pa la yan lag gi dam pa mgos brten par bgyi'o/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad 
[\[35b.3\]]dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/_gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang 
[\[35b.4\]]ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_dgon pa'i phyogs sam/_ri'i sman ljongs sam/_pho brang 'khor gang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba der btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin gyi sde 
[\[35b.5\]]dpon chen po yang dag shes bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_dgon pa'i phyogs sam/_ri'i sman ljongs sam/_pho brang 'khor der mchi bar bgyi'o/_/lus mi gda' bar bgyi ste 
[\[35b.6\]]dge slong chos smra ba de bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/skyes pa'am bud med dam khye'u 'am bu mo chos nyan pa de dag thams cad dang /_
[\[35b.7\]]gang su dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig nyan pa dang tha na tshig gcig dang /_tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig gam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]gcig thos par gyur te/_gzung ba dang tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i ming thos par gyur te/_gzung ba de dag thams cad kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_
[\[36a.2\]]chad pa spang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/rigs de dag dang /_khyim de dag dang /_grong de dag dang /_grong khyer de dag dang /_grong rdal de dag dang /_dgon pa de dag dang /_pho brang 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_
[\[36a.3\]]yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dag gis/_bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes ming du chags par gyur ce na/_'di ni btsun pa bcom 
[\[36a.4\]]ldan 'das nyid kyi mngon sum mo/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad 'tshal to/_/chos thams cad yongs su 'tshal to/_/chos thams cad khong du chud do/_/chos thams cad ji snyed pa dang /_chos thams cad ji lta ba dang gnas pa gang lags 
[\[36a.5\]]pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi rigs gang lags pa dang /_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad bdag la mngon sum mo/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gi ye shes snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/ye shes kyi gsal ba bsam gyis mi 
[\[36a.6\]]khyab bo/_/ye shes kyi rgyu ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/ye shes kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gi ye shes kyi yul 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag chos thams cad 
[\[36a.7\]]yang dag par 'tshal ba dang /_yang dag par yongs su brtags pa dang /_yang dag par yongs su 'tshal ba dang /_yang dag par rnam par bltas pa dang /_yang dag par khong du chud pa'i rgyu des na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]dag shes zhes ming du chags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar chos smra ba de'i lus mi ngal bar 'gyur ba dang /_lus kyi dbang po bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[36b.2\]]rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang gi slad du sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sems 
[\[36b.3\]]can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang /_ye shes kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /_shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 
[\[36b.4\]]bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[36b.5\]]bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur bar de'i spu'i bu ga rnams su mdangs stsal bar bgyi'o/_/de'i lus la mthu dang stobs dang brtson 'grus chen po bskyed 
[\[36b.6\]]par bgyi'o/_/de'i ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab par bgyi'o/_/de'i dran pa khong du chud par bgyi'o/_/de cher spro bar bgyi'o/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_yang dag shes kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//
[\[36b.7\]]'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bzhi pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang gser gyi ri kha dog bzang 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]po gser du snang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas sku legs par brgyan pa/_gang chos kyi sgron ma 'di 'bar bar mdzad pa 
[\[37a.2\]]shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha mo chen mo dpal yon tan gyi 'bru dang bkra shis pa dpag tu med pa phun sum tshogs pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha mo chen mo dbyangs can shes rab kyi yon tan dpag tu med pa 'dus pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang de'i tshe de'i dus 
[\[37a.3\]]na rgyal po stobs kyi dbang po'i tog gi bu rgyal po mdzes pa'i tog dbang bskur nas ring por ma lon pa rgyal srid la gsar du gnas pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu gang ngas sngon dbang bskur nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na/_yab mchog gi dbang po'i tog las blangs pa 
[\[37a.4\]]rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba zhig yod de/_ngas rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig des lo nyi khri'i bar du rgyal po nyid byas par gyur te/_tha na sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam gyi tshod kyang sngon chos ma yin pas phyogs 'ga' zhig 
[\[37a.5\]]la gnas par ma shes so/_/bu rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba de gang zhe na/_des na rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po stobs kyi dbang po'i tog gi bu rgyal po mdzes pa'i tog la rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya 
[\[37a.6\]]ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/sems can kun la phan byed pa/_/the tshom thams cad gcod pa po/_/nyes byas thams cad 'jig byed pa/_/rgyal po'i bstan bcos bshad par bya/_/rgyal po thams cad so so nas/_/
[\[37a.7\]]dga' ba'i sems su 'gyur byos la/_/lha yi dbang po'i dam tshig kun/_/thal mo sbyar te mnyan par byos/_/rdo rje'i 'byung gnas ri dbang 'dir/_/lha yi dbang po 'dus pa na/_/tshangs dbang la ni dri ba'i phyir/_/'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang langs/_/khyod ni lha gtso tshangs 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]pa ste/_/khyod ni lha rnams dbang phyug lags/_/khyod ni bdag cag the tshom gcod/_/bdag cag dogs pa gcad du gsol/_/mir skyes pa yi rgyal po la/_/ji lta bur na lha zhes bgyi/_/gang gi rgyus na rgyal po la/_/lha sras zhes ni bgyi bar 'gyur/_/gal te lha ni ji lta 
[\[37b.2\]]bur/_/mi yi 'jig rten 'dir skye zhing /_/mi bdag gyur te mi rnams la/_/rgyal po nyid ni bgyid par 'gyur/_/'jig rten skyong bas tshangs dbang la/_/de skad yongs su dris pa dang /_/lha yi gtso bo tshangs pa des/_/'jig rten skyong la 'di skad smras/_/de ltar 'jig 
[\[37b.3\]]rten skyong rnams kyis/_/da ltar bdag la dris pas na/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/bstan bcos dam pa kho bos bstan/_/mi yi gnas su skyes pa yi/_/rgyal po rnams kyi skye ba dang /_/rgyu gang gis na yul rnams su/_/rgyal por 'gyur ba bshad par bya/_/
[\[37b.4\]]lha dbang rnams kyis byin rlabs kyis/_/ma yi rum du 'jug 'gyur te/_/lha yis sngar ni byin brlabs nas/_/phyi nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur/_/mi yi 'jig rten skyes kyang ni/_/mi yi dbang por gyur pa yin/_/lha las skyes par gyur pas na/_/de ni lha yi sras 
[\[37b.5\]]zhes bya/_/khyod ni lha kun bu yin zhes/_/sum cu rtsa gsum lha dbang gis/_/rgyal po'i skal ba byin nas ni/_/mi rnams kyi ni dbang por sprul/_/nyes pa byas pa rnam 'gog pa/_/chos ma yin pa gzhig pa dang /_/sems can legs byed dgod pa dang /_/
[\[37b.6\]]lha yi gnas su dgye ba'i phyir/_/mi yi dbang po mi shas dang /_/lha yi shas dang dri za'i shas/_/gdol pa'i shas dang srin shas kyis/_/nyes par byed pa zlog par byed/_/legs par bya ba byed rnams la/_/mi yi dbang po pha ma'i shas/_/rnam smin 'bras bu 
[\[37b.7\]]bstan pa'i phyir/_/lha yi rgyal po byin gyis brlabs/_/tshe 'di'i legs par byas pa dang /_/nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi/_/rnam smin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir/_/lha yi rgyal po byin gyis brlabs/_/yul na nyes byed gnas pa dag_/gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor zhing /_/
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]sdig pa can gyi skye bo la/_/mthun pa'i chad pas mi gcod cing /_/nyes par byas pa yal bor ba/_/de tshe chos min shin tu 'phel/_/'thab mo dang ni g.yo rnams kyang /_/yul 'khor de ni phyir phyir 'byung /_/sum cu rtsa gsum khang pa na/_/lha yi dbang po 
[\[38a.2\]]'khrug par 'gyur/_/yul na nyes byed gnas pa dag_/gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor ba/_/de tshe g.yo ni mi bzad pa/_/drag po rnams kyis yul 'joms 'gyur/_/pha rol dmag tshogs lhags nas su/_/yul 'khor de ni rnam par 'jig_/longs spyod rnams dang 
[\[38a.3\]]rigs kyang 'jig_/gang gis nor bsags yod pa yang /_/g.yo byed rnam pa mang po yis/_/phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur/_/bya ba gang gis rgyal po nyid/_/bya ba de ni mi byed na/_/glang chen dbang pos rdzing bu bzhin/_/rang gi yul 'khor rnam par 'jig_/ma 
[\[38a.4\]]rungs pa yi rlung ldang zhing /_/ma rungs pa yi char pa 'bab/_/nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang /_/gza' dang rgyu skar ma rungs 'gyur/_/rgyal pos yal bar bor na der/_/sa bon lo tog me tog 'bras/_/legs par smin par mi 'gyur zhing /_/mu ge dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[38a.5\]]yul na nyes byed gnas pa dag_/gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor ba/_/de tshe lha rnams khang pa na/_/yid ni dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lha rgyal dbang pos de dag kun/_/rgyal 'di chos dang mi ldan te/_/chos min phyogs la gnas pa zhes/_/phan tshun du ni smra bar 
[\[38a.6\]]'gyur/_/rgyal 'dis ring por mi thogs par/_/lha rnams 'khrug par byed par 'gyur/_/lha rnams rab tu 'khrugs pas na/_/de yi yul ni rnam par 'jig_/yul du chos min 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/mtshon chas kyang ni 'jig par 'gyur/_/g.yo rnams dang ni 
[\[38a.7\]]'thab mo dang /_/nad kyang kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/lha yi dbang po rab khros shing /_/lha rnams kyis kyang yal bar 'dor/_/yul 'khor de ni 'jig par 'gyur/_/rgyal po de ni mya ngan rnyed/_/spun nam yang na bu yang rung /_/sdug pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur/_/
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]sdug pa'i chung ma dang yang bral/_/yang na bu mo 'chi bar 'gyur/_/skar mda' dag kyang ltung bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin nyi ma 'dra ba 'byung /_/pha rol gyi ni dmag tshogs dang /_/mu ge shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de yi blon po phangs pa dang /_/glang po phangs pa 'chi bar 'gyur/_/
[\[38b.2\]]de yi 'og tu rnga mo ni/_/phangs pa dag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/_/khyim dang longs spyod nor rnams kyang /_/phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur/_/yul yul du ni mtshon cha yis/_/phan tshun dag tu 'debs par 'gyur/_/'thab mo dag dang rtsod dang g.yo/_/yul rnams su ni 
[\[38b.3\]]'byung bar 'gyur/_/yul 'khor du ni gdon 'jug cing /_/mi bzad pa yi nad kyang 'byung /_/de yi 'og tu sbyin gnas kyang /_/chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur/_/de yi 'khor dang blon po yang /_/chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur/_/chos dang mi ldan skye bo la/_/de 
[\[38b.4\]]yi 'og tu mchod byed 'gyur/_/chos dang ldan pa'i sems can la/_/rtag tu chad pas gcod par 'gyur/_/chos dang mi ldan skye bo bkur/_/chos ldan chad pas bcad pa na/_/der ni chu dang rgyu skar rlung /_/rnam gsum rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur/_/chos min skye bo bzung 
[\[38b.5\]]bas na/_/dam chos ro yi snying po mdangs/_/sems can mdangs dang sa yi bcud/_/dngos po rnam gsum rnam par 'jig_/skye bo ngan pa rab bkur cing /_/skye bo dam pa smad pas na/_/'chi dang lce 'bab mu ge dang /_/rnam pa gsum ni der 'byung 'gyur/_/'bras 
[\[38b.6\]]bu lo tog ro dang mdangs/_/de yi 'og tu med par 'gyur/_/sems can nad pa mang po dag_/yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mngar zhing che ba'i 'bras bu dag_/yul rnams na ni yod pa yang /_/kha ba dang ni tsha ba dang /_/chung ba dag ni nyid du 'gyur/_/rtse dang 
[\[38b.7\]]rgod dang dga' ba dang /_/sngan chad dga' ba'i dngos po dag_/dga' ba'i nyams ni mi dgar 'gyur/_/nyon mongs brgya yis rnam par 'khrugs/_/lo tog rnams dang 'bras bu yi/_/snum dngos khu ba zad pas na/_/lus dang khams dang dbang po la/_/de ltar tshim par mi 'gyur 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]ro/_/sems can rnams ni mdog ngan zhing /_/mthu chung shin tu rid par 'gyur/_/kha zas mang po zos kyang ni/_/tshim par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus dang /_/de yi 'og tu med par 'gyur/_/sems can brtson 'grus nyams pa 
[\[39a.2\]]dag_/yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sna tshogs nad kyis gzir ba yi/_/sems can nad mang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/srin po sna tshogs las gyur pa'i/_/gza' dang rgyu skar 'byung bar 'gyur/_/chos min phyogs la rab gnas te/_/rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pas/_/
[\[39a.3\]]'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor na/_/khams gsum rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/_/gang tshe rgyal po'i phyogs gnas te/_/nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe/_/'di 'dra'i nyes pa du ma dag_/yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dgos pa gang phyir lha dbang gis/_/
[\[39a.4\]]rgyal po byin gyis brlabs pa yi/_/rgyal po nyid ni mi byed cing /_/nyes byed yal bar 'dor na ni/_/legs par byas pas sems can rnams/_/lha yi gnas su lhar yang skye/_/nyes par byas pas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_/sems can dmyal dang dud 'gror skye/_/gang tshe 
[\[39a.5\]]rgyal po yul rnams na/_/nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe/_/sum cu rtsa gsum lha gnas nas/_/nyes par byas pas ltung bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po nyid ni mi byed na/_/de ni bu yang ma yin la/_/lha yi rgyal po pha rnams kyis/_/gnas la nyes dang bcas par 'gyur/_/
[\[39a.6\]]g.yo ni shin tu mi bzad pas/_/gang tshe yul 'khor 'jig 'gyur ba/_/de phyir lha yi dbang po yi/_/mi gnas rgyal po byin gyis brlabs/_/nyes pa byas zhi bya ba'i phyir/_/legs par byed la 'dzud pa ste/_/tshe 'di la ni sems can la/_/rnam smin bskyed pa rgyal po 
[\[39a.7\]]yin/_/legs byas dang ni nyes byas kyi/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras/_/rnam pa tha dad bstan pa'i phyir/_/byed pa gang yin rgyal por brjod/_/bdag gi don dang gzhan don dang /_/yul gyi chos kyi don gyi phyir/_/lha tshogs rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs/_/lha rnams 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]dag kyang rjes yi rang /_/yul 'khor rnams na skye bo ni/_/sdig can g.yon can 'dul ba dang /_/yul gyi chos kyi don gyi phyir/_/srog dang rgyal srid rnams kyang btang /_/chos ma yin pas bzod byed cing /_/shes bzhin yal bar 'dor ba ni/_/yul na 'jigs pa 
[\[39b.2\]]mi bzad pa/_/de 'dra gzhan ni yod ma yin/_/ji ltar g.yo rnams byung ba la/_/g.yo byed chad pas ma bcad na/_/yul du shin tu mi bzad pa'i/_/g.yo rnams phyir zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/_/glang chen rnams kyi rdzing chen bzhin/_/yul 'khor de ni rnam par 'jig_/
[\[39b.3\]]lha dbang rnams kyang khro bar 'gyur/_/lha yi gnas ni rnam par 'jig_/yul du dngos po thams cad ni/_/ma rungs par yang 'gyur bas na/_/de phyir sdig pa byed pa rnams/_/nyes pa'i rim bzhin gdul bar bya/_/chos kyis yul 'khor bskyang bar bya/_/chos ma 
[\[39b.4\]]yin pa spyad mi bya/_/srog kyang yongs su gtang bya zhing /_/nye 'khon bya bar mi bya'o/_/skye bo gnyen dang skye bo gzhan/_/yul 'khor skye bo thams cad la/_/rgyal pos phyogs kyang gcig bya yi/_/phyogs su lhung bar gyur ta re/_/rgyal po chos dang ldan pa yi/_/
[\[39b.5\]]grags pa 'jig rten gsum gang ste/_/sum cu gsum gyi gnas rnams na/_/lha yi dbang po dgar 'gyur te/_/'dzam bu'i gling na nged kyi bu/_/'di ltar chos ldan rgyal po yin/_/chos kyi yul 'khor der bstan nas/_/legs par byed la skye bo bkod/_/rgyal po de 
[\[39b.6\]]ni legs byed pas/_/skye bo dag ni 'dir 'gyed de/_/lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis/_/lha gnas gang bar byed snyam mo/_/chos kyi yul 'khor der bstan pas/_/rgyal po rnams ni rab tu dga'/_/lha dbang rab tu dang gyur pas/_/mi yi rgyal po de la bsrung /_/nyi zla 
[\[39b.7\]]dang ni de bzhin du/_/rgyu skar legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/_/rlung yang dus su ldang 'gyur zhing /_/char pa'ang dus su 'bab par 'gyur/_/lha gnas rnams dang de bzhin du/_/yul 'khor rnams su lo legs byed/_/lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis/_/lha yi gnas rnams gang 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]bar byed/_/de lta bas na rgyal po yi/_/bdag gis phangs pa'i srog btang gis/_/bdag gis 'jig rten bder 'gyur ba/_/dkon mchog chos ni mi btang ste/_/yon tan rnams kyis gang brgyan pa/_/chos dang ldan pas bsten par bya/_/rang gis skye bo 
[\[40a.2\]]rtag dga' ba/_/rtag tu sdig pa rnam par spangs/_/chos kyis yul 'khor bskyang bar bya/_/chos kyang yang dag bstan par bya/_/legs par byed la sems can dgod/_/nyes byed las ni bzlog par bya/_/gang tshe sdig pa byed pa rnams/_/tshul bzhin 'dul bar 
[\[40a.3\]]byed pa'i tshe/_/yul 'khor du ni lo legs shing /_/rgyal po gzi brjid ldan par 'gyur/_/rgyal po grags dang ldan 'gyur zhing /_/skye dgu rnams kyang bde bar skyong /_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig 
[\[40a.4\]]ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//gang tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur/_/de tshe rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa rnams btang /_/gling bzhi rin chen gang bar bcas pa yang /_/sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la ngas phul lo/_/chos kyi sku de yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/_/
[\[40a.5\]]gang sngon yid du 'ong zhing phangs pa yi/_/dngos po de dag ngas ni ma btang med/_/bskal pa du mar phangs pa'i srog kyang btang /_/ji ltar sngon gyi bskal pa bsam yas na/_/rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bde bar gshegs/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i bde bar gshegs pa de'i/_/
[\[40a.6\]]bstan la legs byung zhes pa'i rgyal po byung /_/de ni gling bzhi'i dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur/_/rgya mtshor thug pa'i sa la rab tu ston/_/rgyal dbang gsung phyir rgyal po'i pho brang na/_/de tshe rgyal po dam pa gnyid kyis log_/rmi lam du ni sangs rgyas yon tan thos/_/chos smra rin 
[\[40a.7\]]chen sog pa gnyid dkyil na/_/rnam par lhang nger mdo sde'i dbang po 'di/_/rab tu 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong bar gyur/_/rgyal po de ni gnyid kyis log las sad/_/de yi lus kun dga' bas khyab par gyur/_/mgu nas rgyal po'i khab nas mngon byung ste/_/nyan thos dge 'dun 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]mchog gi gnas su song /_/rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams la mchod byed cing /_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun 'di ni rin chen sog_/yon tan ldan pa'i dge slong gang yod ces/_/chos smra rin chen sog pa kun tu dris/_/de yi tshe na rin chen sog pa ni/_/phug gzhan zhig gi nang na 
[\[40b.2\]]'dug gyur te/_/mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni rnam sems la/_/kha ton byed cing bde bar rab tu 'dug_/dge slong chos smra rin chen sog pa de/_/phun sum gzi brjid dpal gyis rab 'bar zhing /_/phug gzhan zhig gi nang na 'dug gyur pa/_/de yi tshe na rgyal po de la bstan/_/'di na 
[\[40b.3\]]chos smra rin chen sog pa 'di/_/rgyal po'i spyod yul zab mo 'dzin pa ste/_/gser 'od dam pa zhes ni bya ba yi/_/mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rtag tu ston/_/rin chen sog pa'i rkang la phyag 'tshal te/_/rgyal po legs par byung bas 'di skad smras/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo 
[\[40b.4\]]sde'i dbang po'i rgyal/_/zla ba nya ba'i zhal 'dra bshad du gsol/_/rgyal po legs par byung ba de nyid la/_/rin chen sog pas khas ni blangs pas na/_/stong gsum pa yi 'jig rten thams cad du/_/lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/de tshe mi yi dbang 
[\[40b.5\]]pos sa phyogs ni/_/gtsang zhing mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa der/_/rin chen chu dang spos chus chag chag btab/_/me tog sil ma bkram ste khri bshams nas/_/rgyal pos khri de gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_/dar yug stong phrag du mas legs par brgyan/_/rgyal 
[\[40b.6\]]pos khri der tsan dan dam pa dag_/rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang mngon par gtor/_/lha dang klu dang lha min mi 'am ci/_/gnod sbyin dbang dang mkha' lding lto 'phye ches/_/lha yi me tog man dA ra ba'i char/_/khri de la ni mngon par rab tu phab/_/chos 'dod lha ni bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[40b.7\]]stong /_/bsam gyis mi khyab gang dag lhags gyur pa/_/rin chen sog pa mngon par byung ba na/_/sA la'i me tog dag gis mngon par 'thor/_/chos smra rin chen sog pa de nyid kyang /_/shin tu lus bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos te/_/khri der nye bar song bar byas nas ni/_/thal 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]mo sbyar ba byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha dbang dang ni lha dang lha mo rnams/_/bar snang 'dug nas me tog man dA ra'i/_/char pa 'bebs shing sil snyan brgya stong phrag_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag rab tu sgrogs/_/rin chen sog pa dge slong chos smra des/_/
[\[41a.2\]]phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas bye ba stong /_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dran byas nas/_/de ni mngon par 'dzegs te 'dug par gyur/_/sems can kun la snying brtse bskyed nas ni/_/snying rje'i sems kyang yang dag bskyed byas te/_/rgyal po legs par byung ba de la ni/_/de yi 
[\[41a.3\]]tshe na mdo sde 'di bstan te/_/rgyal pos thal mo sbyar byas btud nas su/_/tshig gcig gis ni rjes su yi rang ste/_/chos kyi shugs kyis mig nas mchi ma phyung /_/de yi lus ni dga' bas khyab par gyur/_/mdo sde 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_/de tshe rgyal po legs par 
[\[41a.4\]]byung ba yis/_/yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rgyal po blangs/_/sems can rnams phyir smon lam btab pa ni/_/rin chen bdun dang ldan pa'i rgyan rnams dang /_/gang yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rnams/_/bde bar 'gyur ba'i nor ni chen po yi/_/char pa de 
[\[41a.5\]]ring 'dzam bu'i gling du phob/_/de yi tshe na rin chen sna bdun dang /_/dpung rgyan dang ni do shal rna cha mchog_/de bzhin zas dang skom dang gos rnams kyang /_/gling bzhi dag tu rab tu 'bab par gyur/_/rgyal po legs par byung bas 'dzam gling du/_/rin chen char pa 'bab pa 
[\[41a.6\]]de mthong nas/_/gling bzhi rin chen gang bar bcas pa ni/_/rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bstan la phul/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nga /_/rgyal po legs par byung zhes bya bar gyur/_/gling bzhi dag ni rin chen gang bcas kyi/_/sa 'di de tshe nga yis yongs su 
[\[41a.7\]]btang /_/gang gis rgyal po legs par byung de la/_/de tshe mdo sde 'di ni rab bstan pa/_/rin chen sog pa chos smra'i dge slong de/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs der gyur to/_/ngas gang de tshe mdo sde 'di thos shing /_/tshig gcig gis ni rjes su yi rang ste/_/nga ni 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]dge ba'i las ni de nyid dang /_/chos nyan pa dang rjes su yi rang bas/_/gser gyi mdog dang bsod nams brgya yi mtshan/_/blta na sdug cing mig tu mngon mdzes la/_/lha stong bye ba rab tu dga' byed pa/_/skye bos mthong na dga' lus rtag tu thob/_/bskal pa dag ni bye ba 
[\[41b.2\]]brgya stong phrag_/dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'khor los sgyur rgyal gyur/_/bskal pa brgya stong du ma mang por yang /_/ngas ni khams kyi rgyal po myong bar gyur/_/bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab brgya byin gyur/_/tshangs pa'i dbang po yid bzhin de bzhin no/_/gang dag tshad ni nam 
[\[41b.3\]]yang yod min pa'i/_/stobs bcu dpag med ngas ni brnyes par byas/_/ngas gang mdo thos rjes su yi rang ba/_/bsod nams phung po de ltar tshad med mang /_/bsam pa ji bzhin ngas ni byang chub thob/_/chos sku dam pa yang ni ngas thob bo/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i 
[\[41b.4\]]dbang po'i rgyal po las legs par byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//dpal ldan lha mo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhig_/'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yo byad thams cad 
[\[41b.5\]]kyis mchod pa chen po shin tu rgyas shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa byed par 'dod cing /_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul zab mo yongs su shes par 'dod pa des gtsug lag khang ngam dgon pa'i phyogs 
[\[41b.6\]]kyang rung ste/_gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i phyogs der/_des gdon mi za bar g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis rna ba blags te gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[41b.7\]]kyis don 'di nyid 'khor la rgya cher brjod pa'i phyir/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad la/_/bsam yas mchod pa byed 'dod cing /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ba/_/zab mo rab tu shes 'dod pas/_/gtsug lag khang 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]ngam gnas khang ngam/_/gang na gser 'od dam pa yi/_/mdo sde dam pa 'di ston pa/_/sa phyogs der ni 'gro bar bya/_/mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yang yas/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho du ma las/_/sems can thams cad thar bar 
[\[42a.2\]]byed/_/mdo sde yi ni thog ma dang /_/dbus dang de bzhin tha ma mthong /_/mdo sde'i dbang po rab zab ste/_/'di la dpe ni yod ma yin/_/gang gA dang ni sa rnams dang /_/rgya mtsho dang ni nam mkha' la/_/gnas pa'i rdul ni gang yang rung /_/dper bya ba ni mi nus so/_/chos 
[\[42a.3\]]kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yi/_/de yi tshe na 'jug par bya/_/chos kyi bdag nyid mchod rten ni/_/zab mo rab brtan gang yin pa/_/mchod rten de yi dbus na ni/_/rgyal ba shAkya thub pa mthong /_/yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis su/_/mdo sde 'di ni rab tu ston/_/grangs med bsam gyis 
[\[42a.4\]]mi khyab pa'i/_/bskal pa bye ba ji snyed par/_/lha yi dang ni mi rnams kyis/_/bde ba dag ni rjes su myong /_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di nyan pa/_/de ltar bdag gi bsod nams kyi/_/phung po bsam yas bsgrub snyam du/_/de tshe des ni de ltar shes/_/mes gang 'obs kyis bskor ba yi/_/
[\[42a.5\]]dpag tshad brgya dag 'da' byed cing /_/tshor ba drag po bzod byas nas/_/mdo sde mnyan par gang nus pa/_/gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang du/_/zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni/_/sdig pa rnams ni med par 'gyur/_/rmi ngan mtshan nyid thams cad dang /_/gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa 
[\[42a.6\]]dang /_/byad dang gdon ni mi bzad kyang /_/zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni/_/thams cad gzhan du phyogs par 'gyur/_/klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis ni/_/rmi lam bstan pa ci 'dra bar/_/der ni pad+ma 'dra ba'i khri/_/de lta bur yang bsham par bya/_/khri de la ni 'dug nas su/_/mdo sde 'di 
[\[42a.7\]]ni rab tu bstan/_/yi ger bris pa bklag par bya/_/de bzhin yongs su chub par bya/_/khri de las ni babs nas su/_/yul gzhan song bar gyur na yang /_/khri de la ni yod pa yi/_/cho 'phrul rnams kyang snang bar 'gyur/_/chos smra ba yi gzugs su yang /_/de ni res 'ga' 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]snang bar 'gyur/_/res 'ga' sangs rgyas gzugs su ste/_/res 'ga' byang chub sems dpar yang /_/res 'ga' kun tu bzang po dang /_/de bzhin 'jam dpal gzugs su ste/_/res 'ga' byams pa'i gzugs su yang /_/khri de la ni snang bar 'gyur/_/res 'ga' 'od ni 
[\[42b.2\]]'ba' zhig snang /_/res 'ga' lha rnams snang bar 'gyur/_/yud tsam zhig ni der snang nas/_/de nas mi snang bar yang 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mthong na bsngags par 'gyur/_/thams cad du yang grub par byed/_/'bru dang bkra shis phun sum tshogs/_/mtshan ma sangs rgyas
