[\[42b.3\]]sprul pa yin/_/rgyal dang dpal dang grags par byed/_/phyir rgol ba yang ldog par byed/_/pha rol dgra tshogs rab tu 'joms/_/g.yul du dgra rnams phung bar byed/_/rmi ngan thams cad zhi bar byed/_/sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig_/sdig pa thams cad rab zhi 
[\[42b.4\]]byed/_/g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar byed/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad du/_/grags pas rab tu gang bar 'gyur/_/de yi dgra rnams thams cad ni/_/shin tu pham pa nyid du 'gyur/_/rtag tu dgra ni choms par 'gyur/_/sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs/_/
[\[42b.5\]]g.yul ngo'i rtse las rnam par rgyal/_/dgra dang bral zhing mchog tu dga'/_/tshangs dbang sum cu rtsa gsum dbang /_/de bzhin 'jig rten skyong rnams dang /_/lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang /_/rgyal ba khyu mchog yang dag shes/_/klu yi dbang po ma dros dang /_/de bzhin du ni 
[\[42b.6\]]rgya mtsho dang /_/mi 'am ci dbang lha min dbang /_/de bzhin nam mkha' lding dbang po/_/de dag la ni sogs pa dang /_/lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang /_/chos kyi mchod rten bsam yas la/_/rtag tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur/_/zhe sar bcas pa'i sems can rnams/_/
[\[42b.7\]]mthong nas shin tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/lha yi dbang po mchog de dag_/thams cad 'di snyam sems par 'gyur/_/lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang /_/phan tshun du ni smra byed pa/_/bsod nams dpal dang gzi brjid dag_/bsags pa de dag kun la ltos/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]sbyangs pa yi/_/mi rnams de dag 'dir lhags te/_/gang dag mdo sde zab mo 'di/_/nyan pa'i phyir ni 'dir lhags pa/_/dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_/chos kyi mchod rten gus dang bcas/_/de dag 'jig rten snying rje ldan/_/de dag sems can phan byed pa/_/
[\[43a.2\]]de dag zab mo'i chos rnams kyis/_/dam pa'i chos kyi ro yi snod/_/chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yis/_/de dag rab tu 'jug pa yin/_/gang dag gser 'od dam pa'i mdo/_/dge ba dam pa 'di nyan pa/_/de dag sngon chad sangs rgyas ni/_/brgya stong rnams la mchod pa 
[\[43a.3\]]yin/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni/_/mdo sde nyan pa de dag la/_/lha dbang rgyal po de kun dang /_/dbyangs can dang ni de bzhin du/_/dpal dang rnam thos bu dang ni/_/de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams dang /_/gnod sbyin brgya phrag stong po dag_/stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis/_/
[\[43a.4\]]phyogs bzhi dag ni kun nas kyang /_/bsrung ba shin tu byed par 'gyur/_/dbang po zla ba gshin rje dang /_/rlung dang chu lha nyid dang ni/_/skem byed 'jug sel dbyangs can dang /_/sbyin sreg za dang skye dgu dang /_/stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa/_/'jig rten skyong ba de kun kyang /_/
[\[43a.5\]]nyin mtshan g.yel ba med par ni/_/de dag rnams la srung bar byed/_/stobs chen gnod sbyin dbang gnyis dang /_/sred med bu dang dbang phyug che/_/yang dag shes la sogs pa dag_/gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_/gnod sbyin brgya phrag stong po dag_/stobs chen rdzu 'phrul 
[\[43a.6\]]ldan rnams kyis/_/'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad ni/_/de dag la ni srung bar byed/_/lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang /_/gnod sbyin dag ni lnga brgya dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang /_/de dag la ni srung bar byed/_/gnod sbyin dbang po nor bu bzang /_/de 
[\[43a.7\]]bzhin gang ba bzang po dang /_/ji 'jigs dang ni 'brog gnas dang /_/dmar ser dang ni ser skya dang /_/gnod sbyin dbang po re re yang /_/gnod sbyin lnga brgya dag gis ni/_/gang dag mdo sde 'di thos pa/_/de dag rnams la srung byed 'gyur/_/dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/_/rgyal ba khyu 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]mchog rgyal ba'i rgyal/_/nor bu'i mgul dang nges mgrin dang /_/de bzhin char pa'i bdag po dang /_/kam po ji dang nag po dang /_/de bzhin gser 'dra'i skra dang ni/_/lngas rtsen dang ni ra rkang dang /_/de bzhin skal ba chen po dang /_/yur ba can dang chos skyong dang /_/spre'u 
[\[43b.2\]]dang de bzhin 'khri byed dang /_/khab kyi spu dang gnyis bshes dang /_/de bzhin rin chen skra dang ni/_/yul chen can dang khyim med dang /_/'dod pa'i mchog dang tsan+dan dang /_/mthu bo che dang gangs can dang /_/bde ba'i ri nyid de bzhin te/_/stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa/_/rdzu 
[\[43b.3\]]'phrul ldan pa de kun kyang /_/gang dag mdo sde 'di dga' ba/_/de dag la ni srung bar byed/_/klu yi dbang po ma dros dang /_/de bzhin du yang rgya mtsho dang /_/e la'i 'dab dang btang bzung dang /_/dga' bo nye dga' gnyi ga dang /_/klu ni brgya phrag stong po dag_/stobs chen rdzu 
[\[43b.4\]]'phrul ldan rnams kyang /_/'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad las/_/de dag la ni srung bar byed/_/stobs can sgra gcan mi gtong dang /_/thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang bde mchog dang /_/rab sim byed dang phrag rtsub dang /_/de bzhin lha min dbang gzhan dang /_/lha min brgya phrag 
[\[43b.5\]]stong po dag_/stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis/_/'jigs skrag byung bar gyur pa las/_/de dag la ni bsrung bar 'gyur/_/'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog ma ni/_/lnga brgya'i bu dang bcas pa yang /_/'dug dang nyal dang ra ro'i tshe/_/de dag la ni srung bar byed/_/gdol pa mo dang 
[\[43b.6\]]gtum mo dang /_/de bzhin gnod sbyin gtum mo dang /_/mdung can dang ni so brtsegs dang /_/sems can kun gyi mdangs 'phrog ma/_/stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de kun kyang /_/phyogs bzhi dag ni kun nas su/_/de dag rnams la srung bar byed/_/
[\[43b.7\]]dbyangs can dag la sogs pa rnams/_/lha mo bsam gyis mi khyab dang /_/dpal la sogs pa de bzhin du/_/lha mo dag ni thams cad dang /_/sa yi lha mo nyid dang ni/_/lo tog 'bras bu nags lha dang /_/kun dga' shing ljon mchod rten la/_/gnas pa dag dang rlung lha dang /_/lha rnams de 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]dag thams cad 'dir/_/rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis ni/_/gang dag mdo sde 'di dga' ba/_/de dag rnams la srung bar byed/_/tshe dang mdog dang stobs rnams la/_/sems can dag ni sbyor bar byed/_/dpal dang bsod nams gzi brjid kyis/_/phun 
[\[44a.2\]]sum tshogs pas rtag tu brgyan/_/gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa dag_/de dag thams cad zhi bar byed/_/rgud dang sdig dang rmi ngan pa/_/de dag thams cad zhi bar byed/_/zab cing stobs chen ldan pa yi/_/sa yi lha mo nyid kyang ni/_/gser gyi 'od kyi dam pa yi/_/mdo sde'i dbang 
[\[44a.3\]]po'i ro yis tshim/_/dpag tshad dag ni brgya yi phrag_/stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad nas/_/rdo rje gnas la thug bar du/_/sa yi bcud ni rab tu 'phel/_/dpag tshad brgyar ni tshang ba yi/_/'og tu sa yi bcud song ste/_/de ni phyir yang log nas ni/_/sa yi steng dag snum par byed/_/
[\[44a.4\]]mdo sde mnyan pa'i stobs kyis ni/_/lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang /_/gser gyi 'od ni dam pa yi/_/mdo sde'i dbang po'i ros tshim 'gyur/_/mdangs dang ldan par rab 'gyur zhing /_/de bzhin rab tu stobs ldan 'gyur/_/bde bar 'gyur zhing tshim par 'gyur/_/'dzam 
[\[44a.5\]]bu'i gling 'di thams cad na/_/'bras bu lo tog nags lha rnams/_/sna tshogs ro yis tshim 'gyur zhing /_/shin tu rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/mdo sde'i ro yis tshim 'gyur nas/_/'bras bu rnams dang lo tog dang /_/me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/'bras bu'i shing ljon sna 
[\[44a.6\]]tshogs kyang /_/kun nas rab tu skye bar byed/_/'bras bu'i shing ljon thams cad dang /_/kun dga' dag dang nags tshal rnams/_/me tog rab tu chags byed cing /_/sna tshogs dri ni rab tu 'byin/_/me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/'bras bu sna tshogs ldan pa yi/_/rtswa dang 
[\[44a.7\]]nags tshal thams cad dag_/sa yi steng na skye bar byed/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad na/_/klu yi bu mo bsam mi khyab/_/rab tu dga' ba'i sems gyur nas/_/rdzing bu'i drung du nyer song ste/_/rdzing bu rnams ni thams cad du/_/ku mu da dang pad+ma dang /_/ut+pa la dang de bzhin du/_/
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]pad+ma dkar po sna tshogs skye/_/nam mkha' la ni du ba dang /_/sprin gyi dra ba med cing dag_/mun pa dang ni rdul med cing /_/phyogs rnams rab tu 'od gsal lo/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer stong ldan yang /_/'od zer dra bas 'od kyang mdzes/_/snang ba dag ni zab mo yis/_/rab tu 
[\[44b.2\]]dga' bar 'char bar 'gyur/_/dbang po nyi ma lha yi bu/_/'dzam bu gling gi gser gyi ni/_/gzhal med khang na 'dug pa yang /_/mdo sde 'dis ni rab tu tshim/_/dbang po nyi ma rab dga' nas/_/'dzam bu'i gling du 'char byed cing /_/'od zer mtha' yas dra ba yi/_/
[\[44b.3\]]kun nas rab tu snang bar byed/_/de ni shar ba tsam gyis kyang /_/'od zer dra ba rab gtong zhing /_/rdzing bu sna tshogs khengs pa yi/_/pad+ma dag ni kha yang 'byed/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad du/_/me tog 'bras bu sman sna tshogs/_/yang dag yongs su smin byed cing /_/sa 
[\[44b.4\]]rnams thams cad tshim par byed/_/zla ba dang ni nyi ma yang /_/de tshe khyad 'phags snang bar 'gyur/_/rgyu skar yang dag 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/rlung yang de bzhin ldang bar 'gyur/_/'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad du/_/kun tu lo yang legs 'gyur te/_/gang na mdo sde 'di yod 
[\[44b.5\]]pa/_/yul 'khor de ni khyad par 'phags/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_gnod sbyin gyi gnas zhes bya ba kun tu bsrungs pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par 
[\[44b.6\]]bsdus pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po dag rgyu gang dang rkyen gang dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa ci 'dra ba dang gang bgyis shing bsags pas/_skyes bu dam pa gsum po 
[\[44b.7\]]'di dag byang chub tu lung bstan pa thos nas/_da ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchis na/_'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog skyes bu dam pa 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]pa grangs ma mchis pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[45a.2\]]sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs zhes bya ba 'jig rten 
[\[45a.3\]]du 'byung ngo /_/ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub ste/_de'i bstan pa yong ye thams cad nub par gyur 
[\[45a.4\]]pa na/_khye'u dngul gyi tog 'di de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshams sbyor zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa'i rgyal mtshan de nyid du/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'dzam bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/
[\[45a.5\]]ji tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'dzam bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_de yi bstan pa yong ye thams cad du nub pa'i bar du gyur pa na khye'u dngul gyi 'od 'di/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 
[\[45a.6\]]mtshams sbyor zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[45a.7\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser brgya'i 'od zer gser du snang ba snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/zhes de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis de 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag ni de tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rlabs po che yang ma gyur/_sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug 
[\[45b.2\]]po dag la spyad skad kyang mi gda'/_lag pa dang rkang pa dang mig dang yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang /_bu dang chung ma dang bu mo phangs pa dag sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'/_nor dang 'bru dang /_'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_
[\[45b.3\]]dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_dngul dang /_sa le sbram dang /_rin po che rnams sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'/_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_khang khyim dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_kun dga' 
[\[45b.4\]]ra ba dang /_rdzing bu dang /_lteng ka dag sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'/_glang po che dang /_ba lang dang /_rta pho rgod dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo sna tshogs sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda' 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs ma 
[\[45b.5\]]mchis pa phrag du ma de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming du lung ma thob kyi bar du sngon bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag grangs ma mchis pa du ma nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag grangs ma mchis pa 
[\[45b.6\]]du ma dag la mchod pa sna tshogs tha dad pa brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa phrag du ma dang yo byad thams cad kyis mchod pa bgyid/_yongs su btang bar bgyi ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang yongs su gtong la/_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang /_yan lag gi dam pa mgo 
[\[45b.7\]]dang bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bu mo phangs pa yongs su btang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongs su gtong /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_dngul dang /_sa le sbram yongs su btang 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]bar bgyi ba rnams yongs su gtong /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_khang khyim dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_kun dga' ra ba dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_rdzing bu dang /_lteng ka dang /_glang po che dang /_
[\[46a.2\]]ba lang dang /_rta pho rgod dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo yongs su btang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongs su gtong zhing rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid/_rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas bde ba brgya 
[\[46a.3\]]stong phrag mang po yang myong bar 'gyur na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang dang dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa ci 'dra ba zhig gis 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag_/bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa'i slad du mchis 
[\[46a.4\]]pa 'di dag bcom ldan 'das/_'di ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa du ma na/_'jig rten gyi khams sA la'i dbang po mthon po'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de nyid du rigs dang /_rus gcig pa dang /_ming gcig tu rim gyis bla na med 
[\[46a.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_rab tu dang ba'i zhal ut+pa la'i dri brtsegs pa zhes bya bar sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen 
[\[46a.6\]]pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi 
[\[46a.7\]]lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi lha mo 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag gang byas shing bsags pas chos mnyan pa'i phyir da ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas 'dir lhags pa 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa yod/_de'i rgyu yod/_de'i byed pa yod de/_rigs kyi lha mo skyes bu dam pa 'di gsum gyi byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'di thos nas thos ma thag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la shin tu ri mo byed cing dga' ba dang dang ba thob par gyur te de 
[\[46b.2\]]tsam du bai DUr+ya dri ma med pa ltar yongs su dag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to/_/dri ma med la shin tu rgya che zhing rgyas pa'i nam mkha' ltar zab pa'i sems rab tu dang ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su bzung ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/rigs kyi 
[\[46b.3\]]lha mo 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag de tsam du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu lhag par ri mo byed pa dang rab tu dang ba thob par gyur to/_/de tsam du bai DUr+ya dri ma med pa ltar yongs su dag pa'i 
[\[46b.4\]]sems dang ldan par gyur te/_de'i phyir lung bstan pa'i sa rjes su thob bo/_/rigs kyi lha mo chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag da ltar bla na med 
[\[46b.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i sa rjes su thob bo/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_lha'i bu stong phrag bcu lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//rigs kyi lha mo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i 
[\[46b.6\]]yang ches grangs med pa rgyas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_
[\[46b.7\]]bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de yongs su 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos nub par gyur te dam pa'i chos ltar bcos par gyur pa na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba chos can chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi rgyal srid skyong gis chos ma yin pas ni ma yin te yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi pha ma 
[\[47a.2\]]lta bur gyur pa zhig byung ngo /_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul du tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya ba sman pa gso bar byed pa/_khams la mchog tu mkhas pa/_tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad kyi rgyud dang ldan pa zhig byung bar gyur to/_/kye 
[\[47a.3\]]rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya ba de'i bu chu 'bebs zhes bya ba/_gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_bstan bcos sna tshogs la mkhas pa/_bstan bcos thams cad rtogs par khong du 
[\[47a.4\]]chud pa/_yi ge dang grangs dang lag rtsis dang /_rtsis rnams shin tu bslabs par gyur pa zhig byung ngo /_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od de'i yul de na sems can brgya stong phrag du ma nad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur cing /_nad sna tshogs kyis 
[\[47a.5\]]yongs su gzir te/_sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa drag pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs de/_sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/_nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/_brgya stong phrag du 
[\[47a.6\]]ma de dag gi don gyi phyir/_snying rje chen po'i sems skyes par gyur to/_/sems can brgya stong phrag du ma de dag ni nad sna tshogs kyis btab cing nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/_de ltar sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa drug po yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong la/_bdag gi pha tshong dpon 
[\[47a.7\]]ral pa 'dzin sman pa gso bar byed pa/_khams la mchog tu mkhas pa/_tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad kyi rgyud dang ldan pa 'di ni rgas 'khogs gtugs lam du zhugs/_na tshod rjes su thob pa/_'khar ba la brten cing 'dar te/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su 'gro mi nus na/_sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/_nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag nad sna tshogs las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir/_bdag nyid bdag gi pha ral pa 'dzin gyi gan du song la nad 
[\[47b.2\]]kyi phyir khams la mkhas par bya ba yongs su dris te/_khams la mkhas par bya ba dris pa des bdag grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su 'gro bar bya'o/_/song nas kyang sems can nad sna tshogs 
[\[47b.3\]]kyis btab pa/_nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/_brgya stong phrag du ma dag nad sna tshogs las yongs su thar bar bya'o snyam nas/_rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs rang gi pha ral pa 'dzin ga la ba der song ste/_phyin nas/_
[\[47b.4\]]rang gi pha ral pa 'dzin gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis rang gi pha ral pa 'dzin la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis khams la mkhas par bya ba dris pa/_ji 
[\[47b.5\]]ltar dbang po 'dzin 'gyur zhing /_/khams kyi rnams kyang yongs su 'gyur/_/gang gi dus na lus can la/_/nad kyi rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dus dang dus min zas zos pa/_/ji lta bur na bde bar 'gyur/_/gang gi lus kyi nang du ni/_/lus kyi mi la gnod mi 'gyur/_/
[\[47b.6\]]rlung las gyur dang mkhris gyur dang /_/'dus las gyur dang bad kan gyur/_/nad rnams zhi bar bgyi slad du/_/ji lta bur ni gso bar bgyi/_/gang gis mi la gnod 'gyur ba'i/_/rlung ni gang gi dus na g.yo/_/gang gi dus na mkhris pa g.yo/_/bad kan gang gi dus na g.yo/_/
[\[47b.7\]]de nas tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin gyis bu chu 'bebs la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis khams la mkhas par bya ba rnam par bstan to/_/zla gsum dbyar te zla gsum ston du shes/_/gsum ni dgun te gsum ni dpyid yin no/_/de ltar zla ba'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]dus ni drug_/lo gcig 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]la ni zla ba bcu gnyis 'dod/_/gsum gsum du ni tshigs rnams bsdus par shes/_/zla ba gnyis gnyis shing ni dus su bstan/_/zas dang skom ni de ltar 'ju bar 'gyur/_/sman pa dang ni khams dang dus kyang bstan/_/dbang po dang ni khams rnams de dag kyang /_/
[\[48a.2\]]lo gcig nang gi tshigs tshigs yongs su 'gyur/_/dbang po dag ni yongs su 'gyur ba na/_/lus can rnams la sna tshogs nad kyang 'byung /_/de nyid la ni sman pas zla gsum bzhi/_/tshigs kyi bar dang dus drug rnams dang ni/_/khams drug mkhas par bya ba shes par bya/_/
[\[48a.3\]]zas skom sman rnams [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin te/_/rlung gi shas che'i nad ni dbyar na ldang /_/ston du gyur pa na ni mkhris pa g.yo/_/dgun gyi dus na de bzhin 'dus pa ste/_/bad kan shas che'i nad ni dpyid na ldang /_/dbyar ni snum dro lan tshwa skyur ba'i ro/_/ston ni mngar dang snum dang 
[\[48a.4\]]bsil bag go/_/dgun ni mngar dang snum dang skyur ba ste/_/dpyid kyi dus na rtsub dro tsha ba'o/_/bad kan che ba zos ma thag tu ldang /_/mkhris pa che ba 'ju ba'i dus na ldang /_/rlung shas che ba zhu ma thag tu ldang /_/khams gsum g.yo ba de ni de lta'o/_/rlung gi bdag nyid la ni 
[\[48a.5\]]bcud kyis gso/_/bkru sman gyis ni mkhris pa bsal bar bya/_/'dus pa la ni gsum dang mthun ldan pa/_/bad kan tshigs su babs na skyugs sman gtang /_/rlung shas che dang mkhris dang 'dus pa dang /_/bad kan shas che'i tshigs rnams shes par bya/_/dus gang khams gang 
[\[48a.6\]]lus ni gang yin pa/_/de yi sman dang bza' btung bsten par bya/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis khams la mkhas par bya ba 'di lta bu de tsam zhig yongs su dris pa des/_tshe'i rig byed kyi yan lag brgyad po thams cad khong du chud par gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i 
[\[48a.7\]]dus na/_tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de thams cad du song nas/_sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/_nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/_brgya 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]stong phrag du ma de dag la kho bo ni sman pa'o/_/kho bo ni sman pa'o zhes bdag nyid kyis khas 'ches te/_kho bos khyed rnams nad sna tshogs las yongs su thar bar bya'o zhes dbugs phyung ngo /_/rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis/_'di lta bu'i tshig brjod pa de thos ma thag tu 
[\[48b.2\]]srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba chen po skyes par gyur to/_/dbugs phyin pa rnyed nas kyang dga' ba dang bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa nad sna tshogs kyis gzir 
[\[48b.3\]]ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag nad sna tshogs las yongs su thar te nad med par gyur to/_/nad med par gyur nas kyang snga mkho bzhin du mthu dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa nad sna tshogs kyis gzir 
[\[48b.4\]]ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag gi nang nas gang su dag nad drag pos btab pa de dag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/_nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag la tshong dpon gyi bu 
[\[48b.5\]]chu 'bebs kyis sman dpyad gang ci bstan pa des/_sems can de dag thams cad kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas so/_/nad med pa dang nad nyung bar gyur nas kyang snga mkho bzhin du mthu dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na 
[\[48b.6\]]rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad na sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/_nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/_brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad tshong dpon 
[\[48b.7\]]gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis nad sna tshogs las yongs su thar bar byas par gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_nad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu drug pa'o//_//'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po lnga pa ste tha ma/_rigs kyi lha mo gzhan yang rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul du/_tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis sems can thams cad kyi nad med par byas pas/_na ba nyung zhing snga mkho bzhin du spro ba dang stobs dang ldan pa'i 
[\[49a.2\]]lus su gyur to/_/rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na sems can thams cad dga' zhing rtse la dga' mgur spyod de sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin/_bsod nams dag kyang byed de/_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs la'ang /_tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs rgyal bar gyur cig_/rgyal bar gyur 
[\[49a.3\]]cig_/sman pa'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi nad gso ba mngon sum du byang chub sems dpar nges pa/_tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad pa thams cad rtogs pa zhes mngon par 'du byed do/_/rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs de la chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba zhig 
[\[49a.4\]]yod de/_rigs kyi lha mo chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po de la khye'u gnyis yod de/_gcig gi ming ni chu'i gos zhes bya/_gcig gi ming ni chu'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs khye'u de gnyis dang lhan cig tu mthar gyis grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_
[\[49a.5\]]grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su 'gro'o/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas dus gzhan zhig na/_tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin te/_de nas 'brog dgon pa der sha za ba'i khyi dang /_spyang ki dang /_wa dang /_khwa 
[\[49a.6\]]dang /_bya dag gang na dgon pa na rdzing zhig yod pa der rgyug par mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_ci'i phyir sha za ba'i khyi dang /_spyang ki nas bya'i bar 'di dag phyogs 'dir rgyug snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag khyi dang /_spyang ki dang /_wa dang /_khwa dang /_bya 
[\[49a.7\]]rnams phyogs gang dang gang du rgyug pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs mthar gyis rgyu zhing song ste/_dgon pa na rdzing zhig yod pa de dag ga la ba der phyin to/_/rdzing chen po de na nya khri zhig gnas te des der nya khri phrag mang po zhig 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]chu dang bral ba mthong nas/_des de la snying rje chen po'i sems skyes pa dang /_de na lha mo zhig shing las lus phyed tsam phyung ba zhig mthong ste/_lha mo des tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/gang gi phyir chu 'bebs 
[\[49b.2\]]zhes bya ba khyod kyis nya 'di rnams la chu byin cig_/rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya ste/_gang chu 'bebs pa dang gang na chu sbyin pa'o/_/de bas na rang gi ming dang mthun par bya ba byos shig_/chu 'bebs kyis slar smras pa/_lha mo nya 'di dag la ji snyed cig mchis/_
[\[49b.3\]]lha mos smras pa nya khri tham pa'o/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs ches mchog tu snying rje ba'i sems skyes so/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing chen po na chu'i lhag ma cung zad tsam zhig lus te/_de nas nya khri 'chi ba'i sgor zhugs shing chu dang 
[\[49b.4\]]bral ba de dag rgyug cing rnam par rgyug go/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis phyogs bzhir brgyugs pa dang /_nya khri po de dag tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs phyogs gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de logs su chu 'bebs la snying rje rje ltar blta'o/_/rigs kyi lha mo de 
[\[49b.5\]]nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis phyogs bzhir brgyugs te chu btsal kyang der chu ma rnyed nas phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang /_des ha cang yang thag mi ring ba zhig na shing ljon pa chen po mang po zhig mthong nas/_shing ljon pa de dag la 'dzegs te/_shing gi yal ga rnams bcad 
[\[49b.6\]]nas shing gi yal ga de dag khyer te rdzing chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_shing gi yal ga de rnams kyis nya khri po de dag la shin tu bsil ba'i grib ma byas so/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs rdzing der chu 'bebs pa tshol te/_gang nas chu 'bab ces de 
[\[49b.7\]]phyogs bzhir brgyugs kyang chu ma rnyed nas/_de myur ba myur bar chu'i rgyun de nyid kyi rjes su song ste/_rigs kyi lha mo dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing der chu 'bab pa zhes bya ba'i klung chen po de las der chu 'bab pa'i klung de yang de'i tshe/_sdig pa can gyi sems can zhig gis nya khri po de dag 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]gi phyir ci nas kyang phyis nya de dag la chu 'bab par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyogs kyi g.yang sa chen por klung de phab bo/_/des de mthong nas bsams pa/_klung 'di ni skye bo stong gis kyang srol de nyid du dbab par mi nus na/_bdag gi lta dbab par ga la nus snyam nas de 
[\[50a.2\]]phyir log go/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs rings pa rings par rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_de dag rgyus nas smras te/_
[\[50a.3\]]bdag gis lha'i chab 'og tu grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal thams cad du sems can gyi nad kyi rgyun ni bkum na gnas che ge mo zhes bgyi ba de na/_dgon pa na yod pa zhes bgyi ba'i rdzing zhig mchis pa de na nya khri zhig gnas pa de chab dang bral nas gdugs kyis gdungs shing 
[\[50a.4\]]mchis te/_ji ltar mi rnams la stsal ba ltar ci nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dag la yang srog stsol bar 'tshal na/_lhas glang po che nyi shu zhig bdag la stsal du gsol/_rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis sman pa'i rgyal po chen po la glang po che nyi shu zhig byin cig 
[\[50a.5\]]ces blon po rnams la bsgo'o/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_sems can chen po glang po che'i lhas ga la ba der song la glang po che nyi shu zhig khrid de/_sems can rnams la phan gdags pa dang bde bar gyis shig_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs rang 
[\[50a.6\]]gi bu chu'i gos dang /_chu'i snying po dang lhan cig tu glang po che nyi shu khrid nas glang po che'i rdzi bo las ba lang gi rkyal pa brgya blangs te/_slar log nas chu 'bab ces bya ba'i klung chen po gang du 'bab pa der song ste/_rkyal pa de dag chus bkang nas glang po che'i rgyab tu chu bkal te/_
[\[50a.7\]]myur ba myur bar dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_chu de glang po che'i steng nas phab ste/_phyogs bzhi nas rdzing bu chus bkang nas phyogs bzhir 'gro ba dang /_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs gang dang gang du 'gro ba de logs su nya khri po dag kyang rgyug go/_/
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs 'di snyam du sems te/_ci'i phyir nya khri po 'di dag bdag ga la ba de logs su rgyug snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_nya khri po 'di dag ni bkres pa'i mes yongs su nyen nas bdag la bza' ba slong du nges kyi 
[\[50b.2\]]bdag gis kha zas sbyin par bya'o snyam nas/_rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis rang gis bu chu'i gos la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu glang po che thams cad kyi nang nas mgyogs pa'i mchog la zhon te bdag gi khyim du song la/_myur ba myur bar song ste mes 
[\[50b.3\]]po tshong dpon la/_kye mes po chu 'bebs kyi mchid nas khyim 'di na pha ma dang /_spun dang /_sring mo dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las bgyid pa rnams kyi kha zas sbyar ba gang ci mchis pa thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/_chu'i gos glang po che la zhon pa'i lag tu myur 
[\[50b.4\]]du rdzongs shig ces mchi'o zhes de skad gyis shig_/de nas khye'u chu'i gos glang po che de la zhon nas myur ba myur bar rgyug cing rab tu rgyug ste/_rang gi khyim ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang de dag rgyus kyis zhib tu smras te/_de nas khye'u chu'i gos kyis sngar smras pa'i zas sbyar ba de 
[\[50b.5\]]thams cad glang po che'i rgyab tu bkal nas glang po che de la zhon te dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing ga la ba der song ba dang /_chu 'bebs kyis rang gi bu chu'i gos mthong nas dga' mgu ste bu las zas blangs nas phrul te rdzing der gtor nas nya khri po de dag tshim par byas te/_de 'di snyam du 
[\[50b.6\]]bdag gis dus gzhan zhig na dgon pa'i gnas zhig na/_dge slong theg pa chen po klog pa las su 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan thos pa de bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye'o zhes thos kyis bdag gis nya de dag la rten cing 'brel 
[\[50b.7\]]par 'byung ba'i chos zab mo yang bshad la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de'i mtshan yang bsgrag par bya'o snyam mo/_/de'i tshe na 'dzam bu'i gling de na sems can rnams kyi lta ba gnyis su gyur te/_kha cig ni theg 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]pa chen po la mngon par dad do/_/kha cig ni smod do/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs kyis de'i tshe rdzing der rkang pa gnyi ga'i pus mo nub tsam du 'bogs te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[51a.2\]]rin chen gtsug tor can de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa de skad ched du brjod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_phyogs bcu dag na gang su dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_nga'i ming thos pa de dag de nas shi 'phos 
[\[51a.3\]]nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam de skad btab bo/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dag la chos 'di bshad de 'di lta ste/_'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung 'di skyes pas 'di skye ba ste/_
[\[51a.4\]]'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/_'du byed rnams kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i 
[\[51a.5\]]rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na 
[\[51a.6\]]sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag par 'gyur ba nas/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig kyang 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/rigs kyi lha mo de ltar de'i tshe de'i dus 
[\[51a.7\]]na tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di brjod nas/_rang gi bu chu'i gos dang chu'i snying po dang lhan cig tu rang gi khyim du phyin pa'i bar du'o/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs dus ston chen po zos 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]nas chang gis ra ro ste mal na nyal ba dang /_de'i tshe de'i dus na ltas chen po byung bar gyur te/_mtshan mo de 'das pa dang /_nya khri po de dag 'chi ba'i dus su gyur nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/skyes ma thag tu de dag 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis sems kyi 
[\[51b.2\]]rnam par rtog pa skyes te/_bdag cag dge ba'i las kyi rgyu gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skyes snyam mo/_/de dag kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag 'dzam bu'i gling de na nya khrir gyur te bdag cag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa las/_/tshong dpon 
[\[51b.3\]]gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis chu mang po dang kha zas kyi mchog gis tshim par byas te/_bdag cag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i chos kyang bstan/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan yang bsgrags 
[\[51b.4\]]pas dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu de dang rkyen des bdag cag lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skyes kyis/_bdag cag tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas de la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i bu khri po de dag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_
[\[51b.5\]]tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi khyim du lhags te/_de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs mal na nyal zhing 'dug pa de la lha'i bu de dag gis mu tig gi se mo do khri ni mgo'i thad kar bzhag_/mu tig gi se mo do khri ni rkang pa'i drung du bzhag_/mu tig gi se mo do khri ni g.yas logs su 
[\[51b.6\]]bzhag_/mu tig gi so mo do khri ni g.yon logs su bzhag ste/_pus mo nub tsam du me tog man dA ra ba'i char chen po yang phab/_lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang dkrol nas des 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyang sad/_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyang sad do/_/de nas 
[\[51b.7\]]lha'i bu khri po de dag kyang nam mkha' la dong ste/_lha'i bu de dag rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul gyi gnas dang gnas gzhan du yang /_me tog man dA ra ba'i char 'bebs shing /_dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing chen po ga la ba der dong nas/_de dag gis rdzing chen po der me tog man dA 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]ra ba'i char chen po phab ste/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas slar yang lha'i gnas su dong ste/_de na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis dga' zhing rtse ste/_dga' mgur spyod cing dpal dang skal ba bzang po chen po dag kyang myong ngo /_/'dzam bu'i gling du nam langs pa dang 
[\[52a.2\]]de nas rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis ltas de dag byung ba mthong nas/_skar mkhan dang blon po chen po rnams la smras pa/_ci'i phyir mdang sum ltas 'di dag byung /_de dag gis smras pa/_lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyi khyim du mu tig gi se 
[\[52a.3\]]mo do bzhi khri'i char bab cing lha'i me tog man dA ra ba'i char yang 'bab po zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis blon po rnams la smras pa/_khyed deng la tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la snyan pa'i tshig gis bos shig_/de nas skar mkhan dang blon po chen po rnams chu 
[\[52a.4\]]'bebs kyi khyim ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od 'di khyod la 'bod do/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs blon po chen po rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ga la ba der 
[\[52a.5\]]dong ba dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu chu 'bebs mdang sum de 'dra ba'i ltas byung ba/_de ci'i ltas yin shes sam/_de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bdag gis 'tshal te nya khri po de dag 'chi ba'i dus 
[\[52a.6\]]bgyis par nges so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ji ltar shes chu 'bebs kyis smras pa/_lha chu'i gos rdzing der nya khri po de dag gum mam ma gum ltar stsal to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de ltar gyis shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis khye'u chu'i gos la 'di skad 
[\[52a.7\]]ces smras so/_/bu song la dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing bu'i nya khri po de dag shi 'am ma shi ltos shig_/de nas khye'u chu'i gos myur ba myur bar dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing chen po ga la ba der song ba dang /_nya khri po de dag shi ba'i dus su gyur cing me tog man dA ra ba'i char chen po bab pa 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]yang mthong nas slar log ste pha la smras ba/_'chi ba'i dus su gyur to/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis khye'u chu'i gos las tshig de thos pa dang /_rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ga la ba der song nas de dag rgyus nas zhib tu smras te/_lha mkhyen par mdzad du 
[\[52b.2\]]gsol/_nya khri po de dag thams cad ni 'chi ba'i dus su gyur nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_de dag dang bdag gi mthus mdang sum de lta bu'i dge ba'i ltas de dag byung ste/_bdag gi khyim du yang mu tig gi se mo do bzhi khri dang lha'i me tog man dA ra 
[\[52b.3\]]ba'i char yang phab bo/_/de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgu ste yi rang par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces 
[\[52b.4\]]bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shAkya lag na be con can de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur pa 
[\[52b.5\]]de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam 
[\[52b.6\]]du khyod sems na/_de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/_/
[\[52b.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs zhes bya ba'i chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/sgra gcan zin ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/_khye'u chu'i gos zhes bya bar gyur to/_/kun dga' bo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/_khye'u chu'i 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na nya khri por gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri po 'di dag de'i tshe de'i dus na 
[\[53a.2\]]nya khrir gyur te/_gang dag ngas chu dang zas kyi mchog gis tshim par byas shing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i chos kyang bstan/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan yang bsgrags te/_dge ba'i las kyi rgyu des 
[\[53a.3\]]nga'i gan du 'dir lhags te/_des na da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/rab tu dga' ba dang dang ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang /_gus par chos nyan pas thams cad lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ming yang thob par gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i 
[\[53a.4\]]dus na/_shing gi lha mor gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi lha mo khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na shing gi lha mor gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo rnam grangs 'dis na 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i tshe ngas ji ltar sems can mang po byang 
[\[53a.5\]]chub tu yongs su smin par byas te de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i sa thob par gyur par rig par bya'o/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_chu 'bebs kyis nya btul ba sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun 
[\[53a.6\]]pa'o//_//rigs kyi lha mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan la phan pa'i phyir lus kyang yongs su gtong ngo /_/de ji lta zhe na/_dri ma med cing shin tu rgyas pa'i yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs brgya'i 'od zer sa dang lha yul du rnam par 'phro ba thogs pa med pa'i ye shes 
[\[53a.7\]]mthong ba dang stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa'i bcom ldan 'das dge slong stong gis yongs su bskor te/_yul lnga len gyi ljongs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas nags tshogs zhig tu byon pa dang /_der des sngo zhing 'jam la mthing gar 'dug pa'i spang gi ngos me tog gi dri zhim pa 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sa phyogs zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo sa phyogs 'di ni mdzes pa ste/_'di na gtam gyi gnas kyi mtshan ma yod kyis da de bzhin gshegs 
[\[53b.2\]]pa'i gdan things shig_/de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du gdan bting ngo /_/gdan bting nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gdan bting lags na bcom ldan gtso bo mchog_/mi la mchog stsol dam pa srid bcings grol/_/
[\[53b.3\]]bzhugs te mi la sman slad mthar bgyid kyi/_/bka' mchid dam pa bdud rtsi gsung du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyod bya dka' ba'i las byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa rnams blta bar 
[\[53b.4\]]'dod dam/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/drang srong dam pa sems can mchog gi snying po la/_/bzod dang brtson 'grus che la zhi dang dul dga' zhing /_/blo gros dran dga' yon tan dpag med gnas gyur 
[\[53b.5\]]gyi/_/rus pa bdag cag blta ba'i dus lags de legs shod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag gi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong gi ri mo can dang /_me tog ka ma la gsar du kha bye ba ltar 'jam pa'i phyag gis sa'i ngos la brdabs te/_bsnun ma thag tu sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te nor 
[\[53b.6\]]bu dang gser dang dngul las byas pa'i mchod rten zhig de nas byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo mchod rten 'di phye zhig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_mchod rten de phye ba dang 
[\[53b.7\]]des der gser gyi 'phra can gyi nor bu dang mu tig gis khebs par g.yogs pa'i gser gyi za ma tog cig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gser gyi za ma tog cig mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]za ma tog bdun po 'di dag thams cad phye shig_/de bzhin du thams cad phye ba dang des der rus pa'i kha dog kha ba dang me tog ku mu da dang 'dra ba dag cig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rus pa dag 
[\[54a.2\]]cig gda'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo skyes bu chen po'i rus pa rnams khyer te shog_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rus pa de dag blangs te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rus pa rnams dge 
[\[54a.3\]]'dun gyi mdun du bsnams te phyag tu bzhes te bka' stsal pa/_rus pa 'di dag yon tan mchog rab tshogs ldan blo gros mchog_/dul dang bsam gtan bzod pas spro ba grags pa dam pa mchog_/phyir zhing byang chub 'di la rtag tu blo gros ldan byas shing /_/spro brtan mos dang blo 
[\[54a.4\]]gros rtag tu sbyin la dga' ba'i yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa tshul khrims dang yon tan gyis yongs su bsgos pa/_mchog tu mthong bar dka' ba bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa rnams la phyag 
[\[54a.5\]]'tshol cig_/de nas dge slong de dag gis thal mo sbyar te 'dun pa'i yid kyis rus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni/_'jig rten thams 
[\[54a.6\]]cad las mngon par 'phags pa sems can thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa lags na/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rus pa 'di dag la phyag bzhes/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo rus pa 'di dag gis 
[\[54a.7\]]nga 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po shing rta chen po zhes bya ba bzhon pa dang stobs du ma dang ldan pa thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa zhig byung ste/_de 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]la bu lha gzhon nu dang 'dra ba gsum zhig yod de sgra chen po dang lha chen po dang sems can chen po'o/_/de nas rgyal po rtse ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba dang /_gzhon nu de dag skyed mos tshal de'i yon tan la chags shing me tog 'dod pas phan tshun rgyu ste/_nags stug po chen po bcu 
[\[54b.2\]]gnyis su zhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po'i bu dag dong ba dang gzhon nu'i rim gro pa rnams kyang rgyal bus bskrad nas phan tshun dong ste/_kun tu bsrungs pa'i skyed mos tshal chen po'i nags stug po bcu gnyis su zhugs so/_/de nas sgra chen pos nu bo gnyis la smras pa/_kho bo'i snying 
[\[54b.3\]]'jigs pas non na 'dir bdag cag gcan gzan gyis gsad du 'ong gis tshur shog_/lha chen pos smras pa/_bdag la 'jigs pa ni ma mchis na/_skye bo sdug pa dang bral ba snyam bgyid pa'i snying du gyur to/_/sems can chen pos smras pa/_thub pas bsngags pa'i 
[\[54b.4\]]nags khrod dben pa 'dir/_/bdag ni mi 'jigs mya ngan ma mchis kyi/_/shin tu rgyas mchog don chen rnyed snyam ste/_/bdag gi snying 'di rab tu dga' bar gyur/_/de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag nags stug po bcu gnyis po de dag gi khrod du rgyu ba na stag mo bu byung nas 
[\[54b.5\]]zhag bdun lon pa zhig bu lngas bskor te/_bkres shing skom pas nyam smad nas lus mchog tu nyam chung bar gyur pa de 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas sgra chen pos smras pa/_kye ma'o nyon mongs ma 'di bu byung nas zhag drug gam zhag bdun lon par gyur la/_da ltar zas ma 
[\[54b.6\]]rnyed pas yang na ni rang gi bu la za bar 'gyur/_yang na ni bkres pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/sems can chen pos smras pa/_nyon mongs ma 'di'i zas ci/_sgra chen pos smras pa/_'di ltar gang sha sar pa dang khrag dron po yod na de ni stag dang dom dang dred dang seng ge rnams 
[\[54b.7\]]kyi zas yin no zhes zer ro/_/lha chen pos smras pa/_'dir nyon mongs bkres pa dang skom pa dang ldan pa'i lus su gyur pas srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus te/_rab tu nyam chung ba 'dis gnas 'dir zas skom tshol ni mi nus na 'di'i srog yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir su zhig rang gi 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]lus yongs su gtong bar byed cig gu/_sgra chen pos smras pa/_kye rang gi lus yongs su btang ba ni bya dka' ba'o/_/sems can chen pos smras pa/_bdag cag lta bu srog dang lus la mngon par chags pa blo chung ba rnams la ni tshul 'di bya dka' ba lags 
[\[55a.2\]]kyi gzhan lus yongs su gtong ba la zhugs pa gzhan la phan par brtson pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la ni dka' ba ma lags so/_/yang snying brtse snying rje las byung 'phags pa'i sems can dag_/lha yul dang ni sa 'dir rang lus rnyed snyam ste/_/gzhan gyi srog phyir mthun 
[\[55a.3\]]par dga' ba'i yid kyis ni/_/'gyur ba med par 'dir ni rnam pa brgya yis rtse/_/de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de shin tu mi dga' ste/_stag mo de la mig mi 'dzums par ring zhig tu bltas nas song ngo /_/de nas sems can chen po 'di snyam du sems te/_da ni bdag 
[\[55a.4\]]gi lus 'di yongs su gtong ba'i dus la bab bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig cing 'gyes pa'i chos can mthar 'gyed mtha' ngan pa/_/rnag can lus 'di zas dang skom dang mal cha dang /_/bzhon pa 'os pa chen po dag gis ring bsrungs kyang /_/snga med rang gis rang 
[\[55a.5\]]bzhin mi 'dor byas don med/_/yang thams cad du mi gtsang bar gyur pas na de'i 'tsho ba med kyis/_da bdag gis de las bzang po la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de'i phyir bdag skye ba dang 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal ba'i gru bo che lta bur 'gyur ro/_/yang snying po med lus dbu ba 'dra la 
[\[55a.6\]]srin bu brgyas gang byas pa chud gzon pa/_/'bras 'dra ba yi srid pa brgya ldan gcin dang phyi sas gang ba 'di btang ste/_/mya ngan med cing 'gyur med phung med dri med bsam gtan la sogs yon tan gyis/_/kun tu gang ba'i chos sku yon tan brgyas gang rdul dang bral ba 
[\[55a.7\]]thob par bya/_/de snying rje mchog dang ldan pa'i snying du gyur pas de ltar brtul nas khyod gnyis gshegs su gsol/_bdag ni rang gi bgyi ba zhig gi slad du nags stug po bcu gnyis su 'jug go zhes de gnyis bskrad do/_/de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu sems can chen po nags 'dab de 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]nas slar log ste/_stag gi gnas su song nas nags kyi yal ga la gos gzar te/_bdag ni 'gro la phan phyir byang chub mtshungs pa med pa zhi ba thob 'dod de/_/gzhan gyis btang bar dka' ba'i lus ni blo gros 'gyur ba med pa'i snying rjes sbyin/_/bdag gis skyon med byang chub rin 
[\[55b.2\]]med rgyal sras rnams kyis gnyer ba thob par shog_/bdag gis srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'jigs las 'jig rten gsum po bsgral bar bya/_/zhes smon lam btab bo/_/de nas sems can chen po stag mo'i mdun du nyal ba dang /_de nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[55b.3\]]dpa' la stag mos ci yang ma byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas kye ma'o 'di ni nyam chung bas mi nus so snyam nas langs te/_snying brtse ba'i blo gros kyis mtshon cha btsal na gang nas kyang mtshon cha ma rnyed nas des 'od ma'i yal ga lo brgya lon pa sra ba zhig blangs te/_bdag gi 
[\[55b.4\]]mgul pa bcad nas stag mo'i mdun du 'gyel to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'gyel ma thag tu chu'i dbus su son pa'i gru rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin du sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/nyi ma yang sgra gcan gyis zin pa bzhin du 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes pa med do/_/lha'i spos 
[\[55b.5\]]dang phye ma dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char yang bab bo/_/de nas lha zhig gis ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i yid kyis byang chub sems dpa' la bstod pa/_blo gros bzang po khyod 'dir ji ltar thugs rjes sems can rnams khyab ste/_/mi yi dbang po rab tu dgyes pas ji ltar sku 'dir btang 
[\[55b.6\]]bas na/_/skye ba dang ni 'chi ba'i don dang bral ba zhi ba gnas kyi mchog_/zhi ba gtsang ma khyod kyis 'dir ni tshegs med ring por mi thogs brnyes/_/de nas stag mo des byang chub sems dpa'i lus khrag gis sbags pa la bldags nas/_yud tsam gyis sha dang khrag med par 
[\[55b.7\]]rus pa tsam zhig lus par byas so/_/de nas sgra chen pos sa g.yos pa de dag la bsams nas lha chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ltar phyogs bcu'i rgya mtsho'i mthar thug rgya mtshor bcas pa yi/_/sa 'di rab tu g.yos shing nyi ma'ang 'od ni med gyur la/_/me tog 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]char pa bab cing kho bo'i yid kyang 'khrugs pas na/_/da gzod bdag gi nu bos rang gi lus ni btang yang dag_/lha chen pos smras pa/_de ni ji ltar snying rje'i tshig smra la/_/bkres dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal brgyas gtses pa/_/shin tu nyam chung rang gi 
[\[56a.2\]]bu la yang /_/za bar chas la lta bas bdag kyang dogs/_/de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis rab tu mya ngan gyis non nas mchi mas mig gang ste lam de nyid nas slar log nas stag mo'i drung du phyin pa dang /_gos thams cad ni 'od ma'i yal ga la gzar/_rus pa rnams 
[\[56a.3\]]ni bye zhing bral/_khrag ni rdzab tu gyur/_skra ni phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'thor bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang brgyal te rus pa'i steng du 'gyel nas ring zhig lon pa dang /_'du shes rnyed de langs nas lag pa bsgred ste nyam thag pa'i sgra phyung ngo /_/kye ma'o nu bo sdug 
[\[56a.4\]]pa dang ni rgyal po dang /_/de bzhin du ni bu la rab tu gdung ba'i ma/_/pad+ma 'dra ba'i mig ring khyod kyi gar bzhag ces/_/ma ni bdag cag la yang tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]'dri bar 'gyur/_/kye ma bdag cag gnyis ni sa phyogs 'di nyid du/_/shi na legs kyis gson na de lta ma yin no/_/
[\[56a.5\]]sems can chen po med par gyur pas bdag cag la/_/pha ma dag gis ji ltar lto ba ster bar 'gyur/_/de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis kyis snying rje rje skad du rnam pa mang por ngus nas dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu'i rim gro pa rnams kyang gzhon nu tshol zhing phyogs 
[\[56a.6\]]dang phyogs mtshams su rgyug pa dang /_gcig gis gcig mthong nas/_gzhon nu ga re gzhon nu ga re zhes 'dri'o/_/de'i tshe btsun mo mal na nyal ba'i rmi lam na sdug pa dang bral bar rmis pa 'di lta ste/_nu ma gnyis bcad pa dang /_so phyung ba dang /_thi ba'i phru gu skrag pa 
[\[56a.7\]]gsum zhig rnyed pa las gcig khras khyer bar mthong ngo /_/de nas btsun mo sa g.yos pas snying dngangs te mod la sad nas sems pa la zhugs te/_'byung po'i rten ma rgya mtsho'i gos can 'di ni kun tu rab g.yo ci zhig gu/_/nyi ma 'od zer med par gyur pas nga yi snying la mya ngan 'gyur 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]bar ston/_/nga yi lus ni zhum zhing mig kyang g.yo la rang gi nu ma bcad rmis pa/_/nga yi bu rnams nags khrod 'dir ni rtser dong ba la dge bar 'gyur ram ge_/de nas de snyam bsams pa dang bran mo yang snying myos te 'ongs nas btsun mo la smras pa/_jo mo gzhon nu'i 
[\[56b.2\]]rim gro pa dag gzhon nu tshol zhing mchis na jo co stor ces gda'o/_/de skad ces thos ma thag tu btsun mo'i snying 'dar zhing mig dang gdong mchi mas gang ste rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa/_lha bdag gi bu sdug pa stor ces thos so/_/rgyal po yang snying 'dar zhing shin tu myos 
[\[56b.3\]]te kyi hud bdag gi bu sdug pa dang bral ba lta zhes smras so/_/de nas rgyal pos btsun mo dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir nga gzhon nu btsal ba la nan tan du byed kyis bzang mo mya ngan ma byed cig_/der gzhon nu tshol ba la zhugs pa na skye bo'i tshogs dag rod rod por gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[56b.4\]]ring por ma lon par rgyal pos rgyal bu gzhon nu gnyis rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang smras pa gzhon nu de dag ni 'ong na thams cad ni ma yin te/_kyi hud bu dang bral ba lta zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/ji ltar bu dang bral bar gyur na yid ni mi bde ba/_/mi 
[\[56b.5\]]rnams bu rnyed pa ni de ltar dga' ba ma yin no/_/'jig rten ni gang dag bu med pa dang shi ba'am/_/mi rnams gang dag bu gson de dag bde ba yin nam ci/_/de nas btsun mo shin tu mya ngan gyis non nas rnga mo gnad du bsnun pa bzhin du shin tu mi bzad pa'i sgra phyung ngo /_/de ltar bu gsum 
[\[56b.6\]]dag ni g.yog gi tshogs bcas te/_/me tog rnams kyis gang ba'i nags khrod zhugs pa las/_/bdag gi bu dge tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]'ongs par ma gyur na/_/bdag gi snying dang 'dra ba'i tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]de ga re/_/de nas de gnyis lhags pa dang rgyal pos bu la dris pa/_khye'u tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]ga re zhes 
[\[56b.7\]]gzhon nu gnyis la dris pa dang /_de nas mya ngan gyis nyam thag cing mig mchi mas gang ste rkan dang mchu dang kha dang so skams nas cang mi zer ro/_/btsun mos smras pa/_kho mo'i bu sdug tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]de ga re/_/kho mo'i snying 'di gas la thug gyur cing /_/lus ni mi bzad rab tu gzir gyur 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]te/_/kho mo'i dran pa nyams gyur myur du smros/_/de nas gzhon nu de gnyis kyis ji ltar gyur pa de zhib tu smras so/_/de thos ma thag tu rgyal po dang btsun mo myos par gyur te/_myos pa sangs nas snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing phyogs der dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal po dang btsun mos rus 
[\[57a.2\]]pa de dag sha dang khrag dang rgyus pa med cing skra phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba mthong nas shing rlung gis btab pa bzhin du 'gyel to/_/de nas nye phan dang blon po dag gis de ltar gyur pa de mthong nas chu dang ri ma la ya'i tsan+dan gyi 'de gus rgyal po dang btsun mo'i lus bsil bar 
[\[57a.3\]]byas so/_/de nas ring zhig lon pa dang 'du shes rnyed nas rgyal po langs te snying rje rje skad du 'bod pa/_kye ma bu sdug yid 'ong mthong dga' ba/_/'chi bdag dbang du ci phyir de myur song /_/'chi bdag ci phyir nga la sngar ma 'ongs/_/nga la sdug bsngal 'di las gzhan mi 'byung /_/
[\[57a.4\]]btsun mo yang myos pa las sangs nas skra gzhig cing lag pa gnyis kyis brang brdungs te/_nya thang la phyung ba bzhin du sa'i steng na 'gre ldog cing ma he be'u stor ba dang rnga mo rnge'u stor ba bzhin du snying rje rje skad du du'o/_/kye ma sdug cing gces pa'i bu ni pad+ma 'di/_/su yis sa yi steng du bshig 
[\[57a.5\]]nas rab tu gtor/_/yid 'ong mig ldan zla 'dra'i bzhin can bdag gi bu/_/bdag gi dgra bo gang gis de ring sa 'dir bcom/_/kye ma sa 'dir bu mchog bsad mthong na/_/lus 'di ci phyir de ring zhig ma gyur/_/sdug bsngal 'di 'dra mthong yang ma gas pas/_/bdag gi snying 'di 
[\[57a.6\]]lcags ni yin yang dag_/de ring rmi lam du ni bdag gi nu ma 'ga' zhig gis ni ral gris bcad/_/so yang phyung bas de ring bdag gi bu sdug de ni myur du ma rung gyur/_/bdag gis thi ba'i phrug gu gsum zhig rnyed pa gcig 'dir ji ltar khras khyer bzhin/_/bdag gi bu gsum dag 
[\[57a.7\]]gis bskor ba las kyang gcig ni de ring 'chi bdag khyer/_/kye ma ho sdig pa can gyi rmi lam de yi 'bras bu grub pa 'di yin no/_/de nas rgyal po dang btsun mo snying rje rje skad du rnam pa mang por smre zhing rgyan thams cad bkrol nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i rus bu la mchod pa byas 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]nas/_gzhon nu'i rus pa rnams phyogs 'dir bzhag go/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu sems can chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu sems 
[\[57b.2\]]can chen po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/kun dga' bo 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug las yongs su ma grol ba de'i tshe yang /_sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las ngas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags na/_skyon thams cad dang bral te yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[57b.3\]]par sangs rgyas pa da ltar lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de ltar sems can re re'i phyir yang sems can dmyal ba rnams su bskal par gnas par spro zhing skye bo 'khor ba las rnam par bsgral lo/_/sems can gyi snying pos shin tu bya dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs du mas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan 
[\[57b.4\]]btags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/byang chub mchog 'di yongs su tshol ba na/_/bskal pa mang po rangs ni lus btang ste/_/ji ltar rgyal po dang ni rgyal bur gyur/_/de ltar ngas ni lus rnams yongs su btang /_/
[\[57b.5\]]sngon gyi skye ba rnams ni rjes dran te/_/shing rta chen po zhes bya'i rgyal po byung /_/de la bu ni gtong ba che ldan pa/_/sems can che zhes bya ba dam pa yod/_/de la phu bo dag ni gnyis yod de/_/ming ni sgra chen po dang lha chen po/_/dpung tshogs de dag nags tshal stug por dong /_/
[\[57b.6\]]de dag stag mo bkres pas gzir ba mthong /_/de la sems can mchog de snying rje skyes/_/stag mo 'di ni bkres skom gzir bas na/_/bdag bu de dag za bar 'gyur 'ong gis/_/de ltar bdag lus da ni gtang bar bya/_/shing rta che bu sems can che/_/stag mo bkres mthong stag phrug 
[\[57b.7\]]rnams/_/thar bar bya phyir snying rje yis/_/ri ngos gzar nas mchongs pa dang /_/sa ni ri dang bcas su g.yos/_/bya tshogs rnam mang rnam par 'thor/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]tshogs skrag 'jig rten 'di/_/mun pas thibs por gnas par gyur/_/de yi phu bo sgra chen dang /_/de bzhin lha chen de 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]gnyis kyis/_/nags mchog chen po der bltas na/_/sems can chen po ma rnyed nas/_/shin tu mya ngan zug rngu'i snying /_/dran med nags kyi nang na rgyu/_/nu bo de ni yongs tshol zhing /_/gdong la mchi zag nags khrod rgyu/_/sgra chen de bzhin lha chen po/_/
[\[58a.2\]]rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag gnyis/_/stag mo nyam chung gar nyal ba/_/der ni nye bar song ba dang /_/stag mo dang ni stag phrug gi_/stag gi mchu la khrag chags mthong /_/skra dang rus pa cung zad cig_/sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong /_/de yi khrag gi thigs pa ni/_/
[\[58a.3\]]nyung zhig sa la yod par gyur/_/rgyal po'i bu ni de gnyis kyis/_/khrag chags pa yi sa de mthong /_/rab tu brgyal te sa de la/_/'gyel nas yid ni nyams par gyur/_/lus rnams la ni rdul gyis gos/_/dran dbang nyams shing sems kyang myos/_/de dag 
[\[58a.4\]]gi ni 'khor rnams kyang /_/snying rjer ngu zhing mya ngan non/_/de dag chus ni rab 'thor zhing /_/lag pa sgreng ste ngu zhing gnas/_/de ni 'gyel ma thag tu yang /_/btsun mo gces mchog skyed pa'i ma/_/bud med dag ni lnga brgya dang /_/pho brang nang na bder 'dug pa/_/nu 
[\[58a.5\]]sor gnyis ka'i rtse mo nas/_/'o ma khrag tu 'byung zhing 'dzag_/de yi lus dang yan lag kun/_/khab kyis gtsags pa bzhin du tsha/_/snying ni rab tu mya ngan gang /_/bu bral mya ngan drag mdas phog_/rgyal po'i gan du nyer song ste/_/mya ngan rab gdungs yid mi dga'/_/
[\[58a.6\]]snying rje'i sgra yis rab ngu zhing /_/rgyal po shing rta che la smras/_/mi dbang rgyal po bdag la gson/_/bdag lus mya ngan me yis tshig_/bdag gi nu sor rtse gnyis nas/_/'o ma khrag tu rab tu 'byung /_/bdag lus khab kyis gtsags bzhin tsha/_/bdag gi snying yang gas 
[\[58a.7\]]la thug_/ji ltar sdug pa'i bu rnams ni/_/phyin cad mi mthong 'di 'dra'i ltas/_/bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal/_/thugs rje mdzod de bdag srog stsol/_/de ring bdag gi rmi lam na/_/thi ba phrug gu gsum rnyed na/_/bdag gi thi ba phrug gu ni/_/sdug cing yid 'ong gang lags 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]pa/_/der ni khra mchis bdag gi ni/_/thi ba phrug gu de khras 'tshal/_/bdag gi rmi lam de 'dra ba'i/_/mya ngan snying 'dir rab tu zhugs/_/sems ni mya ngan rab gdungs pas/_/bdag ni ring por mi thogs 'gum/_/bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal/_/thugs rje ldan pa 
[\[58b.2\]]bdag srog stsol/_/de skad smras nas btsun mo mchog_/brgyal nas sa der 'gyel bar gyur/_/dran pa'i dbang po rnam par nyams/_/sems kyang stor zhing dran pa med/_/btsun mo'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyang /_/snying rje'i skad kyis rab tu ngu /_/btsun mo dam pa brgyal 
[\[58b.3\]]gyur te/_/sa la 'gyel ba mthong nas ni/_/de ma thag tu rgyal dbang de/_/bu dang bral ba'i mya ngan non/_/blon po dang ni 'khor rnams kyang /_/gzhon nu rnams ni btsal phyir dong /_/grong khyer kun gyi skye bo dag_/tha dad khyim nas byung zhing 'khod/_/ngu zhing gdong nas mchi ma 
[\[58b.4\]]zag_/lam khar sems can che de 'dri/_/gson nam 'on te shi 'am ci/_/sems can chen po de gar song /_/bdag cag de ring mthong zhig gam/_/yid 'ong sems can mthong re dga'/_/de'u re mi snyan thos 'gyur zhing /_/yul 'dir mya ngan mi bzad rlung /_/sgra mi phyin cing 
[\[58b.5\]]sgyu mtha' yas/_/drag po'i sgrar bcas ldan zhig gam/_/rgyal po shing rta che langs te/_/mya ngan non cing ngu bzhin du/_/btsun mo dam pa sar 'gyel la/_/bdag nyid chu yi rgyun kyang 'thor/_/ji srid dran rnyed ldan 'gyur ba/_/de srid du ni chu yis gtor/_/bdag bu gum mam 
[\[58b.6\]]gson zhig ces/_/zhum pa'i yid kyis 'dri bar byed/_/rgyal po shing rta chen po yis/_/btsun mo mchog la 'di skad smras/_/blon po dag dang 'khor rnams kyang /_/gzhon nu rnams ni tshol phyir dong /_/khyod ni rab tu yid zhum zhing /_/rtag tu mya ngan snying ma byed/_/de 
[\[58b.7\]]ltar shing rta chen po yis/_/btsun mo dam pa spro bsrings te/_/rgyal po pho brang nas byung nas/_/mya ngan non cing ngu bzhin du/_/blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor te/_/yid ni rab zhum lus kyang zhan/_/srog chags brgya phrag mang po yang /_/ngu zhing mchi ma zag bzhin rgyug_/rgyal 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]bu rnams ni btsal ba'i phyir/_/grong khyer gyi ni mchog nas byung /_/rgyal po byung ba mthong nas ni/_/rgyal po'i phyi bzhin kun tu 'brang /_/rgyal po shing rta chen po ni/_/grong khyer nas byung de ma thag_/sdug pa'i bu ni blta ba'i phyir/_/rgod pa'i mig gis phyogs su 
[\[59a.2\]]bltas/_/mgo bregs yan lag khrag sbags shing /_/lus la rdul gyis gos gyur la/_/gdong la mchi zag ngu bzhin du/_/'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong nas ni/_/shing rta chen po'i snying la yang /_/rab tu mi bzad mya ngan gnas/_/ngu zhing gdong la mchi ma zag_/lag pa bsgreng 
[\[59a.3\]]ste ngu zhing 'dug_/de nas blon po gzhan zhig ni/_/rgyang ring myur du rings par 'ong /_/'ongs nas mi dbang rgyal po ni/_/shing rta che la 'di skad smras/_/mi dbang thugs ngan ma mdzad cig_/khyod sras yid du 'ong ba mchis/_/ring por mi thogs khyod kyi gan 'dir ni/_/sras 
[\[59a.4\]]mchog yid 'ong mchi ba khyod kyis gzigs/_/rgyal po yud tsam lam du zhugs pa dang /_/de nas blon po chen po gnyis pa 'ongs/_/rdul chags dri ma can gyi gos gyon cing /_/mchi ma'i gdong gis rgyal la 'di skad ces/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras gnyis ni/_/mya 
[\[59a.5\]]ngan me yis rab tu gdungs shing gnas/_/rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog gcig mi gda'/_/sems can chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin/_/stag mo bu byung ring por ma lon pa/_/rang gi bu rnams za bar 'dod pa mthong /_/de dag la ni gzhon nu sems can ches/_/snying rje chen po 
[\[59a.6\]]ldan pas sems bskyed nas/_/byang chub tu ni smon lam che btab pa/_/sems can thams cad bdag gis dgrol bar bya/_/byang chub zab mo rgya chen 'dod pa la/_/ma 'ongs dus na bdag gis reg par bya/_/sems can chen po ri ngos gzar nas mchongs/_/stag mo bkres pas 
[\[59a.7\]]non pa de langs te/_/yud tsam gyis ni lus la sha med byas/_/rgyal po'i bu ni rus pa nyi tshe lus/_/ma rungs pa yi tshig ni de thos nas/_/rgyal po shing rta chen po brgyal gyur te/_/sa la 'gyel nas sems kyang stor bar gyur/_/mya ngan me ni shin tu mi bzad 'bar/_/'khor 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]dang blon po snying rje'i skad kyis ni/_/ngu zhing mya ngan non bzhin de dag kyang /_/chus 'thor lag pa bsgreng ste rab tu ngu /_/blon po gsum pas rgyal la smras pa ni/_/bdag gis de ring gzhon nu gnyis po dag_/nags chen de na rab tu brgyal gyur cing /_/sa la 'gyel te sems 
[\[59b.2\]]kyang stor mthong nas/_/dran pa rnyed de langs kyi bar du ni/_/bdag cag rnams kyis chab kyis rab tu gtor/_/phyogs bzhi dag nas kun nas 'bar bar mthong /_/yud tsam 'greng nas slar yang sa la 'gyel/_/snying rje'i skad kyis smre sngags rab tu 'don/_/rtag par lag pa 
[\[59b.3\]]bsgreng ste gnas nas ni/_/nu bo de yi bsngags pa rab tu brjod/_/rgyal po de ni rab tu sems zhum zhing /_/bu bral mya ngan non nas sems kyang 'khrugs/_/mya ngan rab tu gdungs shing smre sngags 'don/_/rgyal po de ni 'di snyam yongs su sems/_/bdag 
[\[59b.4\]]bu sdug cing yid 'ong gcig po ni/_/sems can chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin/_/bdag gi bu ni gnyis po de dag kyang /_/mya ngan me yis srog ni zad 'ong gis/_/'di ltar bdag ni myur du der dong la/_/mthong na dga' ba'i bu dag blta bar byas/_/
[\[59b.5\]]bzhon pa mgyogs pas rgyal po'i pho brang gi/_/rgyal po'i khab tu myur du bkri bar bya/_/de dag rnams ni bskyed pa'i ma yi snying /_/mya ngan me yis gas par 'gyur du 'ong /_/bu gnyis mthong nas zhi ba thob 'gyur te/_/srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/
[\[59b.6\]]rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor nas/_/glang chen zhon te bu rnams blta phyir song /_/bu gnyis snying rje'i skad kyis rab ngu zhing /_/nu bo'i ming 'bod lam nas 'ong ba mthong /_/rgyal pos bu de gnyis ni khrid nas su/_/rab tu ngu zhing khyim du song 
[\[59b.7\]]nas ni/_/de yis skyen par la gor myur du yang /_/btsun mo la ni rang gi bu rnams bstan/_/shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa nga /_/sngon gyi rgyal po shing rta chen po yi/_/bu de sems can chen po mchog gyur cing /_/gang gis stag mo bde bar byas pa yin/_/rgyal 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]po'i dbang po dam pa zas gtsang ni/_/shing rta che zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur/_/btsun mo'ang btsun mo dam pa sgyu mar gyur/_/sgra chen po ni byams par gyur pa yin/_/rgyal bu lha chen po yang de bzhin du/_/de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin/_/
[\[60a.2\]]stag mor gyur pa skye dgu'i bdag mo che/_/stag phrug rnams ni dge slong lnga por gyur/_/de nas rgyal po shing rta chen po dang btsun mos snying rje bar smre sngags rnam pa mang po bton nas/_rgyan thams cad bkrol te skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas 
[\[60a.3\]]nas/_sems can chen po de'i rus pa de dag sa phyogs 'di nyid du bzhag ste/_rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'di byas so/_/sems can chen po 'dis stag mo la lus yongs su btang nas lus yongs su btang ba 'dis phyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa bgrang ba las shin tu 
[\[60a.4\]]'das pa rnams su yang /_sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya'o/_/zhes smon lam 'di skad btab bo/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[60a.5\]]tu sems bskyed do/_/mchod rten 'di 'dir bstan pa'i rgyu ni 'di yin no/_/rkyen ni 'di yin no/_/mchod rten de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sa de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_stag mo la lus yongs su btang 
[\[60a.6\]]ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma de dag_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po 
[\[60a.7\]]che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/rgyal ba'i sku mdog btso ma'i gser 'dra ste/_/sku lus gser gyi mdog tu rnam par gda'/_/gser gyi ri dbang lta bu'i gser gyi mdog_/thub pa pad+ma dkar po gser mdog can/_/bzang po'i mtshan gyis sku lus 
[\[60b.2\]]rab tu brgyan/_/dpe byad sna tshogs bzang pos sku lus spras/_/gser gyi 'od ltar mdzes pa rnam par 'bar/_/shin tu dri med zhi ba ri dbang 'dra/_/tshangs pa'i sgra dang sgra snyan tshangs pa'i dbyangs/_/seng ge'i sgra dang 'brug sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs/_/yan lag drug cu 
[\[60b.3\]]bsgrags sgra dri med sgra/_/rgyal dbyangs rma bya ka la ping ka'i sgra/_/shin tu dri med dri bral gzi 'od mdzes/_/rgyal ba bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan/_/mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho dri med dri bral mchog_/rgyal ba yon tan kun ldan ri rab 'dra/_/sems can rnams la phan 
[\[60b.4\]]par thugs brtse mchog_/'jig rten dag na bde ba sbyin pa'i mchog_/rgyal ba dam pa'i don rnams ston pa ste/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la 'dzud pa lags/_/'chi ba med pa'i bde ba stsol ba ste/_/rgyal ba bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab tu ston/_/'chi ba med pa'i grong khyer 'dzud pa 
[\[60b.5\]]ste/_/bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas bde ba'i gnas/_/rgyal bas 'gro ba sdug bsngal thar bar mdzod/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni skye dgu sgrol/_/zhi ba'i lam la skye dgu rab tu 'dzud/_/skye dgu rnams la bde ba kun stsol ba/_/khyod la dpe ni bgyi bar mi nus te/_/ji 
[\[60b.6\]]snyed 'dren pa'i yon tan ye shes mtsho/_/srog chags kun la khyod kyi thugs rje dang /_/byams pa'i stobs dang thabs dang brtson 'grus dang /_/khyod kyi yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho las/_/bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por yang /_/yon tan thigs pa gcig tsam rab bstan par/_/
[\[60b.7\]]lhar bcas 'gro ba'i nang na nus ma mchis/_/yon tan mtsho las yon tan thigs blangs te/_/de ltar bdag gis mdor bsdus cung zad bshad/_/bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags de yis ni/_/sems can de dag byang chub mchog reg shog_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]dbang po'i rgyal po las/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs 
[\[61a.2\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/thub dbang khyod ni bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan/_/dpal stong mdzes pa'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/_/kha dog rgya chen mchog tu 
[\[61a.3\]]zhi ba ston/_/nyi ma stong ltar 'od ni rnam par 'phro/_/'od zer du ma 'bar bas 'od kyis khyab/_/kha dog sna tshogs dang bas rin chen 'dra/_/sngon po dkar po gser 'od bai DUr+ya/_/zangs dang skya rengs shel gyi 'od lta bus/_/rdo rje ri dbang ri rab thal mdzad cing /_/zhing rnams 
[\[61a.4\]]bye ba du mar snang mdzad de/_/sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po zhi bar mdzad/_/bde ba mchog gis sems can tshim par mdzad/_/mdog dang dbang po gsal bag blta na mdzes/_/gzugs bltas mi ngoms skye bos blta na dga'/_/rma bya'i mdog 'dra'i dbu skra rnam par mdzes/_/
[\[61a.5\]]bung ba mang pos gang ba'i 'od dang 'dra/_/thugs rje rnam dag yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/_/ting 'dzin byams pa bsod nams dam pa bsags/_/dpe byad bzang dang kha dog sna tshogs ldan/_/ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag yon tan brgyan/_/khyod ni rab tu tshim mdzad phan pa 
[\[61a.6\]]mdzad/_/bde mdzad bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas 'byung /_/yon tan zab mo sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/_/zhing rnams bye ba dag du lhang nge ste/_/me yi 'od ltar 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes/_/ji ltar nam mkhar nyi dkyil rdzogs pa bzhin/_/ri rab lta bur yon tan kun 
[\[61a.7\]]ldan par/_/'jig rten khams rnams kun tu rab tu gda'/_/ba zho ku mu da dung zla 'dra zhing /_/kha ba'i mdog dang dkar po bzang 'dra ba'i/_/tshems kyi phreng bas khyod kyi zhal mdzes pa/_/ngang pa'i rgyal po bar snang ji bzhin no/_/khyod kyi zhi zhal mtshams nas zla ba 'dra/_/g.yas 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]su 'khyil zhing khong chud 'dra ba lags/_/bai DUr+ya 'dra'i spu 'od dkar rnams kyis/_/nam mkha'i dkyil na nyi ma lta bur mdzes/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o//_//
[\[61b.2\]]de nas rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/_rnam par dag pa'i chos la spobs pa'i blo mnga' ba/_/las ngan lam dang bral ba'i bdag nyid blo mnga' zhing /_/srid dang srid 
[\[61b.3\]]min mkhyen pa rnam dag blo mnga' ba/_/sangs rgyas rnam dag blo mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kye ma'o kye ma'o sangs rgyas gzi brjid mtha' yas te/_/kye ma'o kye ma'o rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab 'dra/_/kye ma'o kye ma'o sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas te/_/u dum 
[\[61b.4\]]bA ra'i me tog bzhin du shin tu dkon/_/sems can dag ni thams cad rjes su gzung slad du/_/gang gis mdo sde dam pa 'di 'dra rab gsungs pa/_/mi dbang nyi ma shAkya'i dbang po'i rigs kyi tog_/kye ma'o kye ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje ldan/_/de bzhin 
[\[61b.5\]]gshegs pa shAkya'i thub pa dbang po zhi/_/zhi ba'i dam pa zhi ba'i grong khyer rab tu zhugs/_/ting 'dzin zab cing zhi la rdul dang bral ba ni/_/rgyal ba sangs rgyas spyod yul der yang rab tu zhugs/_/de ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa ste/_/rkang gnyis dam pa rnams kyi gnas 
[\[61b.6\]]pa'ang stong pa lags/_/chos rnams de dag thams cad rang bzhin stong lags na/_/sems can rnams ni stong pa'i bdag nyid ma 'tshal to/_/rtag pa ther zug tu ni rgyal ba dran par bgyid/_/rgyal ba mthong bar yang ni rtag tu mya ngan bgyid/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma mthong 
[\[61b.7\]]bar bgyid slad du/_/rtag par yang ni smon lam rab tu 'debs par bgyid/_/bdag ni rtag tu dog sar pus mo btsugs nas su/_/rgyal ba'i gzugs kyis skom pa'i mya ngan rab tu sems/_/'dren pa'i slad du snying rje'i skad kyis ngu bar bgyid/_/bdag ni bde bar gshegs pa mthong 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]bar rab tu skom/_/mya ngan me yis kun tu rab tu 'bar bar gyur/_/mthong ba'i chu bsil bdag la rtag par stsal du gsol/_/bdag ni khyod kyi gzugs la blta bas rab tu skom/_/thugs rje'i char gyis bdag la rab tu sim par mdzod/_/'dren pa khyod kyis 
[\[62a.2\]]bdag la thugs rje mdzad du gsol/_/zhi ba'i gzugs mthong ba ni bdag la stsal du gsol/_/khyod ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba skyob pa ste/_/'di ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa lags/_/sems can thams cad dag ni rmi lam rang bzhin te/_/nam mkha' 'dra zhing nam 
[\[62a.3\]]mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyang lags/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu dang ni chu yi zla ba 'dra/_/'dren pa khyod kyis stong pa tshe dang ldan pa lags/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi lha mo khyod legs so khyod yang legs so/_/bcom 
[\[62a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa dang /_lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la sogs pa lha yi bu mo de dag thams cad dang /_lha mo chen mo dpal la sogs pa lha mo'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang /_rnam thos 
[\[62a.5\]]kyi bu la sogs pa lha'i rgyal po de dag thams cad dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/gser 
[\[62a.6\]]'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_mjug bsdus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[62a.7\]]ye d+ha rmA he tu pra b+ha wA he dun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba da ta te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma Na//_//
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]{D558}]rgya gar skad du/_ma hA sa ha sra pra marda na nA ma sU tra/_bod skad du/_stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom 
[\[63a.2\]]ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod phung po'i ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul shing ljon pa rab tu snang ba'i nags tshogs na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu la 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_
