[\[63a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ga yA 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa cang shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku la dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa 
[\[63a.4\]]dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa lag bzang dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nam gru nas tshe dang 
[\[63a.5\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo'i bar du de la sogs pa'i dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lus 'phags mo'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras na bza' 
[\[63a.6\]]dang /_bshos dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas so/_/yang de'i tshe sa yang cher g.yos par gyur/_sprin 'dus pa chen po yang byung /_dus ma yin pa'i 
[\[63a.7\]]rlung dang /_ser ba chen po dang /_sprin chen po las char pa chen po yang 'bab par gyur/_'brug kyang di ri ri zer/_glog kyang byung /_phyogs bcu yang 'khrugs par gyur to/_/mun pa mun nag chen po yang byung ste/_skar ma rnams kyang mi snang /_nyi ma dang zla ba rnams kyang 'od 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]dang mi ldan par gyur te/_lhan ner ma yin/_lhang nger ma yin zhing 'od mi gsal bar gyur to/_/de nas yang yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por 'jigs pa de dag byung ba dang /_yangs pa can gyi li ts+tsha bI kha cig gis grong gzhan dang grong khyer ba gang yin 
[\[64a.2\]]pa de gdon 'byung pos btab par gyur/_grong gi gzhon nu rnams dang /_rtsis mkhan rnams dang /_blon po dang /_blon po chen po dang /_'khor na gnas pa dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_mngag pa dang /_g.yog kha cig kyang gdon 'byung 
[\[64a.3\]]pos btab par gyur/_yul yangs pa can gyi ljongs kun gyi dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang 'jigs skrag dngangs te skyi bung zhes byed nas kha gnam du bltas te ngu 'bod cing /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun 
[\[64a.4\]]la phyag 'tshal/_bram ze dang khyim bdag gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag de dag kha cig ni tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal/_kha cig ni brgya byin la/_kha cig ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal/_kha cig ni dbang phyug 
[\[64a.5\]]chen po dang /_nor bu bzang po dang /_gang ba bzang po dang /_'phrog ma dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_gza' dang /_skar ma dang /_ri dang /_nags tshogs dang /_sman dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_klung dang /_lteng ka dang /_mtshe'u dang /_rdzing bu dang /_rdzing dang /_mchod 
[\[64a.6\]]rten gyi gnas na gnas pa dag la phyag 'tshal zhing bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i gnod pas 'jigs pa'i gnas nas ji ltar thar bar 'gyur snyam du sems shing 'khod pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mi las 'phags pa'i spyan rnam par dag pas gzigs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 
[\[64a.7\]]'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang mngon par 'du mdzad pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur nas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dad par gyur te 'dus par gyur pa rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]mdzad do/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad 
[\[64b.2\]]dang /_gnod sbyin chen po stobs po che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_'phrog ma bu dang bcas 'khor dang bcas pa kha dog 'phags pa dag nub mo 'das pa dang /_dag pa lta bu'i bya rgod phung po'i ri la bdag gi kha dog dang mthus snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba 
[\[64b.3\]]der dong nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas tshig gcig dbyangs gcig ngag gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/_shin tu 'bar ba'i gser dang 'dra/_/zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang 
[\[64b.4\]]mtshungs/_/dpal ldan rnam thos bu bzhin brtan/_/rin chen rnams kyi 'byung gnas lags/_/seng ge glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros/_/glang chen myos pa bzhin du gnon/_/gser gyi ri bo dang yang mtshungs/_/'dzam bu gling gi gser rgyan 'dra/_/skar ma rnams kyis yongs 
[\[64b.5\]]bskor ba'i/_/nam mkha'i zla ba dri med bzhin/_/nyan thos dge 'dun rnams kyi dbus/_/mtshan rnams kyis ni brgyan par gyur/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di/_/thub pa la ni skyabs su mchi/_/mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir/_/srung ba dus su nye bar gnas/_/
[\[64b.6\]]sangs rgyas snga mas bshad pa yi/_/stong chen rab 'joms mdo sde 'di/_/kho ra khor yug ri mtha'i bar/_/mtshams gcod pa yi dam pa lags/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/_/chos kyi rgyal po thub chen la/_/thal 
[\[64b.7\]]mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yud tsam zhig cang mi gsung bar dgongs nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po dag gang khyod kyi 'khor nga'i 'khor la 'tshe bar sems pa de ni tshul ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi'i 'jig 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]rten 'dir sangs rgyas byung ba dang /_chos legs par gsungs pa dang /_dge 'dun legs par bsgrubs pa de la sa bon 'di btab na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams 'jig 
[\[65a.2\]]rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_de la 'jig rten de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis las lha'i ris gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_rgyal po dag kyang dmag rnam bzhi dang ldan pa nas gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[65a.3\]]rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen por chos kyi rgyal srid byed par 'gyur te/_de dag la yang bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_tshan po che'i stobs kyi shugs bdog pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/_rin po che sna bdun 
[\[65a.4\]]dang ldan pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na 'jig rten 'dir rnam pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur bar khyed snying las chung ngus gnas pas gnas par gyis shig_/de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas 
[\[65a.5\]]pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la grong dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_bsil 
[\[65a.6\]]khang dang /_sgo khang dang /_rta babs dang /_skar khung dang /_dar gyi lda ldi bzang zhing mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /_dril bu dang mu tig gi dra bas yongs su bskor ba dang /_pog phor nas bdug pas bdugs pa dag dang me tog gis gtor ba'i khyim dang /_gnas dang khang 
[\[65a.7\]]pa chen po dag mchis te/_der bdag cag bud med brgya phrag stong dag gis yongs su bskor cing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan par gyur nas gnas te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rab tu myos pas bag ma mchis par gnas pas gnas pa na/_'khor zas dang skom 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]tshol du phyogs bcu kun tu 'byer zhing skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_btsas ma thag pa dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog_/'tshe bar bgyid/_bgegs bgyid/_gsod par bgyid/_srog dang bral bar 
[\[65b.2\]]bgyid de/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag gis 'khor bzhi'i mdun du bdag cag gi 'khor gyi tshul gyi mtshan ma bstan par bgyi'o/_/gang gis 'khor gyi gdon byung ba der rgyal po chen po de'i gzugs mchod rten dang bcas pa chen po bgyis te/_nad pas rgyal po chen po 
[\[65b.3\]]de'i ming nas dbyung zhing dri sna tshogs kyis rang gi lag nas bdug par bgyi'o/_/dog sa la me tog sil ma bkram ste/_zhugs mar bus la mchod rten de la mchod par bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di 
[\[65b.4\]]lta bu lags te/_phyi phyir rgod cing 'jigs par 'gyur/_/smra bar bgyid cing khro bar 'gyur/_/de ni gnyid kyang log par 'gyur/_/yang na shin tu na bar 'gyur/_/rtag tu gyen du lta bar 'gyur/_/skar ma dag la snyegs par bgyid/_/nub mo shin tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/rtag 
[\[65b.5\]]tu 'dar zhing sgra 'byin te/_/de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis/_/'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_sid d+he su sid d+he/_sa twe a re/_a ra Ne/_ba le/_ma hA ba le/_dzam b+he/_dza Ti le/_a kha ne/_ma kha ne/_kha kha ne/_kha raT+Te/_kha rarge ha ri ping+ga le/_te ming+gi le/_
[\[65b.6\]]te ming+gi le/_te ming+gi le/_ti ming+gi li ni maM ga l+ye swA hA/_bdag gi sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i ming dang /_stobs dang /_dbang phyug dang /_byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig swA hA/_de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung stan las langs 
[\[65b.7\]]te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor dri za'i gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]lags te/_glu len cing ni bro rdung ste/_/rgyan rnams la yang dga' bar bgyid/_/brkam pa ma mchis mang bar smra/_/rgod par bgyid cing khro bar 'gyur/_/skom par 'gyur la mig dmar te/_/rtag tu rims kyis 'debs par bgyid/_/mig kyang 'byed par 
[\[66a.2\]]mi bgyid de/_/rgyab kyis phyogs shing nyal bar bgyid/_/de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis/_/'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_a khe/_na khe/_bi na khe/_b+han d+he/_ba rAng+ge/_tsa pa le/_ba khe/_ba kha ne/_a khi ni/_na khe ni/_ba hu le/_b+ha khe/_b+ha ga na 
[\[66a.3\]]da le/_ba she ba sha brtIn swA hA/_rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gi ming dang /_stobs dang /_dbang phyug dang /_byin gyis bdag gdon thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad las thar bar gyur cig swA hA/_de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa 
[\[66a.4\]]gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]grul bum gyis zin pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta 
[\[66a.5\]]bu lags te/_shin tu skom pas 'debs par 'gyur/_/g.yeng bas btab cing lta bar 'gyur/_/bzhin yang dmar por gda' bar 'gyur/_/bskums nas sa la nyal bar 'gyur/_/kha dog ngan cing lus kyang skem/_/skra dang sen mo ring ba ste/_/dri ma can la dri mi bda'/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]
[\[66a.6\]]dang kyal pa smra bar bgyid/_/de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis/_/'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_kha kha kha mi/_kha la ne/_kha la mi/_kha rA li/_kha ra li/_ka ra khe/_ka sha ni/_ka ra Te/_kA li/_kA mi ni/_bi ba le/_bid+he ya sha ya ni sa ma ba te/_sha ma/_
[\[66a.7\]]sha ma ni swA hA/_rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po'i ming dang /_stobs dang /_dbang phyug dang /_byin gyis bdag gi gdon dang /_gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/_de nas rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor klu 'dab [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/_
[\[66b.2\]]skyigs bus 'debs shing dbugs kyang 'byin/_/de bzhin dbugs kyang grang bar 'gyur/_/rngul zhing dbu ba kha chu 'byung /_/phyi phyir gnyid kyang log par 'gyur/_/kha dog ldan zhing dpa' ba ste/_/de bzhin 'dar zhing rgyug par 'gyur/_/sen mo dag kyang ston par bgyid/_/
[\[66b.3\]]dog sar mchis shing ngu bar bgyid/_/de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis/_/'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_kra ka mi/_kra ga ma ni/_kra ga se/_kru gra she/_kra kra/_sha mi/_kru shru mi kru shru me/_kruk+ka/_ku klu ma/_kru ge/_a ga le/_na ga 
[\[66b.4\]]le/_sa ma ga le/_ku hu me/_gu me/_a la ke/_ka lu ke/_ka la ma le/_ga la le/_ka la Ta ke/_i ri mi re/_d+hi re/_a ru ga ba ti swA hA/_rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gi ming dang /_stobs dang /_dbang phyug dang /_byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig swA hA/_de nas bcom 
[\[66b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'khor thams cad kyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa/_nga ni stobs bcu dang ldan zhing mi 'jigs pa bzhis 'jigs pa med pa ste/_'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra khyu mchog lta bu rgya chen po yang dag par bsgrags so/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro/_/
[\[66b.6\]]sde dang mthu dang bzhon bcas pa'i/_/bdud kyang gcig gis rab tu btul/_/sems can thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir/_/rig sngags thams cad nga la nyon/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_a sang ge/_khaT+ga ba te/_ba la ba te/_ba la ni r+g+ho She/_shU re/_shU ra ba twe badzras me/_badzra ga me 
[\[66b.7\]]badzra d+ha re/_stam b+he/_dzaM b+he/_dr-i D+ha sA re/_bi ra dze/_bi g+ho She/_ba rA gra prAp+te/_a ra Ne a ra Ne d+har+m+ma yuka te/_di shi bi g+huSh+Te swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang /_stobs dang /_dbang phyug dang /_byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig swA hA/_/phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba dag_/
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung thos nas/_/'jigs dang skrag dang dngangs gyur te/_/thal mo sbyar nas 'khod par gyur/_/'byung po'i tshogs ni lhags pa rnams/_/dngangs 'khrugs rod rod por gyur nas/_/phyogs bcur rab tu 'byer byed cing /_/sgra bo che yang 
[\[67a.2\]]sgrogs par byed/_/rgyal po chen pos de shes nas/_/gsang ba gsum ni yang dag smra/_/kye ma rig sngags rig sngags che/_/stong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa de/_/thos nas 'byung po skrag gyur te/_/dper na rab tu 'bar me dang /_/
[\[67a.3\]]til mar ngar btags ral gri bzhin/_/gau ta mas ni rab bshad pa'i/_/rig sngags spu gri'i so dang 'dra/_/drang srong tshig ni legs bshad pa/_/de la gang zhig ma dad na/_/de yi bu yi thu bo ni/_/tshangs pa'i zhags pas med par 'gyur/_/me ni rab tu 'bar byas nas/_/
[\[67a.4\]]bla dang 'og dang phyogs bzhir yang /_/sbyin sreg gi ni chus gtor te/_/nas dang yungs kar blangs nas su/_/mar gyi snying po dang sbyar nas/_/me yi nang du blug par bya/_/legs par gsungs pa 'di thos nas/_/gal te myur du mi gtong na/_/thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur 
[\[67a.5\]]ba ni/_/mar dang yungs kar mer blugs bzhin/_/gnod sbyin chad pas bsdigs nas su/_/de dag bde ba mi rnyed de/_/de yi rtsib logs g.yas par ni/_/'bras chen nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin nad kyis btab pa na/_/sha bkra'i nad kyis btab par 'gyur/_/
[\[67a.6\]]lcang lo can gyi pho brang du/_/gzhar yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lus ngan grogs dang ldan pa yi/_/khyim yang mthong bar mi 'gyur te/_/'byung po mang po tshogs pa na/_/stan yang thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dag ni dkyil 'khor du/_/zas skom dang yang 'bral 
[\[67a.7\]]bar 'gyur/_/stong chen rab 'joms mdo sde la/_/gnod sbyin gang dag mi phyogs pa/_/de la rdo rje 'chang khros te/_/spyi bo dag ni 'gems par 'gyur/_/spu gri'i so ni rtsub po yis/_/de yi lce ni gcod par 'gyur/_/mtshon cha shin tu rnon po yis/_/de yi sna dang rna ba gcod/_/
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]'khor lo spu gri'i so 'dra bas/_/klad pa rab tu gshegs par byed/_/tho ba lcags kyis dkris pa yis/_/de yi snying la 'joms par byed/_/rnag dang khrag ni dron mo dag_/de yi kha nas 'dzag par 'gyur/_/rig sngags zhags pa'i chad pa yis/_/rtag tu 'khor bar 
[\[67b.2\]]'gro ba na/_/'khor ba gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor du/_/de nyid du ni 'khor bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po chen po dpal ldan pa/_/phyogs bzhi dag tu song gyur nas/_/chos kyi go cha bgos gyur te/_/bzang po'i khri la 'dug pa ni/_/shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung /_/lho phyogs na ni 
[\[67b.3\]]'phags skyes po/_/nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang /_/byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/_/dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba yi/_/rgyal po dag ni phyin pa dang /_/de tshe ston pa thams cad mkhyen/_/bar snang gnas la rab tu 'phags/_/tshangs pas sprul pa'i gzhal med khang /_/
[\[67b.4\]]der ni rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs/_/de nas tshangs dang tshangs chen rnams/_/thal mo sbyar 'khod phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal ldan gser gyi ri bo 'dra/_/gser gyi mchod sdong dang yang mtshungs/_/me tog pad+ma bzhin du rgyas/_/sA la'i rgyal po bzhin du rgyas/_/nyi ma dang 'dra zla nya 
[\[67b.5\]]la/_/skar ma rnams kyis yongs bskor bzhin/_/thub sku gser gyi kha dog la/_/mtshan rnams kyis ni yongs su bskor/_/'jig rten mes po tshangs pa yis/_/'jig rten sgron ma bstod byas te/_/'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/_/'jig rten skyong la 'di skad smras/_/
[\[67b.6\]]'jig rten skyong gi 'khor rnams kyis/_/rjes su bstan pa ma thob ste/_/gang phyir 'di las sangs rgyas dang /_/rang sangs rgyas dag 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/'di las nyan thos rnams kyang skye/_/lha rnams dag kyang skye bar 'gyur/_/rig byed yan lag drug mthar phyin/_/bram 
[\[67b.7\]]ze rnams kyang skye bar 'gyur/_/drang srong skal ba chen po dang /_/dge sbyong bram ze 'di las skye/_/khyed cag snying las chung byed pa/_/mi yi skye dgu gnod par 'gyur/_/tshangs pa yi ni tshig thos nas/_/'jig rten skyong gis tshig smras pa/_/tshangs pa chen po de bzhin no/_/thub pa chen po 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]de bzhin no/_/bdag gis ri rab bsgul byas shing /_/sa yang rab tu bzlog byas la/_/rgya mtsho la ni thug pa rnams/_/rnam par sbyang ba nyid du bya/_/zhags pa dam po ma nyams pas/_/nyi ma zla ba rlung rnams dang /_/skar ma dag ni thams cad kyang /_/bdag 
[\[68a.2\]]gis su ni bcing bar bya/_/gang dag rab tu sdang byed cing /_/'jig rten la ni phan mi byed/_/de dag la ni thams cad du/_/phyogs kyang snang bar mi bya'o/_/'jig rten lha dang bcas pa de/_/'byung po rnams kyi phyir smod de/_/'byung po mi yi skye dgu la/_/gnod par byed cing 
[\[68a.3\]]'tshe bar byed/_/gang dag sngags dang sman rnams dang /_/rig sngags las ni 'da' byed pa/_/'di la sngags kyi dam pa ni/_/pha rol gnon pa ston par byed/_/rig sngags las ni 'da' ba'i 'khor/_/kun tu chad pas bsdigs byas te/_/'jig rten mgon po'i spyan 
[\[68a.4\]]sngar ni/_/yang dag par yang brjod par bgyi/_/gang gis 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor du/_/'di bshad pa na mi nyan pa/_/de dag chad pa bshad par bya/_/tshangs pas sprul pa'i mdo sde'o/_/sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_/phan tshun du ni blta byas na/_/bai DUr+ya 
[\[68a.5\]]dang gser dang dngul/_/mu tig rnams dang shel dag dang /_/spug dang rdo yi snying po dang /_/rin chen bdun gyis brgyan pa yi/_/rtsibs stong kha dog gser 'dra ba'i/_/shing rta rnam pa bzhi byas pa/_/bzo rnams kun dang ldan pa ste/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro/_/
[\[68a.6\]]rgyal po dag ni der bzhugs nas/_/'byung po'i dkyil 'khor nyid du dong /_/sa ni gser gyi phye ma dang /_/me tog dag gis bkang byas nas/_/mgul par ltung dang skud pa dang /_/zhags pa dag kyang gdags byos la/_/phyogs kyi sa ni ci snyed pa'i/_/'byung po 
[\[68a.7\]]thams cad khrid shog ces/_/gnod sbyin gyi ni sde dpon kun/_/phyogs bzhi dag tu dgye ba byas/_/stong chen rab tu 'joms pa yi/_/mdo sde yi ni dam pa 'di/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar du byung /_/lha rnams kun gyis rnam par bsams/_/stong chen po yi lus kyis 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]su/_/gnod sbyin dang ni srin po btul/_/lus ngan po yi tshig thos nas/_/gnod sbyin gyi ni sde dpon dag_/phyogs bzhi dag tu song nas su/_/gsang ba po la drag tu bsgo/_/thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad/_/dri za las byung gdon gyi rnams/_/shar phyogs cha na 
[\[68b.2\]]'khod pa dag_/mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun/_/bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi/_/'byung po mang po nga la nyon/_/thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad/_/grul bum las byung gdon gyi rigs/_/lho phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag_/mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun/_/
[\[68b.3\]]bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi/_/'byung po mang po nga la nyon/_/thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad/_/klu las gdon du gyur pa rnams/_/nub phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dang /_/mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun/_/bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi/_/'byung po mang po nga la 
[\[68b.4\]]nyon/_/thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad/_/gnod sbyin las ni gdon gyur pa/_/byang phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag_/mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun/_/bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi/_/'byung po mang po nga la nyon/_/lus ngan po yi bu thu bo/_/kun tu rgyal ba mi la 
[\[68b.5\]]zhon/_/de yi drung na 'khod pa yi/_/gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu dag_/bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/_/mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs/_/de nyid kyi ni bu gnyis pa/_/skyed pa po zhes rnam grags pa/_/de yi drung na 'khod pa yi/_/gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu dag_/
[\[68b.6\]]bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/_/mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs/_/de nyid kyi ni bu gsum pa/_/de yi ming ni gdon po che/_/de yi drung na 'khod pa yi/_/gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams/_/bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/_/mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs/_/
[\[68b.7\]]de nyid kyi ni bu bzhi pa/_/de yi ming ni bum pa'i lto/_/de yi drung na 'khod pa yi/_/gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams/_/bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/_/mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs/_/dbang phyug chen po lha chen po/_/lag bzhi pa la stobs po che/_/de yi drung na 'khod pa yi/_/
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams/_/bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas/_/mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs/_/'byung po 'joms pa'i ri la ni/_/'byung po thams cad lhags nas su/_/rig sngags thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/_/rig sngags 'di ni kun tu 
[\[69a.2\]]bsams/_/chad pa mi bzad drag po ste/_/gang phyir sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs/_/gau ta ma la gus par ni/_/thams cad de la skyabs su song /_/g.yo med par ni rjes zhugs shig_/thams cad med par gyur ta re/_/de nas thang cig yud tsam gyis/_/'byung po 
[\[69a.3\]]mang po thams cad lhags/_/ri rnams dang ni g.yang sa dang /_/rgya mtsho dang ni mtsho rnams dang /_/klung dang 'bab chu lu ma dang /_/dba' klong dag na gang 'khod dang /_/skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang /_/kun dga' dang ni nags rnams dang /_/mchod rten gnas dang 
[\[69a.4\]]grong gi gnas/_/ljon shing drung na gang gnas dang /_/grong khyer sgo dang grong dang ni/_/grong rdal dang ni ljongs rnams dang /_/rgyal po'i pho brang sgo rnams dang /_/gzhal med khang na gang gnas dang /_/dkyil 'khor dag dang dur khrod dang /_/de bzhin lha khang rnams dang ni/_/
[\[69a.5\]]mtshams dang sho gam gnas rnams dang /_/khang stong dang ni gram sa dang /_/gnod sbyin gang rnams bla 'og dang /_/phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams rnams nas/_/gnod sbyin bye ba stong rnams ni/_/rig sngags zhags pas bkug pa rnams/_/rdza rnga dag ni brdungs nas su/_/
[\[69a.6\]]la las rnga zlum dag ni brdungs/_/pi wang gling bu 'khar ba'i rnga/_/stobs chen rnams ni sgra 'byin te/_/rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs dang /_/glu dang gar rnams byas nas su/_/dbang po zla ba chu lha dang /_/b+ha ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag_/mi ldan pa dang kun tu lta/_/mngon shes 
[\[69a.7\]]gangs can rdzogs pa dang /_/tsan+dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang /_/mgul pa mdzes dang mgul nges dang /_/skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang /_/lha las byung ba'i ma ldan dang /_/dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/_/mi rgyal rgyal ba khyu mchog dang /_/de bzhin phud pu lnga zhes bya/_/g.yer 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]ma dang ni nyi zer dang /_/nya lcibs dang ni ral gri bu/_/kun gyi bshes dang grags 'dzin dang /_/'brog gnas dang ni yid [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_/khab sna dang ni ri sul kha/_/lnga 'dzin dang ni khab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag_/sde dang dpung dang bzhon par bcas/_/lha dang klu dang dri za dang /_/
[\[69b.2\]]gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin/_/nyin gsum pa yi smyo byed dang /_/de bzhin bzhi pa'i rims dag dang /_/'jig rten 'tshe ba gang yin pa/_/gnod sbyin srin po ma rungs rnams/_/phyogs bzhi nas ni bkug nas su/_/bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa rnams/_/'jig rten 
[\[69b.3\]]mgon po'i spyan snga ru/_/thal sbyar 'khod nas 'di skad smras/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/_/thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag gi ni mdun rgyug pa/_/'byung po gnod 
[\[69b.4\]]sbyin lus po che/_/lag pa bzhi pa ma rungs pa/_/rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang ni rkang gcig pa/_/rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis pa/_/rkang pa bsgreng la spyi'u tshugs dang /_/lus mang mgo bo gcig pa dang /_/lus gcig pa la mgo bzhi pa/_/mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]po la lus phyed dang /_/
[\[69b.5\]]mig gcig lto ni bcu gnyis dang /_/bong bu rnga mo glang chen mgo/_/lag pa bsgreng la mgo btud dang /_/mtshon cha'i so dang mtshon cha'i lag_/mtshon cha'i rkang pa srin po'i rnams/_/zangs kyi skra dang zangs kyi so/_/zangs kyi mig dang zangs kyi lag_/zangs kyi tho 
[\[69b.6\]]ba'i rkang pa dang /_/zangs kyi sna dang zangs kyi kha/_/rkang lag kun tu 'bar ba dang /_/mi yi lus su gnas pa rnams/_/sgur zhar lba ba gsum yod pa/_/mig mi sdug la kha glal ba/_/chu srin stag gi gzugs dang ni/_/gzugs mi sdug dang kha ral po/_/
[\[69b.7\]]mchu 'phyangs po dang so yon po/_/rab tu gtum po khro gnyer can/_/gsus po che dang bum rna bo/_/rna 'phyangs pa dang rna ba med/_/lag ring dang ni rna ba ring /_/sna yi rtse dang lag rtse ring /_/lus skam lus ni rid pa dang /_/skra ring rab tu brgyan pa dang /_/rkang pa mid pa phra 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]ba dang /_/dri nga ba dang bum lto bo/_/yan lag chu srin 'dra ba dang /_/gtun shing tho ba 'dra ba'i lto/_/gnam lto bo la rna bo che/_/gyen du brdzes skra rab tu dmar/_/mgo bo che la gzhu mgrin po/_/skem po sgur po bum lto bo/_/ri rab rtse mo bsgul nas su/_/me 
[\[70a.2\]]mdag gi ni char pa 'bebs/_/ljon shing ri dang rdo ba dang /_/sprin gyi tshogs kyi mdog 'dra ba/_/dung dang rnga chen rdza rnga dang /_/grul bum rnga phran rnams kyi sgra/_/'jigs pa'i sgra ni rab tu 'byin/_/mid po che la bong bu'i sgra/_/nag po ser po sngon po dang /_/dmar ser me ltar dmar 
[\[70a.3\]]ser dang /_/khab 'dra'i spu dang ral gri'i sgra/_/dmar po khrag gis bskus pa rnams/_/mi ro dag ni khyer nas su/_/za bzhin du ni rnam par rgyug_/so rnon lag pa dmar po dang /_/mchu ni khrag gis bskus pa dang /_/lus phyed dag ni zos pa dang /_/mkhal ma snying dang 
[\[70a.4\]]nang grol gyis/_/snyim pa shin tu bkang ba dang /_/byis pa dag ni za bzhin du/_/mer mer po dang srog chags kyi/_/rkang lag rnams kyi stobs kyang 'phrog_/keng rus kyi ni lus kyis su/_/skye bo mang po skrag par byed/_/khrag gis rab tu bkang ba yi/_/mi yi pags 
[\[70a.5\]]pa thogs nas su/_/mi bzad dug gis kun bskus te/_/phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyug_/grong khyer rnams kyi sgo dag dang /_/khyim nas khyim du rnam par 'thor/_/rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa rnams/_/phyogs bzhi dag tu 'khrug par byed/_/de ltar de na rgyal po yi/_/
[\[70a.6\]]gdon dang 'jigs pa chen po rnams/_/lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang /_/rig sngags zhags pas rab tu bsdams/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/_/thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[70a.7\]]grong khyer grong dang yul 'khor dang /_/pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba ni/_/gnod sbyin ma rungs mdangs 'phrog pa/_/snying rje med cing khrag 'thung ba/_/lus chen 'jigs pa chen po ste/_/stobs po che la sgra yang che/_/mgrin bcu po la mig stong po/_/gdon chen mig ni dmar po rnams/_/'khor ni mang 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]po rnams btang ste/_/lag na mtshon thogs rab tu 'jigs/_/sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa dang /_/lag bzhi lag na sgron ma thogs/_/lag na mtshon dang dbyig pa thogs/_/rdo rje mdung rtse lag thogs pa/_/rab tu drag pa'i dmag brgal nas/_/phyogs kun tu ni skrag par byed/_/
[\[70b.2\]]sdang ba'i gnas na 'khod pa yi/_/gsang ba po ni dad kun kyang /_/mi yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu/_/skyes pa bud med gzhan yang 'dzin/_/sha khrag dron mor bcas pa la/_/rnam par 'khrul cing 'dod pa'i gzugs/_/seng ge dang ni stag dang rta/_/ma he ba lang bong bu rnga/_/
[\[70b.3\]]glang po che yi gzugs 'dra dang /_/dom dang gzig dang spyang ki dang /_/khyi dang wa dang ra dag dang /_/byi la byi ba spre'u'i gzugs/_/bse dang phag dang sre mong dang /_/nya dang rus sbal dag gi gzugs/_/kha cig dag ni sram gyi gzugs/_/khwa dang 'ug pa khu byug dang /_/
[\[70b.4\]]bya rgod khra dang nya mid bcas/_/rma bya ngang pa thi bya dang /_/khrung khrung dang ni bya rnams dang /_/kha cig bya gag gzugs rnams su/_/gnod sbyin rnams ni mi yis mthong /_/'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bya yi tshul gyis kyang /_/skye bo mang po skrag par byed/_/kha cig mi yi mgo can la/_/
[\[70b.5\]]lus ni bya gag bong bu 'dra/_/kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu 'tshe/_/lus dang bral ba dag tu snang /_/rnam par 'khrugs shing 'dod la mos/_/rgyu ma'i phreng bas kun tu dkris/_/rtse gsum mdung gis rab 'debs shing /_/srog chags rnams la gnod par byed/_/mi 
[\[70b.6\]]bzad gdug pa'i dbugs 'byin cing /_/skye dgu 'di dag skrag par byed/_/srog chags rgyud ni ji snyed par/_/sna tshogs kyi ni gzugs su snang /_/kha cig dag ni ri yang thogs/_/la la ral gri 'khor lo thogs/_/grangs ni brgya phrag stong rnams te/_/dbyug pas 
[\[70b.7\]]bsdigs shing kha drag po/_/mig phyung ba la bzhin mi sdug_/srin po so ni rno ba dang /_/sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang /_/lce chad gdong ni gnyer ma can/_/rkang lag dang ni gtubs pa dang /_/mgo bo bcad pa'i srin po rnams/_/skabs ni rab tu tshol bar byed/_/sdig pa can rnams 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]mdangs kyang 'phrog_/mi dag gi ni lus rnams la/_/rab tu phra ba'i gdon du snang /_/spu yi bar dang gnad rnams dang /_/de bzhin rma yi kha rnams su/_/lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang /_/rig sngags zhags pas rab tu drangs/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod 
[\[71a.2\]]la/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/_/thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ri yi rgyal po ri rab dang /_/de bzhin kho ra khor yug dang /_/bya rgod phung po gshol mda' 'dzin/_/spos ngad ldang dang gangs kyi ri/_/sna tshogs brtsegs 
[\[71a.3\]]dang paN+Da pA/_/na la pA yi ri gnyis dang /_/dpal gyi ri yi rtse mo ni/_/gang dag shin tu mthor 'phags dang /_/ri bo de dag kun la yang /_/lha dang drang srong gang gnas pa/_/de dag thams cad mi dga' zhing /_/'jigs pa'i yid kyis mya ngan byed/_/bye ba stong gi lha dag dang /_/
[\[71a.4\]]bye ba phrag brgya'i lha rnams dang /_/lha yi bu mo skal chen dag_/thal mo rab tu sbyor bar byed/_/thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang sgra gcan dang /_/sim par byed pa'ang der phyin to/_/lha min bye ba phrag stong dang /_/lha min bye ba phrag brgya dang /_/de dag bu mo 'phrul ldan pa/_/mang 
[\[71a.5\]]po kun kyang thal mo sbyor/_/rab tu gnas dang rgya mtsho dang /_/klu yi rgyal po gzi can dang /_/klu yi rgyal po ma dros dang /_/dga' bo nye dga' gnyis po dang /_/rdo rje blo gros pak+shu dang /_/gang+gA dga' bo sin d+hu mtsho/_/bya yi rgyal po 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_/rgya mtsho chen po 'khrug byed 
[\[71a.6\]]dang /_/stong phrag bye ba'i klu yi rnams/_/bye ba brgya yi klu dag dang /_/de dag bu mo skal chen rnams/_/thal mo rab tu sbyor bar byed/_/nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka yang /_/skar ma'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor/_/gser gyi me tog yan lag na/_/ma ga d+hA na 'jigs byed pa/_/
[\[71a.7\]]gso ba'i mtha' na mi thod can/_/ko sa la na rab tu dkar/_/bzang po'i yul na kha spu can/_/gyad kyi yul na grags pa 'dzin/_/lnga 'dzin pa na skrag byed pa/_/rta skye ba na mig dmar gnas/_/srung byed pa na ser skya ste/_/sems pa na ni mig ser po/_/be'u la phan bum pa'i lto/_/
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]dga' ba'i yul na ring por skyes/_/ba lang 'dzin na rab tu 'joms/_/dung yul na ni nyi ma'i grogs/_/ljongs chen rnams kyi gnod sbyin ni/_/brjod pa bcu drug de dag dang /_/lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che/_/chos skyong rab tu dkar ba dang /_/ser skya rab mdzes khyab 'jug pa/_/
[\[71b.2\]]bum lto gsus pa zlum po dang /_/chu srin bden pa 'chang ba dang /_/lnga ldan rgyal ba khyu mchog dang /_/gnod sbyin chen po dbang phyug che/_/lag pa bzhi can stobs po che/_/sde pa rab tu 'dul ba ni/_/mthu bo che la stobs po che/_/gshin rje gshin rje'i pho nya dang /_/bdud 
[\[71b.3\]]rnams sde dang bcas pa dang /_/gnod sbyin bye ba'i g.yog 'chang ba/_/gnod sbyin de ming 'phrog po yin/_/sha ri ta ni sder bcas dang /_/ri yi bu mo sder bcas dang /_/ri yi bu mo gnod sbyin ma/_/gzi brjid chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/'phrog ma zhes kyang 
[\[71b.4\]]grags pa dang /_/gdol pa mo ni gtum mo dang /_/bu rnams lnga brgyas bskor ba dang /_/mi rdung nag mo kar ka te/_/pad+ma dang ni pad+ma can/_/me tog so dang sa ga dang /_/srin mo bong bu'i rna can dang /_/tsan+dan dang ni khyab 'jug len/_/seng ge ser skya dmar ser po/_/
[\[71b.5\]]glang po klu yi so can dang /_/ri bshes drag po'i mche ba can/_/srin mo so bzang yod pa dang /_/tshangs pa len dang khyab 'jug len/_/gnod sbyin ha la ha la dang /_/gnod sbyin rnam pa'i mchu can dag_/mdung dang mda' gzhu kun thogs shing /_/mi rta ba lang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams/_/
[\[71b.6\]]za zhing 'tshe ba de dag ni/_/phyogs rnams kun tu rgyug cing 'dong /_/sa 'di rab tu g.yo bar byed/_/nags tshal rnams kyang rab tu skems/_/ri rnams kun nas g.yo bar byed/_/skye dgu 'di dag 'tshe byed cing /_/phan tshun nas ni 'du ba dag_/rig sngags kyis ni drangs 
[\[71b.7\]]nas lhags/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/_/thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru/_/de dag lhags par gyur pa dang /_/de nas rgyal po rnam thos bus/_/
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]'jig rten mgon la 'di skad gsol/_/bdag gi phyogs cha byang phyogs su/_/rgyal po'i gnas su sprul pa ni/_/lcang lor ldan pa yid du mchi/_/de bas bdag ni lcang lo'i bdag_/rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can/_/lha rnams kun gyis bsam par gyur/_/
[\[72a.2\]]phyi ra shin tu mthon po can/_/rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa lags/_/'phang du dpag tshad bcu drug ste/_/gser gyi rgyu las bgyis pa lags/_/phyogs bzhi lcog ni re re la'ang /_/gnod sbyin rdo rje 'chang ba dag_/kun nas rab tu gnas par gyur/_/lag na mtshon cha 
[\[72a.3\]]legs par sprul/_/rgyal bo'i pho brang de yi sgo/_/bzhi po gtod par bgyis pa ni/_/gcig ni gser las bgyis pa'i sgo/_/gnyis pa dngul las bgyis pa ste/_/gsum pa shel gyi sgo mo lags/_/bzhi pa gser gyis rnam par spras/_/grong khyer de yi nang dag na/_/
[\[72a.4\]]skyed mos tshal gyi me tog rgyas/_/de yi nang na gzhal med khang /_/rin chen bdun rgyu sna tshogs mchis/_/rin chen sna tshogs ljon shing can/_/bya bran sna tshogs skad kyang 'byin/_/me tog sna tshogs legs par bkram/_/sna tshogs spos kyis byugs pa lags/_/gnod 
[\[72a.5\]]sbyin mo ni 'joms ma dang /_/glu dang rol mos rab tu brgyan/_/dpal gyi dam pa nyams su myong /_/der ni 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor der/_/gang dag 'khor zhing mchis pa dag_/rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa ste/_/chos 'tshal ba dang chos spyod pa/_/srog chags rnams la 
[\[72a.6\]]'tshe mi bgyid/_/zas dang skom gyis mi brel te/_/skye dgu mi bzad gzhan dag ni/_/longs spyod chen po tshol bgyid cing /_/phyogs bzhi kun tu rnam par lta/_/grong khyer sgo yi gom yo dang /_/bza' shing ra ba nags tshal na/_/gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po'i tshogs/_/bye ba 
[\[72a.7\]]stong phrag brgya mchis pa/_/de dag thams cad mdo sde yi/_/zhags pas drangs te brlag par bgyi/_/rgyal po'i pho brang dbus na ni/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas gyur pa/_/bsil ba'i rdzing bus bskor ba ste/_/tsan+dan nags kyis 'khor ba lags/_/kun nas dpag tshad drug cu ste/_/
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]khang pa brtsegs ma sprul pa dag_/gcig ni gser las bgyis pa ste/_/gnyis pa dngul las bgyis pa lags/_/gsum pa baiDUr+ya las bgyis/_/bzhi pa gtsang dang shel gyi rgyu/_/lnga pa mu tig dmar po ste/_/drug pa rdo yi snying po lags/_/bdun pa spug las bgyis 
[\[72b.2\]]pa ste/_/brgyad pa rin chen bdun las bgyis/_/bud med stong phrag brgya dag kyang /_/de dag re re kun na gnas/_/lhab lhub sna tshogs mchog dag dang /_/cha byad sna tshogs mang pos brgyan/_/glu dang rol mo sna tshogs dang /_/bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa mchis/_/de lta'i rab 
[\[72b.3\]]tu dga' ba yis/_/bde zhing tshim pa'i yid gyur cing /_/de na bdag ni dgun skyems dang /_/'dod pa dag gis rab myos pas/_/bdag gi 'khor rnams 'phyan bgyid cing /_/phyogs bcu dag tu 'jigs pa skyed/_/bud med dag dang skyes pa dang /_/de bzhin khye'u dang bu mo dang /_/
[\[72b.4\]]mngal na gnas pa'ang 'jigs par bgyid/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas gtogs pa'ang 'tshe/_/skar ma dag dang nyi zla dang /_/gtum pa'i gza' rnams gnod par bgyid/_/lo tog sa bon 'bras bu dang /_/me tog sman dang zas skom dang /_/mi rnams kyi ni dpal 'phrog cing /_/
[\[72b.5\]]mthon po rnams kyang dma' bar bgyid/_/'jig rten dag na nongs pa rnams/_/dmag dang 'thab mo shar gnyer dang /_/tshig gam zhig gam gsad phye ba/_/de kun 'byung po'i rnam par gyur/_/sbed cing ston par bgyid pa dang /_/bzlog par bgyid cing rgod par bgyid/_/
[\[72b.6\]]'jigs par bgyid cing lta bar bgyid/_/dgrar 'gyur ba yang ston par bgyid/_/sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bgyid/_/nyal ba dag la gnod par bgyid/_/sgo nas se gol sgra phyung zhing /_/mi snyan brjod de za bar bgyid/_/mdza' bo gnyen bshes gzugs dag tu/_/
[\[72b.7\]]gda' zhing bka' mchid smra bar bgyid/_/bu mo sdug gu'i gzugs dag tu/_/'dod la spyod pa dga' bar bgyid/_/nyi ma skar ma'i gzugs dang ni/_/zla ba'i gzugs su gda' bar bgyid/_/rlung dang skar mda' lce gzugs su/_/tshe la gnod par de dag gda'/_/skar ma'i tshogs dang 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]'dra ba dag_/'jigs par bgyid pa wa dang khyir/_/rnam par sprul nas ljon shing dang /_/mchod rten dag gi gnas na gda'/_/skyes pa gzhon nu'i gzugs mdzes pa/_/'bar zhing shing rta'i sgra yang 'byin/_/gnas rnams dang ni shul dag tu/_/rnam pa 
[\[73a.2\]]sna tshogs rjes kyang ston/_/grong khyer dag dang khyim rnams kyi/_/sgo yang gnod sbyin de dag 'byed/_/srog dang lus kyang blangs bgyis shing /_/lam ngan kun tu skor bar bgyid/_/rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs sgra rnams dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs nad 
[\[73a.3\]]kyis rnams/_/lus la na ba gnas par ston/_/nad rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang /_/phyin ci log tu ston par bgyid/_/ji snyed 'jig rten rang bzhin dag_/thams cad log par de dag ston/_/rig sngags zhags pas drangs pas na/_/de dag kun kyang 'dir mchis so/_/de 
[\[73a.4\]]nas rgyal po rnam thos bu/_/langs te thal mo rab sbyar nas/_/zhabs la 'khor lo'i mtshan mnga' ba/_/gser gyi mchod sdong 'bar ba bzhin/_/'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa po/_/thub pa chen po me dang 'dra/_/gnod sbyin gsang sngags mi bzad can/_/stong phrag drug cu 
[\[73a.5\]]rtsa bzhi dag_/byang gi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas/_/byang phyogs dag tu gnod par bgyi/_/'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/_/de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad/_/s+yAd ya the da na/_khang+ge/_khang+ge/_khang+ga/_gam+b+he/_pi tsak+Sha Ne tsakra/_rA dza ne/_tsan+d+re/_tsa pa le/_pA tA le/_
[\[73a.6\]]b+hI ma ba da ba ti/_kha rA gre b+h+r-i ku Ti mu khe ku Ti la ka rA gre/_e kA k+Shi/_pa ra ga ba ti/_sA raM ga ba ti/_mArga ba ti/_garga ba te/_tsi tra ba ti/_tsi tra kAn+ti/_bdag byang phyogs su dge bar gyur cig swA hA/_tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang /_/'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che/_/gnod sbyin 
[\[73a.7\]]sde dpon thams cad dang /_/'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang /_/bdag gi me tog spos dag dang /_/sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis/_/de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang /_/gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang /_/nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur/_/bdag 'jigs pa dang 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/_phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/_/thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal chen yul 'khor srung ba yang /_/langs te thal mo sbyar 
[\[73b.2\]]btud nas/_/me tog tshogs ltar rgyas gyur cing /_/ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs can/_/khu byug dang ni rma bya'i sgra/_/rnga dang 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa/_/thub chen gnod sbyin srin po dang /_/dri za stong phrag drug cu bzhi/_/shar gyi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas/_/shar phyogs 
[\[73b.3\]]pa la gnod par byed/_/'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/_/de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_d+hA ra Ni/_d+hA ra Ni/_pra d+h+wan sa ni/_b+hany+dza ni/_pra b+hany+dza ni/_bi d+ha ma ni/_/kim pu ru She/_sha ka le/_sA re the/_sA ra ba ti/_shU la d+ha re/_/shU la d+hA ri Ni/_shud d+ha tsa ra Ne/_
[\[73b.4\]]g+ho Sha ba ti/_shA rA gre_/shAn+te/_bdag shar phyogs su dge bar gyur cig swA hA/_tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang /_/'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che/_/gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang /_/'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang /_/bdag gi me tog spos dag dang /_/sbyin sreg 
[\[73b.5\]]'di ni blang bar gyis/_/de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang /_/gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang /_/nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur/_/bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/_phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/_/
[\[73b.6\]]phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/_/thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po/_/thal mo sbyar te de nas langs/_/thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs/_/smra ba thams cad rab 'joms pa/_/the tshom 
[\[73b.7\]]thams cad gcod mdzad pa/_/'jig rten thams cad rnam 'dren pa/_/grul bum [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]srul po dag_/stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams/_/lho yi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas/_/de nas byung la gnod par bgyid/_/'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/_/de dag chad pa bdag gis 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]bshad/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_shAn+ti/_shA ra ba ti/_kAn+ti/_kA ra ba ti/_kiM ka ra si/_kiM ka ra ti/_kiM ka si ki riN+Ti/_kiM ra te/_kiM ba te/_d+ha ra Ni/_d+ha ba ni/_b+hU mi/_d+hA r-i Ni/_hi ma ba ti/_dz+yo tiSh+tsa ra Ne/_gA lA gre/_bdag lho phyogs su dge bar gyur cig swA hA/_tshangs pa 
[\[74a.2\]]dang ni brgya byin dang /_/'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che/_/gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang /_/'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang /_/bdag gi me tog spos dag dang /_/sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis/_/de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang /_/gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang /_/
[\[74a.3\]]nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur/_/bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/_phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/_/thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[74a.4\]]rgyal po mig mi bzang ba yang /_/thal mo sbyar ba byas nas langs/_/sprin chen seng ge chen po pa/_/che ba'i che ba rgya mtsho che/_/gsung ba chen po dpa' chen po/_/g.yul chen rab tu 'joms mdzad pa/_/klu dang 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gsang ba po/_/stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dag_/
[\[74a.5\]]nub kyi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas/_/de nas byung la gnod par bgyid/_/'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/_/de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad/_/s+yAd ya the da na/_d+har+m+mi ba ra gre/_ba la ba te/_ba li ni/_bi shAM ge/_bi tsa shi/_sA ga re/_khA rI/_ka ba li/_tsaN+Da li/_ki ri Ni/_
[\[74a.6\]]nI ra ny+dza ne/_bing+hAr Ni/_bal+la ma ti/_a bar+Na ba te/_a tsa le/_bdag nub phyogs su dge bar gyur cig swA hA/_tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang /_/'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che/_/gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang /_/'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang /_/bdag gi me tog spos dag dang /_/
[\[74a.7\]]sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis/_/de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang /_/gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang /_/nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur/_/bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/_phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]khyod la/_/thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas tshangs pa tshangs chen yang /_/thal mo sbyar ba byas nas langs/_/tshangs pas bkrus pa dag pa po/_/rig byed kun gyi pha rol phyin/_/skye bo dga' mdzad sman pa'i rje/_/'jig rten 
[\[74b.2\]]thams cad gso mdzad pa/_/gnod sbyin srin po gang gi rnams/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams gnas pa dang /_/sa yi 'og dang bar dang steng /_/nam mkha' dag la gnas pa'i gdon/_/'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/_/de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad/_/s+yAd ya the 
[\[74b.3\]]da na/_brah+ne/_brat+ma/_g+ho She/_brah+ma swa re/_badzre badzra g+ho She/_badzra d+ha re/_s+thi te sA re/_a tsa le/_a ra Ne/_i Sha ni/_a rA ni te/_shu re/_ba rA gra/_prAp+te/_sA ga ra ba te/_bdag phyogs thams cad du dge bar gyur cig swA hA/_tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang /_/'jig rten skyong dang dbang 
[\[74b.4\]]phyug che/_/gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang /_/'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang /_/bdag gi me tog spos dag dang /_/sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis/_/de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang /_/gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang /_/nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur/_/
[\[74b.5\]]bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/_rlung las gyur dang mkhris las gyur/_/bad kan las gyur 'dus las gyur/_/nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur/_/bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/_phyag 
[\[74b.6\]]'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/_/thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyal srid gcig gi phyir 'jig rten du 
[\[74b.7\]]byung ba ma yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_grong dang /_khyim nas sems can gcig gi bar gyi don gyi phyir 'jig rten du byung ba ma yin gyi/_'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]dge sbyong dang /_bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ste/_de ni dper na sman pa mkhas pa'i mchog tu phyin pa/_gso ba la brtson pa/_sman pas shes par 
[\[75a.2\]]bya ba shin tu bslabs pa rgyal po gcig gi don du byung ba ma yin/_yul gcig gi don du byung ba ma yin pa nas sems can gcig gi don gyi bar du byung ba ma yin pa dang 'dra'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_phyogs gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i phyogs de dag tu 
[\[75a.3\]]mi rnams dang /_mi ma yin pa de dag kyang rnam par 'tshe bar mi bya bar sems kyis/_nga yang yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ba dang /_yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i don kyang byas par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang byas 
[\[75a.4\]]par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bgos nas lhung bzed bsnams te/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /_thabs cig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri las shod du gshegs pa dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas lha'i 
[\[75a.5\]]gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das la g.yas rol nas phul lo/_/phul nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das la g.yon rol nas phul lo/_/
[\[75a.6\]]phul nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang re re zhing lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das la snam logs nas phul nas/_bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to/_/lha'i bu 
[\[75a.7\]]dbang phyug chen po dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_gnod sbyin mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang bcas pas kyang so so nas lha'i gdugs dag blangs te/_nyan thos rnams la phul nas rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to/_/
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]de lta bu'i grags pa dang bkur sti dang /_brnyes par bya ba brnyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri las shod du babs te/_yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der gshegs pa dang /_yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[75b.2\]]'das shin tu mdzes pa/_dad par 'os pa/_dbang po zhi ba/_thugs zhi ba/_dbang po dul ba/_thugs dul ba/_dul ba dang /_zhi gnas kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/_dbang po dben zhing khugs pa/_glang po chen po lta bu shin tu dul ba/_mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med 
[\[75b.3\]]la rnam par gsal ba/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus shin tu brgyan pa/_shing sA la'i rgyal po ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par spras pa/_nyi ma ltar 'od zer gyi dra ba kun tu 'gyed pa/_mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na 
[\[75b.4\]]ri bo'i spo la me'i phung po rab tu 'bar ba dang 'dra zhing bcom ldan 'das gser gyi ri bo chen po dam pa ltar lham me lhan ne lhang nge rgyang ring po nas gnas der gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu yangs pa can gyi li ts+tsha bI rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur nas/_sems dad par 
[\[75b.5\]]gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por lam gang nas gshegs pa'i lam de phyags shing chag chag 'debs/_byi dor byed/_me tog 'thor/_dar gyi lda ldi dang /_dril bu dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te bdug spos sna tshogs 
[\[75b.6\]]kyis bdugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i ri mo can me tog pad+ma'i snying po ltar 'jam pa/_sngon legs par spyad pa'i 
[\[75b.7\]]mtshan gyis brgyan pa/_gzhon sha chags shing 'jam pa/_nyi ma'i 'od zer bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/_'od zer brgya phrag mang po kun tu 'phro ba/_dri ma med pa'i phyag gis lits+tsha bI dag gi mgo la byugs te rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i nang du 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]gshegs nas nam gyi gung thun la sgo skyes kyi gzhi zhabs kyis mnan nas phyogs bzhir gzigs te phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas na bza' bla gos gsol te bka' stsal pa/_phyi ma'i dus na dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma 'am gang 
[\[76a.2\]]su yang rung ba dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la mchod pa byed pa dang /_stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[76a.3\]]rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing ston pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa de dag la yams kyi nad dang /_'jigs pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrugs pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'ching ba dang /_kha 
[\[76a.4\]]mchu dang /_shags dang /_tha na phra ma dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i sdug bsngal ba'i las kyis mi tshugs shing /_'tshe bar byed pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[76a.5\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar bgyid pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag 
[\[76a.6\]]rgya de gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/btsun pa de bzhin no zhes gsol nas mi mjed 
[\[76a.7\]]kyi bdag po tshangs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/s+yAd ya thed na/_a tsa le/_ma tsa le/_sA ra ma tsa le/_pra kr-i ti bar+Ne kr-i ti ni r+g+ho She/_sa man+ta mu khe/_s+thi re s+thA pa re bi g+huSh+Te/_bi g+huSh+Ta shab+de pra ga la ni/_sA rang ga me 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]sA rA su te sA rang+ga ba te/_ba le ma hA ba le ma hA nir b+hA se swA hA/_de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_lus su gtogs pa dran pa dang /_zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong dang /_ting nge 'dzin gsum dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar 
[\[76b.2\]]gzhag pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_rjes su dran pa drug dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[76b.3\]]dgu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_rnam par grol ba'i skye mched bcu gcig dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis dang /_rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang /_dbugs dbyung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa rnam pa bcu drug 
[\[76b.4\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te tshangs pa de ni stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa'i mdo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[76b.5\]]rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya ste/_sangs rgyas bsgrubs pa'o/_/chos bsgrubs pa'o/_/dge 'dun bsgrubs pa'o/_/tshangs pa bsgrubs pa'o/_/dbang po bsgrubs pa'o/_/'jig rten skyong ba bsgrubs pa'o/_/dbang phyug bsgrubs pa'o/_/bden 
[\[76b.6\]]pa bsgrubs pa'o/_/lam bsgrubs pa'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsgrubs pa'o/_/zla ba bsgrubs pa'o/_/nyi ma bsgrubs pa'o/_/gza' bsgrubs pa'o/_/rgyu skar bsgrubs pa'o/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_sA le ka si ni/_bi d+ha ra ni/_ba rA gra/_sA re A mar+Sha Ni/_a mo g+ha ba ti/_
[\[76b.7\]]sa tsa na kA li/_na kA li/_kA shi ka pa ti/_b+ha ra Ni/_b+ha ra ka sha khe/_sa man+ta prAp+te/_sAprAp+te/_sA ra prAp+te/_stam+b+ha ni/_stam+b+ha na prAp+te/_badzra d+ha re swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten 'di 'am yang dag 'das pa dang /_/mtho ris dag na 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]rin chen mchog yod pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi lhar gyur pa/_/mi yi mchog dang 'dir ni mtshungs pa med/_/de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/zad pa chags bral bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas/_/shes 
[\[77a.2\]]pas shAkya thub des rab tu phye/_/bdud rtsi zhi ba 'dus byas ma yin pa/_/chos de dang ni mtshungs pa gang yang med/_/de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhin rab bstan pa/_/ston pa'i rnal 
[\[77a.3\]]'byor bla med rtag sgrub pa/_/rdo rje lta bu'i mig gnyis lam mthong ba/_/ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yod ma yin/_/de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/gang zag chen po brgyad po rab bsngags shing /_/gang zag zung bzhir 
[\[77a.4\]]brjod pa de dag ni/_/drang srong chen po gang zag mtshungs med pa/_/bde bar gshegs pas sbyin pa'i gnas zhes gsungs/_/de la byin na 'bras bu cher 'gyur te/_/zhing rab gshin la sa bon btab pa bzhin/_/'di ni dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de 
[\[77a.5\]]yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/gang dag brtan pa'i yid kyis rab brtson zhing /_/gau ta ma'i bstan la 'jug byed na/_/de dag thob nas bdud rtsi 'jug thob ste/_/mun pa bsal nas mya ngan 'das thob pa/_/de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni 
[\[77a.6\]]dge bar shog_/lta ba 'di la sbyar ma thag tu ni/_/'jig tshogs lta dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang /_/the tsom dang ni nyon mongs gsum po dag_/cig car spangs te 'phags pa'i bden mthong ba/_/des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir 
[\[77a.7\]]ni dge bar shog_/lus sam ngag gam 'on te yid kyis kyang /_/sdig pa rnam gsum nam yang mi byed cing /_/blo bur byas na'ang 'chab par mi byed la/_/de ltar de dag lta bas 'dzin mi byed/_/de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]shog_/ji ltar dbang po'i sdong po sar btsugs pa/_/phyogs bzhi'i rlung rnams kyis ni mi g.yo ltar/_/'phags pa'i lam gyi dam pa mthong ba yi/_/gang zag 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de bzhin no/_/des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni 
[\[77b.2\]]dge bar shog_/shes rab zab mo shin tu bstan pa yi/_/'phags pa'i bden pa su dag rnam sgom zhing /_/lus kyang sbyin par yid la byas pa ni/_/de dag 'jigs pa brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur/_/des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir 
[\[77b.3\]]ni dge bar shog_/ji ltar me ni rlung gis rab gtor ba/_/lag tu blangs te bgrang du med pa nyid/_/de ltar kun tu sbyor ba rab btang ba/_/sangs rgyas sras rnams bstan du med par 'gro/_/des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/
[\[77b.4\]]sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/_/de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur cig_/ston mchog dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa/_/sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog_/sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/_/de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur cig_/zhi ba 
[\[77b.5\]]chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa/_/chos la phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog_/sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/_/de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur cig_/tshogs kyi dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa/_/dge 'dun phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog_/sems 
[\[77b.6\]]can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/_/de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur cig_/'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/_/sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag_/skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog_/nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shog_/'di ni rgyal ba dgra rgyal 
[\[77b.7\]]bden gang gis/_/shin tu bden pa gsung zhing rdzun med pa/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig swA hA/_s+yAd ya the dan/_d+hi re d+hi d+hi re/_ba li ni r+g+ho She/_ba li swa re/_sA ra ba te/_stu ti pra stu ti prAp+te/_A ra be/_a ra ni r+g+ho She/_A ra ba ti/_a ts+yu te 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]ba la ba te/_shU ra prAp+te/_sA raM ga me/_sur+ya ba le/_sUr+ya ni r+g+ho She swA hA/_tshangs pa stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las rab tu thar bar byed pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[78a.2\]]rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi gnas so/_/chos kyi gnas so/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas so/_/tshangs pa'i gnas so/_/dbang po'i gnas so/_/'jig rten skyong ba'i gnas so/_/dbang phyug gi gnas so/_/drang srong chen po'i gnas 
[\[78a.3\]]so/_/'byung po'i gnas so/_/mig gi gnas so/_/rgyu'i gnas so/_/phyogs kyi gnas so/_/bstan pa'i gnas so/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o/_/nyan thos rnams kyi reg pa'o/_/tshangs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/dbang po'i 
[\[78a.4\]]rab tu bsngags pa'o/_/'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi mchod pa'o/_/dbang phyug gi phyag byas pa'o/_/lha thams cad kyi kun tu mchod pa'o/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyi bsngags pa'o/_/mkhas pa rnams mngon par dga' bar gyur pa'o/_/drang srong rnams kyi rab tu bsngags 
[\[78a.5\]]pa'o/_/tshangs pa rnams kyi rab tu brgyan pa'o/_/lha rnams kyi mngon par bstod pa'o/_/khrus byed pa rnams kyi bsang ba'o/_/rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi dga' bar byas pa'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul lo/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi skyed mos tshal lo/_/
[\[78a.6\]]drang srong rnams kyi gnas so/_/nyan thos rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi 'byung gnas so/_/nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms pa'o/_/bag la nyal gyi zug rngu rnams 'byin pa'o/_/'phags 
[\[78a.7\]]pa'i lam kun tu ston pa'o/_/thar pa'i sgo rnams 'byed pa'o/_/'jig tshogs la lta ba rnams 'jig par byed pa'o/_/nga rgyal gyi ri rab tu bsnyil bar byed pa'o/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skems pa'o/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems can thams cad sgrol ba'o/_/bdud kyi 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]zhags pa gcod pa'o/_/bdud kyi 'khor skrag par byed pa'o/_/bdud kyi mchil ma 'dor ba'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i g.yul las sgrol ba'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par byed pa'o/_/'khor ba'i khyim nas 'byung bar byed pa'o/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_khaD+ge khang+ge khaD+ge g+ho/_
[\[78b.2\]]u sho d+ha ne/_sA ra thi/_pra b+he de/_bi pu la pra b+he/_saM kar+tha Ni/_bi kar+tha Ni/_bi sha gra ba te/_shud d+ha sA d+ha ni/_ba ru Na ba te/_bA sa/_pe b+hu She ne/_be saM ga me/_pa shu pa ti/_puspa gar+b+he/_bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang nye bar 'tshe ba dang ngal ba thams cad las bde legs su 
[\[78b.3\]]gyur cig swA hA/_stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa'i mdo sde 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya ste/_'dis ni lha dang /_
[\[78b.4\]]mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag rgyas btab pa ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer bla na med par zhugs so/_/de'i don gyi phyir sngon mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_nyan thos 
[\[78b.5\]]rnams dang /_pha ma dang /_sbyin gnas dang /_bla ma lta bu rnams la bsnyen bkur to/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/tshul khrims bsrungs so/_/sbyin pa byin no/_/snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bskangs so/_/byang chub thob par bsgrubs so/_/bdud pham par byas so/_/
[\[78b.6\]]de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gis skad gcig dang blo gros gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/_kye ma rig sngags rig sngags che/_/stong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa/_/
[\[78b.7\]]sangs rgyas phyag rgya de yis ni/_/phyogs bzhi'i sems can thams cad bsrungs/_/phyag rgya gang gis btab gyur na/_/'byung po thams cad skrag bgyid pa/_/stong chen rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo/_/phyag rgya bdag cag stsal bar bgyi/_/mi gang rab tu sdang ba dang /_/bstan pa 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]'di la ma dad pa/_/de dag tshangs pas sprul pa yi/_/rig sngags chad pas gcad par bgyi/_/brgya byin gyis ni spyi bos blangs/_/'jig rten skyong bas rgyas btab bo/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_ka liM ge ba ra de/_dzau tA gre/_dzA ma ni/_siM ha ba de/_sA rA gra prAp+te/_haM sa gA mi ni/_
[\[79a.2\]]ma li ni/_hu le si hu le si hu li si hu le me/_ha ham/_ha ham/_su da ni/_ba rA gra ba ti/_hasti ni/_ne ba ra mi ta/_tsaN+Ta le/_tsa ra me/_tsa rA me tsa rA tsa rA re swA hA/_stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten 
[\[79a.3\]]gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_phyogs bzhi'i gnod sbyin dang srin po sha za ba rnams kyis sgra skad drag po phyung ba/_kye ma'o sdug bsngal kye ma'o brlag_/bdag cag 'byung po'i tshogs phung ngo /_/'byung po'i tshogs ni 
[\[79a.4\]]rab tu phung /_/bdag cag rtag tu dbang gis khrid/_/srog chags 'byung po thams cad ni/_/de ring dgrar bcas dbang med do/_/de dag sa la 'khod nas ni/_/zhum zhing rnam par zhum gyur nas/_/'gre zhing ldog par rab tu byed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa gzhi rdo rjer mngon 
[\[79a.5\]]par sprul pa dang /_de dag kyang phyogs bzhir byer ro/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis phyogs bzhir me lce'i phung po chen po mngon par sprul pa dang de dag nam mkha' la kun tu rgyug go/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas nam mkha' lcags su mngon par sprul pa dang /_de dag shing 
[\[79a.6\]]ta la bdun tsam nas nam mkha' la kun tu rgyug go/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis ral gri dang /_mda' dang /_mdung thung dang /_mdung dang /_mda' bo che dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_ri'i char mngon par phab bo/_/de'i tshe gnod sbyin lnga stong mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[79a.7\]]su kun nas 'dus pa rnams rig sngags kyi dmod pas bcom ste/_rims nad kyis btab nas myos te rmya zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te gsol pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_thugs brtse ba can lags kyis/_dge sbyong gau ta mas bdag cag 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]bskyab tu gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po de dag la byams pas khyab par mdzad nas bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin du btsud do/_/bdag cag phyag rgya spong gyur na/_/ma bsad pa yi 'gro gang dang /_/pha bsad pa yi 'gro gang dang /_/dgra bcom pa yang gsod 
[\[79b.2\]]gang dang /_/dge 'dun dbyen bgyid 'gro gang dang /_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la sdang sems kyis/_/sku mtshal phyung ba bgyid pa yi/_/'gro ba gang lags der mchi'o/_/ardza ka yi dog pa ltar/_/mgo ni tshal pa bdun 'gas shing /_/gnod sbyin nad kyis btab pa dang /_/bdag lus 
[\[79b.3\]]sha bkra 'byung bar shog_/gang 'di rgyal bas gsungs pa'i mdo/_/stong chen rab tu 'joms pa yi/_/rig sngags rgyal las 'gal bgyis na/_/bdag cag 'dod bzhin mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe grong khyer chen po yangs pa can na yams kyi nad dang /_'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa 
[\[79b.4\]]dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrugs pa thams cad rgyun chad par gyur to/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rang rang gi spyod yul las 'das so/_/ngang pa dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_rma bya dang /_ngur pa dang /_shang shang te'u 
[\[79b.5\]]dang /_bya'i tshogs rnams kyang sgra snyan pa 'byin to/_/mi 'am ci rnams ni lha'i bu mo bzhin du lus la gnod pa med do/_/rin po che'i cha byad rnams kyang ma dkrol bar 'khrol lo/_/rnga bo che dang /_dung dang /_rdza rnga dang /_rnga bran dang /_pi bang dang /_gling bu rnams kyang ji ltar gnas su 
[\[79b.6\]]bkod pa bzhin du sgra byung ngo /_/bal po se'u dang /_bil ba dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_n+ya gro d+ha dang /_byang chub kyi shing dang /_spre'u gnas dang /_blak+Sha dang /_u dum bA ra dang /_sA la dang /_ta ma la'i shing ljon pa rnams kyang dri rab tu 'byin to/_/lha brgya stong dag gis kyang a la la zhes 
[\[79b.7\]]bya ba'i sgra phyung ste/_bar snang las me tog gi char mngon par phab bo/_/mi ma yin pa'i dri dag kyang 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis bslab pa'i gzhi yongs 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]su bzung ste/_gos ngur smrig bgos nas stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde'i rgyal po gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs shing bzung ste/_bklags shing bshad la kun chub par bgyis shing yi ger bris nas mdud 
[\[80a.2\]]pa bor te 'chang na/_de la yams kyi nad dang /_'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrugs pa dang /_khrag khrug dang /_'thab mo dang /_bcing ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa nas phra ma'i bar gyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so/_/rnam 
[\[80a.3\]]par 'tshe ba thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur lags so/_/yul 'khor mtshams gcad par 'tshal ba/_khrus bgyis pa/_zas dkar gsum 'tshal ba/_zas ngan pa rnam lnga spangs pa/_mi'i bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad yongs su bzung ba/_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/_shin tu brgyan 
[\[80a.4\]]pa/_gos dang /_rgyan dang ldan pa des grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_sum mdo dang /_khyim rnams nyal nyil gyi phung po ma mchis par bgyis te/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi dbus kyi dog sa rnams su me tog sil ma bkram la/_spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdug par 
[\[80a.5\]]bgyi'o/_/phyogs bzhir bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis pas brgyan pa/_lag na mtshon thogs pa bzhi dang /_dril bu bzhi dang /_rin po che'i snod bzhi bzhag go/_/snga dro'i dus kyi tshe gdugs shar ba dang /_rig sngags bklag par bgyi ste/_mdo sde bzlas shing bklag par bgyi'o/_/yi ger bris te mchod 
[\[80a.6\]]rten chen po dang /_shing ljon pa chen po dang /_rgyal mtshan chen po'i rtse mo la bstod de btags la/_me tog sna tshogs dang /_spos sna tshogs dag gis dgung zla phyed kyi bar du mchod par bgyi'o/_/gdugs re re zhing rig sngags lan re bklag par bgyi'o/_/de ltar na yul 'khor yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[80a.7\]]de ltar grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_pho brang 'khor dang /_gnas dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_khyim dang /_zhing dang /_las khang dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_'bras bu dang /_ne'u gsing dang /_kun dga' ra ba dang /_gnag lhas dang /_phyugs lhas rnams nyal 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]nyil ma mchis par bgyis te/_seng ldeng dang /_rgya shug gi zhugs bltams la/_dog sa la me tog sil ma bkram ste/_sgo gang g.yas g.yon nas dri sna tshogs kyis bdugs la/_sa bon thams cad mar gyis bskus te phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi/_chab sgor tshon skud sna tshogs bre bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[80b.2\]]dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa dag ni bton la slar yang gzud par bgyi'o/_/rig sngags kyang bklag par bgyi'o/_/yi ger bris sam/_mdud pa mdud de mthon po'i khar btags la mchod par bgyi'o/_/nad pa'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam/_sangs rgyas kyi ring 
[\[80b.3\]]bsrel lam/_tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/_brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gzugs khri'u 'am/_za ma tog gi steng du bzhag ste/_phyag rgya bzhi bgyis la bzhag par bgyi'o/_/me tog sna tshogs dang /_spos sna tshogs dang /_tshangs pa dang /_brgya 
[\[80b.4\]]byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dang /_gnod sbyin stobs po che dang /_'phrog ma la sogs pa'i ming gis dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bgyi'o/_/de rnams kyi stobs dang /_dbang phyug dang /_byin gyis bdag dge bar 
[\[80b.5\]]gyur cig_/bdag la srung ba gyis shig_/nad thams cad las thar bar gyur cig_/nad pa'i zas dang /_skom dang /_sman rnams kyang rig sngags 'dis btab ste stsal bar bgyi'o/_/rdzogs sangs rnam par sangs rgyas tshe/_/'jig rten skyong bas phyogs bzhi nas/_/snod 
[\[80b.6\]]bzhi dag ni blangs nas su/_/bde bar gshegs la phul ba dang /_/mthu yis gcig tu sprul mdzad pa/_/lha yi snod mchog de dang ni/_/bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams/_/ston pa'i phyag na bsnams gyur pa/_/bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis/_/sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur 
[\[80b.7\]]par shog_/de bzhin lha mo 'phrog ma yis/_/lha rdzas dge ba a ru ra/_/blangs nas ston la rab phul ba/_/bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams/_/bden pa'i tshig ni 'di dag gis/_/nad pa rnams kyi nad sel cing /_/nyes pa thams cad 'phrog byed pa/_/sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]par shog_/sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gzi brjid dang /_/gtsug tor can gyi stobs rnams dang /_/thams cad skyob kyi bden tshig dang /_/log dad sel gyi ting 'dzin dang /_/gser zhes bya ba'i ye shes dang /_/'od srung gi ni rdzu 'phrul dang /_/shAkya seng ge'i mthu 
[\[81a.2\]]rnams kyis/_/sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog_/nad pa shar phyogs kha bstan la/_/sman rnams nye bar stsal bar bgyi/_/de yi tshe na rig sngags 'di/_/lag mthil bzhag ste bklag par bgyi/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_kha Te/_kha Te/_kha Te/_kha Te bi kha Ti/_bi ma le/_bi lam be/_ba le/_ba la 
[\[81a.3\]]ba ti/_tsan+d+re/_tsa ra Ne/_a mr-i ta ni r+g+ho She swA hA/_rlung las gyur dang mkhris las gyur/_/bad kan las gyur 'dus las gyur/_/nad rnams thams cad rab bcom ste/_/bdag la rtag tu dge bar shog_/byad stems dang ro langs dang ldan pa'i las rnams la skyes pa'am/_bud med gdugs 
[\[81a.4\]]zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pa/_rab tu bkrus pa/_shin tu brgyan pa des dog sa la me tog sil ma bkram ste/_spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs la seng ldeng dang /_rgya shug rigs gnyis kyi zhugs bus te/_sa bon thams cad phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o/_/zhugs kyi 
[\[81a.5\]]nang du'ang gtor bar bgyi'o/_/rtsa ba thams cad dang /_me tog thams cad tshon skud sna tshogs la brgyus te ral gri'am/_mdung rtse gsum pa'am/_mdung ngam/_mda' la gdags par bgyi'o/_/spos chab sna tshogs sbyar te/_bum pa chen po'i nang du blugs la/_gang byad 
[\[81a.6\]]stems kyis phog pa de skud pa des bcings te/_bum pa'i chab kyis bkru bar bgyi'o/_/skud pa yang ral gris bcad de zhugs kyi nang du dor ro/_/stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di yang brjod par bgyi'o/_/gang dag sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[81a.7\]]kyi nyan thos dang /_/tshangs dbang dang ni 'jig rten skyong /_/gnod sbyin sde dpon dbang phyug dang /_/de bzhin gnod sbyin stobs chen dang /_/'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang /_/de dag mthu dang gzi brjid kyis/_/ro langs las rnams chad gyur cig_/rdo rjes rin chen phug pa dang /_/
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]me yis bud shing sreg pa dang /_/rlung gis sprin ni 'thor ba dang /_/nyi mas nags tshal skems byed pa/_/bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis/_/byad stems las rnams tshig par shog_/spos dang me tog sna tshogs kyis/_/sdig pa thams cad nges par bsal/_/tad+ya thA/_hu me hu me 
[\[81b.2\]]ka kha li/_ka kha li/_kha ra le/_dzu hwi ni/_dza ba le/_ha rA gre/_ha ri Ni shA ba ri/_shAn+ti/_pra shan+ti swA hA/_d+hA ba ni swA hA/_pra d+hA ba ni swA hA/_g+han+da rbeswA hA/_pra laM gi ni swA hA/_sarba kA khorda kr-i ta be tA Da ts+tshe da ni swA hA/_lha thams cad kyi gsang sngags 'di dag gis bdag gi byad stems dang /_ro 
[\[81b.3\]]langs dang /_sman dang /_sngags dang /_dug dang /_dug sbyar ma rnams bcad do/_/bshig go_/pham par byas so/_/pha rol pham par byas so swA hA/_lba ba dang /_shu ba dang /_smyo ba dang /_'bras dang /_'brum bu dang /_rkom po dang /_dug 'thungs pa las thar bar 'tshal ba shin tu 
[\[81b.4\]]khrus bgyis pa/_shin tu brgyan pa/_stan bzang po'i steng du mchis te/_rig sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang /_/rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang /_/dgra bcom dag gi mthu dag dang /_/gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang /_/shA ri'i 
[\[81b.5\]]bu yi shes rab dang /_/maud gal bu yi rdzu 'phrul dang /_/ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni/_/'od srung sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_/kauN+Di n+ya'i sngar thob dang /_/kun dga' bo yi thos pa dang /_/tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang /_/brgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang /_/'jig rten skyong ba'i yul 
[\[81b.6\]]rnams dang /_/dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dag dang /_/sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang /_/'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang /_/de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzis/_/bdag gi dug ni dug med shog_/dug med dug rnams 'jig byed pa/_/gsang sngags tshig rnams de lags 
[\[81b.7\]]so/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_ha ri gi shi na ki li/_e he re/_a ma re/_aN+Da re/_paN+Da re/_ka Ta ke/_ke yU re/_ha se ha se ha se/_kha se kha se kha se/_kha raM ge_/ma ru ga ha Ne swA hA/_mu mu k+Sha swA hA/_hi le swA hA/_mi le swA hA/_'bras dang rma dang shu ba dang /_/g.yan pa dang ni 'brum bu dang /_/lhog pa dang ni g.ya' 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]ba ni/_/bdun pa lags te rab tu bcom/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/_/de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/_/bcom ldan sangs rgyas dug mi mnga'/_/sangs rgyas gzi yis dug bcom mo/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/_/de dag 'jig rten dug gsum 
[\[82a.2\]]ste/_/bcom ldan chos ni dug mi mnga'/_/chos kyi gzi yis dug bcom mo/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/_/de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/_/bcom ldan dge 'dun dug mi mnga'/_/dge 'dun gzi yis dug bcom mo/_/sa ni dug gi ma yin te/_/sa ni dug gi pha yang 
[\[82a.3\]]yin/_/bden pa'i bden tshig de dag gis/_/bdag gi dug ni dug med shog_/dug ni sa yi nang du song /_/gang ba'i snod du dug song shig swA hA/_de nas khrag khrug dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_dgra rnams las rgyal bar 'tshal bas 
[\[82a.4\]]thog mar mchod rten chen po la mchod par bgyi'o/_/stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di yang brjod par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni bdud pham mdzad/_/chos ma yin ni chos kyis so/_/dge 'dun gyis ni mu stegs pham/_/dbang pos lha min pham par gyur/_/
[\[82a.5\]]lha min rnams kyis zla ba pham/_/nam mkha' lding gis rgya mtsho'o/_/me yis shing rnams pham par gyur/_/chus ni me yang pham par 'gyur/_/rlung gis sprin rnams rab tu pham/_/rdo rje yis ni rin chen phug_/lha rnams bden par rab tu gsungs/_/sa yang bden par gnas pa 
[\[82a.6\]]lags/_/sangs rgyas dang ni chos kyang bden/_/bden pa rgyal gyur [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ma lags/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_a mr-i te/_a gra puSh+pe/_ba hu pha le/_ni bA ra Ni/_sarba ar+Tha sA d+ha ni/_a pa rA dzi te/_ba ra Te d+ha ra Ni/_gu h+yA bar te/_gau ta me/_gu gu ma ti/_dzam+b+ha ni swA hA/_pra dzam+b+ha ni swA hA/_ba la 
[\[82a.7\]]pra b+hany+dza ni swA hA/_dza ye swA hA/_bi dza ye swA hA/_dza ya bi dza ye swA hA/_phyir rgol ba ni kun las rgyal/_/sdig pa thams cad rab tu pham swA hA/_de nas ston pa kun mkhyen gyis/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs/_/mi 'khrugs pa dang snang mdzad spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang /_/rin chen 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]'od 'phro ri rab mu khyud 'od dpag med/_/rdo rje rnams kyi mtshan rnams rtag tu bzung na ni/_/'jigs par 'gyur ba ma yin non par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gis mthu stobs chen po brgyad po 'di dag gi/_/mtshan rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir ni rab brjod cing /_/kun tu bskyab pa 
[\[82b.2\]]byas na de yi lus la ni/_/me dang dug dang mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te de la gnod pa byed pa nye bar gnas/_/gshed mas mtshon rnams kyis ni gdab par gzas pa las/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rjes su dran na ni/_/mtshon cha de dag dum bu dum bur 
[\[82b.3\]]chag cing 'brul/_/gal te mtshon cha rnams ni thogs par gyur na yang /_/lag pa chag nas sa la rab tu ltung bar 'gyur/_/de yi lus la cung zad 'bab par mi 'gyur te/_/sngan chad byas pa gang yin pa ni ma gtogs so/_/lha rnams kyis mthun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[82b.4\]]dag gsol to/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bden pa rab ston thub pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/deng ni bden pa rnams la gnas nas mchi bar bgyi/_/bdag gi las rnams thams cad 'bras bur bcas gyur cig_/de nas tshangs pa tshangs 
[\[82b.5\]]chen gyis/_/langs te thal mo sbyar btud nas/_/stong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa/_/legs par gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di/_/byis pa rnams la phan bgyid pa/_/rig sngags bdag gis brjod par bgyi/_/gang gis dang por 'dzam gling du/_/rig sngags rab tu 
[\[82b.6\]]ston mdzad pa/_/chos kyi rgyal po snang mdzad pa/_/sangs rgyas dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyad par 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang /_/tshogs kyi dam pa dge 'dun dang /_/sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_/tshangs pas 'di skad tshig gsol to/_/gang dag sangs rgyas rang 
[\[82b.7\]]sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni nyan thos dang /_/drang srong dang ni 'jig rten skyong /_/lha rnams ji snyed mchis pa dang /_/de kun mi yi 'jig rten na/_/'di las skyes pa sha stag go/_/thub chen mngal la 'tshal ba yi/_/gnod sbyin srin po 'di na mchis/_/rgyal po rnams kyis mthong mi nus/_/bstan 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]par yang ni mi nus so/_/gang la bu ni mi 'chags dang /_/gang gi mngal ni mi gnas dang /_/skyes pa bud med 'du ba na/_/dbang po rnams ni myos par bgyid/_/mer mer po dang nur nur po/_/bu yi sa bon ma rung bgyid/_/gang yang mngal ni thur du gyur/_/sha ma mi 
[\[83a.2\]]'byung gnod bgyid pa/_/de rnams kyi ni ming brjod kyis/_/'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/_/'jam pa po dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal/_/skem byed brjed byed khu tshur can/_/ma mo dang ni dza mi ka_/'dod pa can dang nam gru dang /_/srul po dang ni ma dga' byed/_/bya dang gnya' ba'i lag 
[\[83a.3\]]can dang /_/bzhin rgyan dang ni mig 'phyang ba/_/de dag thams cad sa la rgyu/_/gdon rnams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga de dag ni/_/byis pa rnams la 'jigs par bgyid/_/ji ltar byis pa 'dzin pa yi/_/mtshan dang gzugs kyang brjod par bgyi/_/'jam pa pos ni zin gyur na/_/mig ni rab tu 'gyur bar 
[\[83a.4\]]bgyid/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal gyis zin gyur na/_/skyugs pa mi bzad skyug par 'gyur/_/skem byed kyis ni zin gyur na/_/skem byed pas ni byis pa 'gul/_/brjed byed kyis ni zin gyur na/_/'gre zhing de ltar sgra yang 'byin/_/dbu ba dang ni kha chu 'dzag_/khu tshur can gyis rab zin na/_/
[\[83a.5\]]khu tshur 'chang zhing 'gyed par bgyid/_/ma mo yis ni zin gyur na/_/rgod cing de bzhin sgra yang 'byin/_/dza mi kas ni rab zin na/_/nu zho nu bar mngon mi dga'/_/'dod pa can gyis rab zin na/_/mal na gnyid log ngu bar 'gyur/_/nam grus rab tu zin gyur na/_/lce la sos ni 'cha' bar 
[\[83a.6\]]bgyid/_/srul pos rab tu zin gyur na/_/ku co 'don cing sgra yang 'byin/_/ma dga' byed pas zin gyur na/_/rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su 'gyur/_/bya yis rab tu zin gyur na/_/mnam pa'i dri ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gnya' lag can gyis zin gyur na/_/mgul pa rab tu 'gag par 
[\[83a.7\]]'gyur/_/bzhin rgyan gyis ni zin gyur na/_/rims kyis btab cing 'khru bar 'gyur/_/mig 'phyang bas ni zin gyur na/_/skyigs bu dang ni sdam pa 'byung /_/byis pa ji ltar skrag bgyid pa/_/de yi gzugs ni brjod par bgyid/_/'jam pa po ni ba lang gzugs/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dra/_/
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]skem byed pa ni gzhon nu'i gzugs/_/brjed byed pa ni wa 'dra'o/_/khu tshur can ni bya rog gzugs/_/ma mo de ni mi yi gzugs/_/dza mi ka ni rta yi gzugs/_/'dod pa can ni rdo rje'i gzugs/_/nam gru khyi yi gzugs kyis te/_/srul po phag gi gzugs kyis so/_/ma dga' byed pa byi la'i 
[\[83b.2\]]gzugs/_/bya ni 'dab chags gzugs kyis so/_/gnya' lag can ni bya gag gzugs/_/bzhin rgyan 'ug pa'i gzugs su ste/_/mig 'phyang ba ni pha bang gzugs/_/'di dag byis pa skrag par bgyid/_/'di dag bu 'phrog ma rungs pa/_/byis pa rnams la 'jigs bgyid pa/_/mdo sde'i 
[\[83b.3\]]zhags pas drangs nas ni/_/'di dag shin tu dgug par bgyid/_/gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po ni/_/dri za tsan+dan zhes bgyi ba/_/yi ge phyag rgya de stsal te/_/song la gdon ni drag po pa/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga de dag khug shig ces/_/pho nyar yang ni btang bar bgyi/_/de dag rnams ni twa skad cig gis/_/
