[\[83b.4\]]bcing ba lnga yis bcing bzhin bkug_/de nas 'jig rten mgon po la/_/tshangs chen thal sbyar 'di skad gsol/_/srog chags sa bon 'jig bgyid pa/_/'byung po 'di dag rnams lhags te/_/mgon po yi ni spyan snga ru/_/'di dag chad pas bshad par bgyi/_/bud med gang 
[\[83b.5\]]dag bu mi 'tshal/_/gang zhig btsas pa 'dzin 'tshal ba sa/_/tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la/_/bslab bzung dam chos skyabs mchis la/_/mchod rten legs par mchod par bgyi/_/khrus bgyis shin tu brgyan nas ni/_/sa gzhir yungs kar gtor nas su/_/me tog spos kyis 
[\[83b.6\]]brgyan par bgyi/_/sna lnga'i tshon gyi skud pas ni/_/khor yug tu ni bskor bar bgyi/_/nam phyed bar du mchis nas ni/_/spyi bor yungs kar bzhag nas su/_/tshangs pas rab tu byas pa ste/_/tshangs pas sprul ces brjod par bgyi/_/lo grangs bcu gnyis bar du ni/_/gzhon nu rnams 
[\[83b.7\]]la phan bgyid pa/_/tshangs pas sprul pa'i mdo sde yi/_/rig sngags 'di la gang 'da' ba/_/a rdza ka yi dog pa bzhin/_/mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_aM ge_/baM ge_/baM gi ni/_b+ha ba ne/_i nan+de/_bi nan+de/_sa ra li/_gi ri gi ri/_sha ba ri/_ga ru Ni/_sha ru Ni/_gi ri/_ga ba re/_lo tsa ni/_ro Sha Ni/_
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]la sa ni/_ro tsa ne/_a la b+he/_a ga ne/_a la b+he/_ta la b+he/_pra kaR+Shi Ne swA hA/_mngal na bde bar gnas gyur cig_/dbang po yang dag 'phel bar shog_/mngal na 'dug pa bde gyur cig_/btsas pa 'jig par ma gyur cig_/mngal na bde bar gnas gyur cig_/dus 
[\[84a.2\]]bzhin du ni 'byung bar shog_/tshon skud sna tshogs rnams dang ni/_/yungs kar 'bru ni ma grugs pa/_/de dag bsrung bar gsungs pa ste/_/byis pa ring du 'tsho bar shog_/de nas ston pa kun mkhyen gyis/_/rig pa'i sngags ni 'di dag gsungs/_/mngal na 'dug pa bsrung bar shog_/
[\[84a.3\]]byis pa rnams ni bde gyur cig_/s+yAd ya the dan/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_ma hA bo d+hi/_bo d+ha a nu ma te/_pha li ni/_ba hu pha le/_shi k+Sha shi k+Sha/_sA ra ba te/_sA ga li/_du rA sa de/_du rA ga me/_shU ra prAp+te/_shU ra ba te/_b+ha ge/_b+ha ga ba te/_b+hA gi ni ni bA ra Ni swA hA/_de nas gdon ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga po/_/rtag tu 
[\[84a.4\]]khrag la 'thung rnams kyis/_/'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal te/_/thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad gsol/_/grong ngam khyim mam grong khyer ram/_/gang na legs par gsungs pa yi/_/mdo sde 'di ni bzhugs pa der/_/byis pa rnams ni 'chi mi 'gyur/_/thub chen khyod ni ji 
[\[84a.5\]]bzhin du/_/rjes su mthun par 'jug par bgyi/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig_/grub par gyur cig_/rig sngags kyis sgrol bar gyur cig_/tshangs pas bsam par 
[\[84a.6\]]gyur cig swA hA/_de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos gang la la stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di 'dzin 
[\[84a.7\]]tam/_'chang ngam/_ston tam/_klog gam/_kun chub par bgyid pa des mang du thos pa la brtson par bgyi'o/_/mchod rten mchod pa la brtson par bgyi'o/_/tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi dang /[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i dus su mchod rten la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas rig sngags bklag par bgyi'o/_/
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]tshes brgyad kyi tshe ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i skyes bu dag rgyal po chen po rnams kyi mdun na de la sems par bgyid/_ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid do/_/tshes bcu bzhi'i tshe ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag nyid mdun na sems par bgyid/_ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid do/_/tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[84b.2\]]lnga'i tshe ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag ni sems par bgyid cing ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos gang stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di len pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_ston pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa de ni srog chags 'byung po 
[\[84b.3\]]thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan par bgyid lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang de la gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis mi brel bar bgyi'o/_/sems can thams cad 
[\[84b.4\]]kyis kyang bsti stang bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang /_blon po dag gis kyang bla mar bgyi ba dang /_rim gro bgyi ba dang /_mchod par bgyi bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa can dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_mdza' ba dang /_mi 
[\[84b.5\]]mdza' ba dag gi nang du mchis kyang mchod par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa des gtsang mar bgyis te/_lus gtsang ba dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_yo byad khyad par can gtsang mar bgyi/_yul ngan pa rnyed par mi bgyi/_
[\[84b.6\]]yul ngan pa'i mdza' bo dang bsten par mi bgyi/_yul ngan pa na gnas pa la bsngags par mi bgyi'o/_/gang 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mdun du stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di dran par gyur na/_de la rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag nyid srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed 
[\[84b.7\]]par bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar na stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di mthu che ste/_gang gis rang gi khyim du mtshan gcig gam/_nyin gcig kyang rung yang dag par bsams na/_de la lo gcig gi bar du mi ma lags pas glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ba lags so/_/gang stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de 'tshal na/_rgyal po chen po bzhi yang bzhin ston par 'gyur na/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_phal pa gzhan lta smos 
[\[85a.2\]]kyang ci 'tshal/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sems can rnams la sman pa'i slad du 'jig rten la gang su dag rig sngags bgyid pa de dag pas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag rab mchog_/gtso bo/_khyad par du 'phags pa/_dam pa/_zab pa/_rgya che ba/_tshad ma mchis pa/_'jug par dka' 
[\[85a.3\]]ba/_thun mong ma lags pa'i slad du ste/_'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya lags so/_/de nas dbang po mig stong po/_/lha yi rgyal po bde sogs khyod/_/thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/_/'jig rten mgon la 'di skad gsol/_/'jig rten kun la phan bgyid pa/_/rig sngags 'di 
[\[85a.4\]]ni legs par gsungs/_/gsang sngags sman dang ldan pa yi/_/rig sngags bdag gis brjod par bgyi/_/shir sha me tog a pa mArga dang /_/ka ta kA yi 'bras bu a ga ru/_/rdo dreg dang ni mi dA btsod rnams dang /_/su ka rI dang dzA ya marga ti/_/pa ri pe la sa ra bI rA dang /_/sA ma 
[\[85a.5\]]ka dang buspa rgya spos dang /_/tsan+dan a bar ta ka ru rta dang /_/sder mo lo ma ka Ta ma rA dang /_/pri yang ku dang 'bu gsug smig bcud dang /_/yungs kar dag dang ldong ros rnams dang ni/_/shing tsha shu dag gur gum shing kun dang /_/lo ma dag dang ldan pa'i brna kaM/_/de dag sbyar te reng bur bgyis 
[\[85a.6\]]pa ni/_/gnod rnams kun las grol bar bgyid pa ste/_/'byung po dag ni kun gyi 'gyur ba la/_/mig la de yis bskus par bgyis na ni/_/de nas 'byung po rdo rje dang /_/gnam lcags mda' yis zin las thar/_/ljon shing che dang de bzhin du/_/mchod rten che la bskus bgyis na/_/gang 
[\[85a.7\]]gis gnas de mthong ba de/_/'byung po la ni 'jigs ma mchis/_/der ni 'byung po mi gnas te/_/gnod byed gzhan yang ma lags so/_/rnga chen dung dang rdza rnga dang /_/rnga bran dag la'ang bskus na ni/_/de dag sgra ni gar grags par/_/'byung po'i dkyil 'khor skrag par 'gyur/_/grong du rgyu ba'i 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]bya rnams kyi/_/'dab ma dag la bskus na ni/_/yul dang phyogs ni gzhan dag tu/_/bya de gang du mchis pa der/_/'byung po rnams ni mi gnas te/_/gnod byed gzhan yang ma lags so/_/chu mig mtsho dang lteng ka 'am/_/gang dang gang du bor yang rung /_/der ni dpag tshad khor yug tu/_/
[\[85b.2\]]bde ba dang ni zhi bar 'gyur/_/pha rol dmag tshogs nang mchis te/_/mtshon cha dag ni 'bab pa na/_/gnas rnams kun tu byugs bgyis na/_/bde blag tu ni thar bar 'gyur/_/lba ba dang ni gzhang nad dang /_/me dbal dang ni 'bras byung dang /_/gdug pas zin dang dug 'thungs pas/_/
[\[85b.3\]]'thungs sam byugs na thar bar 'gyur/_/lus la de yis byugs na ni/_/byad stems thams cad gcod par bgyid/_/rtsod pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po'i gyod las thar bar 'gyur/_/ma grub pa yang grub par 'gyur/_/dbul po las ni phyug por 'gyur/_/bu ma mchis pa 
[\[85b.4\]]bu rnyed 'gyur/_/nor ma mchis pa nor rnyed 'gyur/_/rig sngags 'chang gnas bar du yang /_/'di ni gsang sngags grub par bgyid/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas gyur pa dang /_/ljon shing rnams kyi 'bras bu dang /_/rig sngags 'chang ba thob la yang /_/'di ni zhi ba'i las dge byed/_/
[\[85b.5\]]'di la gsang sngags tshig mchis te/_/dper na dbang po'i tshig bzhin no/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_a kra me/_bi kra me/_b+hU ta g+ho She b+hA taM ga me/_da ha ni d+ha d+ha re/_d+ha ra ba re/_da d+hi ni/_ni khu me/_khu khu me/_kha kha kha kha/_sA raM ga me/_tsan+d+re_tsa pa le/_ha li me/_ha le/_hA ri Ne swA hA/_phyogs thams cad 
[\[85b.6\]]nas bdag gi sdig pa thams cad zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/_de nas tshangs pa dbang po dang /_/'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che/_/gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang /_/'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang /_/thal mo dag ni rab sbyar nas/_/sgra skad gcig tu 'di skad gsol/_/nyi ma stong ltar gsal ba 
[\[85b.7\]]po/_/zla ba nya ltar 'od gsal ba/_/lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/khyod dang 'dra ba yong ma mchis/_/legs bsam legs par sbyar na ni/_/gnod sbyin srin po rnams 'joms pa/_/rgyal srid thar bgyid ces bgyi ba/_/rig sngags rgyal srid rab sbyor ba/_/stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten na/_/
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]bsrung ba'i mdo sde dam pa lags/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/_/thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/_/de nyid du ni mi snang gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nub kha'i dus kyi tshe/_nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas dge 
[\[86a.2\]]slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde long shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/ston cig_/kun chub par gyis shig dang /_de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bde ba la 
[\[86a.3\]]reg par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag nga'i dge slong gang la la zhig gis stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'dis shing skam po la skud pas bcings na de la lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu rnams skye bar 'gyur na/_rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang 
[\[86a.4\]]ci dgos te/_sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde chen po lnga gsungs pa de dag ni 'di lta ste/_stong chen po rab tu 
[\[86a.5\]]'joms pa dang /_rma bya chen mo dang /_bsil ba'i tshal chen mo dang /_so sor 'brang ba chen mo dang /_gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'brang ba chen mo lags te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag zas rnam pa lnga yongs su spangs la chongs shig ces kyang bka' stsal la/_zas bsod 
[\[86a.6\]]snyoms la brten te rab tu byung shig ces kyang gsungs na/_bcom ldan 'das zas rnam pa lnga dang ma 'dres pa'i bsod snyoms ni nyung /_'di ltar zas rnam pa lnga dang 'dres pa de ni mang lags na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag gis ji ltar nan tan du bgyi/_de skad ces gsol 
[\[86a.7\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag de nyid kyi phyir su stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di 'chang ba des/_rma med pa'i nor bu'i gzungs zhes bya ba de bdag nyid bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir chongs shig_/des bsod snyoms len pa'i 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]tshe zas la mi mthun pa med pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/zas rnam pa lnga dang 'dres pa'i bsod snyoms la yang zas rnam pa lnga dang ma 'dres pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya/_'dus byas thams cad la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /_mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[86b.2\]]sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/zas rnam pa lnga po dag ga la yod/_zas rnam pa lnga po su'i yin/_su zhig zas rnam pa lnga po za/_sems can dmigs su med do/_/de la zas rnam pa lnga dang 'dres na tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi dang /[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la bdag 
[\[86b.3\]]bsrung ba byas te/_rgyal rigs kyi bu mo legs par bkrus pa/_shin tu brgyan pa/_nyin zhag gcig zas bcad pa/_bslab pa'i gnas lnga bzung ba/_skud pa dmar po bzhi sgril du 'khal du bcug la gsang sngags 'dzin pas rig sngags dran par byas te skud pa de mdud pa mdud 
[\[86b.4\]]la/_skud pa de mtshon sar pas bcad de bsregs la rin po che'i snod dam/_lcags kyi snod kyang rung /_chus khong ste me tog gis khyab par khrom la bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdugs te/_snod kyi nang nas skud pa de slar 'byor te ma byung gi bar du rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/de yang 
[\[86b.5\]]lag pa la bcings la tshig 'di skad brjod do/_/bram ze rnams kyis bslus nas su/_/shAkya seng ge'i skyob pa la/_/dpal sbas kyis ni dug can gyi/_/bsod snyoms dag ni phul ba dang /_/de las de ni blangs nas su/_/ston pas dug ni bsad nas gsol/_/bden pa'i tshig 
[\[86b.6\]]ni 'di yis su/_/zas ni bdud rtsir 'gyur bar shog_/rnam par gzigs pa lha gang dang /_/gtsug tor can dang kun skyob dang /_/log par dad pa sel ba dang /_/stobs chen lha gang dad pa dang /_/gser dang dpal ldan 'od srung dang /_/shAkya yi ni seng ge la/_/rab dad lha yi dbang 
[\[86b.7\]]po dang /_/tshangs dbang sum cu'i dbang phyug dang /_/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang /_/nor bu bzang dang dbang phyug che/_/srin mo nag mo chen mo dang /_/de bzhin gdol ma gtum mo dag_/me tog dang ni bdug pa dang /_/bdag gi sbyin sreg 'di bzhes shig_/de dag tshim zhing mchod gyur nas/_/
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]bdag gi kha zas byang bar mdzod/_/zas lnga dag dang 'dres pa yang /_/bdag la ma 'dres mdzad du gsol/_/kha zas lnga dang 'dres pa yang /_/zas de kun ni bza' bar bgyi/_/sa bon dag gis tshogs kun la/_/sa yi bcud ni zhugs pa yi/_/kha zas 'dres pa 
[\[87a.2\]]thams cad kyang /_/bdag la ma 'dres mdzad du gsol/_/ji ltar skud pa bcad bsregs pa/_/de lta bu yang slar 'byor pa/_/de ltar zas rnams 'dres pa yang /_/ma 'dres par yang bdag la mdzod/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_kha kha me/_kha kha kha kha/_khu khu me/_shi me shi me/_shi hu me/_
[\[87a.3\]]shi me/_shi me/_swa sti swa sti swa sti swa sti/_ma ma shAn+te/_shA rA gre_/kha zas lnga dang 'dres pa yang /_/ji ltar ma 'dres zas bzhin du/_/gang gis ji ltar skud bsregs pa/_/de 'dra'i bden pa mdzad du gsol/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_ka la ke/_kal le/_ba la ni/_ka ru ta/_A la ye/_
[\[87a.4\]]agle/_saM krA ma Ne swA hA/_sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang gtsug tor can/_/bde gshegs kun skyob sangs rgyas log par dad sel dang /_/gser thub 'od srung shAkya thub pa gau ta ma/_/bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/_/mi mchog bdun po de dag gi ni sku 
[\[87a.5\]]rnams la/_/me tog dag dang spos rnams kyis ni mchod par bgyi/_/lus dang ngag dang rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni/_/de dag rnams la skyabs su nye bar mchi bar bgyi/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che dang ldan pa de dag la/_/lha gang mngon par rab tu dang ba yod pa yi/_/lha de mgu 
[\[87a.6\]]zhing yid ni rab tu dgar gyur nas/_/rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis bdag la bsrung du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa stong chen po rab tu 'joms 
[\[87a.7\]]pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_dz+nyA na sid+d+hi dang /_shAkya pra b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//slar yang lo tsA ba gzhon nu dpal gyis chos rje chag 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]lo'i rgya dpe dang bstun nas zhu dag par bgyis so//[ {D559}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma hA mA yU rI bid+yA rAdz+nyI/_bod skad du/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang 
[\[87b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bdun po 
[\[87b.3\]]dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la 
[\[87b.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag la rig sngags de grub par gyur cig_/
[\[87b.5\]]'byung po'i tshogs gang su dag sa la rgyu ba rnams dang /_nam mkha' la rgyu ba rnams dang /_chu la rgyu ba rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_rlung lha rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams 
[\[87b.6\]]dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_srin po rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang /_sha za rnams dang /_'byung po rnams dang /_grul bum rnams dang /_srul po rnams dang /_lus srul po rnams dang /_skem byed rnams dang /_smyo byed rnams dang /_grib gnon rnams dang /_brjed byed rnams 
[\[87b.7\]]dang /_gnon po rnams bdag la nyon cig_/'byung po'i tshogs gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams dang /_zas su mngal za ba rnams dang /_zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang /_zas su zhag za ba rnams dang /_zas su sha za ba rnams dang /_zas su tshil za ba rnams dang /_zas su rkang za ba rnams dang /_
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang /_srog 'phrog pa rnams dang /_zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang /_zas su phreng ba za ba rnams dang /_zas su dri za ba rnams dang /_zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang /_zas su me tog za ba rnams dang /_zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang /_
[\[88a.2\]]zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang /_zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang /_zas su rnag za ba rnams dang /_zas su phyi sa za ba rnams dang /_zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang /_zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang /_zas su mchil ma za ba rnams dang /_zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang /_zas 
[\[88a.3\]]su snabs za ba rnams dang /_zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang /_zas su skyugs pa za ba rnams dang /_zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang /_sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams 
[\[88a.4\]]dang /_gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa rnams bdag la nyon cig_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/_/spos dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_gtor ma yang sbyin no/_/bdag la sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams 
[\[88a.5\]]dang /_drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa rnams dang /_zas su mdangs za ba'i gdon thams cad ni dengs shig_/zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni 
[\[88a.6\]]bdag la nyon cig_/sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa rnams bdag la nyon cig_/'di lta ste/_nag mo bzhin sgyur ma/_grul bum ma/_dung can ma/_me tog ka ma la lta bu'i mig can ma/_'phrog ma/_skra mdog ljang gu ma/_dpal ldan ma/_spre'u ltar 
[\[88a.7\]]dmar ser ma/_'phyang ma/_rab tu 'phyang ma/_dus kyi zhags pa can ma/_bum lto ma/_gshin rje'i pho nya mo/_gshin rje'i sring mo/_'byung po zab mo/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_gtor ma 'di dag 'bul gyis bzhes shig_/'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa thams cad las 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]bdag la bsrung du gsol/_lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/bdag la rig sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin 
[\[88b.2\]]gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong sa ri zhes bya ba gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/_rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pa/_chos 'dul 
[\[88b.3\]]ba 'dir 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa zhig gnas pa de dge 'dun gyi bsro khang bya ba'i phyir shing gshags pa dang /_shing rul pa'i ser ga zhig nas sbrul nag po chen po zhig byung nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong la zin pa dang /_lus sbrid nas sa la 'gyel te/_dbu bar skyug cing mig 
[\[88b.4\]]kyang gyur nas nyal ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong sa ri nad kyis btab ste sdug bsngal zhing nad tshabs che nas sa la 'gyel te/_dbu bar skyug cing mig kyang gyur nas nyal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 
[\[88b.5\]]song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[88b.6\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba 'di na dge slong sa ri zhes bgyi ba gzhon nu thor bu/_lang tsho la bab pa/_rab tu byung nas ring po ma lags pa/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lags pa/_chos 'dul ba 'dir mchis nas ring po ma lags pa zhig gnas pa de dge 'dun gyi bsro 
[\[88b.7\]]khang bgyi ba'i slad du shing gshags pa dang /_shing rul pa'i ser ga zhig nas sbrul nag po chen po zhig byung nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong la zin pa dang lus sbrid nas dog sa la 'gyel te/_dbu bar skyug cing mig kyang gyur nas nyal zhing mchis na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]gis ci ltar nan tan du bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas khyod song la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis lha'i gdon dang /_
[\[89a.2\]]klu'i gdon dang /_lha ma yin gyi gdon dang /_rlung lha'i gdon dang /_nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang /_dri za'i gdon dang /_mi 'am ci'i gdon dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang /_gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang /_srin po'i gdon dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gdon dang /_sha za'i gdon dang /_
[\[89a.3\]]'byung po'i gdon dang /_grul bum gyi gdon dang /_srul po'i gdon dang /_lus srul po'i gdon dang /_skem byed kyi gdon dang /_smyo byed kyi gdon dang /_grib gnon gyi gdon dang /_brjed byed kyi gdon dang /_gnon po'i gdon dang /_skar ma'i gdon dang /_gshed byed dang /_sgyur 
[\[89a.4\]]ba'i las dang /_byad dang /_g.yengs byed dang /_ro langs dang /_sems sgyur dang /_sbod gtong dang /_bza' nyes dang /_skyug nyes dang /_gnod sgrib dang /_gnod bltas dang /_bri nyes dang /_bsgom nyes dang /_smad pa dang /_rims nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin 
[\[89a.5\]]gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa dang /_nyin bdun pa dang /_zla ba phyed pa dang /_zla ba gcig pa dang /_nyin mo pa dang /_yud tsam pa dang /_rtag pa'i rims dang /_rims drag po dang /_'byung po'i rims dang /_mi'i rims dang /_mi ma yin pa'i rims dang /_rlung las gyur pa dang /_
[\[89a.6\]]mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_rims thams cad las dge slong sa ri la bsrung ba gyis shig_/sba ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba 
[\[89a.7\]]dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_mtshams gcad pa dang /_sa bcing bgyis shig_/klad pa na ba med par gyis shig_/gzhogs phyed na ba dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_mig nad dang /_sna nad dang /_kha nad dang /_mgul 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]nad dang /_snying nad dang /_lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang /_rna ba na ba dang /_so na ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_rtsib logs na ba dang /_rgyab na ba dang /_lto ba na ba dang /_mkhur ba na ba dang /_chu so na ba dang /_skye gnas na ba dang /_rab tu skye gnas na ba dang /_rked pa na ba dang /_brla na ba dang /_
[\[89b.2\]]byin pa na ba dang /_lag pa na ba dang /_rkang pa na ba dang /_yan lag na ba dang /_nying lag na ba med par gyis shig_/mtshan mo dge dang nyin mo dge_/nyi ma'i gung gi dge ba dang /_/nyin mtshan kun gyi dge ba dag_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol/_/tad ya thA/_i Di/_bi Di/_
[\[89b.3\]]ki Di/_hi Di/_mi Di/_ni Di/_me The do dum+bA/_A De/_g+hA De/_dug+ha De/_hi ri Ni/_ba gu De/_pA na su/_pi shA tsi ni/_bar+Sha Ni/_A ro ha Ni/_A ro hi Ni/_e le/_me le te le/_ti li ti li/_me le me le/_ti mi ti mi/_du me du me/_du du me/_iT+Ti/_miT+Ti/_biSh+Ta ba d+he/_tsa pa le/_bi ma le/_hu lu hu lu/_a shwa mu khi/_kA li 
[\[89b.4\]]kA li/_ka ra li/_ma hA kA li/_pra kIr+Na ke shi_/ku lu ku lu/_ba phu lu ba phu lu/_ko lu ko lu/_hu lu hu lu/_ba hu lu ba hu lu/_bo sa dum+bA/_do dum+bA/_du ma dum+bA/_go lA yA/_be lA yA/_pa ri be lA yA/_bi shu pi shu/_hi li hi li/_hi li hi li/_hi li hi li/_hi li hi li/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_mi li mi li/_

[\[89b.6\]]hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu/_bA bA bA bA bA bA bA bA bA bA/_pA pA pA pA pA pA pA pA pA pA/_dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/_da ma da ma ni/_ta pa ta pa ni/_dz+wa la dz+wa la ni/_pa tsa pa tsa ni/_dun+du b+hi/_gardza ni/_bar+Sha Ni/_s+pho Ta ni/_ta pa ni tA pa ni/_pa tsa ni pA tsa ni/_hA ri Ni/_kA ri Ni/_ki mi ni/_kam+pa ni/_
[\[89b.7\]]marda ni/_maN+Di ki te/_k+She maM ka ri/_ma ka ri/_shA rka ri/_shAng+ka ri/_karka ri/_sha ba ri/_shaM ka ri/_dz+wa la dz+wa la ni/_du ma dum+ba ni/_su ku su ku me/_go lA yA/_be lA yA/_pa ri be lA yA/_lhas kun tu char phob cig_/i li ki si swA hA/_nga ni yul 'khor srung la byams/_/sa srung bu la'ang nga byams te/_/nga ni mig 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]mi bzang la byams/_/gau ta ma ni nag po dang /_/nga ni klu rgyal nor bu dang /_/nga ni nor rgyal bu la'ang byams/_/dbyug pa rkang gi klu dag dang /_/gang ba bzang la'ang nga rtag tu/_/klu gang dga' bo nye dga' bo/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing lha 
[\[90a.2\]]min dang /_/lha yi g.yul yang myong bar byed/_/ma dros klu dang chu lha dang /_/'dzam pa len pa la yang byams/_/'jog po dang ni mtha' yas dang /_/de bzhin nor gyi sgo dang ni/_/gzhan las rgyal la nga byams te/_/gcod dang ldan pa'i bu la byams/_/rtag par gzi can chen po 
[\[90a.3\]]dang /_/gzi can la yang de bzhin no/_/phub ma med dang dung can dang /_/longs spyod ldan dang dge tshul dang /_/kha na zho dang nor bu dang /_/pad+ma dkar po phyogs dag dang /_/stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang /_/la ba dang ni mgyogs mchog dang /_/klu yi rgyal po de dag la/_/nga ni 
[\[90a.4\]]rtag tu byams pa yin/_/gnas bcas chu srin kum b+hi ra/_/de bzhin khab kyi spu dag dang /_/brang 'gro'i bdag po nag po dang /_/drang srong la yang nga byams so/_/de bzhin rna ba tshang ba dang /_/shing rta'i bzhin la byams pa ste/_/gzi can dang ni rab dga' dang /_/bad sa'i bu la nga 
[\[90a.5\]]rtag tu/_/nga ni e la'i 'dab la byams/_/'phyang ba'i tshul la'ang nga byams te/_/mi min klu ni gang dag dang /_/de bzhin mi yi bla ma dang /_/klu chen tshol ba'i tshul can dang /_/btang bzung zhes ni grags pa dang /_/klu gang sa la rgyu dag dang /_/de bzhin chu la gnas rnams dang /_/
[\[90a.6\]]gang dag bar snang rgyu ba dang /_/gang dag lhun por gnas pa dang /_/mgo gcig pa dang mgo gnyis pa/_/de dag la ni nga rtag byams/_/rkang pa med la nga byams te/_/rkang gnyis pa la'ang nga byams so/_/rkang bzhi pa la'ang nga byams so/_/rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]la yang nga byams so/_/
[\[90a.7\]]rkang med nga la gnod ma byed/_/rkang gnyis nga la gnod ma byed/_/rkang bzhi nga la gnod ma byed/_/rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]nga la gnod ma byed/_/gang dag chu la gnas pa yi/_/klu rnams kun la nga byams so/_/gang su sa la gnas pa yi/_/'byung po kun la nga byams so/_/sems can gang dag 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]gnas par bcas/_/sems can kun la nga byams so/_/sems can kun dang srog chags kun/_/'byung po dag ni thams cad kyang /_/thams cad bde ba 'ba' zhig shog_/thams cad nad ni med gyur cig_/kun gyis bzang po mthong bar shog_/gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig_/
[\[90b.2\]]byams pa'i sems la gnas nas su/_/dug ni rab tu gsad par bya/_/bsrung dang yongs su gzung ba dang /_/de bzhin yongs su bskyang bar bya/_/sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byang chub phyag 'tshal lo/_/grol gyur phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhi gyur phyag 'tshal zhi la 
[\[90b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnam grol phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bram ze gang dag sdig pa'i chos rnams bsal bar gyur pa de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag gis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_
[\[90b.4\]]'khrug pa thams cad dang /_rims thams cad dang /_nad thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_dug thams cad las bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/kun dga' bo sngon byung ba ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la rma bya'i 
[\[90b.5\]]rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_de nang par rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bde legs su 'gyur bar byas te nyin mo dge bar gnas/_nub kar bde legs su 'gyur bar byas te mtshan mo dge bar gnas so/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la 
[\[90b.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad ya thA/_hu hu/_hu hu/_hu hu/_nA ga le le le/_dum+ba le le le/_nA ga le le le/_hu ya hu ya/_bi dza bi dza/_thu su thu su/_gu lu gu lu/_hu tse dzi ni tse dzi ni/_a gu lu/_e lA 
[\[90b.7\]]me lA/_e lA/_me lA/_ti lI/_me lA/_i li mit+te/_i lA+e ti li mit+te/_dum+be su dum+pe/_to su to su/_go lA pe lA/_tsa pa lA/_bi ma lA/_eT+Ti ri/_b+hiT+Ti ri/_riT+wi ri/_na mo bud+d+hA nAn/_tsi li ki si/_go do hi kA/_na mo ar+ha tAn/_hA la hA la/_lhas phyogs bcu kun tu char phob shig_/sangs 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA/_des dus gzhan zhig na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bsrung ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba ma byas par 'dod pa rnams la zhen cing chags te rgyags pas myos nas rab tu rmongs shing brgyal ba dang 'dra bar gyur nas rab tu zhen te 
[\[91a.2\]]nags kyi rma bya gzhon nu mang po dang lhan cig tu kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra bar/_skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal du/_ri'i ngos nas ri'i ngos su rgyu zhing song song ba las de bag med par gyur nas ri'i ser ga zhig tu chud nas/_de der rigs ngan gzhon nu yun ring du phyir rgol ba dgrar gyur pa 
[\[91a.3\]]'tshe bar gyur pa/_glags lta ba rnams kyis rma bya rnyis bzung ste/_de mi mdza' ba'i nang du son pa dang dran pa slar rnyed nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di nyid yid la byas so/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rig sngags 
[\[91a.4\]]kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_hU hU/_hU hU hU/_nA ga le le le/_dum+ba le le le/_nA ga le le le/_hu ya hu ya/_bi dza bi dza/_thu su thu su/_gu lu gu lu/_hu tse dzi ni/_tse dzi ni/_a gu lu/_i lA me lA/_i li me lA/_ti li me lA/_i li mit+te/_i li ti li mit+te/_dum+be/_su dum+be/_
[\[91a.5\]]to su to su/_go lA be lA/_tsa pa lA/_bi ma lA/_iT+Ti ri/_b+hiT+Ti ri/_riT+Ti ri/_na mo bud d+hA nAn/_tsi li ki si/_go de hi kA/_na mo aD+ha tAn/_hA la hA la/_lhas phyogs bcu kun tu char phob cig_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA/_de nas de sdug bsngal de las thar te dge ba dang /_bde bar bdag 
[\[91a.6\]]gi yul du phyin nas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang bzlas so/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_
[\[91a.7\]]sid d+he/_su sid d+he/_mo tsa ni/_mo k+Sha ni/_muk+te/_bi muk+te/_a ma le/_bi ma le/_nirma le/_aN+Da re/_paN+Da re/_maM ga l+ye/_maM ga l+ye/_hi ra N+ye/_hi ra N+ye/_gar+b+he rat+ne/_rat+na gar+b+he/_b+ha dre/_su b+ha dre/_sa man+ta b+ha dre/_shrI b+ha dre/_sarbaar+tha sA d+ha ni/_ba ra mAr+tha sA d+ha ni/_sar+b+ba a nar+tha pra bA d+ha ni/_sarba maM ga la sA d+ha ni/_sarba a maM ga la sA d+ha 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]ni/_ya sho ba ti/_mA na si/_mA na si/_ma hA mA na sI/_a ts+yu te/_ad b+hu te/_ad d+yan b+hu te/_muk+te/_bi muk+te/_mo tsa ni/_mo sha k+Sha ni/_prah+ma/_a ra dze/_bi ra dze/_bi ma le/_a mr-i te/_a mr-i ta bar+Sha Ni/_a ma re/_a ma ri Ni/_prah+me/_brah+ma swa re/_pUr+Ne/_pUr+Ne ma no ra the/_a mr-i te/_a mr-i ta sany+dzi ba ni/_shrI b+ha dre/_tsan+d+re tsan+d+ra 
[\[91b.2\]]bra b+he/_sUr+ye/_/sUr+ya kAn te/_bI ta b+ha ye/_sarba su bar+Na/_su bar+Na pra b+he/_brah+ma g+ho She/_brah+ma dzuSh+Te/_sarba tra/_a pra ti ha te swA hA/_sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag la dge ba dang bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/_lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/tad+ya thA/_
[\[91b.3\]]hu tsi/_shu tsi/_g+hu tsi/_mu tsi swA hA/_kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_/kun 
[\[91b.4\]]dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i snying po 'di yang bzlas par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_i li mit+te/_ti li mit+te/_ti li mi li mit+te/_ti li mi li/_mi li ti li/_ti li mit+te/_bi li mi li mit+ti/_bi li mi li mit+ti/_bi li mi li mi li ti li mi li/_su dum+ba/_dum+ba/_su ba tsa/_tsi ri ki si yA/_b+hin+na mi Ti/_na mo 
[\[91b.5\]]bud d+hA nAn/_tsi li ki si/_prAn+ta mU le/_i di hA nga /_lo hi ta mU le/_dum+bA/_su dum+bA/_kuT+Ti/_ku naT+Ti/_ku ku naT+Ti/_ti li kuny+dza/_nAT+Ti/_lcang lo can du lhas zla ba dgu 'am/_zla ba bcur char phob cig_/i li mi li/_ki li mi li/_ki li mi li/_ke tu mU le/_du dum+bA+e/_su du mo De/_da li mi/_san du baT+Te/_bu sa baT+Te/_bu sa ra/_bu 
[\[91b.6\]]sa ra/_d+ha na ba sta ra ke/_na r+k+ka lA/_nar+k+ka li me/_kha li ma g+ho She/_ra khi le/_/i ti sadz+dza le/_dum+be/_su dum+pe/_aT+we/_naT+Te/_pra naT+Te/_a na NaT+Te/_a na mo le/_lhas kun nas chu sar pa'i char phob cig_/nA rA ya Ni/_pA rA ya Ni/_ha ri tA li/_kun tA li/_ku b+haN+Di/_i li mi sti/_ki li mi sti/_ki li ti li mi sti/_'gro lding ba'i 
[\[91b.7\]]gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag grub par gyur cig swA hA/_kun dga' bo 'di ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i snying po yin no/_/kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di grong na 'dug pa na yang yid la bya'o/_/dgon pa na 'dug gam/_lam na 'dug gam/_lam gol ba na 'dug gam/_
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na 'dug gam/_chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/_me'i nang na 'dug gam/_chu'i nang na 'dug gam/_dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/_phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra bo'i nang na 'dug gam/_'khor gyi nang na 'dug gam/_rtsod pa'i nang na 'dug gam/_sbrul gyis zin tam/_dug 
[\[92a.2\]]'thungs sam/_'jigs pa thams cad 'dus pa na yang yid la bya'o/_/rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi las nad gang yang rung bas btab par gyur pa dang /_phongs par gyur pa na yang shin tu yid la 
[\[92a.3\]]bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo gsad pa'i rigs pa ni chad pas bral bar 'gyur ro/_/chad pas gcad pa'i rigs pa ni gzhu btsog gis so/_/gzhu btsog pa'i rigs pa ni spyo bas so/_/spyo ba'i rigs pa ni dam bcas pas so/_/dam bcas pa'i rigs pa ni spu zing zhes bya bas so/_/
[\[92a.4\]]spu zing zhes bya ba'i rigs pa ni de bzhin du thar bar 'gyur te/_de'i nad thams cad kyang ldog par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di yang yid la bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_tsi li/_mi li/_ki li mi li/_ke tu mU le/_bu sa baT+Te/_bu sa ri Ne/_bu da ri ni/_ke baT+Te/_
[\[92a.5\]]ke baT+Te ka_/mU le/_i ti sha ba le/_dum+ba/_be dum+pe/_pri yaM ka re/_A baT+Te/_pa ri baT+Te/_lhas kun tu chu sar pa'i char phob cig_/na mo b+ha ga ba te/_iT+TiT+Ta ya/_in+d+ra go mi si kA ya/_b+h+r-ing+ga ri kA ya/_A sha ne/_bA sha ne/_pA pa ni kU le/_ka pi la mit+te/_i li mit+te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[92a.6\]]gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_

[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_mtshams bcad pa dang /_sa bcing ba byas pa la rnam par 'tshe ba'i phyir 'ong ba/_lha 'am/_lha mo'am/_lha'i bu 
[\[92b.2\]]pho'am/_lha'i bu mo'am/_lha rgan po'am/_lha rgan mo'am/_lha'i 'khor pho'am/_lha'i 'khor mo'am/_klu'am/_klu mo'am/_klu'i bu pho'am/_klu'i bu mo'am/_klu rgan po'am/_klu rgan mo'am/_klu'i 'khor pho'am/_klu'i 'khor mo'am/_lha ma yin nam/_lha ma yin mo'am/_lha ma yin gyi bu pho'am/_

[\[92b.7\]]sbyin rgan mo'am/_gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho'am/_gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo'am/_srin pho'am/_srin mo'am/_srin po'i bu pho'am/_srin po'i bu mo'am/_srin po rgan po'am/_srin po rgan mo'am/_srin po'i 'khor pho'am/_srin po'i 'khor mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi bu pho'am/_
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi bu mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rgan po'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rgan mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'khor pho'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'khor mo'am/_sha za'am/_sha za mo'am/_sha za'i bu pho'am/_sha za'i bu mo'am/_sha za rgan pho'am/_sha za rgan mo'am/_sha za'i 'khor pho'am/_
[\[93a.2\]]sha za'i 'khor mo'am/_'byung po'am/_'byung po mo'am/_'byung po'i bu pho'am/_'byung po'i bu mo'am/_'byung po rgan po'am/_'byung po rgan mo'am/_'byung po'i 'khor pho'am/_'byung po'i 'khor mo'am/_grul bum mam/_grul bum mo'am/_grul bum gyi bu pho'am/_grul bum 
[\[93a.3\]]gyi bu mo'am/_grul bum rgan pho'am/_grul bum rgan mo'am/_grul bum gyi 'khor pho'am/_grul bum gyi 'khor mo'am/_srul po'am/_srul po mo'am/_srul po'i bu pho'am/_srul po'i bu mo'am/_srul po rgan pho'am/_srul po rgan mo'am/_srul po'i 'khor pho'am/_srul 
[\[93a.4\]]po'i 'khor mo'am/_lus srul po'am/_lus srul pho mo'am/_lus srul po'i bu pho'am/_lus srul po'i bu mo'am/_lus srul po rgan po'am/_lus srul po rgan mo'am/_lus srul po'i 'khor pho'am/_lus srul po'i 'khor mo'am/_skem byed dam/_skem byed mo'am/_skem 
[\[93a.5\]]byed kyi bu pho'am/_skem byed kyi bu mo'am/_skem byed rgan po'am/_skem byed rgan mo'am/_skem byed kyi 'khor pho'am/_skem byed kyi 'khor mo'am/_smyo byed dam/_smyo byed mo'am/_smyo byed kyi bu pho'am/_smyo byed kyi bu mo'am/_smyo byed rgan po'am/_smyo byed rgan mo'am/_smyo byed kyi 'khor 
[\[93a.6\]]pho'am/_smyo byed kyi 'khor mo'am/_grib gnon nam/_grib gnon mo'am/_grib gnon gyi bu pho'am/_grib gnon gyi bu mo'am/_grib gnon rgan po'am/_grib gnon rgan mo'am/_grib gnon gyi 'khor pho'am/_grib gnon gyi 'khor mo 'am/_brjed byed dam/_brjed byed mo'am/_brjed byed kyi 
[\[93a.7\]]bu pho'am/_brjed byed kyi bu mo'am/_brjed byed rgan po'am/_brjed byed rgan mo'am/_brjed byed kyi 'khor pho'am/_brjed byed kyi 'khor mo'am/_gnon po'am/_gnon po mo'am/_gnon po'i bu pho'am/_gnon po'i bu mo'am/_gnon po rgan po'am/_gnon po rgan mo'am/_gnon po'i 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]'khor pho'am/_gnon po'i 'khor mo'am/_'ga' yang 'ong bar ngas lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang bcas pa/_bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo /_/glags tshol bar 'dod cing glags 
[\[93b.2\]]lta na yang glags mi rnyed de/_lha ni lha 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_klu ni klu 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_lha ma yin ni lha ma yin 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_rlung lha ni rlung lha 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_nam mkha' lding ni nam mkha' lding 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_dri za ni dri za 'du ba'i gnas 
[\[93b.3\]]su ma yin/_mi 'am ci ni mi 'am ci 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_lto 'phye chen po ni lto 'phye chen po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_gnod sbyin ni gnod sbyin 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_srin po ni srin po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_sha za ni sha za 
[\[93b.4\]]'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_'byung po ni 'byung po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_grul bum ni grul bum 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_srul po ni srul po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_lus srul po ni lus srul po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_skem byed ni skem byed 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_smyo byed ni 
[\[93b.5\]]smyo byed 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_grib gnon ni grib gnon 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/_brjed byed ni brjed byed 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin te/_gnon po ni gnon po 'du ba'i gnas su mi byed do/_/gang la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las 'gal bar byed na de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog 
[\[93b.6\]]pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/_/gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang yid la bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_i li mi li/_ki li mi li/_kin dug d+he/_muk+te/_su muk+te/_A kle nADe/_su NA De/_lcang lo can du mchog tu lhas char phob shig_/A rA pA rA/_go do hi kA/_i li mi li/_b+hidz+dzi li kA/_u du kA/_dun+du ka_/
[\[93b.7\]]kA Tu Tu kA/_i li mi li/_ti li mi li/_sa man+ta taHkri twA/_hu lu hu lu/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_pi li pi li/_ki li ki li/_shIR+She Na/_bar+Sha ma/_tsU lu tsU lu/_tsa la tsa la/_tsi li tsi li/_tsU lu tsU lu/_tsi Ti tsi Ti/_shi khi shi khi/_shi khi shi khi/_i Ti bi Ti/_khi khi khi khi/_dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu/_
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]ha ra ha ra/_ha ra ni/_dzam+b+he/_pra dzam+b+he/_sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nAM/_dzam+b+he mi/_stam+b+he mi/_bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/sba ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_

[\[94a.3\]]mu ru mu ru/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis sdang ba dang /_rab tu sdang ba rnams kyi dug dang /_mche ba'i dug dang /_rtsa ba'i dug dang /_kha zas kyi dug bcom mo/_/su ru su ru ke/_tsa ra tsa ra ke/_ba ra ba ra ke/_bak+ke/_pi ri hi ri/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang 
[\[94a.4\]]bcas pa bdun po dag gi gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/_/dug nges par bcom mo/_/dug med do/_/e lA me lA/_i li mi lA/_ti li/_ti li/_me lA/_ti ha du ha/_ti li mA/_ti mA/_du mA/_d+hI mA/_d+hu mA/_d+hu su kum b+hA/_kum+b+hA su kum+b+hA/_sum+bA/_tum+bA/_sa mA tum+bA/_A De nA De/_ti la/_kuny+dza nA De/_bar+Sha tu de ba/_i li

[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]de dag la/_/mngon par dad pa'i lha gang 'khod pa dag_/lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgu gyur nas/_/rtag tu dge dang zhi bar 'gyur bar byas/_/tad+ya thA/_i li mi li/_ki li mi li/_ki li tsi li/_ki li bo li/_u du rA/_su du ru/_su du mo de/_bu sa ra/_bu sa ra/_hu hu/_ka rany+dze/_
[\[94b.2\]]ka rany+dza/_mU le/_i hi sa/_na tA/_kuN+Da li/_kun tA li/_nA rA ya ni/_pA rA ya ni/_pA sh+ya ni/_pA sh+ya pA sh+ya ni/_ki pi la bAstu ni/_i ri bA si/_'gro lding ba'i sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/_kun dga' bo sman chen po 'di dag ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang 
[\[94b.3\]]po brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa ste/_kun dga' bo gang sman chen po 'di dag gi ming 'dzin pa la 'ga' zhig rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis 'ong na/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/_/tad+ya thA/_
[\[94b.4\]]kI rti mU le/_e raN+De mU le/_sa man+ta mU len Da nA De/_a De nA De/_ku sha nA De/_it+te/_mit+te/_mA ru/_a ra Da kA/_ma ra Da kA/_i li ki shi_/go do hi ka_/ud ng+huM du ma/_b+hin na/_me DA/_sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog_/rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog_/
[\[94b.5\]]lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog_/phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog_/mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/_/nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing /_/khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog_/de dag sdig par ma gyur cig_/nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin/_/rgyu skar thams 
[\[94b.6\]]cad bzang po yin/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che/_/dgra bcom thams cad zag pa med/_/bden pa'i tshig 'dis kun tu bde legs su gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/sba ba dang /_
[\[94b.7\]]yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_mtshams gcad pa dang /_sa bcing ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gang dag rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin chen po dag dang /_gang dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /_gang dag ri'i rgyal po gzhan rnams dang /_'brog rnams dang /_'brog chen po rnams dang /_klung rnams dang /_klung chen po 
[\[95a.2\]]rnams dang /_sman ljongs rnams dang /_'bab chu rnams dang /_lteng ka rnams dang /_lu ma rnams dang /_ri'i phug rnams dang /_dur khrod rnams dang /_dur khrod chen po rnams dang /_bzhi mdo rnams dang /_grong rnams dang /_grong khyer rnams dang /_lhas rnams dang /_skyed mos tshal 
[\[95a.3\]]rnams dang /_nags rnams dang /_nags tshal rnams dang /_lam rnams dang /_lam gol ba dag na gnas pa dang /_kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gang dag lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo 
[\[95a.4\]]brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/tad+ya thA/_ha ri hA ri Ni/_tsa li tsA li ni/_b+h+ra ma Ni/_b+h+ra ma ni/_mo ha ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_dzam+b+ha ni/_swa yam+b+hu be swA hA/_kun dga' bo shar phyogs na dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya ba dri za thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dri za 'bum phrag du ma yod 
[\[95a.5\]]pa dri za rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/_gang shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de yang bu dang bcas/_tsha bo dang bcas/_spun dang bcas/_blon po dang bcas/_sde dpon dang bcas/_mngag pa dang bcas/_pho nya dang bcas/_g.yog dang bcas/_'khor dang bcas pas rig 
[\[95a.6\]]sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/sba ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_
[\[95a.7\]]mtshams gcad pa dang /_sa bcing ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/tad+ya thA/_dz+hu dz+hu ru/_dz+hu dz+hu ru/_dz+hu dz+hu ru/_dz+hu ru/_dz+hu ru/_dz+hu ru me swA hA/_kun dga' bo lho phyogs na grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba grul bum gyi bdag po 'khor grul 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]bum brgya stong du ma yod pa/_grul bum rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/_gang lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de yang bu dang bcas/_tsha bo dang bcas/_spun dang bcas/_blon po dang bcas/_sde dpon dang bcas/_mngag pa dang bcas/_pho nya dang bcas/_g.yog dang bcas/_
[\[95b.2\]]'khor dang bcas pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung bgyis shig_/sba ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba 
[\[95b.3\]]dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_mtshams gcad pa dang /_sa bcing bgyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/tad+ya tha/_be lu ke/_be lu ke/_a mr-i tag+hA tani/_ba ru na ba te/_/so ma ba te/_be Nu mA li ni/_be lu ni/_pu tri ke/_tso tsu tsi tsu swA hA/_kun dga' bo nub phyogs 
[\[95b.4\]]na klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang zhes bya ba klu thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor klu brgya stong du ma yod pa/_klu rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/_gang nub phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de yang bu dang bcas/_tsha bo dang bcas/_spun dang bcas/_blon po dang bcas/_sde dpon dang bcas/_
[\[95b.5\]]mngag pa dang bcas/_pho nya dang bcas/_g.yog dang bcas/_'khor dang bcas pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung bgyis shig_/sba ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[95b.6\]]chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_mtshams gcad pa dang /_sa bcing bgyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/ta d+ya thA/_be du ri be du ri/_be dU rI/_be dU rI/_maT+Ti te/_maT+Ta te/_ko Ti/_ko Ti/_
[\[95b.7\]]bi byu ma ti/_bebyu ma ti/_hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu/_ru ru ru ru ru ru ru ru/_tsu tsu tsu tsu tsu tsu tsu tsu/_tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa dzu swA hA/_kun dga' bo byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu zhes bya ba gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma yod pa gnod sbyin rnams la dbang byed du 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]'jug pa gnas te/_gang byang phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de yang bu dang bcas/_tsha bo dang bcas/_spun dang bcas/_blon po dang bcas/_sde dpon dang bcas/_mngag pa dang bcas/_pho nya dang bcas/_g.yog dang bcas/_'khor dang bcas pas rig 
[\[96a.2\]]sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/sba ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad 
[\[96a.3\]]pa dang /_mtshams gcad pa dang /_sa bcing ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/tad+ya thA/_sau ri sau ri/_shi ri shi ri/_ma ti ma ti/_ti ri ti ri/_ma ti/_ki ri ki ri/_hi ri hi ri/_pe lu pe lu/_ping+ga le/_tsu lu tsu lu/_ha taM pi ShaM ban d+hu ma ti/_ni ha 
[\[96a.4\]]taM be ShaM/_ban d+hu ma ti swA hA/_shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung /_/lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/_/nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang /_/byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/_/rgyal po chen po 'di bzhi dag_/'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/_/phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar byed/_/sde 
[\[96a.5\]]bo che la stobs po che/_/pha rol dgra rnams rab tu 'joms/_/gzhan gyis mi thub thul bar dka'/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan/_/rdzu 'phrul che zhing lha min dang /_/lha yi g.yul yang myong bar byed/_/de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma 
[\[96a.6\]]bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/sba ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_mtshams gcad pa 
[\[96a.7\]]dang /_sa bcing ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/tad+ya thA/_e le me le/_ke le te le/_me le/_she le/_pA she_/dum+be/_du dum+be/_lhas kun tu char phob shig_/ti li/_mi li/_dum+be/_du dum+be/_aT+Te/_baT+Te/_pa ra ma du baT+Te/_lhas 'ur 'ur kun tu char phob shig_/
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]gu Tu gu Tu na ta/_a Da ka bad+dA yAM/_aN+De naN+De/_tuN+De/_tu tuN+De/_tsuk+ke/_buk+ke/_muk+ke/_i ri Di/_mi ri Di/_ni ri Di/_pi ri Di/_hi ri Di/_hi ri hi li/_hi li/_hu lu hu lu/_mi li mi li/_tu le/_ta ta le swA hA/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi ming zung shig_/'di lta ste/_
[\[96b.2\]]lus ngan gyi ni bu thu bo/_/kun tu rgyal ba mi la zhon/_/phrugs su ldan na gnas pa ste/_/lha yi bden pa gsol ba bo/_/des kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/tad+ya thA/_
[\[96b.3\]]ba le ba le/_balka le/_mA taM gi tsaN+DA le/_pu ru sha Ni/_bi tsi li ni/_gau ri/_gan d+hA ri/_ma taM gi/_tsaN+DA le/_mA li ni/_hi li hi li/_A ga te/_gau ri/_gan d+hA ri/_koSh+Thi ka pa tsa ri/_bi hA ri/_hi li hi li/_ku bye swA hA/_skya snar bu na 'khor ba 'jig_/gzhan gyis mi thub ka ba na/_/grong khyer 
[\[96b.4\]]bzung na gnod sbyin brag_/shed kyi bu ni byang phyogs na/_/lag na rdo rje rgyal po'i khab/_/bya rgod phung por gnas bcas pa/_/rgya mtsho'i mtha' yi bar gyi sar/_/lan gsum bar du 'gro byed pa/_/stobs che zhing ni gzi brjid che/_/dpag tshad bcur ni rnam par gnon/_/gnod sbyin 
[\[96b.5\]]mkha' lding rgyal ba na/_/sna tshogs sbed pa gnas sgo na/_/gnod sbyin bak+ku rgyal khab na/_/sde bo che la stobs po che/_/gnod sbyin nag po nye gnag po/_/ser skya yi ni gnas na gnas/_/thub pa chen po shAkya'i tog_/sangs rgyas thub pa gar bltams pa/_/rkang bkra po ni dgra can na/_/
[\[96b.6\]]tsi ra ta na dbang phyug che/_/mnyan yod na ni phur bu'o/_/gnas bcas na ni rgya mtsho gnas/_/yangs pa can na rdo rje mtshon/_/spre'u ltar dmar ser gyad yul na/_/bA rA Na sIr nag po che/_/blta na sdug pa tsam pa na/_/gnod sbyin khyab 'jug sgo can na/_/'dzin pa po ni sgo drung na/_/
[\[96b.7\]]'jigs byed zangs kyi 'dab ma can/_/brang gis 'gro na 'joms pa po/_/'brog na gnod sbyin 'brog gnas po/_/ser skya po ni 'bru [{]mangs [,]mang [}]na/_/'phags rgyal na ni nor srung ba/_/srung byed na ni nor 'byor pa/_/gso ba'i mtha' na gso ba po/_/dga' bo nye dga' grong khyer gnas/_/phreng ba 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]'dzin pa chu mchog na/_/kun dga' 'chi med sa zhag na/_/mche ba dkar po dngos bzang na/_/mi brtan pa ni gzi can na/_/rin chen ri ldan grong khyer na/_/nor gyi bu ni phyogs mtshams gnas/_/smin drug bu ni gzhon nu zhes/_/'jig rten grags pa skye yod na/_/
[\[97a.2\]]'od ma'i 'gram na lag brgya pa/_/ka ling ka na shing rta che/_/thul bar dka' ni 'gro 'joms na/_/srid sgrub nags na srid sgrub pa/_/gnod sbyin 'joms pa 'dun khang na/_/phreng ba srung na ri brtsegs pa/_/rta dmar na ni bzang po pa/_/ma rdzogs pa ni thams cad bzang /_/
[\[97a.3\]]snyems pa can na skyong ba po/_/ded dpon nor gyi dbang phyug go/_/ma rgyal rgyal na mche ba gtsigs/_/gnas can na ni nor bzang po/_/zhi ba zhi ba'i grong len na/_/zhi ba bzang po 'jigs byed na/_/gnod sbyin dbang po dbang grong na/_/me tog tog ni rdo grong na/_/shing pa shing gi 
[\[97a.4\]]grong khyer na/_/kha dog can na ser skya gnas/_/nor bu bzang dang gang ba bzang /_/spun gnyis tshangs pa ldan pa na/_/ba lang 'dzin na 'joms pa po/_/rab tu 'joms pa rdo 'jog na/_/gnod sbyin chen po bong srung sel/_/skyugs pa yi ni ri la gnas/_/gsum sbas 'gram 
[\[97a.5\]]pa ldan ngogs na/_/ho nu na ni 'od byed pa/_/dga' ba can dang 'phel byed pa/_/dga' ba 'phel byed grong khyer na/_/rlung gi sa ni rlung ldan pa/_/'phyang bar gyur na 'thab dga' ba/_/bcom brlag na ni bong bu pa/_/lang ka na ni bum pa'i lto/_/gnod sbyin nyi 'od rab nyams na/_/ko sa 
[\[97a.6\]]la ni ri mgo bo/_/rnam par rgyal dang rnam rgyal ldan/_/dkar po bcom brlag yul na gnas/_/gnod sbyin gang ba ma la yar/_/ti se gangs na mi 'am ci/_/sprin gyi phreng can pon+t+ra na/_/rab tu gnas na dum bu pa/_/pi tang ga l+yar yang dag byed/_/rlangs dang ldan na bde byed pa/_/
[\[97a.7\]]sna nas byung na gnod sbyin mdzes/_/gso ba'i mtha' na ma chags pa/_/dga' byed dang ni pha dga' dang /_/dpa' dang gser gyi lag pa dang /_/ka ling+ka na lto 'phyang po/_/ko sa la na nag po che/_/dge ba dge ba'i pho brang na/_/bA rA Na sIr skyong ba po/_/'gram ldan phung po rna ba bzang /_/
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]grong khyer drug na nor gzhan po/_/gnod sbyin stobs can mtha' ma na/_/srung ba can na mthong dga' ba/_/ba lang 'joms na gtsug phud can/_/phyogs mtshams na ni thal mo dga'/_/gdugs 'dra na ni dkris pa po/_/grong khyer drug na chu srin 'dul/_/tshang tshing gcig na mig 
[\[97b.2\]]yangs pa/_/u dum+bA rar sgo nga'i 'od/_/kau shAm+bIn lhun gyis grub/_/rnam par snang byed zhi ldan na/_/sbrul gyi gdugs na dga' ba po/_/g.yo ba 'dzin na ser skya'o/_/gyen du 'gro na bak+ku la/_/gang po snying po thob byed na/_/grong rdal tshol ba lnga [{]mangs [,]mang [}]na/_/glang chen brjod pa 
[\[97b.3\]]'du ba mchog_/chu lha'i yul na gzhu brtan po/_/g.yul 'gyed ldan par grong khyer rgyal/_/sgra ngan zhing na gnod sbyin dbang /_/gnyi dang rgyal ngan rgyal gnyi na/_/gnod sbyin mor grags de nyid na/_/gtum chen gser gyi 'og pag can/_/gnod par byed dang don grub dang /_/
[\[97b.4\]]'byung bar byed pa nags na gnas/_/'gro ba drug pa 'gro 'joms na/_/ka ba na ni ka ba nyid/_/seng ge'i stobs na gnod sbyin gang /_/seng ge stag stobs med byed gnyis/_/bye ba 'dab na sde bo che/_/de bzhin gzhan gyi grong las rgyal/_/me tog so ni tsam pa na/_/mnyam dga' ba 
[\[97b.5\]]ni ri [{]mangs [,]mang [}]na/_/ba lang sbyor na gnod sbyin ri/_/grong khyer na ni sde bzang po/_/gnas dang bcas na lag pa dpa'/_/kha la byin na bde byed pa/_/kau shAm+bI na tshegs med pa/_/bzang po can na bzang po pa/_/skya snar can gyi bu na ni/_/gnod sbyin 'byung po'i gdong zhes bya/_/'ching bu 
[\[97b.6\]]na ni mya ngan med/_/ma la gnas na sha thang ba/_/tshang tshing gcig na don grub pa/_/ma rgyal rgyal na dman pa po/_/chu mchog na ni muny+dza'i skra/_/sen da pa na nor bu'i gnas/_/gnod sbyin mi bzad 'gro ldan dag_/ser skya yi ni gnas na gnas/_/ba lang 'dzin dang gzhan brnyas dang /_/
[\[97b.7\]]sgo ba gnas can rtag pa dang /_/dbu ma pa yi gnod sbyin dag_/grags pa chen po bzang mdzes na/_/grong khyer snying por dgras dogs pa/_/mya ngan sa na rmongs byed pa/_/khyu 'gro na ni gnod sbyin grags/_/ma rungs pa yang de bzhin te/_/nga rgyal bral dang lha rtse ba/_/'jigs byin na 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]ni yid 'jigs pa/_/kha che'i yul na 'od byed pa/_/gtum po ral pa can grong na/_/kha che'i yul gyi sa mtshams na/_/lngas rtsen zhes ni bya ba gnas/_/de la bu ni lnga brgya ste/_/sde bo che la stobs po che/_/lngas rtsen gyi ni bu thu bo/_/rgya yul gyi ni sa la gnas/_/
[\[98a.2\]]phrag pa'i mig ces bya ba ni/_/mdzod ldan na ni spun dang bcas/_/ka ling+ka na mche ba rkang /_/dkyil 'khor stan na dkyil 'khor ro/_/ka pu sha na lang ka'i bdag_/'od can dga' ba'i tshang tshing na/_/nam mkha' srung na chos skyong ba/_/lag pa chen po ngan pa na/_/rnam thos bu yi 
[\[98a.3\]]bu dpal ldan/_/rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal po'i bu/_/gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor cing /_/tho gar gyi ni yul na gnas/_/'gror bcas ri dang gangs can dag_/sin d+hu yi ni rgya mtshor gnas/_/grong khyer gsum na rtse gsum lag_/ka ling+ka na rab 'joms pa/_/tshigs lnga 
[\[98a.4\]]ser po 'gro lding na/_/sing ha la na nor gyi bdag_/ne tso'i bzhin ni 'brog na ste/_/'gro 'am ci ni 'og na gnas/_/pad+ma dkar po'i 'od gsal ba/_/grong khyer che na brtse ba can/_/'jigs pa sbyin na rab 'jigs pa/_/chu dang ldan na dmar ser gnas/_/bab+ba da bskyed bab+ba Da/_/'dod 
[\[98a.5\]]pa sbyin na ma dad ldan/_/bu mo 'jug na rab sad pa/_/ka pu sha na nal ku bar/_/pha rol mtha' med dngul chu na/_/nus pa'i gnas na zhi byed pa/_/pa lha pa na thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris/_/ke ta ka na dmar ser po/_/'phral ris 'phel na bzhin rgyas pa/_/u T+yan yul na ma rungs pa/_/
[\[98a.6\]]thong shol ngan na bum lto bo/_/chu srin rgyal mtshan mya ngam na/_/sna tshogs sde ni po ka na/_/dga' dang ldan na sgra sgrogs bu/_/phung po'i bdag por dmar ser po/_/chung ma can na mthong dga' bo/_/gnod sbyin chu srin rgyal po'i khab/_/yangs pa na ni gnas pa ste/_/brgya stong phrag ni mang 
[\[98a.7\]]po yi/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas/_/ba lang skyong ba sbrul gdug can/_/lcang lo'i grong na lcang lo pa/_/dga' ba'i grong na dga' ba can/_/grong gi lhas na stobs chen gnas/_/lha las babs na rnam thos bu/_/rang gi sde ni yongs su skyong /_/lcang lo can na gnas pa ste/_/
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]gnod sbyin bye bas yongs su bskor/_/gnod sbyin de dag ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/_sde che ba/_stobs che ba/_pha rol gyi dgra rab tu 'joms pa/_thub par dka' zhing gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/_'od dang ldan pa/_kha dog dang ldan pa/_grags pa dang ldan pa/_lha dang /_lha ma yin gyi 
[\[98b.2\]]g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa/_rdzu 'phrul che ba dag ste/_de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/sba ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[98b.3\]]chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_mtshams gcad pa dang /_sa bcing ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/tad+ya thA/_a ka Te/_bi ka Te/_ha ri Ni/_hA ri Ni/_d+ha ra Ni/_d+hA ra Ni/_huk+ke/_huk+ke/_buk+ke/_
[\[98b.4\]]buk+ke_/bdag gi mi mdza' ba rnams/_ha na ha na/_ha na ha na/_ha na ha na/_ha na ha na/_ha na ha na/_bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa rnams/_da ha da ha/_da ha da ha/_da ha da ha/_da ha da ha/_da ha da ha/_bdag la phyir rgol ba rnams/_pa tsa pa tsa/_pa tsa pa tsa/_pa tsa pa tsa/_pa tsa pa tsa/_pa tsa pa tsa/_
[\[98b.5\]]d+hu d+hu/_d+hu d+hu/_d+hu d+hu/_d+hu d+hu/_d+hu d+hu/_bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa rnams/_ha ha ha ha ha/_ha ha ha ha ha/_dzi Ti dzi Ti/_dzi Ti dzi Ti/_dzi Ti dzi Ti/_dzi Ti dzi Ti/_dzi Ti dzi Ti/_bdag gi dgra bo rnams/_nA sha ya/_tsu lu tsu lu/_tsu lu tsu lu/_tsu lu tsu lu/_tsu lu tsu lu/_tsu lu tsu lu/_hi li hi li/_hi li hi li/_hi li hi 
[\[98b.6\]]li/_hi li hi li/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_mi li mi li/_mi li mi li/_mi li mi li/_mi li mi li/_phu ru phu ru/_phu ru phu ru/_phu ru phu ru/_phu ru phu ru/_phu ru phu ru/_tsi Ti tsi Ti/_tsi Ti tsi Ti/_tsi Ti tsi Ti/_tsi Ti tsi Ti/_tsi Ti tsi Ti/_bdag gi dgra bo rnams/_nA sha ya/_hik+ka/_mik+ka/_tsik+ka/_duk+ka/_shrI b+ha dre/_
[\[98b.7\]]mang+ga l+ye/_sa man+ta/_b+ha dre/_hi ra N+ya gar+b+he sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/_a ma le/_ka ma le/_bi ma le/_tsan+d+ra/_tsan+d+ra/_pra b+he/_sUr+ye/_sUr+ya/_kAn+te/_durbidz+nyeye/_du me/_dum+be do dum+be/_pr-i yaM ka re/_bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/kun dga' bo 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]khyod kyis gang dag phyogs bcu srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po dag gi ming zung shig_/kun dga' bo shar phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi gnas te 'di lta 
[\[99a.2\]]ste/_ring po dang /_mig bzang dang /_gang po dang ser skya'o/_/de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/kun dga' bo lho phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag 
[\[99a.3\]]lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi gnas te/_'di lta ste/_seng ge dang /_nye ba'i seng ge dang /_dung can dang /_dga' bo'o/_/de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar 
[\[99a.4\]]shog shig_/kun dga' bo nub phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag nub phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi gnas te/_'di lta ste/_seng ge dang /_seng ge'i ral pa dang /_bla ma dang /_ser skya'o/_/de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis 
[\[99a.5\]]bdag la bsrung bgyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/kun dga' bo byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag byang phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi gnas te/_'di lta ste/_'dzin pa dang /_'dzin dga' dang /_brtson 
[\[99a.6\]]skyong dang /_khyab 'jug go/_/de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung bgyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag phyogs mtshams na gnas te/_gang dag phyogs 
[\[99a.7\]]mtshams srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi po 'di dag_/'di lta ste/_lnga spyod dang /_tshigs lnga ser po dang /_ri mnyam dang /_gser can no/_/de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]shog shig_/kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag sa la gnas te/_gang dag sa srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi po 'di dag 'di lta ste/_sa pa dang /_shin tu sa pa dang /_nag po dang /_nye gnag go/_/de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag 
[\[99b.2\]]la bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag bar snang la gnas te/_gang dag bar snang srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi po 'di dag 'di lta ste/_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_me 
[\[99b.3\]]dang /_rlung ngo /_/de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis rnam thos kyi bu'i chos kyi spun gang dag sems can rnams srung zhing yongs su skyong bar 
[\[99b.4\]]byed pa/_'jig rten gyi yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'khrug pa rnams med par byed pa/_'jig rten la phan gdags pa'i phyir 'jig rten na rgyu ba rnams kyi ming zung shig_/'di lta ste/_dbang po dang /_zla ba dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po dang /_chu lha dang /_b+ha ra d+h+wa dza dang /_
[\[99b.5\]]dbang ldan dang /_tsan+dan dang /_'dod pa'i gtso bo dang /_mgrin ngan dang /_mgul nges dang /_ba Di dang /_nor bu dang /_nor bu spyod dang /_sgra rab dang /_nye lnga po dang /_ri mnyam dang /_gser can dang /_gang po dang /_seng ldeng pa dang /_g.yon can dang /_gnod sbyin ba lang skyong dang /_
[\[99b.6\]]'brog gnas dang /_mi'i rgyal po dang /_rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang /_tshigs lnga ser po dang /_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_dri za sna tshogs sde dang /_'bras bu gsum pa dang /_mgul gsum pa dang /_lcags mdung ring po dang ma ldan te/_gnod sbyin 
[\[99b.7\]]de dag ni gnod sbyin chen po'o/_/sde rnams kyi yongs su 'dren pa/_rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/_'od dang ldan pa/_kha dog dang ldan pa/_grags pa dang ldan pa dag ste/_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i spun te/_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus gnod sbyin 'di ni nga la rnam par 'tshe'o/_/gnod sbyin 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]'di ni nga mi gtong ngo /_/zhes gang dag la go bar byed pa de dag ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i spun te/_de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/'thab 
[\[100a.2\]]pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa las yongs su skyobs shig_/mi'i gdon dang /_mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang /_lha'i gdon dang /_klu'i gdon dang /_lha ma yin gyi gdon dang /_rlung lha'i gdon dang /_nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang /_dri za'i 
[\[100a.3\]]gdon dang /_mi'am ci'i gdon dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang /_gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang /_srin po'i gdon dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gdon dang /_sha za'i gdon dang /_'byung po'i gdon dang /_grul bum gyi gdon dang /_srul po'i gdon dang /_lus srul po'i gdon dang /_skem 
[\[100a.4\]]byed kyi gdon dang /_smyo byed kyi gdon dang /_grib gnon gyi gdon dang /_brjed byed kyi gdon dang /_gnon po'i gdon dang /_rgyu skar gyi gdon dang /_'byung po'i gdon las yongs su skyobs shig_/zas su mdangs za ba dang /_zas su mngal za ba dang /_zas su sha za ba dang /_zas su 
[\[100a.5\]]khrag 'thung ba dang /_zas su zhag za ba dang /_zas su tshil za ba dang /_zas su rkang za ba dang /_zas su btsas pa za ba dang /_srog 'phrog pa dang /_zas su gtor ma za ba dang /_zas su phreng ba za ba dang /_zas su dri za ba dang /_zas su bdug pa za ba dang /_zas su me tog za ba 
[\[100a.6\]]dang /_zas su 'bras bu za ba dang /_zas su lo tog za ba dang /_zas su sbyin sreg za ba dang /_zas su rnag 'thung ba dang /_zas su phyi sa za ba dang /_zas su gcin 'thung ba dang /_zas su mchil ma za ba dang /_zas su ngar snabs za ba dang /_zas su snabs za ba dang /_zas su skyugs pa

[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]nye ba'i dbang po la swA hA/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos kyi bu la swA hA/_dri za'i bdag po yul 'khor srung la swA hA/_grul bum gyi bdag po 'phags skyes po la swA hA/_klu'i bdag po mig mi bzang la swA hA/_lha rnams la swA hA/_klu rnams la swA hA/_lha ma yin rnams la swA hA/_
[\[104b.2\]]rlung lha rnams la swA hA/_nam mkha' lding rnams la swA hA/_dri za rnams la swA hA/_mi 'am ci rnams la swA hA/_lto 'phye chen po rnams la swA hA/_gnod sbyin rnams la swA hA/_srin po rnams la swA hA/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams la swA hA/_sha za rnams la swA hA/_'byung po rnams la swA hA/_
[\[104b.3\]]grul bum rnams la swA hA/_srul po rnams la swA hA/_lus srul po rnams la swA hA/_skem byed rnams la swA hA/_smyo byed rnams la swA hA/_grib gnon rnams la swA hA/_brjed byed rnams la swA hA/_gnon po rnams la swA hA/_zla ba dang nyi ma la swA hA/_drag po rnams la swA hA/_rgyu skar 
[\[104b.4\]]rnams la swA hA/_gza' rnams la swA hA/_skar ma rnams la swA hA/_drang srong rnams la swA hA/_brtul zhugs grub pa rnams la swA hA/_rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la swA hA/_dkar mo la swA hA/_sa 'dzin ma la swA hA/_dug sel ma la swA hA/_'chi med ma la swA hA/_rmugs byed 
[\[104b.5\]]ma la swA hA/_rengs byed ma la swA hA/_thal mo rdeg ma la swA hA/_'gro lding ma la swA hA/_sha ba ri la swA hA/_ar+tha sha ba ri la swA hA/_gtum mo la swA hA/_ban glang chen po la swA hA/_klu'i snying po la swA hA/_nam mkha' lding gi snying po la swA hA/_yid las byung la swA hA/_yid las byung 
[\[104b.6\]]chen po la swA hA/_yi ge drug ma la swA hA/_nor bu bzang la swA hA/_kun tu bzang po la swA hA/_kun tu bzang po chen po la swA hA/_dam tshig chen po la swA hA/_zla ba chen po la swA hA/_so sor 'brang ba chen mo la swahA/_bsil ba'i nags tshal la swA hA/_bsil ba'i nags tshal chen po la swA hA/_
[\[104b.7\]]be con 'dzin ma la swA hA/_be con 'dzin chen mo la swA hA/_btang bzung la swA hA/_btang bzung chen po la swA hA/_rgyal byed ma la swA hA/_zhi ma la swA hA/_lngas rtsen la swA hA/_gzhan gyis mi thub ma la swA hA/_rma bya'i rgyal mo gser du snang ba la swA hA/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la swA hA/_
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]rig sngags chen mo dang /_gsang sngags chen mo dang /_so sor 'brang ba chen mo dang /_bsrung ba chen mo 'di dag gis gshed byed rnams bcom mo/_/sgyur ba'i las rnams dang /_byad dang /_g.yengs byed rnams dang /_ro langs rnams dang /_sems sgyur ba rnams dang /_
[\[105a.2\]]sbod gtong rnams bcom mo/_/skem byed rnams dang /_smyo byed rnams dang /_grib gnon rnams dang /_brjed byed rnams bcom mo/_/skems pa rnams dang /_skrag pa rnams dang /_dbyig dug rnams dang /_dug rnams bcom mo/_/bza' nyes rnams dang /_skyug nyes rnams dang /_
[\[105a.3\]]gnod sgrib rnams dang /_gnod bltas rnams dang /_bri nyes rnams dang /_bsgom nyes rnams dang /_smad pa rnams bcom mo/_/rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang /_nyin gnyis pa rnams dang /_nyin gsum pa rnams dang /_nyin bzhi pa rnams dang /_nyin bdun pa rnams dang /_zla ba 
[\[105a.4\]]phyed pa rnams dang /_zla ba gcig pa rnams dang /_nyin mo pa rnams dang /_mtshan mo pa rnams dang /_yud tsam pa rnams dang /_rtag pa'i rims rnams dang /_rims drag po rnams dang /_rlung las gyur pa rnams dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang /_bad kan las gyur pa 
[\[105a.5\]]rnams dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang /_mi'i rims rnams dang /_mi ma yin pa'i rims rnams bcom mo/_/rims thams cad bcom mo/_/shu ba dang /_g.ya' ba dang /_'brum mo phra mo dang /_mdze dang /_phol mig dang /_g.yan pa dang /_me dbal dang /_lhog pa rnams 
[\[105a.6\]]bcom mo/_/klad pa na ba dang /_gzhogs phyed na ba dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_mig nad dang /_sna nad dang /_kha nad dang /_mgul nad dang /_snying nad dang /_lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang /_rna ba na ba dang /_so na ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_rtsib logs na ba dang /_rgyab na ba dang /_
[\[105a.7\]]lto ba na ba dang /_mkhur ba na ba dang /_mtshan par rdol ba dang /_skye gnas na ba dang /_rab tu skye gnas na ba dang /_rked pa na ba dang /_brla na ba dang /_byin pa na ba dang /_lag pa na ba dang /_rkang pa na ba dang /_yan lag na ba dang /_nying lag na ba rnams bcom mo/_/gdon thams cad

[\[105b.1\]]dang /_dug thams cad dang /_nad thams cad bcom mo/_/bdag bde legs su gyur cig_/mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/_/nyi ma'i gung gi bde legs dang /_/nyin mtshan kun gyi bde legs dag_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol/_/sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byang

[\[105b.5\]]rgyal po dbang po dang /_klu'i rgyal po nye ba'i dbang po dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po dug med bcas dang /_klu'i rgyal po mtsho chen dang /_klu'i rgyal po mtsho chen bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po chu srin dang /_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_klu'i rgyal 
[\[105b.6\]]po nye dga' bo dang /_klu'i rgyal po mi zhum pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po nye bar mi zhum pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po blta na mdzes dang /_klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_klu'i rgyal po skya reng dang /_klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang /_klu'i rgyal po paN+Da ka dang /_klu'i rgyal po sor mo

[\[108a.1\]]'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsungs pa'o/_/tad+ya thA/_a ra De/_ka ra De/_ma de/_ma da bar d+ha ni/_a ba re/_sha ba re/_tu re tu re/_tsu re tsu re/_sha ba re/_par+Na sha ba re/_hu tsi hu tsi mu tsi mu tsi swA hA/_kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi

[\[108a.5\]]A Di/_dan+ti/_dan+ti le/_sha ka ri/_tsa ka ri/_tha ga ri/_ta ga ri/_kAny+tsi ni/_kany+tsa nA ba ti/_ba re ba re/_ba re ba re/_dan+te sid+d+hi swA hA/_kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis gsungs pa'o/_/tad+ya thA/_tat+ta le ta ta le/_ta la to ta 
[\[108a.6\]]le/_bI re/_bi dza ye/_bidz+dza d+ha re/_a ra dze/_bi ra dze/_bi rA dzA/_ma si/_ma ti/_mA li ni/_muN+Ti/_shrI muN+Di/_dz+wa le dz+wa le/_dz+wa le dz+wa le/_b+ha ga ba ti/_sid+d+hi swA hA/_kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gsungs pa'o/_/tad+ya 
[\[108a.7\]]thA/_aN+Dare/_kaN+Da re/_maN+Da re/_khaN+Da re/_dzam+bu/_dzam+bu na di/_dzam+bu ba ti/_mat+te/_maN+Di ti ke_/a ma re/_sid+d+he/_ha ra ha ra/_ha ra ha ra/_pa shu pa shu/_pa shu pa shu/_pa shu pa ti sid+d+hi swA hA/_kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]pa ngas sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir da ltar bshad pa'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hi li mi li/_ki li mi li/_i li le/_ka ta le/_ke tU mU le/_a Ta ma li/_Dab+se/_Da Dab+se/_bu sa ra ke_/bu sa Te/_na ra kan+te/_kA mi Ni/_kam+bu/_da ra ki ru ru ta ra/_ba ra Ni/_pra kr-i ti/_dAMSh+Te/_mi li ta le/_
[\[108b.2\]]hi ti hA se/_a ba le/_tu ba le/_pi laM ke_/baT+Ti baT+Ti ti ke_/a Dan+hu be/_ba Ti tum+me/_phyogs bcu kun tu lhas char phob shig_/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sa la dga' bas chu dbab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/_/i ri dza ye/_go do hi kA ye/_
[\[108b.3\]]b+h+ring+ga ri kA ye/_a ru tsi/_na ru tsi/_naT+Te/_badzre badzre naT+Te/_u da ya na/_pri ye/_a le ta le/_ku la tA le/_nA rA ya Ni/_pA rA ya Ni/_pa sh+ya ni/_spar+sha ni/_'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/_ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ngas bstan cing rjes su yi 
[\[108b.4\]]rangs nas dge slong kun dga' bos dge slong sa ri la bde legs su 'gyur bar byas pa de bzhin du bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/sba ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_

[\[108b.6\]]cing rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/tad+ya thA/_shi ri shi ri shi ri/_b+ha dre/_dz+yo ti dz+yo ti dz+yo ti b+ha dre/_ha re ha re ha re/_hA ri Ni/_dan+ti/_sha ba re/_shi be/_shU la pA Ni ni/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_be d+hi be d+hi/_sa twe bo d+hi/_pa ri tsA ra ni ye swA hA/_kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 
[\[108b.7\]]'di ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_mi li ni/_tsaM ka ri/_ki ri ki ri ki ri ki ri ki ri ki ri ki ra ye/_brah+mA ye/_rat+na ka raN+Da ke/_be Do hu phus+sa/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_sa ra sa ra/_ha ra ha ra/_ha la ha la/_phu ru phu ru/_

[\[109a.1\]]phu ru phu ru phu ru phu ru swA hA/_dug bcom mo/_/dug nges par bcom mo/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis dug nges par bcom mo/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/_/dgra bcom pa'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i gzi

[\[109b.1\]]re badzre/_tu Ta tu Ta si/_ba Ta ba Ta si/_si li si li/_ka pi li/_ka pi li/_mU le/_hA hI hU/_sdang ba dang /_rab tu sdang ba thams cad rab tu rmugs par bya'o/_/lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag dang /_sum cu pa'i lha dang bcas te chad pas gcad par bya'o/_/

[\[109b.4\]]gshin rje'i pho nya dang /_mtshan mo nag mo dang /_dus kyi zhags pa dang /_'chi bdag gi chad pa dang /_tshangs pa'i chad pa dang /_dbang po'i chad pa dang /_drang srong gi chad pa dang /_lha'i chad pa dang /_klu'i chad pa dang /_lha ma yin gyi chad pa dang /_rlung lha'i chad pa dang /_nam mkha'

[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]gi rgyal po sI ta dang /_klung gi rgyal po mda' 'byung dang /_klung gi rgyal po khyim ldan dang /_klung gi rgyal po gshin rje sel dang /_klung gi rgyal po gya gyu dang /_klung gi rgyal po rgyas 'bab dang /_klung gi rgyal po zhags bral dang /_klung gi rgyal po zhi ba 'dzin dang /_klung gi

[\[110b.1\]]dang /_brjed byed rnams dang /_gnon po rnams dang /_zas su mdangs za ba rnams dang /_zas su mngal za ba rnams dang /_zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang /_zas su sha za ba rnams dang /_zas su tshil za ba rnams dang /_zas su zhag za ba rnams dang /_

[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/sdig pa thams cad sol cig_/dge ba rnams snang bar gyur cig_/mi dge ba sol cig_/don rnams la snang bar gyis shig_/gnod pa rnams sol cig_/mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/_/nyi ma'i gung

[\[111b.3\]]nab so dang /_/rgyal ni bkra shis phun sum tshogs/_/de bzhin skag ste bdun po yin/_/de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni shar gyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/_gang dag shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go/_/de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis 
[\[111b.4\]]bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/mchu ni mi mdza' 'joms pa dang /_/de bzhin gre dang dbo gnyis dang /_/me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang /_/sa ga ste ni bdun pa yin/_/de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni/_lho phyogs kyi sgo na 
[\[111b.5\]]gnas pa dag ste/_gang dag lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go/_/de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/lha mtshams gzi brjid chen mo dang /_/de bzhin
