[\[111b.7\]]bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/mon gru dang ni mon gre dang /_/de bzhin khrums stod khrums smad dang /_/nam gru dang ni tha skar dang /_/bra nye ste ni bdun pa yin/_/de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni byang gi phyogs na gnas pa dag ste/_/gang dag 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]byang phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go/_/de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis gza' gang dag rgyu skar rnams 
[\[112a.2\]]kyi khrod na rgyu zhing 'grib pa dang /_'phel ba dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_lo nyes pa dag kyang ston pa rnams kyi ming zung shig_/'di lta ste/_gza' nyi ma dang /_gza' zla ba dang /_gza' phur bu dang /_gza' pa bsangs dang /_gza' spen pa dang /_
[\[112a.3\]]gza' mig dmar dang /_gza' gza' lhag dang /_gza' lha min dbang po sgra gcan dang /_gza' du ba mjug [{]rings so[,]ring ngo [}]/_/rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni/_/de ltar phyogs na bdun bdun no/_/skar ma gza' bdun de bzhin te/_/rdzu 'phrul che zhing dka' thub che/_/nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang /_/
[\[112a.4\]]sum cu rtsa bdun tshang ba dag_/'char ba dang ni nub pa ni/_/'khor lo mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu/_/'jig rten du ni zad 'phel byed/_/gzi che rdzu 'phrul chen po dag_/rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/_/rig sngags rjes su yi rang byos/_/de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen 
[\[112a.5\]]mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/kun dga' bo drang srong rnying pa brtul zhugs grub pa/_rig sngags grub pa/_grags pa 'bar ba/_klung dang ri la gnas pa/_dmod pa'i mtshon cha can/_dka' thub grags pa/_
[\[112a.6\]]rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba de dag gi ming brjod kyis khyod kyis zung shig_/'di lta ste/_drang srong chen po brgyad pa zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs pa zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs lha zhes bya ba 
[\[112a.7\]]dang /_drang srong chen po lha skyabs kyi bu zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po 'od zer can zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po kun gyi bshes zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po gnas 'jog ces bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po grog mkhar ba zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po 'drob skyong gi bu zhes bya ba 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]dang /_drang srong chen po 'drob skyong gi bu rgan po zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po ngan spong zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po ngan spong dga' zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po 'gro 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po 'gro dga' zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po 'jigs can zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[112b.2\]]drang srong chen po skal ldan shing rta zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po mdun du bdar zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po mgo bo che zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po gshin rje'i me zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung gi bu zhes bya ba 
[\[112b.3\]]dang /_drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung nag po'i bu zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po ljang sngo'i bu zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po ljang sngo'i tsha bo zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po ngag mnyam zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po 'phags po zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po yang dag 
[\[112b.4\]]'phags po zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po bzod pa smra zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po grags pa zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po rab grags zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po bla ma zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po grub pa zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po gru 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_drang 
[\[112b.5\]]srong chen po rta bu zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po gangs can zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po mig dmar zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po cha byad 'dzin zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po gos ngan zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po mda' ltar snang ba zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po rgyags pa zhes 
[\[112b.6\]]bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po 'od ces bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po pa ba sangs zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po phur bu zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po spen pa zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po gza' lhag ces bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po dug sel 
[\[112b.7\]]zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po sa 'dzin zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po rwa gcig pa zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po drang srong rwa zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po gyur mid kyi bu zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po gar ldan gyi bu zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po sgra'i bu zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]'jigs byed ces bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po 'jigs byed glang po zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po ser skya zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po gau ta ma zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po rta dmar zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po byis pa rtse zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po mis 
[\[113a.2\]]byin gyi bu zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po ri bo zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong chen po srin bu 'dzin ces bya ba ste/_kun dga' bo drang srong chen po rnying pa 'di dag ni rig byed rnams byed pa/_gsang sngags rnams byed pa/_dmod pa 'dor ba/_brtul zhugs grub pa/_gzi brjid che ba grub pa/_pha 
[\[113a.3\]]rol gnon pa grub pa dag ste/_de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/tad+ya thA/_hi ri hi ri/_khi ri khi ri/_mi ri mi ri/_phu ri phu ri/_su ri su ri/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_
[\[113a.4\]]si ri si ri/_Dab+phu/_Dab+phu/_Da Dab+phu/_gra sa ni/_ma tha ni/_da ma ni/_da ha ni/_g+hA ta ni/_pa tsa ni/_pA tsa ni/_ta pa ni/_tA pa ni/_ha na ni/_da ha ni/_dA ha ni/_da hA da hA da hA/_da la da la dA la ni/_pA Ta ni mo ha ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_dzam+b+ha ni/_swa yam+b+hu swA hA/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis skye dgu'i 
[\[113a.5\]]bdag po chen po gang dag lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_rlung lha rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_srin po rnams dang /_mi dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas 
[\[113a.6\]]pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi dge ba dang /_mi dge ba la sogs pa'i dge ba'i khyad par grangs med pa dag gis 'jig rten gsum du rnam par gzhag pa rnams kyi ming zung shig_/'di lta ste/_skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po bu can dang /_skye dgu'i 
[\[113a.7\]]bdag po za tshul gyi bu dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po me dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po gso ba dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po mdun du bdar dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po spu zing sel dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po go byed dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po mdzes gnas dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po zin po dang /_
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]skye dgu'i bdag po lus mdzes dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po rab dga' dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po mkhas pa dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po gus yod de/_kun dga' bo skye dgu'i bdag po bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni gnas pa dang /_'gro ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs bsrung ba'i phyir gnas pa dag go/_/de 
[\[113b.2\]]dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/thogs pa med pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag gis kyang bsrung ba gyis shig_/tad+ya thA/_hi ri hi ri/_khi ri khi ri/_mi ri mi ri/_phu ri phu ri/_
[\[113b.3\]]su ri su ri/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_si ri si ri/_Dab+phu/_Dab+phu/_Da Dab+phu/_gra sa ni/_ma tha ni/_da ma ni/_da ha ni/_g+hA ta ni/_pa tsa ni/_pA tsa ni/_ta pa ni/_tA pa ni/_ha na ni/_dA ha ni/_dA ha ni/_da ha da ha da ha/_da la da la/_dA la ni/_pA Ta ni/_mo ha ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_dzam+b+ha ni swA hA/_kun dga' bo 
[\[113b.4\]]khyod kyis dug chen po rnams kyi ming zung shig_/tad+ya thA/_aN+Da rA/_paN+Da rA/_kA ra DA/_ke yU rA/_b+hU taM ga mA/_b+hu ta pa ti/_bin+du pa ti/_si ri pa ti/_te dze pa ti/_te dzo gra pa te/_ya sho pa te/_ya sho gra ba te/_a ra DA/_ta ra DA/_ta ra ta ra DA/_dan+tA/_dza hA dzau hA/_dzo lA/_mi lA/_ha lA/_pha lA/_
[\[113b.5\]]gu la hA/_ru tsi rA/_dan du rA/_i ri ki tsi kA_/kam+b+ha/_sha ta dan+du rA/_bi pu le/_na ku le/_ki ri pi/_ta raM gA rISh+Ta/_a mra ma ti dzAm bU ma ti/_ma d+hu ma ti/_ka ma le/_bi ma le/_kuN+Da le/_a hi/_tu hi/_du hi/_bag+ke bag+kedU de/_bad sa nA b+he/_ma hA ga re/_tu lam+be/_du lam+be/_su lam+be swA hA/_
[\[113b.6\]]kun dga' bo 'di dag ni dug chen po dag ste/_de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig_/sba ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_
[\[113b.7\]]mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_mtshams gcad pa dang /_sa bcing ba gyis shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis shing ljon pa rnams kyi ming zung shig_/'di lta ste/_shing ljon pa chen po gser zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]shing ljon pa chen po ser skya zhes bya ba dang /_shing ljon pa chen po khyab gnas zhes bya ba dang /_shing ljon pa chen po spre'u gnas zhes bya ba dang /_shing ljon pa chen po pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba dang /_shing ljon pa chen po ser po zhes bya ba dang /_shing ljon 
[\[114a.2\]]pa chen po mya ngan 'tshang zhes bya ba dang /_shing ljon pa chen po rna ldan byed ces bya ba dang /_shing ljon pa chen po rgyas byed ces bya ba dang /_shing ljon pa chen po bil ba zhes bya ba dang /_shing ljon pa chen po tsU ta zhes bya ba dang /_shing ljon pa chen po de dag dang gzhan dag la

[\[114a.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang 
[\[114a.6\]]ba'o/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngas kyang da ltar bstan cing rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni byang chub sems

[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/grul bum gyi bdag po 'phags skyes pos kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus kyang smras shing 
[\[114b.2\]]rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/dri za'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang /_grul bum gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang /_klu'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen dang /_'phrog ma 
[\[114b.3\]]bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can gyis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni lha'i gdon dang /_klu'i gdon dang /_rlung lha'i gdon dang /_lha ma yin gyi gdon dang /_nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang /_dri za'i gdon dang /_
[\[114b.4\]]mi 'am ci'i gdon dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang /_gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang /_srin po'i gdon dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gdon dang /_sha za'i gdon dang /_'byung po'i gdon dang /_grul bum gyi gdon dang /_srul po'i gdon dang /_lus srul po'i gdon dang /_

[\[115b.1\]]'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/nad thams cad dang /_dug thams cad dang /_sdang ba thams cad dang /_'jigs pa thams cad dang /_yams kyi nad thams cad dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrug pa

[\[115b.4\]]rnams kyis de la sdug bsngal chen po byed par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor te/_rdo rjes de'i mgo 'gems par 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa'i gzi brjid kyis kyang de'i 'byor pa thal bar rlog par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[115b.5\]]kun dga' bo su zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bsrung ba byas sam/_skud pa btags na de bsad pa'i rigs pa ni chad pas bral bar 'gyur ro/_/chad pas bcad pa'i rigs pa ni gzhu btsog pas so/_/gzhu btsog pa'i rigs pa ni spyo bas

[\[115b.7\]]'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs te/_mtshon gyis kyang ma yin no/_/bde bar gnyid kyis log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur ro/_/bde ba dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang /_dgra choms par 'gyur ro/_/rmas pa med par 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/bde bar yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/_/
[\[116a.2\]]kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni ha cang char che ba'am/_char dkon pa'i tshe bklag par bya'o/_/des ni klu thams cad spro bar 'gyur te/_char chen po ni gcod par byed/_char dkon pa'i tshe ni rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsam pa ci srid par 
[\[116a.3\]]char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di dran pas kyang 'jigs pa dang dgra thams cad zhi bar 'gyur na sus dum bur ma gyur cing rdzogs par 'chang ba'am/_bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_kun dga' bo khyod 
[\[116a.4\]]kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di zung shig_/'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i phyir rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa 'di kun 
[\[116a.5\]]chub par gyis shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/tad+ya thA/_yA ba ti/_d+hA ba ti/_d+ha ra ki la/_hu lu/_hu lu me swA hA/_'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/_/de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan dug med pa/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[116a.6\]]bden pas dug bcom mo/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/_/de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/_/bcom ldan chos ni dug med pa/_/chos kyi bden pas dug bcom mo/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/_/de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/_/
[\[116a.7\]]bcom ldan dge 'dun dug med pa/_/dge 'dun bden pas dug bcom mo/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang /_/dgra bcom rnams kyi grags gang dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid kyis/_/ngas ni bde legs 'gyur bar byas/_/kun dga' bo rig 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos dug bcom mo/_/dge slong sa ri bde legs su gyur cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[116b.2\]]lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_dge slong sa ri ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slong sa ri la chad pa spang bar byas te/_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_
[\[116b.3\]]bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_mtshams gcad pa dang /_sa bcing ba byas te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsrung ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[116b.4\]]dge slong sa ri nad de las sos so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te ci ltar gyur pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[116b.5\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di'i mthu mthong ngam/_kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 
[\[116b.6\]]de bzhin du gsung ba de la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ma 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po bzhi ni skam yang srid/_sa ni nam mkha' la 'phags kyang srid/_
[\[116b.7\]]zla ba dang nyi ma ni sa la ltung yang srid/_klung ni rgyun las ldog kyang srid kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur mi srid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de lta bas na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]bya chen mo 'di la 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams mos par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_
[\[117a.2\]]'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma de rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la mos par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sa ri dang /_
[\[117a.3\]]lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_rlung lha dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa gang dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod pa de dag thams cad yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[117a.4\]]'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang /_dz+nyA na sid d+hi dang /_shAkya pra b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad 
[\[117a.5\]]gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D560}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma yU ra bid+yA gar+b+he nA ma/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya'i yang snying zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das rma bya chen mo la 
[\[117a.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dgra yis 'jigs pa'am/_'thab rtsod kyis 'jigs pa'am/_bgegs kyis 'jigs pa'am/_dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa'am/_sbrul 
[\[117a.7\]]gyis 'jigs pa'am/_gcan gzan gyis 'jigs pa'am/_dug gis 'jigs pa'am/_mes 'jigs pa'am/_chus 'jigs pa'am/_rlung gis 'jigs pa'am/_'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang na 'dug na 'di yid la bya'o/_/rlung las gyur pa'am/_mkhris pa las gyur 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]pa'am/_bad kan las gyur pa'am/_'dus pa las gyur pa'am/_gdon gyis zin tam/_rims kyis btab pa'am/_dug 'thungs sam/_nad thams cad kyi nang na 'dug na 'di yid la bya'o/_/na mo b+ha ga ba te/_iT+TiT+TA ya/_in+d+ra go mi si kA ya/_A sha ne/_pA sha ne/_
[\[117b.2\]]pA pa ni kU le/_ka pi la mit+te/_i le mit+te swA hA/_gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig_/nA rA ya Ni/_pA rA ya Ni/_ha ri ta/_tA li/_kun tA li/_i li mi sti/_ki li ti li mi sti swA hA/_rig sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig_/ha ha/_hi hi/_hu hu/_
[\[117b.3\]]kha rA/_ma rA/_kha hi/_kha hi/_hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT swA hA/_bdag la srungs shig_/srungs shig_/lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig_/ston brgya mthong bar shog shig_/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod de gtor ma ri mthon po la gtang bar bya'o/_/des thams cad zhi zhing phyir 
[\[117b.4\]]bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/rma bya'i snying po rig pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so//[ {D561}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA pra ti sa rA bid+yArAdz+nyI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[117b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i zom na/_khang pa brtsegs pa rdo rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sa'i gnas/_rdo rje chen po'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par 
[\[117b.6\]]brgyan pa/_rdo rje chen po'i rdzing gi rin po che dang /_pad+ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/_sa phyogs rdo rje chen po'i bye ma bdal ba/_rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs pa/_'khor gyi khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[117b.7\]]stong gis rnam par mdzes pa/_chos bstan pa dang /_cho 'phrul can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/_chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba na/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/_mthu chen po thob pa/_rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_
[\[118a.2\]]cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pa/_sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /_spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos ston pa sna tshogs snyan cing rgya che la zab cing yangs pa dang /_spobs pa dang /_cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[118a.3\]]du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang /_gzungs dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_dbang po dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_sa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[118a.4\]]dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_byams pa'i stobs dang bden pa dang /_yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[118a.5\]]chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang /_rdo rje'i lus dang /_rdo rje'i blo gros dang /_lag na rdo rje dang /_rdo rje 'dus pa dang /_rdo rje mthu bo che dang /_rdo rje rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_rdo rje brtsegs pa dang /_rdo rje phung po dang /_rdo rje bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 
[\[118a.6\]]tog dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang /_nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba/_yongs su chad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par 
[\[118a.7\]]grol ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang /_cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pa/_lta ba chags pa med pa/_thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba thob pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon nges par bsregs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung dang /_
[\[118b.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /_de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang /_lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med pa/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag 
[\[118b.3\]]dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha'i bu rab 'thab bral g.yog 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang /_yongs su dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[118b.4\]]lha'i bu thams cad kyi 'khor can dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang /_stobs can dang /_rab sim dang /_sgra gcan dang /_rnam par snang byed dang /_de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshad med/_grangs med/_dpag tu med pa rnams dang /_
[\[118b.5\]]klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_dung skyong dang /_stobs kyi rgyu dang /_pad+ma dang /_pad+ma chen po dang /_de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang /_mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang /_dri za'i 
[\[118b.6\]]rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dri za'i rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang /_rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po don thams cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang /_gnod sbyin gyi 
[\[118b.7\]]rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_nor bu bzang dang /_gang ba bzang dang /_lngas rtsen gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang /_'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i g.yog du ma can dang /_'jig rten gyi ma bdun dang /_srin mo chen mo bdun dang /_drang srong gi mchog chen po bdun dang /_
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]bar snang la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar dang /_gza' thams cad kyi lha rnams dang /_phyogs kyi lha rnams dang /_phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnams dang /_sa'i lha dang /_dbyangs can dang /_'byung po rnams dang /_bgegs rnams dang /_log 'dren rnams dang /_
[\[119a.2\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang /_'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang /_ri'i rgyal po thams cad dang /_'jig rten skyong ba chu lha g.yog rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi bzad dang /_lag na be con dang /_bden bral dang /_me'i 
[\[119a.3\]]lha dang /_rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang /_dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa g.yog bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma can dang /_sred med kyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa dang /_byin pa po dang /_phreng ba can dang /_zla ba can dang /_lcags can dang /_tshogs kyi bdag po chen po 
[\[119a.4\]]dang /_sprin ta la la dang /_log 'dren gyi dbang po bgegs log 'dren gyi dbang po g.yog du ma can dang /_shing gseb kyi lha drug cu dang /_sring mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang /_rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud dang /_rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /_rdo rje'i sde dang /_lag bzang 
[\[119a.5\]]dang /_gtsug gis 'gro rdo rje'i ris kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang /_de las gzhan pa sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye 
[\[119a.6\]]chen po dang /_'byung po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_grib gnon dang /_smyo byed dang /_brjed byed dang /_skem byed dang /_sgrub pa dang /_sbrul 'dzin bcas pa dang /_gnon po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang /_lha'i bu nyi ma dang /_lha'i bu zla ba dang /_nub 
[\[119a.7\]]ka'i lha dang /_nang bar gyi lha dang /_dus kyi lha thams cad dang /_sa'i lha dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das des chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni shin tu yongs su mthar phyin/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]rdzogs/_thams cad mkhyen pa ni shin tu yongs su bzung /_byang chub chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa ni brnyes/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku ni rab tu 'bar/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par spras/_
[\[119b.2\]]dbu'i gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong /_bdud kyi las thams cad la ni mkhas/_sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa ni shes/_spyan rnam pa lnga ni mnga'/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/_
[\[119b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/_bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/_grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pas ni 'phags/_khyu mchog dang /_seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs/_ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/_bskal pa bye ba 
[\[119b.4\]]khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_thabs dang /_stobs dang /_smon lam dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bya dka' ba'i spyod pa 
[\[119b.5\]]las ni phyir ma log_/sku ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan te/_rab tu mdzes shing rdo rje rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po rdo rje rin po che dang /_mu tig dang /_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sgra 'byung ba/_
[\[119b.6\]]rtsa ba'i drung na rdo rje rin po che'i stegs bu du ma shin tu brtan par gnas pa/_rdo rje rin po che'i chu srin du ma'i kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bres pa'i phang bshams pa/_rin po che du ma pad+ma'i snying po la chags pa rin po che ke ke ru dang /_ke ke ru chen po dang /_an da rnyil dang /_an da 
[\[119b.7\]]rnyil chen po dang /_dun las kyi 'od zer chen po 'tsher bas snang bar byas te kun nas mdzes pa/_gdugs rtsa ba dang bcas pa/_rdo rje rin po che'i shar bu du mas rnam par brgyan pa/_bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas rnam par brgyan pa/_bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas kun nas 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]bskyabs pa/_dpag bsam gyi shing du mas rgyas par mdzes par byas pa/_rdo rje rin po che'i khri ri rab tsam la bzhugs te/_gser gyi ri bo'i rgyal po ltar dpal ni rab tu 'bar/_sa phyogs ni nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par brgyan/_
[\[120a.2\]]zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad la sdug par ni snang /_dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu rgyas shing chos ston te/_tshangs par spyod pa/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_
[\[120a.3\]]ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba/_yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba bkye ste/_'od zer gyi dra 
[\[120a.4\]]ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par byas par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag seng ge'i khri bkod pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang na nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[120a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu chos ston pa'i 
[\[120a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des khyab par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor phal po che la bka' stsal pa/_sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/_/nyes par byas dang gnod pa kun/_/rab 'joms so 
[\[120a.7\]]sor 'brang ba yi/_/gzungs 'di rab tu bshad par bya/_/'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang /_/sdig pa kun ni zad par 'gyur/_/sems can kun la bde ba sbyin/_/nad do cog las grol bar byed/_/sems can kun la snying brtse bas/_/lus can ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams/_/
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]de dag thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir/_/'jig rten dag gi mgon pos gsungs/_/'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni/_/lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug_/de bzhin lcang lo can dang ni/_/srin po'i gnas kyi sar yang 'gro/_/'byung po klu dang sha za rnams/_/mi bzad 
[\[120b.2\]]'jigs pa'i g.yul 'gyed par/_/'byung po tshogs rnams thams cad dang /_/dgra bo cog gis mi tshugs so/_/ming tsam bzung ste brjod byas kyang /_/skem byed smyo byed brjed byed dang /_/mkha' 'gro ma dang sha za dang /_/gdon rnams rab tu brlag par 'gyur/_/
[\[120b.3\]]so sor 'brang ba'i gzi brjid kyis/_/gzi chen mdangs rnams za ba dang /_/mi yi skye dgu rnams 'tshe ba/_/de dag thams cad rengs byed 'gyur/_/byad stems mi bzad gang yin dang /_/pha rol dmag tshogs phung bar byed/_/sngags kyi las kyis gnod mi 
[\[120b.4\]]'gyur/_/rtsa ba'i las las rnam par grol/_/dug dang dug sbyar mes mi tshugs/_/mtshon dang chus kyang tshugs mi 'gyur/_/lce 'bab glog gis mi tshugs te/_/dus kyi rlung gis gnod mi 'gyur/_/rig pa'i rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/_/dgra kun rab tu 
[\[120b.5\]]'joms par 'gyur/_/de yis don rnams thams cad 'grub/_/rtag tu rgyal ba thob par 'gyur/_/gang gis rtag tu mgul pa'am/_/lag par rig pa btags na ni/_/de yi dgos pa yod do cog_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[120b.6\]]chen po dang /_/sangs rgyas rnams dang rang 'dren dang /_/de bzhin klu yi rgyal po dang /_/lha dbang rnams ni rtag tu bsrung /_/so sor 'brang ba'i gzungs 'dzin la/_/nyan thos sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul che/_/rtag tu srung ba byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[120b.7\]]lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang /_/de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams kyang /_/de la nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/srung bar byed de the tsom med/_/brgya byin lha dang bcas pa dang /_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen dang /_/dga' ba'i dbang po nag po che/_/smin drug bu dang tshogs kyi dbang /_/
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]ma mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang /_/de bzhin bdud ris gzhan rnams dang /_/drang srong gzi brjid che rnams dang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha rnams dang /_/de kun so sor 'brang ba yi/_/gzungs 'dzin de la srung bar byed/_/sangs rgyas bdag 
[\[121a.2\]]nyid che rnams dang /_/rig pa'i lha mo stobs chen dang /_/bdag gi ma dang khro gnyer dang /_/lha mo sgrol ma lcags kyu dang /_/rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang dkar/_/de bzhin dkar mo chen mo dang /_/nag mo che dang pho nya dang /_/de bzhin rdo rje pho nya gzhan/_/zhags pa bzang 
[\[121a.3\]]dang rdo rje zhags/_/lag na rdo rje stobs po che/_/rig pa lha mo rdo rje phreng /_/bdud rtsi thab sbyor byed pa dang /_/gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo che/_/rna ba nag mo stobs chen mo/_/dpal yon ldan pa skal chen dang /_/rna cha gdub kor pad+ma 'dra/_/me tog so can nor 
[\[121a.4\]]bu gtsug_/skra mdog mdzes dang kham pa mo/_/lha mo gzi brjid chen mo dang /_/dpal yon ldan pa glog phreng can/_/srin mo ral pa gcig pa dang /_/sangs rgyas bsrungs zhes bya ba dang /_/skal ba chen po mi thod can/_/lang ka'i bdag po dpal yon can/_/
[\[121a.5\]]gzhan yang lha mo mang po rnams/_/sems can rjes su 'dzin byed dag_/rig pa gang gi lag na gnas/_/de la srung ba byed par 'gyur/_/'phrog ma dang ni lngas rtsen dang /_/dung can dang ni so brtsegs ma/_/dpal gyi lha mo dbyangs can yang /_/de yi rjes 'gro 
[\[121a.6\]]rtag tu bsrung /_/so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di/_/bud med gang zhig rtag 'chang na/_/de yi thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/rtag par mngal na bu pho chags/_/mngal rnams na yang bde bar skye/_/sbrum ma dag kyang bde bar 'gyur/_/nad dang sdig pa thams cad kyang /_/
[\[121a.7\]]'jig par 'gyur te the tsom med/_/bsod nams ldan zhing stobs dang ldan/_/nor dang 'bru yang rtag tu 'phel/_/tshig kyang gzung du 'os pa dang /_/mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba yin/_/bud med dang ni skyes pa'ang rung /_/gtsang ma gang zhig 'chang bsrel na/_/de ni sems 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]can thams cad dag_/thar bar bya phyir brtson par 'gyur/_/rtag tu bde bar 'gyur ba yin/_/nad do cog kyang rnam par spangs/_/slas dang skye bo mang bcas pa'i/_/rgyal po'ang de yi dbang du 'gyur/_/phun sum tshogs pa rtag tu 'bar/_/bsod nams phung po rnam par 
[\[121b.2\]]'phel/_/de yi bsam pa thams cad 'grub/_/dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa yin/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi bka' bzhin du/_/de ni kun tu dam tshig shes/_/rmi lam ngan pa rmi mi 'gyur/_/sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa'i mchog_/sdig pa rnams dang de bzhin du/_/
[\[121b.3\]]dgra yang rab tu phung bar byed/_/gza' kun rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/_/ye shes dbang phyug chen pos gsungs/_/'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed/_/de phyir rtag tu bcang bar bya/_/'byung po'i tshogs rnams nga la nyon/_/da ni rab tu 'di brjod do/_/de bzhin 
[\[121b.4\]]gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM bi pu la bi pu la gar+b+he/_bi pu la bi ma le/_bi pu la gar+b+he/_bi ma le/_dza ya gar+b+he/_
[\[121b.5\]]badzra dz+wA lA gar+b+he/_ga ti ga ha ne/_ga ga na bi sho d+ha ne/_sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ne/_oM gu Na pa ti/_ga ga na/_pi tsA ri Ni/_ga ga ri Ni/_gi gi gi ri/_gi ri Ni gi ri Ni/_ga ma ri/_ga ma ri/_ga ha ga ha/_garga ri garga ri/_ga ga ri/_ga ga ri/_gaM b+ha ri/_gaM b+ha ri/_ga b+hi ga b+hi/_
[\[121b.6\]]ga hi ga hi/_ga ma ni/_ga ma ni/_ga ri ga ri/_gu b+ha gu b+ha/_gu ha gu ha/_gu ru gu ru gu ru Ni/_tsa le gu ha Ni/_gu ha Ni/_gu ru Ni/_tsu lu tsu lu/_tsa le tsa le/_mu tse le mu tse le/_dza ye bi dza ye/_sarba b+ha ya bi ga te/_satwa sarba gar+b+ha saM rak+Sha Ni/_si ri si ri/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_mi ri 
[\[121b.7\]]mi ri/_mi ri mi ri/_gi ri gi ri/_g+hi ri g+hi ri/_g+hi ri g+hi ri/_sa man+ta par+Sha Ni/_bcom ldan 'das ma sems can 'dren ma/_kun nas 'dren ma/_dgra thams cad 'joms par mdzad ma/_bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad dang /_

[\[122a.1\]]nad thams cad las bsrung du gsol/_bsrung du gsol/_tsi ri tsi ri/_bi ri bi ri/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_bi ga ta/_A ba ra Ne/_bi sho d+ha ne/_bi bi d+ha/_A pa ra Na/_bi nA sha ni/_mu ri mu ri/_mu tsi mu tsi/_mu li mu li/_tsi li tsi li/_ki li ki li/_mi li mi li/_ka ma le/_

[\[122a.4\]]cad las thar bar mdzad du gsol/_tsaN+De tsaN+De/_tsaN+De tsaN+De/_tsaN+De Ni/_tsaN+De Ni/_be ga ba ti/_sarba duSh+Ta ni bA ra Ni/_bi dza ya/_bA hi ni/_hu ru hu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_tu ru tu ru/_A yuHpA li ni/_su ra ba ra pra ma tha ni/_sarba de ba ga Na pU dzi te/_tsi ri tsi ri/_

[\[122b.1\]]glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs ma/_bdag mi'i gnod pa las bsgral du gsol/_la hu la hu/_hu lu hu lu/_hu du hu du/_tu ru tu ru/_ki Ni ki Ni/_k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/_hu Ni hu Ni/_sarba gra ha b+ha k+Sha Ni/_piM ga li/_piM ga li/_mu tsu mu tsu/_tsu mu tsu mu/_su bi tsa re/_

[\[123a.1\]]gshegs pa'i snying po rnam par dag pa bcom ldan 'das ma bzhugs su gsol/_bzhugs su gsol/_dam tshig bskyang du gsol/_'jigs pa mi bzad pa chen po brgyad las bdag la gzigs su gsol/_sa ra sa ra/_pra sa ra pra sa ra/_sarba 
[\[123a.2\]]A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni/_sa man+ta A ka ra maN+Da la bi shud d+he/_bi ga te bi ga ti/_bi ga ta ma le/_sarba ma la bi sho d+ha ni/_k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/_sarba pA pa bi shud d+he/_ma la bi ga ti/_dza ya ba ti/_te dzo te dzo ba ti/_badzra badzra ba ti swA hA/_'jig rten gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa la

[\[123b.2\]]swA hA/_da ha da ha sarba duSh+TA nAM swA hA/_pa tsa pa tsa sarba pra t+yar+thi kA pra t+ye mi hrA nAM swA hA/_gang dag bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa de dag thams cad kyi lus dz+wa la ya sarba duSh+TaM tsi trA nAM swA hA/_'bar ba la swA hA/_rab tu 'bar ba la swA hA/_rdo rje 'bar ba la swA hA/_me lce 'bar ba la swA hA/_

[\[123b.5\]]b+huHswA hA/_b+hu baHswA hA/_b+hur b+hU baHswA hA/_tsi Ti tsi tsi Ti swA hA/_bi Ti ba Ti swA hA/_d+hA ra Ni swA hA/_d+hA ra Ni swA hA/_ag+ni swA hA/_te dzo ba yu swA hA/_tsi li tsi li swA hA/_mi li mi li swA hA/_si li si li swA hA/_bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya swA hA/_sid+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya swA hA/_maN+Da la ban d+he swA hA/_sI mA ban 
[\[123b.6\]]d+he swA hA/_d+ha ra Ni b+han d+he swA hA/_sarba sha truM NAM b+hany+dza ya swA hA/_dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya swA hA/_stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya swA hA/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da swA hA/_b+hin+da b+hin+da swA hA/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza swA hA/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA/_mo ha ya mo ha ya swA hA/_ma Ni bi shud d+he swA hA/_sUr+ye swA hA/_sUr+ya bi shud d+he swA hA/_sho d+ha ni swA hA/_
[\[123b.7\]]bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/_tsaN+De tsaN+De pa ri pU ra Na tsa swA hA/_gra he b+h+yaHswA hA/_nak+Sha tre b+h+yaHswA hA/_shi bi b+h+yaHswA hA/_shAn+ti b+h+yaHswA hA/_puSh+Ti b+h+yaHswA hA/_swa sti ya ne b+h+yaHswA hA/_gar+b+ha d+ha re swA hA/_shi baM ka ri swA hA/_shaM ka ri swA hA/_shAn+tiM ka ri swA hA/_puSh+TiM ka ri swA hA/_ba la bar+d+ha ni swA hA/_ba la bar+d+hi ni ka ri 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]swA hA/_shrI ka ri swA hA/_shrI bar+d+hi ni swA hA/_shrI dz+wA li ni swA hA/_mu tsi swA hA/_na mu tsi swA hA/_ma ru tsi swA hA/_be ga ba ti swA hA/_oM bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mchog dri ma dang bral ba/_bdag gi sdig pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad du 
[\[124a.2\]]gsol/_bdag bde legs su gyur cig_/oM mu ni mu ni/_bi mu ni bi mu ni/_d+ha ri tsa la tsa la ni/_b+ha ga ba ti/_b+ha ya bi ga te/_b+ha ya ha ri Ni/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_bud d+hi li bud d+hi li/_tsum+bu li tsum+bu li swA hA/_sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya dzuSh+Te swA hA/_oM mu ni 
[\[124a.3\]]mu ni mu ni ba re/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i dbang bskur ba/_rdo rje'i go cha chen po'i phyag rgyas btab pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/_a d+hiSh+ThA na/_a d+hi ti badzre swA hA/_bram ze chen po rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang 
[\[124a.4\]]ba chen mo/_kun nas me lce'i phreng ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang /_snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mos thos ma thag tu sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/bram ze chen po rig pa 
[\[124a.5\]]'di gang gi snying la gnas par gyur pa de'i lus rdo rjer rig par bya'o/_/de'i lus la mes mi tshugs so/_/ci mngon zhe na/_gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas na/_gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po mngal du zhugs pa de'i tshe shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma bdag nyid me'i nang 
[\[124a.6\]]du mchongs pa dang /_der pad+ma dag byung ste/_de'i tshe gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po mngal na gnas bzhin du rig pa 'di yid la byas so/_/rig pa 'di rjes su dran pa tsam gyis me de skad cig de nyid la bsil bar gyur to/_/de nas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma'i lus la mes ma reg go_/
[\[124a.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rig pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/bram ze chen po rgyu des na mes mi tshig go/_/dug gis kyang srog dang 'bral bar mi nus so/_/de ci lta zhe na/_bram ze chen po gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po bde bar pha rol tu 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]'gro ba zhes bya ba na/_tshong dpon mdzod stobs can gyi bu rig pa smra bar gyur to/_/de'i rig pa'i stobs des klu'i rgyal po 'jog po bkug go/_/bkug nas kyang bag med pa'i dbang gis ma bcings pas des khros nas de la bzung ba dang /_de tshor ba mi bzad pa myong nas ji 
[\[124b.2\]]ltar yang bdag ni srog dang bral lo snyam du shes so/_/de nas smra ba can mang po bos kyang 'ga' tsam gyis kyang dug las gso bar ma nus so/_/de nas grong khyer chen po bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba na dge bsnyen ma dri ma med par dag pa zhes bya ba snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhig 
[\[124b.3\]]gnas pa des rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di kha ton du shes so/_/de de'i gnas su song ste phyin pa dang /_rig pa chen mo 'di brjod do/_/des de la lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis de dug med par byas shing de dran pa rnyed par byas te/_sdug bsngal chen po de las yongs su 
[\[124b.4\]]thar bar byas nas rig pa chen mo'i snying po 'di cho ga ci ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu de'i snying la gnas par byas so/_/bram ze chen po gzhan yang ci ltar yongs su shes zhe na/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba'i grangs su chud pa zhig grong khyer chen po ba rA rA Na sI 
[\[124b.5\]]na sngon yongs su rgyu ba'i tshe/_de'i shar phyogs kyi mtshams kyi stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/_grong khyer chen po ba rA rA Na sI kun nas bskor te/_gzhom par bshams so/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin de 
[\[124b.6\]]la blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis grong khyer 'phrog la thug na thabs gang gis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom par bgyi/_bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas pa dang rgyal pos khyed 'tsher 'grib chung ngur gyis shig_/rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang 
[\[124b.7\]]ba chen mo zhes bya ba yod de/_ngas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di pham par bya'o/_/thal ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang /_blon po rnams kyis mgo btud de rgyal po chen po sngon bdag cag gis nam yang ma thos pa 'di ci zhig lags zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]ngas de mngon sum du bya'o zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin spos chu sna tshogs kyis mgo bkrus te/_gos gtsang ma bgos nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di cho ga bzhin du bris te/_mgo'i gtsug gi skra'i nang du bzhag nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen 
[\[125a.2\]]mo 'di nyid kyis go cha byas te/_g.yul gyi nang du zhugs pa dang /_gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad pham par byas te/_ji srid skyabs su dong ba de srid du 'dis tshar bcad nas stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de gcig pu btang ngo /_/bram ze 
[\[125a.3\]]chen po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang /_phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa/_mthu chen po 'di mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/_mngon sum du gyur to snyam du gzung bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs pa 
[\[125a.4\]]nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sems can tshe thung ba rnams dang /_bsod nams chung ba rnams dang /_longs spyod chung ba rnams la phan par 'gyur bar blta'o/_/bram ze chen po gang la la zhig rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di cho ga bzhin du bris 
[\[125a.5\]]te lag pa'am/_mgul du btags na de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par rig par bya'o/_/de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur rig par bya'o/_/rdo rje'i lus yin par rig par bya'o/_/de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel 
[\[125a.6\]]gyi snying po can yin par rig par bya'o/_/de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan yin par rig par bya'o/_/de rdo rje chen po'i lus su rig par bya'o/_/de 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i lus dang ldan par rig par bya'o/_/de mi shigs pa'i go cha can du rig par bya'o/_/de dgra 
[\[125a.7\]]thams cad rab tu 'joms par rig par bya'o/_/de sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad 'joms par rig par bya'o/_/de sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba rnams sbyong bar rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sngon yongs su shes pa yin te/_bram ze chen po phyogs gzhan zhig na dge 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]slong ma dad pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bslab pa 'dral ba/_ma byin par len pa/_bza' ba 'du ba'i sgo 'phrog pa/_dge 'dun gyi dang /_phyogs bzhi dang /_tshogs kyi rdzas su gyur pa de thams cad gang dag gir byin gyis brlabs te za ba zhig dus gzhan zhig na 
[\[125b.2\]]nad tshabs chen pos btab pa dang /_sdug bsngal chen po'i tshor ba myong ngo /_/nyon mongs te skyabs med dpung gnyen med nas ku co'i sgra chen po 'byin to/_/bram ze chen po de nas phyogs de na dge bsnyen zhig gnas pa des sgra de thos so/_/thos nas kyang dge slong de ga 
[\[125b.3\]]la ba der song ste phyin nas rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di bris te/_dge slong de'i mgul du btags so/_/rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo dge slong de'i mgul du btags ma thag tu tshor ba thams cad ni rab tu zhi/_nad thams cad las ni yongs su thar 
[\[125b.4\]]te/_sos par gyur nas de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang /_dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag ste 'chi ba'i dus byas so/_/lus de bor ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so/_/de'i ro de yang dge slong dag gi sgang bu zhig la bzhag go/_/rig pa chen mo 
[\[125b.5\]]so sor 'brang ba chen mo de yang de'i mgul du btags pa bzhin du gnas so/_/dge slong de mnar med pa der skyes ma thag tu sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rab tu zhi nas sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad bde 
[\[125b.6\]]ba thams cad kyis tshim par gyur to/_/mtshams med pa'i me'i phung po chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zhi bar gyur to/_/de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag thams cad ngo mtshar skyes nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la nges pa'i tshig 'di dag rgyas par brjod do/_/
[\[125b.7\]]sems can las las skyes pa yi/_/sdug bsngal mi bzad rab tu zhi/_/shin tu ngo mtshar 'di ni lha/_/sems dmyal nyam nga rnams na gda'/_/lus can lus la rtag gnas pa'i/_/me ma mur de rab tu zhi/_/sog le rnams kyis gshegs ma mchis/_/spu gri'i sos 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]yang gcod mi bgyid/_/lcags sdong shal ma ri yang chag_/lcags zangs thams cad rab tu zhi/_/ral gri lo ma can nags na/_/las skyes lo ma gnod mi 'gyur/_/chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje khyod/_/mi rnams la ni chos kyi ston/_/rgyu 'di mi chung 
[\[126a.2\]]bdag cag la/_/khyod kyis brjod par mdzad pa'i rigs/_/de nas chos kyi bdag nyid can/_/chos nges chos kyi rgyal po des/_/snying rje'i bsam pa nyams rnams kyi/_/'di 'dra'i tshig de thos gyur nas/_/myur du 'di ni ci yin smros/_/'di ni ci 'dra yang smros shig_/
[\[126a.3\]]de nas mi bzad gshin rje'i mi/_/gnod pa'i rgyun can de dag gis/_/chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la/_/'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so/_/mnar med rab tu nyam nga bar/_/sems can chen po 'di skyes lha/_/gang gi ming ni mnar med pa/_/des na de ni nyam ngar brjod/_/
[\[126a.4\]]gang gis sems can bde bgyis pa/_/rnam pa sna tshogs las la gzigs/_/'di ni kun tu bde gyur nas/_/slar yang lha yi gnas su mchis/_/chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes kyang /_/mthong nas ngo mtshar smras pa ni/_/'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba ste/_/'di ni tshe rabs 
[\[126a.5\]]snga lus tshe/_/ci ltar sku gdung brgya mang pos/_/ston pa'i mchod rten mdzes pa ltar/_/so sor 'brang ba mgul btags pas/_/de yi lus ni de bzhin mdzes/_/de nas sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma gnod sbyin de dag gis chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la 'di skad ces 
[\[126a.6\]]smras so/_/lha ci ltar na 'di so sor 'brang ba zhes bgyi/_chos kyi rgyal pos smras pa/_gang gi tshig rnams so sor dran/_/de ni ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/_/so sor 'brang ba bsgoms pa yi/_/shes rab can de bde 'gror 'gro/_/sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma khyed/_/
[\[126a.7\]]rab tu rgyas dang ldan par dong /_/der ni sgang bu mthon po la/_/lha rnams kyis ni bskor ba ltos/_/de mthong sems can thams cad la/_/byams pa'i sems su 'gyur bar gyis/_/de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag de nyid kyi nub mo rgyas pa dang ldan par dong ngo /_/de tshe der ni de dag gis/_/
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]rgyal po'i pho brang nye ba na/_/sgang bu de yi khor yug na/_/'bar ba gcig gis gang bar mthong /_/mi ro zhig gi mgul pa na/_so sor 'brang ba btags pa'ang mthong /_/lha dang klu dang dri za dang /_/gnod sbyin srin po mi 'am cis/_/kun nas 'khor bar 
[\[126b.2\]]bskor nas ni/_/bla na med pa'i mchod pa byed/_/de la gnod sbyin de dag gis/_/so sor 'brang ba'i sgang zhes btags/_/de nas gnod sbyin de dag gis chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i nges pa de rtogs te slar log nas lha khyod kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin no zhes rgyas par 
[\[126b.3\]]brjod do/_/de skad ces smras ma thag tu tshig de smras pa'i tha ma la sems can chen po de sems can dmyal ba'i lus de bor nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/rgyu des na sngon so sor 'brang ba'i lha'i bu zhes bya'o/_/bram ze chen po des na sngon chad yongs su 
[\[126b.4\]]shes so/_/de'i phyir so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di gdon mi za bar gzung bar bya'o/_/yi ger bri bar bya/_bklag par bya'o/_/cho ga bzhin du rtag tu lus la btags nas bcang bar bya ste/_de rtag tu sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_
[\[126b.5\]]ngan 'gro'i 'jigs skrag pa thams cad las rgal bar 'gyur ro/_/glog gis 'gyel bar byed mi nus so/_/glog gis ci ltar mi nus zhe na/_bram ze chen po sngon yongs su shes te/_grong khyer chen po'i mchog shing kun rdzib na/_tshong dpon chen po dri med dung zhes bya ba nor mang 
[\[126b.6\]]ba/_gser shin tu 'byor pa/_mdzod dang /_bang ba kun tu gang zhing phun sum tshogs pa zhig gnas te/_ded dpon zhes bya bar grags so/_/de nas ded dpon chen po des gru bo che de rnyed nas/_rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang /_nya mid rnams kyis de'i gru de bzung nas/_
[\[126b.7\]]rnam par gzhig par 'dod pa'i klu rnams kyang 'khrugs te/_'brug sgra chen po sgrog go/_/glog dang skar mda' yang gtong ngo /_/rdo rje'i lce 'bebs par yang bshams so/_/de nas tshong pa de dag sdug bsngal chen pos sems non to/_/klu 'khrugs pa chen po de dang /_glog 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]dang skar mda' dang /_rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa dang /_nya mid de dag gis kyang gru bo che bzung bar mthong nas ku co'i sgra chen po bton te/_de dag lha khyad par can rnams la gsol ba btab kyang 'ga' tsam yang de dag gi dpung gnyen du ma gyur to/_/de nas de dag 
[\[127a.2\]]tshong dpon sems rab tu brtan pa'i gan du song nas/_de dag gis snying rje rje skad du tshig 'di skad smras so/_/sems can chen po khyod kyis bdag cag bskyab cing 'jigs pa chen po las thar bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas ded dpon chen po sems brtan pa blo gros chen po des 
[\[127a.3\]]tshong pa 'khrugs par gyur pa rnams la tshig 'di skad smras so/_/ma 'jigs ma 'jigs tshong pa rnams/_/khyed cag brtan par dengs shig dang /_/khyed rnams sdug bsngal chen po yi/_/rgya mtsho che las ngas bsgral lo/_/de nas yid ni brtan gyur nas/_/tshong pa 
[\[127a.4\]]rnams kyis tshig 'di smras/_/sems can chen po 'di ci lags/_/bgegs bral myur du bka' stsol cig_/blo gros chen po khyod kyi mthus/_/bdag cag ji srid 'tsho ba'i tshe/_/ye shes che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs/_/slad na khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi/_/de nas 'gron 
[\[127a.5\]]mang bdag po yis/_/de dag la ni tshig 'di brjod/_/nga la so sor 'brang ba yi/_/rig pa chen por grags pa yod/_/gnod byed thams cad sel bar byed/_/stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa/_/des ni rab tu sdug bsngal ba'i/_/'jigs pa che las ngas bsgral 
[\[127a.6\]]lo/_/de nas ded dpon chen po de'i tshe rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa dang /_rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags ma thag tu nya mid de dag thams cad kyis gru bo che de me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong 
[\[127a.7\]]ngo /_/de nas klu de dag byams pa'i yid kyis de dag gi drung du lhags nas mchod pa bya bar bshams so/_/nya mid de dag kyang rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di nyid kyi mthus tshig nas byer te zhi bar gyur to/_/'gron po phal po che de dag kyang klu chen po de dag gis rin po che'i 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]gling chen por phyin par byas so/_/de ltar na ye shes dang ldan pa rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/_bram ze chen po rgyu des na 'di rig pa chen mo zhes grags so/_/'di ni nges par rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags 
[\[127b.2\]]te bcang bar bya'o/_/rlung dang /_grang ba dang /_dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang /_glog dang /_lce 'bab pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin gyi 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa las yongs su thar bar byed do/_/sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_sha sbrang dang /_
[\[127b.3\]]byi ba dang /_srog chags kyi rigs gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs lo tog ma rung bar byed pa thams cad mthu med cing rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dang /_gcan gzan gnod par sems pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_
[\[127b.4\]]lo ma dang /_nags tshal dang /_sman dang /_lo tog la sogs pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur te/_rab tu bro zhing zhim pa dang 'jam par 'gyur ro/_/legs par yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/_/ha cang char che ba dang /_char dkon pa'i nyes pa rnams yongs su mi 'byung ngo /_/
[\[127b.5\]]char dus su 'bab cing /_dus ma yin par mi 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/yul de'i klu chen po gang yin pa de dag kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs so/_/yul gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba 'di spyod pa'i yul der sems can de dag gis shes 
[\[127b.6\]]par bya ste/_spos sna tshogs dang /_bdug pa sna tshogs dang /_me tog sna tshogs kyis mchod cing bsti stang byas la/_tshon sna tshogs kyis dkris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas glu dbyangs dang /_rol mo sil snyan byas te/_bskor ba byas nas lha rnams dang /_brgya 
[\[127b.7\]]byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pas sems can chen po de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/_re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga ci lta ba bzhin du de lta de lta bur 'grub ste/_bu pho 'dod na'ang khye'ur 'grub/_/mngal na 'dzin pa dam par 'gyur/_/mngal 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]na bde bar skye ba dang /_/mngal nas bde bar btsas par 'gyur/_/mngal na dus bzhin skye ba dang /_/dus bzhin rab tu btsas par 'gyur/_/cis mngon zhe na/_bram ze chen po snga ma bzhin du de nyon cig_/yul ma ga d+hA 'di nyid na/_rgyal po lag brkyang 
[\[128a.2\]]zhes bya ba de bu med par gyur to/_/ci'i phyir lag brkyang zhes bya zhe na/_rgyal po de btsas ma thag tu lag pa brkyang nas ma'i nu zho la bzung ste/_nu zho ngoms ngoms su 'thungs so/_/nu ma de gnyis la reg ma thag tu gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to/_/dus kun tu nu zho 'phel bar 
[\[128a.3\]]gyur to/_/rgyu des na rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya bar btags par gyur to/_/gzhan yang gang gi tshe rgyal po'i gan du skye bo slong mo pa 'ongs pa de'i tshe rgyal po de lag pa g.yas pa bar snang la brkyang ba dang /_rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' de rgyu des sangs rgyas la mngon 
[\[128a.4\]]par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis lha'i rin po che khyad par du 'phags pa gser dang /_nor bu rnams kyis lag pa gang bar byed do/_/rgyal po des kyang skye bo slong mo pa lhags pa rnams la rab tu byin no/_/bsams pa tsam gyis slong mo pa thams cad la 'dod pa bzhin du bde ba 
[\[128a.5\]]phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byin no/_/bu pho 'dod pa'i phyir lha rnams la mchod pa dang /_bsti stang cher byas kyang bu pho ma rnyed nas de sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi mchod rten rnams kyi mdun du bsti stang bya bar brtsams te mchod pa dang /_bsti stang chen po byas so/_/
[\[128a.6\]]sbyin pa yang byin to/_/bsnyen gnas la yang nye bar gnas so/_/bsod nams chen po byas so/_/sbyin pa chen po de dag kyang mi zad par byin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bram ze chen po sngon byung ba yul ma ga d+hA 'di nyid na/_gyad yul zhes bya ba'i grong khyer ku sha'i tshong dus 
[\[128a.7\]]chen po'i mchog na bcom ldan 'das rin chen mang gi bstan pa la zhugs pa tshong dpon chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba chos la sems pa'i sems can chen po zhig gnas pa de sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar gzhag nas rig pa chen po so sor 'brang ba 'di nyid las 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]brtsams te chos ston to/_/de nas mi dbul po zhig gis chos de thos nas tshong dpon chen po de la tshig 'di skad ces bdag jo bo'i khab tu gla bgyi'o/_/chos kyang nyan to/_/gang gi tshe bdag gis cung zad rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag chos la mchod pa bgyid do/_/zhes smras nas/_
[\[128b.2\]]de'i khyim na las byed cing chos kyang nyan to/_/dus gzhan zhig na de la tshong dpon des di na ra cig byin pa dang /_des sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas rin po che snyim pas so sor 
[\[128b.3\]]'brang ba chen mo la phul nas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu chen po 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi dbul ba kun tu gcod par gyur cig ces smon lam de skad kyang btab bo/_/rgyu des na sbyin pa de yongs su mi zad par gyur to/_/de ltar bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba rnam pa mang po 
[\[128b.4\]]rnam pa du ma byas te/_lha rnams kyang mchod pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du mchod pa dang /_de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rmi ltas su bstan te/_'di skad du/_kye rgyal po chen po so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba kun nas me lce'i phreng ba rnam par dag pas 
[\[128b.5\]]rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang /_snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs chen mo rig pa'i rgyal mo cho ga las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du cho ga bzhin bris la btsun mo dam pa smyung ba byas la/_cho ga bzhin du lus la btags na khyod bu pho yod par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o/_/
[\[128b.6\]]de nas rgyal po de sad de mtshan mo zad nas rtsis dang /_yi ge'i 'bru dang /_rgyu skar dang /_gza' rnam par 'byed pa'i bram ze rnams bsogs nas cho ga las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyu skar gyi rgyal po rgyal gyi nyin par btsun mo dam pa lus shin tu legs par bkrus te/_smyung ba byas nas 
[\[128b.7\]]rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba 'di yang cho ga bzhin du bris te btsun mo dam pa'i mgul du btags so/_/sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten rnams la mchod pa chen po byas so/_/rin po che khyad par can du ma yang sems can rnams la sbyin pa byin no/_/de nas zla ba dgu lon pa dang 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]bu pho gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/bram ze chen po de ltar shes nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa/_'dod pa thams cad du 
[\[129a.2\]]'gro ba/_gzhan gyis mi thub pa so sor 'brang ba chen mo dkon mchog ces grags so/_/'di ni rtag tu brgya byin gyi gtsug gi nor bu yin no/_/gang gi tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams dang /_g.yul chen po 'gyed par 'dod pa de'i tshe 'di nyid kyis go cha byas nas spyi 
[\[129a.3\]]gtsug tu btags te/_lha ma yin thams cad pham par byas/_pha rol pham par byas nas dge ba dang /_bde bas bde bar lha'i grong khyer du 'jug ste/_lha ma yin thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa yin no/_/bram ze chen po de ltar na sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_
[\[129a.4\]]rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di 'chang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la bdud thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/'di gang gis lus la btags sam/_mgul du btags pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/de la byang 
[\[129a.5\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_mi dang /_rgyal po dang /_rgyal po'i blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag thams cad kyis kyang rtag par rgyun du phyag bya zhing mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[129a.6\]]dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen pos rjed cing mchod par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi dpung rab tu 'joms pas kyang de la sems can chen po zhes gsungs so/_/nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de la yams kyi nad dang /_
[\[129a.7\]]gnod pa thams cad dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can chen po de mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de la lha thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang sbed par byed par 'gyur ro/_/des gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]gsang sngags chen po'i snying po 'di dag bris te/_rtag par rgyun du lus la gdags shing bcang bar bya/_rtag par rgyun du yid la bya'o/_/kha ton du bya'o/_/bsam pa thag pa nas bsgom par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal ba dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan 
[\[129b.2\]]pa dang /_bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni gsang sngags kyi gzhi las thams cad byed pa dge ba rnams grub pa'o/_/tad+ya thA/_oM a mr-i te/_a mr-i ta 
[\[129b.3\]]ba re/_ba re ba re/_pra ba re bi shud d+he/_hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_oM a mr-i ta bi lo ki ni gar+b+he saM rak+Sha Ni/_A kar+Sha Ni hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po'o/_/oM bi ma le bi pu le/_dza ya ba re/_dza ya bA hi ni/_a mr-i te/_bi ra dze/_hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_
[\[129b.4\]]oM b+ha ra b+ha ra/_saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/_in+d+ri ya ba la bi sho d+ha ni/_ru ru tsa le hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o/_/oM ma Ni d+ha ri/_badzri Ni ma hA pra ti sa re hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_rab tu gsang ba'i snying po'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa 
[\[129b.5\]]thams cad thabs cig tu 'dus nas sgra dbyangs gcig tu gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so/_/gsang sngags 'di dag ni rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i snying po dang go cha'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o/_/
[\[129b.6\]]'di thos par yang rab tu dka' na yi ger bri ba dang /_tshig tu 'don pa dang /_klog pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_gzhan la yang ston pa lta ci smos te/_de ni sangs rgyas la bya ba byas par rig par bya'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags so/_/rjes 
[\[129b.7\]]su yi rang ngo /_/lung bstan to/_/so sor 'brang ba chen mo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di mchog tu dkon pa'o/_/so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di'i ming thos par yang shin tu dka' ste/_gzungs chen mo 'di ni sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/_stobs che ba/_pha rol 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]gnod pa/_gzi brjid che ba/_'od che ba/_yon tan brjod par che ba/_mthu che ba/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa/_pha rol gyi sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dug dang /_
[\[130a.2\]]byad dang /_g.yengs byed kyi sbyor ba dang /_gnod par bya ba dang /_drag shul du spyod pa gnod pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'phags pa'i tshogs thams cad la mchod pa dam pa byed par mngon 
[\[130a.3\]]par dga' ba rnams la yongs su skyong bar byed pa/_theg pa chen po 'dzin pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_tshig tu 'don pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_'chang bar mngon par brtson pa rnams la yongs su skyong ba'o/_/bram ze chen po so sor 
[\[130a.4\]]'brang ba chen mo rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/_gang du yang thogs pa med do/_/ston pa dgra las rgyal ba nga ci lta ba bzhin du thams cad du yang mchod pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/cis mngon zhe na/_rig pa 
[\[130a.5\]]chen mo bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni sngon yongs su shes te/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya cher rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal nor bu dang /_gser dang /_rin po 
[\[130a.6\]]che 'bar ba'i 'od zer snang ba mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang po mngon par sangs rgyas nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der gshegs te/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bzhed pa de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das de la bdud g.yog 
[\[130a.7\]]dang bcas pa bdud bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor ba gzugs sna tshogs mi sdug pa/_'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/_sgra mi snyan pa/_bdud kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul par byin gyis rlob pa/_mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char 'beb pa/_mngon 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]par sprul nas lhags te/_phyogs bzhi nas bskor nas bar chad bya bar brtsams pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das rgya cher rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal nor bu dang /_gser dang /_rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od zer snang ba mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po yud tsam zhig cang mi gsung bar 
[\[130b.2\]]bzhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di yid kyis lan bdun brjod do/_/rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di brjod ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la bdud sdig can de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas skyes bu go cha gyon 
[\[130b.3\]]pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ral gri dang /_dgra sta dang /_zhags pa dang /_tho ba dang /_rtse gsum pa 'bar ba lag na thogs pa sha stag tshig 'di skad du gang dag bcom ldan 'das la gnod par byed pa/_bdud gnod sems can rnams zung shig zung shig_/chings 
[\[130b.4\]]shig chings shig_/gnod par sems pa thams cad rab tu choms shig_/gnod sems can dang /_gza' dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren thams cad kyi srog phye mar gyis shig_/ces 'dzer cing 'thon pa mthong ngo /_/de nas bdud de dag thams cad byams pa'i 
[\[130b.5\]]ral gris mngon par btul nas/_la las ni bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ba nas/_la las ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i bar du'o/_/de la mthu che ba gzhan dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu ga nas 'thon pa'i skyes bu chen po de dag 
[\[130b.6\]]mthong nas/_grong khyer de nyid du spa gong bar gyur/_rdzu 'phrul yongs su nyams shing spobs pa dang /_stobs dang rtsal med par gyur cing /_mda' gzhu dag kyang chag nas byer ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bgegs dang /_log 'dren dang /_bdud sdig can 
[\[130b.7\]]thams cad rab tu bcom nas sangs rgyas gzhan dag ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor to/_/brgal to pha rol tu rab tu gshegs so/_/bram ze chen po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo stobs kyi drag shul che ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]dran pa tsam gyis sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams dang /_gzhan gnod sems can rnams kyang sdug bsngal ba dang /_'jigs skrag pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar byed do/_/bram ze chen po de lta bas na rtag par rjes su dran pa'i yid la byed pas 
[\[131a.2\]]yid la bya'o/_/yi ger bris te rtag tu lus la gdags shing bcang bar bya'o/_/cis mngon zhe na/_snga ma bzhin du nyon cig rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi yul na grong khyer chen po 'phags rgyal du mi zhig la nyes pa byung nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis gshed ma'i mi rnams la 
[\[131a.3\]]khyed kyis mi 'di sod cig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas gshed ma'i mi de dag gis rgyal pos bsgo ba bzhin du mi de khrid de ri sul zhig tu phyin nas/_ral gri shubs nas phyung ste bsad par bshams pa dang /_de'i tshe mi des rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di yid la dran no/_/
[\[131a.4\]]yi ger bris nas lag pa g.yas pa la btags shing 'dug go/_/sems can chen po de'i rig pa 'di'i mthus/_ral gri me lce gcig tu gyur nas rdul gtor ba bzhin du dum bu dum bur gyur to/_/de nas gshed ma'i mi de dag gis nges pa 'di rgyal po la zhib tu bsnyad do/_/
[\[131a.5\]]de nas rgyal po de rab tu 'khrugs nas/_kye mi 'di dag sa phyogs zhig na gnod sbyin gyi phug yod de/_de na gnod sbyin brgya stong mang po sha rjen za ba gnas kyis/_der khrid de 'or cig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas mi de gshed ma mi de dag gis gnod sbyin gyi phug der bor ro/_/
[\[131a.6\]]gnod sbyin gyi phug der bor ma thag tu de nas gnod sbyin de dag thams cad yid dga' ste/_mi sha bza'o snyam du brgyugs pa dang /_de dag gis so sor 'brang ba 'di'i mthus mi de la me lce gcig tu gyur pa'i 'od 'phro bar rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang thams 
[\[131a.7\]]cad dngangs nas rang rang gi lus tshig par yang mthong ngo /_/de nas gnod sbyin de dag ngo mtshar skyes nas mi de khrid de sgo'i phyi rol du bzhag nas bskor ba bya bar brtsams pa nas gshed ma'i mi de dag gis rgyal po la zhib tu bsnyad pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas rgyal po cher 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]'khrugs te rngams nas gal te de ltar na khyed cag deng la mi 'di chings te/_chur bor cig ces bsgo ba dang /_gshed ma'i mi de dag gis khrid de chur bor ro/_/mi de chu bor ma thag tu mi de ji ltar thang la 'dug pa bzhin du chu med par gyur to/_/chings ma de dag kyang dum bur chad do/_/
[\[131b.2\]]rgyal pos de skad thos pa dang /_de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas mig tshugs su bltas te/_/e ma'o mi 'di ngo mtshar to/_/'di la rgyu ci zhig yod snyam du rnam par rtog par gyur to/_/zhes smras so/_/de nas rgyal po des mi de bkug ste/_kye mi khyod ci zhig shes zhes 
[\[131b.3\]]de skad smras so/_/mi des smras pa rgyal po chen po rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'chang ba las gzhan ni ci yang ma 'tshal te/_lha de ni de'i mthu lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/rig pa chen mo dge bar gsungs/_/'chi bdag nan tur rmongs 
[\[131b.4\]]byed pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/_/sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol/_/nad dang sdug bsngal thar bar byed/_/rig pa chen mo gzi brjid che/_/dus min 'chi las rab tu sgrol/_/nad chen rnams ni zlog byed pa/_/mgon po thugs rje can gyis 
[\[131b.5\]]gsungs/_/de nas rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo la mchod nas mngon par bstod do/_/mi de yang blon thabs byin te/_rang gi gnyen gyi mdun du grong khyer gyi gtso bor dbang bskur to/_/bram ze chen po de ltar na rig pa'i 
[\[131b.6\]]rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'dis thams cad du yang mchod pa chen po rnyed do/_/sems can gnod sems can thams cad kyis kyang 'gal bar mi bya'o/_/de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di yongs su shes te/_gang du yang thogs pa med do/_/de lta bas na gdon mi za 
[\[131b.7\]]bar rtag tu lus la gdags shing bcang bar bya'o/_/bram ze chen po skar ma bzang po la cho ga legs par byas te/_rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di bri bar bya'o/_/de nas bram ze chen po de yid rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]'das rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di'i cho ga ni ji ltar bgyis te bri bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bram ze chen po khyod nyon cig_/sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/_/ngas ni khyod la bshad par bya/_/gang gis sems can bde byed cing /_/
[\[132a.2\]]nyam nga ba yi las las 'grol/_/nad rnams las kyang thar bya dang /_/bud med sbrum mar 'gyur ba dang /_/sems can rnams kyi dbul ba yi/_/rma rnams gso bar bya phyir ro/_/bsnyen gnas dag la gnas gyur nas/_/rgyu skar rgyal du shes pa la/_/sangs 
[\[132a.3\]]rgyas mchod la brtson byas te/_/byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bskyed/_/snying rjes kun tu brlan sems dang /_/byams pa dang yang ldan gyur nas/_/rtag tu sems can thams cad la/_/phan pa bskyed pa brtson par bya/_/tsan+dan dang ni gur gum dang /_/gla rtsir 
[\[132a.4\]]bsres pa'i chus bkrus te/_/bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa yi/_/gos gtsang rnams ni bgo bar bya/_/sa dang lci ba bsres pa yis/_/de yi 'og tu dkyil 'khor bya/_/bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag ste/_/lnga pa dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag_/de la 
[\[132a.5\]]rin thang chen po yi/_/me tog bdug pa spos rnams gsol/_/tsan+dan spr-i ka de bzhin du/_/a ka ru dang du ruska/_/sha kha ra dang lnga sbyar ba'i/_/bdug pa cho ga bzhin du 'bul/_/cho ga ci bzhin dus bzhin bya/_/lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/_/me 
[\[132a.6\]]tog 'bras bu sa bon dang /_/spos rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang /_/nas thug 'o thug la sogs pas/_/gtor ma'i bum pa dgang bar bya/_/mtshan ma shin tu bkra shis pa/_/phyogs bzhi rnams su gzhag par bya/_/lnga pa 
[\[132a.7\]]dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag_/spos kyis bkang ba'i phor pa rnams/_/grwa bzhi dag tu gzhag par bya/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'gram logs su/_/seng ldeng phur bu bzhi btsugs la/_/tshon skud kha dog sna lnga yis/_/'khor bar dam du dkri bar bya/_/gal te bdag 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]'grub 'dod na ni/_/bram ze de ltar byas nas bri/_/kha zas dkar po zos nas su/_/phan par 'dod pas bri bar bya/_/dar ram ras sam gro ga 'am/_/ci yang rung ba gzhan la bri/_/bud med dag la bu 'dod na/_/gi'u wang gis ni legs par bri/_/dbus 
[\[132b.2\]]su khye'u zhig bris nas ni/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/de bzhin rin chen gang ba'i snod/_/lag pa g.yon na thogs par bya/_/pad+ma rab tu rgyas gyur cing /_/brgyan pa la ni de 'dug bya/_/nor bu do shal gser dag dang /_/rin chen sna tshogs 
[\[132b.3\]]rnams kyis brgyan/_/gdul bar shin tu dka' ba bri/_/grwa bzhi dag tu ri bo bri/_/gal te bde bar 'tsho 'dod na/_/rab tu bsgrims te de ltar bri/_/bye brag tu ni skyes pa rnams/_/gur gum gyis ni bri bar bya/_/de yi dgos pa 'dod pa rnams/_/'grub 
[\[132b.4\]]'gyur 'di la the tsom med/_/pad+ma gnyis sam yang na gsum/_/bzhi 'am yang na lnga bris te/_/pad+ma la ni phyag rgya'i mtshan/_/rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su bri/_/de bzhin du ni pad+ma rnams/_/ze bas kun tu 'khor bar bri/_/pad+ma 'dab ma rab rgyas la/_/
[\[132b.5\]]sdong bu dar gyis bcings par bri/_/pad+ma la ni rtse gsum pa/_/zur brgyad la ni dar dpyangs bri/_/de bzhin pad+ma dgra star bcas/_/'dab ma brgyad dang ldan par bri/_/pad+ma bcas pa'i ral gri bri/_/pad+ma de ni dkar por bya/_/pad+ma'i steng du dung yang bri/_/thams 
[\[132b.6\]]cad du yang rgyas par bya/_/kun tu cho ga'i mtshan ma rnams/_/mkhas pa dag gis bri bar bya/_/gang la gnod pa'i sems 'byung ba/_/byis pa'i gzugs rnams mi bri'o/_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/_/lha yi gzugs ni bri bar bya/_/dge slong phyir ni rdo rje 
[\[132b.7\]]'chang /_/gnod sbyin bsdigs par brtson par bri/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyang /_/ngos bzhi rnams su bri bar bya/_/bram ze'i phyir ni dbang ldan no/_/rgyal rigs la ni dbang phyug che/_/dmangs rigs phyir ni rtag zhi ba/_/khyab 'jug legs par bri bar bya/_/
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]rje'u rigs phyir ni rnam thos bu/_/lha yi dbang phyug dbang po bri/_/khye'u yi phyir ni skye dgu'i bdag_/blo gros chen po bri bar bya/_/sngo bsangs mdog ni gang yin pa/_/de yi ched du khros pa bri/_/dkar mo'i phyir ni grags ldan pa/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i 
[\[133a.2\]]gzugs su bri/_/sbom mo'i phyir ni nor bu bzang /_/rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya/_/skem mo'i phyir ni gang ba bzang /_/rang 'byung nga yis bstan par bri/_/sbrum ma'i phyir ni nag mo che/_/tshangs lha rnams kyang bri bar bya/_/gzhan yang ci ltar cho ga las/_/gong 
[\[133a.3\]]du bshad pa bzhin du bri/_/las kyi cho ga mthong nas ni/_/rab tu bsgrims te de bzhin bri/_/rtag tu mgul du btags na ni/_/de ni bde bar 'gyur ba yin/_/rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i pad+ma la/_/yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba bri/_/pad+ma'i snying por zhags pa dang /_/de 
[\[133a.4\]]bzhin 'khor lo'ang bri bar bya/_/pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje dang /_/pad+ma'i snying po tho ba bri/_/cho ga las ni 'byung ba bzhin/_/pad+ma'i steng du mdung thung bri/_/cho ga las ni brjod pa bzhin/_/nor bu thams cad rtse mo 'bar/_/'od zer 'phro bas rgyas pa dang /_/dar gyis 
[\[133a.5\]]bcings pa bri bar bya/_/klu mgo gdengs ka dgu yod la/_/nor bu rab tu 'bar ba dang /_/de dag kun gyi snying gar yang /_/rdo rje gnas par bsgrims te bri/_/rgyal po rnams phyir stobs can dang /_/ded dpon mkhas pas rtag tu bri/_/rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi/_/
[\[133a.6\]]rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyang bri/_/zla ba nyi ma rgyu skar bcas/_/sgra gcan mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]gza' brgyad bri/_/cho ga bzhin du nges bris la/_/blo gros ldan pa'i mis bsrel na/_/za ma dang ni ma ning yang /_/bu pho rnyed par 'gyur ba yin/_/'dis ni thams cad 'grub par byed/_/
[\[133a.7\]]shis shing sdig pa zhi bar byed/_/rang byung gi ni bka' bzhin du/_/gnas kyi dam pa thob par 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'di na'ang mchog tu bde/_/'jig rten pha rol shin tu bde/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gnas la sogs/_/lha gnas de yi gnas su 'gyur/_/'dzam 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]gling bzang zhing nyams dga' bar/_/khyad par can rigs grags pa dang /_/rgyal rigs khyad par 'phags pa dang /_/bram ze khyad par 'phags rnams su/_/bdag nyid chen po de skyes te/_/rtag tu rig dang bde bar 'gyur/_/so sor 'brang ba 'chang ba'i mis/_/bsod 
[\[133b.2\]]nams thob pa gang yin pa/_/sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyis/_/bsod nams phung po brjod mi nus/_/sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad/_/mtho ris sgo rnams rab tu phye/_/bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/blo gros chen por 'gyur ba yin/_/sangs 
[\[133b.3\]]rgyas byang chub sems dpas kyang /_/rtag tu dbugs ni 'byin par 'gyur/_/lus kyi bde ba phun sum tshogs/_/stobs kyang che bar 'gyur ba yin/_/rgyal bas ji skad gsungs pa ltar/_/'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba yin/_/mi dang lha rnams dbugs 'byin 
[\[133b.4\]]te/_/gnod par sems pa skrag par byed/_/gang phyir rig pa legs bshad pa/_/de ni ring por mi thogs so/_/de ni mtshon gyis mi tshugs te/_/dug dang mes kyang tshugs mi 'gyur/_/dus min 'chi ba'i sdig pa yang /_/de las thag ni ring du 'gro/_/rnam pa 
[\[133b.5\]]kun tu nyan pa 'am/_/mthong ba dang ni reg pa'ang rung /_/'byung po gdon dang rtsod pa dang /_/chu dang me yis 'jigs pa dang /_/gcan gzan sbrul dang seng ge dang /_/klu dang nad ni mi bzad rnams/_/gang la rig pa legs bshad pa/_/de la de dag kun mi 'byung /_/
[\[133b.6\]]de dag sems can kun mchog 'gyur/_/bdud rnams kun gyis thams cad du/_/mchod par 'gyur ba'i 'os yin te/_/yang dag bshad kyis mnyan par byos/_/rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i cho ga rdzogs so//_//de nas sems can thams cad la 
[\[133b.7\]]snying brtse ba'i phyir rig sngags 'chang ba bsrung ba'i tshul gyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/bsrung ba'i cho ga gang zhig gis/_/dngos grub chen po 'grub 'gyur ba/_/gang dang gang du bsrung byas na/_/don yod 'gyur te the tshom med/_/'jigs med rims kyis mi btab ste/_/
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]gza' rnams thams cad zlog par byed/_/rgyu skar rnams kyang mthun par 'gyur/_/las kyi lu gu rgyud kyang gcod/_/bza' nyes pa dang sgom nyes dang /_/dgra tshogs kun gyis byas pa dang /_/gnod par bltas dang bri nyes dang /_/byad dang gang 
[\[134a.2\]]yang mi bzad dang /_/phye ma sngags kyis btab pa dang /_/dug 'thung ba dang sbyar ba'i dug_/gang zhig bsrung ba 'chang de la/_/de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig rig las 'gal byed pa/_/yan lag rnams la rnam par smin/_/so sor 'brang ba'i 
[\[134a.3\]]dmod bsdigs na/_/pha rol 'khor ni mi bzad dang /_/'jigs pa chen po dgra yi rnams/_/de dag thams cad rab tu 'bros/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' des pas bsrung /_/nyan thos dka' thub chen po dang /_/rang 
[\[134a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyis bsrung bar 'gyur/_/gzhan yang rnam pa mang po yi/_/lha klu rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams/_/'di la rtag tu brtson byed pa/_/de la srung ba byed par 'gyur/_/rig pa yi ni rgyal mo 'di/_/thos pa tsam gyis mi mchog rnams/_/kun tu 
[\[134a.5\]]'jigs pa med 'gyur zhes/_/thub pa yis ni de skad gsungs/_/rmi lam ngan dang ngan byas dang /_/gang yang nad 'go mi bzad dang /_/nad kyis btab dang nad chen gyis/_/gang dag zin cing khrag skyugs dang /_/gzhan yang rnam pa mang po'i nad/_/
[\[134a.6\]]'bras dang shu ba skem po dang /_/gang yang gnod pa mi bzad pas/_/mi yi skye dgu zin pa dang /_/mi rnams ma rungs bya ba'i phyir/_/mchog tu mi bzad gnod byed rnams/_/bsrung ba stobs chen ga la bar/_/de dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/'di las bsrung 
[\[134a.7\]]ba byas nas ni/_/bcings pa dag kyang grol bar 'gyur/_/so sor 'brang ba bris pas kyang /_/gal te dus kyi zhags pa yis/_/bzung nas gshin rje'i gnas khrid pa/_/de yi tshe ni rnam par 'phel/_/gang zhig tshe ni zad gyur tam/_/zhag bdun ni 'chi 'gyur ba/_/
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]yi ge bris pa'i bar tsam gyis/_/'tsho bar 'gyur te the tshom med/_/cho ga bzhin du bsrung byas pa'am/_/yang na thos pa tsam gyis kyang /_/kun tu dge ba thob par 'gyur/_/'dod pa bzhin du bde bar 'tsho/_/gang dag sum cu rtsa gsum lha/_/stong phrag drug cu rtsa
