[\[134b.2\]]brgyad dang /_/bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya dang /_/brgya byin mdun nas 'gro ba kun/_/sems can de la bsrung ba'i phyir/_/phyi bzhin 'brang zhing gnas par byed/_/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dang /_/lag na rdo rje stobs chen yang /_/rig pa'i rigs ni brgya dag dang /_/
[\[134b.3\]]lhan cig rtag tu srung bar byed/_/zla ba yid bzang nyi ma dang /_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/_/nor bu bzang dang gshin rje dang /_/stobs kyi lha ni stobs chen dang /_/gang ba bzang po dpal chen dang /_/'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang /_/lnga 'dzin pa dang 
[\[134b.4\]]lngas rtsen dang /_/smin drug bu dang tshogs dbang dang /_/lha mo chen mo dpal can dang /_/rnam thos bu dang dbyangs can dang /_/dung can dang ni me tog go/_/de bzhin ral pa gcig pa dang /_/gnod sbyin chen po dpal yon can/_/rtag tu srung ba byed par 'gyur/_/za 
[\[134b.5\]]ma rnams kyi bu yang skyed/_/mngal na gnas pa bde bar byed/_/de ni ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar/_/'di ni bsrung ba chen por 'gyur/_/'jigs med 'thab mo'i g.yul 'gyed par/_/dpa' bo rnams la rtag rgyal sbyin/_/chos la nges pa'i lha rnams la/_/'dis ni snang 
[\[134b.6\]]ba sbyin par byed/_/sdig pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/_/gus par byed de bris na ni/_/de bzhin gshegs dang de bzhin du/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'ang blta bar 'gyur/_/de yi grags pa rnam par 'phel/_/bsod nams dang ni tshe yang 'phel/_/nor rnams dang 
[\[134b.7\]]ni 'bru dag kyang /_/'byor par 'gyur te the tshom med/_/bde bar gnyid kyis log pa dang /_/bde bar rab tu sad par 'gyur/_/'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang /_/dgra kun gyis kyang mi rdzi'o/_/g.yul 'gyed pa yi tshe na yang /_/rig pa sgrub pa byas na ni/_/
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]bsrung ba bla na med pa 'dis/_/rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur bar byed/_/bde bar rig pa sgrub byed cing /_/de la bgegs ni 'byung mi 'gyur/_/de yis bsam pa thams cad 'grub/_/dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa yin/_/skye ba dag ni thams cad du/_/
[\[135a.2\]]de ni myur du dam tshig shes/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan 'dzin pa'i phyir/_/de ni yid brtan 'os yin no/_/bkra shis thams cad rab tu rdzogs/_/bsam pa thams cad grub par byed/_/'di ni bris pa tsam gyis kyang /_/bde ba thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/_/bde 
[\[135a.3\]]bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/_/mtho ris su ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'thab pa dang ni rtsod pa dang /_/'gyed pa mchog tu mi bzad par/_/'jigs pa kun las grol 'gyur te/_/rgyal bas ji skad gsungs bzhin no/_/skye ba rnams su skye ba na/_/rtag tu skye dran the 
[\[135a.4\]]tshom med/_/rgyal po btsun mo 'khor bcas pa/_/'di yi dbang du 'gyur ba yin/_/'jig rten dge bar grags pa yin/_/rtag tu thun mong 'gyur ba yin/_/de ni kun la sdug par 'gyur/_/lha dang mi ni gang yang rung /_/nyin dang mtshan rnams rtag par yang /_/
[\[135a.5\]]de la srung ba byed par 'gyur/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs/_/sngags tshig 'di dag 'dir 'grub bo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[135a.6\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 'phel bya'i phyir/_/de la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/_/
[\[135a.7\]]sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/_/da ni nga yis brjod par bya/_/rig pa gzi brjid chen po 'di/_/stobs chen pha rol gnon pa ste/_/rdo rje gdan la thug pa yis/_/'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang /_/bdud dang bdud kyi ris rnams dang /_/gza' dang log 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]par 'dren pa dang /_/bgegs rnams ji snyed gang yod pa/_/thams cad de yi mod la 'byer/_/tad+ya thA/_oM gi ri gi ri/_gi ri Ni gi ri Ni/_gi ri ba ti/_guN ba ti/_A kA sha ba ti/_A kA sha bi shud d+he/_sarba pA pa bi ga te/_A kA sha_/ga ga na ta le/_A kA sha 
[\[135b.2\]]bi tsA ri Ni/_dz+wA li ta shi kha re/_/ma Ni muk+ti ka_/kha tsi ta mau li d+ha re/_su ke she_/me ke she su Sha su bak+t+re_/su ne tre/_su bar+N+Ne/_su bar+N+Na gau ri/_a tI te/_a nung+pan+ne/_a nA ga te/_prat+yut+pan+ne na ma/_na maHsarbe ShAn/_bud+d+hA nAn dz+wa li ta/_te dza sA na/_bud+d+he/_su bud+d+he/_b+ha ga ba ti/_su 
[\[135b.3\]]rak+Sha Ni/_su k+Sha me/_su pra b+he/_su da me/_su dAn+te/_ba re brte/_b+ha ga ba ti/_b+ha dra ba ti/_b+ha dre su b+ha dre/_bi ma le/_dza ya b+ha dre/_pra tsaN+De/_tsaN+De/_pra tsaN+De/_pra tsaN+De/_badzra tsaN+De/_ma hA tsaN+De/_ma hA tsaN+De/_gau ri/_gan+d+hAri/_gau ri/_tsau ri/_tsaN+Da li/_mA tAM gi/_brtsa 
[\[135b.4\]]si/_puk+ka si/_su ma ti/_sha ba ri/_shA ba ri/_shaM ka ri/_dra mi Di/_drA mi Di/_rau tri Ni/_sarba gra ha bi dA ri Ni/_ar+tha sA d+ha ni/_ha na ha na/_sarba sha trU NAM/_da ha da ha/_sarba duSh+TAn/_pre ta bi shA tsa DA ki nI nAM/_ma nu Sh+yA/_a ma nu Sh+yA nAny+tsa/_pa tsa pa tsa/_hr-i da yan/_gdon ma 
[\[135b.5\]]rungs pa rnams kyi srog gzhom du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das ma bdag gi sdig pa thams cad gzhig tu gsol/_gzhig tu gsol/_thams cad du 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa thams cad las bdag la bsrung du gsol/_bsrung du gsol/_ma rungs pa thams cad 
[\[135b.6\]]bcing du gsol/_sarba kilpi Sha nA sha ni/_mArtaN+Da/_mr-i t+yu daN+Da ni bA ra Ni mA na na/_daN+Da mA na ni/_ma hA mA ni ni/_ma hA bi Ni Ti tsa le tsa le/_tsi Ti tsi Ti/_bi Ti bi Ti/_ni Ti ni Ti/_ti Ti ti Ti/_na tu Ti/_gau ri ni/_bI ri NI/_pra ba ra sa ma re/_tsaN+DA li/_mA taM gi/_run+d+ha si/_sa ra si/_
[\[135b.7\]]brtsa si/_su ma ti/_puk+ka si/_sha ba ri/_shA ba ri/_shaM ka ri/_dra mi Di/_drA mi Di/_da ha ni pa tsa ni/_ma tha ni/_marda ni/_sa ra li/_sa ra le/_sa ra baM b+he/_hI na mang+h+yod kriSh+Ta/_bi d+hA ra Ni/_bi d+hA ri Ni/_ma hi le/_ma hi le/_ma hA ma hi le/_ni ga De/_ni ga Da/_b+hany+dze/_mat+ti/_mat+ti ni/_dAn+ti/_
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]tsakre/_tsakra bA ki ni/_dz+wa le dz+wa le/_dz+wA le dz+wA le/_dz+wA la ni/_sha ba ri sha ba ri/_shA ba ri shA ba ri/_sarba byA d+hi ha ra ni/_tsU Di tsU Di/_tsU Da ni tsU Da ni/_ma hA tsU Di ni/_ni mi ni mi/_ni min+d+ha ri/_tri lo ka_/da ha ni/_tri lo ka A lo ka kA ri/_trai d+hA tu ka byA ba lo 
[\[136a.2\]]ki ni/_badzre/_pa ra shu/_pA sha_/mung+ga ra/_khaD+ga/_shaM kha/_tsa kra_/tri shU la/_tsin tA ma Ni/_ma hA bid+yA d+ha ri Ni/_bdag thams cad du gnas thams cad na gnas pa na ma rungs pa thams cad dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_nad thams 
[\[136a.3\]]cad dang /_'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/_badzre badzre badzra pa ti/_badzra pA Ni d+ha re/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_ki li ki li/_tsi li tsi li/_bi li bi li/_si li si li/_ba ra ba ra/_ba ra de/_sarba tra/_dza ya la ba d+he swA hA/_sarba pA pa/_
[\[136a.4\]]bi dA ri Ni swA hA/_sarba tra/_sarba byA d+hi ha ra Ni swA hA/_sarba tra/_sarba sha truM b+ha ya ha ra Ni swA hA/_sarba b+ha ra Ni swA hA/_swa stir b+ha ba tu mAM swA hA/_shAn+tiM ka ri swA hA/_puSh+TiM ka ri swA hA/_ba la bar d+ha ri Ni swA hA/_dza ya tu/_dza ye dza ye/_dza ya b+ha ti/_ka ma le/_bi ma le/_bi 
[\[136a.5\]]pu le swA hA/_sarba ta thA ga ta mu swA hA/_oM b+hu ri ma hA shAn+ti swA hA/_oM b+hu ri b+hu ri/_badzra ba ti/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/_pU ra Ni/_A yuHsan d+hA ra Ni/_ba la ba la/_ba la ba ti/_dza ya bi dz+ye/_hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT swA hA/_bram ze chen po gang la la zhig gis de bzhin 
[\[136a.6\]]gshegs pa'i sku rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi'i gzungs 'dis yongs su bsrung ba byas shing yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_dbyug pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba byas na/_
[\[136a.7\]]de tshe yongs su zad pa las kyang rnam par 'phel te ring du bde bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/dran pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/bskrad pa tsam dang /_rdo rjes byabs pa tsam gyis dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /_nad chen po las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i nad thams 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyun ring du na ba la yang byabs pa tsam gyis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin du kha ton du bton na shes rab chen por 'gyur ro/_/gzi brjid dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_spobs pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur 
[\[136b.2\]]ro/_/de'i sdig pa dang las kyi sgrib pa gdon mi za bar myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyang ma lus par yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad kyang de'i lus la gzi brjid dang /_
[\[136b.3\]]stobs dang /_brtson 'grus snon par 'gyur ro/_/dga' ba chen po mang bar 'gyur ro/_/bram ze chen po tha na rig pa chen mo'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya'i rna lam du thos na yang de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[136b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur na/_so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i gzungs 'di la dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_rgyal po'am/_rgyal po'i blon po 'am/_
[\[136b.5\]]bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_de las gzhan pa 'ga' zhig gis lan cig thos te/_thos nas kyang dad pa chen po dang /_gus pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas yi ger 'dri 'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_yid drag pos 
[\[136b.6\]]sgom pa 'am/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta ci smos te/_bram ze chen po de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad rnam pa thams cad du 'byung du ma dogs shig_/de'i lus la nad chen po rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i lus la mes mi tshugs/_
[\[136b.7\]]dug gis ma yin/_mtshon gyis ma yin/_dug sbyar mas ma yin/_byad kyis ma yin/_g.yengs byed kyis ma yin/_sngags kyi las kyis ma yin/_phye ma'i sbyor bas ma yin/_yan lag na bar mi 'gyur/_rims kyis btab par mi 'gyur/_klad pa na ba dang /_nyin gcig pa dang /_
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa dang /_nyin bdun pa'i rims rnams de'i lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dran bzhin du bde bar gnyid log cing dran bzhin du bde bar sad par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang 
[\[137a.2\]]'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig gis chos dang ldan pa'i dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/de gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba de dang der skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyang byams par 'gyur ro/_/phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro/_/sems can 
[\[137a.3\]]dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'gro ba thibs po kun dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye ba rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad la snang bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od zer gyis snang ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar zla ba'i 
[\[137a.4\]]dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi'i mthus sems can thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa de bzhin du/_chos kyi bdud rtsis sems can thams cad kyi rgyud sim par byed par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i mthus de la gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_
[\[137a.5\]]'byung po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_skem byed dang /_brjed byed dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren la sogs pa thams cad kyis gtse bar mi nus so/_/de dag 'ongs na yang rig pa'i rgyal mo 
[\[137a.6\]]chen mo 'di dran par bya'o/_/'on kyang 'di lta ste/_rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di nyid kyi mthus ma rungs pa de dag thams cad rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang du 'gyur te/_bsgo ba bzhin du ngag nyan par 'gyur ro/_/de la dgra'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/dgra'i 
[\[137a.7\]]tshogs thams cad dang /_rgyal po dang /_rgyal po'i blon po chen po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyang 'gal bar byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/tha na gsad par 'os pa zhig la gshed ma mi rnams kyis mtshon gdab par gzas na yang mtshon rnams rdul bzhin dum bu dum 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]bur chag par 'gyur ro/_/de nyid kyi dus na de la chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/de'i dran pa'i stobs kyang cher 'gyur ro/_/'di ni srin po 'joms pa'i mchog_/gtsang zhing sdig pa 'jig par byed/_/dpal du byed cing blo yang byed/_/yon tan thams cad 
[\[137b.2\]]rnam par 'phel/_/'di ni bkra shis thams cad byed/_/bkra shis ma yin rnam par 'jig_/rmi lam bzang po rmi bar byed/_/rmi lam ngan pa rnam par 'jig_/rig pa mthu stobs chen mo 'di/_/skyes pa bud med bsrung ba'i mchog_/'brog dgon dang ni mya 
[\[137b.3\]]ngan las/_/rtag tu de yi mod la thar/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bka' bzhin du/_/'dod pa dag ni kun kyang rnyed/_/lam las lam gol zhugs na yang /_/rig pa 'di ni rjes dran na/_/myur du lam dang bza' ba dang /_/btung ba mchog kyang rnyed par 
[\[137b.4\]]'gyur/_/lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis/_/mi dge mang po gang yang rung /_/tshe rabs snga mar ci byas pa/_/de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur/_/dran pa dang ni 'chang ba dang /_/'dzin dang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_/tshig tu 'don tam klog pa dang /_/bzlas 
[\[137b.5\]]brjod byed dam gzhan ston na/_/de ni ring por mi thogs par/_/chos kun rtogs par khong du chud/_/de ltar chos kyi ro rnyed na/_/sdig pa rnams ni zad par 'gyur/_/yid kyis ci dang ci 'dod pa/_/dgos pa thams cad grub par byed/_/'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 
[\[137b.6\]]thams cad dang /_/rgyal po dang ni me dang chu/_/glog dang de bzhin kun 'joms las/_/'di ni de las skyob par 'gyur/_/rig pa 'bum du bzlas na ni/_/g.yul 'gyed pa dang rtsod pa dang /_/gang yang gcan gzan ma rungs pa/_/de dag thams cad 'bros par 
[\[137b.7\]]'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi/_/dngos grub mchog gi rig pa 'di/_/brjod na sgyid lug mi 'gyur bar/_/byang chub tshogs rnams rdzogs par byed/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi don bsgrubs phyir/_/gnas kyi rnam pa thams cad du/_/rig pa 'di la 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]sbyor na ni/_/'dod pa'i las rnams gang yin pa/_/bsgrim mi dgos par rig 'di las/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/nad pa rnams ni gso bya ba/_/da ni rab tu bshad par bya/_/sa dang lci ba bsres pa yis/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham 
[\[138a.2\]]par bya/_/tshon gyi phye ma sna lnga yis/_/dkyil 'khor sdug gur bri bar bya/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis cho ga bzhin/_/bum pa gang ba bzhi yang bzhag_/de la me tog sil mas gtor/_/bdug pa mchog gis bdug par bya/_/sems can chen po gdul ba'i phyir/_/
[\[138a.3\]]gtor ma yi ni las kyang bya/_/snga ma bzhin du me tog spos/_/cho ga bzhin du 'di la mchod/_/dar gyis bcings pa'i mda' bzhi yang /_/dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir gzugs par bya/_/de yi 'og tu nad pa yang /_/dri zhim spos kyis lus bskus te/_/gtsang ma'i gos 
[\[138a.4\]]rnams bskon nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya/_/de nas shar phyogs kha bstan te/_/rig pa 'di ni brjod par bya/_/lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas su/_/mkhas pas de la bsrung bar bya/_/de nas nad pa'i don gyi phyir/_/lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[138a.5\]]tu/_/rig pa 'di ni brjod byas na/_/des ni nad kun zhi bar 'gyur/_/de nas gtor ma'i bum pa la/_/lan bdun legs par sngags kyis gdab/_/de nas bshos kyang sngags gdab ste/_/gtor ma me tog cho ga bzhin/_/de ltar lho phyogs ngos su ni/_/lan bdun 
[\[138a.6\]]kho nar gtor bar bya/_/nub phyogs su yang bdun nyid de/_/byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/_/'og dang steng du'ang lan bdun te/_/bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ba yin/_/bram ze dam pa de lta bur/_/byas na sdug bsngal kun las grol/_/skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/_/bsrung 
[\[138a.7\]]ba 'di ni yang dag bshad/_/'di ma gtogs par khams gsum na/_/bsrung ba'i rig pa gzhan med do/_/de ni mi 'chi mi rgas te/_/nad kyis mi btab mi sdug min/_/sdug pa dang ni 'bral mi 'gyur/_/rig pa 'di ni bdag gi lus/_/shin tu bsgom pa byas na ni/_/
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]de la 'chi bdag tshogs kyis mchod/_/chos kyi rgyal po dam pa gshin rje yang /_/gus dang bcas pas de la mchod par 'gyur/_/skad cig nga yi sems dmyal 'di byos la/_/lha yi grong khyer song zhes smra bar 'gyur/_/de nas gzhal med khang pa rnam mang pos/_/
[\[138b.2\]]rdzu 'phrul chen po lha gnas bzang por 'gro/_/de ltar der ni lha mi gnod sbyin dang /_/srin po rnams kyis de la rtag mchod 'gyur/_/lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang /_/bde sogs bdag po dbang po dang /_/'phrog ma dang ni lngas rtsen dang /_/'jig rten skyong ba 'phrul 
[\[138b.3\]]chen dang /_/zla ba nyi ma rgyu skar bcas/_/mchog tu mi bzad gza' rnams dang /_/gang yang klu chen thams cad dang /_/lha dang de bzhin drang srong dang /_/lha min mkha' lding dri za dang /_/mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che/_/bsrung phyir rtag tu 'brang bar byed/_/gang gis rig 
[\[138b.4\]]pa stobs chen mo/_/rdzu 'phrul chen mo bris nas ni/_/shes rab can gyi lag la gdags/_/mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur/_/rtag tu phun sum tshogs par 'ong /_/'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi 
[\[138b.5\]]na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/_/slar yang lo tsA ba gzhon nu dpal gyis chos rje chag lo'i rgya dpe dang bstun nas zhus dag par bgyis so//_//
[\[138b.6\]{D562}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma hA shI ta ba nI sU tra/_bod skad du/_bsil ba'i tshal chen po'i mdo/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/gang gis thog mar rig sngags rnams/_/'dzam bu'i gling du 
[\[138b.7\]]gsungs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/da ltar byung dang 'das pa dang /_/ma byon sangs rgyas gang lags pa/_/thams cad la yang bdag phyag 'tshal/_/de dag kun la skyabs su mchi/_/'khor lo bskor ba bla med pa/_/mar me mdzad la phyag 'tshal 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]lo/_/chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa/_/thams cad gnon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thams cad mkhyen pa grags ldan pa/_/pad+ma'i bla la phyag 'tshal lo/_/spyan dang ldan pa skyob mdzad pa/_/rab 'thor gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ded dpon bla na 
[\[139a.2\]]med pa po/_/grags pa'i bla la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyi zla lta bur 'od mdzad pa/_/bde mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos kyi me long ston pa po/_/don gzigs la yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/dul ba'i tshul khrims 'jigs med pa/_/rgyal zhes bya la phyag 'tshal 
[\[139a.3\]]lo/_/mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan/_/skar rgyal la yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal ldan pa/_/rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'od can gzi brjid ldan pa po/_/gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/legs par 
[\[139a.4\]]mchod pa grags ldan pa/_/thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdud dpung rab tu 'joms pa po/_/log dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bram ze dpal dang ldan pa po/_/gser thub de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can kun la thugs brtse ba/_/'od srung de 
[\[139a.5\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shAkya seng ge 'od mdzad pa/_/gser mdog can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ser sna med pa thugs rje can/_/byams pa la yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kun la'ang phyag 'tshal te/_/de dag la ni bdag skyabs mchi/_/gang dag gis ni chos bstan 
[\[139a.6\]]pa/_/sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang la sangs rgyas gus mdzad pa'i/_/chos la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang la phul na don che ba'i/_/dge 'dun la yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyan thos shes rab mchog gyur pa/_/shA ri'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[139a.7\]]rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog gyur pa/_/maud gal bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos kyi gtam la 'jigs med pa/_/kA t+yA'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyan thos sbyangs pa'i mchog gyur pa/_/'od srung la yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/skyob pa yi ni dbang gyur pa/_/kauN+Di n+ya la phyag 'tshal 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]lo/_/mang du thos pa rig sngags 'chang /_/kun dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lus ngan dang ni yul 'khor srung /_/mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po/_/phyogs bzhi kho ra khor yug gi_/rgyal chen rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyi sde dpon 
[\[139b.2\]]mchog_/nyi shu brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pha ma mkhan po slob dpon dang /_/lha rnams la ni phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag la ni phyag 'tshal nas/_/rig sngags 'di ni grub gyur cig_/gang gi don du bya ba yi/_/don de bdag la grub gyur cig_/sdang bar 
[\[139b.3\]]sems shing gnod byed pa'i/_/mi ma yin rnams gud du deng /_/gnod par 'dod pa glags lta rnams/_/ston pa'i bstan pa mnyan par gyis/_/byams par sems shing phan 'dod pa'i/_/mi ma yin pa gang yin rnams/_/thams cad 'dus shing mthun 
[\[139b.4\]]gyur nas/_/'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi tshig_/ston pas rjes su yi rang ba/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis bdag la nyon/_/bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bsrung ba chen po ste/_'khor bzhi po rnams la yongs su khyab pa'o/_/gnod 
[\[139b.5\]]sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_klu dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_gsang ba pa dang /_'byung po dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_srul po dang /_sha za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_rlung lha dang /_skem byed dang /_'tshe rgyu dang /_smyo byed dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_
[\[139b.6\]]gyen du rgyu dang /_rgyu ba dang /_'dun pa dang /_ngan byed dang /_gzi byin 'phrog pa dang /_brjed byed dang /_rims drag po dang /_rims zhag gcig pa dang /_zhag gnyis pa dang /_zhag gsum pa dang /_zhag bzhi pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa/_sdang bar sems pa dang /_
[\[139b.7\]]glags lta ba dang /_mi phan par 'dod pa dang /_gnod par byed pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mi dga' ba dang /_gnod par 'dod pa dang /_phan par mi 'dod pa dang /_bde bar mi 'dod pa dang /_grub pa dang /_bde bar mi 'dod pa dang /_'khor bzhi po rnams la 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]mi dga' ba dang /_gnod par 'dod pa dang /_phan par mi 'dod pa dang /_bde bar mi 'dod pa dang /_grub pa dang /_bde bar mi 'dod pa dang /_ming 'di zhes bya ba la mi dga' ba dang /_gnod par 'dod pa dang /_phan par mi 'dod pa dang /_bde bar mi 'dod pa 
[\[140a.2\]]dang /_grub pa dang /_bde bar mi 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag ni bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di thos nas dengs shig_/skrag par gyur cig_/dngangs par gyur cig_/kun tu dngangs par gyur cig_/'di na ma 'khod cig_/ngan sems dang gnod sems kyi mgo bo tshal pa 
[\[140a.3\]]bdun du 'gas ta re/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_klu dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_gsang ba pa dang /_'byung po dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_srul po dang /_sha za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_rlung lha dang /_skem byed dang /_'tshe rgyu dang /_smyo 
[\[140a.4\]]byed dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_gyen du rgyu dang /_rgyu ba dang /_'dun pa dang /_ngan byed dang /_gzi byin 'phrog pa dang /_brjed byed dang /_rims drag po dang /_rims zhag gcig pa dang /_zhag gnyis pa dang /_zhag gsum pa dang /_zhag bzhi pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa 
[\[140a.5\]]sdang bar sems pa ma yin pa rnams dang /_glags mi lta ba dang /_phan par 'dod pa dang /_gnod par mi 'dod pa dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dga' ba dang /_don du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_phan par 'dod pa dang /_bde bar 'dod pa dang /_grub pa dang /_
[\[140a.6\]]bde bar 'dod pa dang /_ming 'di zhes bya ba la dga' ba dang /_don du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /_phan par 'dod pa dang /_bde bar 'dod pa dang /_grub pa dang /_bde bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag ni bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di thos nas 'dir 'khod cig_/ma skrag cig_/
[\[140a.7\]]ma dngangs par gyur cig_/kun tu dngangs par ma gyur cig_/mi 'jigs pa kho nar gyur cig_/ming 'di zhes bya ba'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di bdag gis bstan cing bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]de la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po bdag la bsrung ba ni 'di yin te/_s+yAd ya the dan/_kha Te kha Te/_khat+t+ya si/_pa la ka ba Te/_ro ga b+ha dri ga Ne/_hi li hi li/_du ma te/_gr-it+ta ti/_a dza Ti/_ka tha ri/_ma sA ra kalpe/_sa man+te na/_tsa tud+di shi_/yo dza na sha ta/_At+ma rak+Sha/_
[\[140b.2\]]a na ti kra ma Ni/_sarba bi he Tha ke b+h+yaHna mo b+ha ga ba te/_bud d+ha s+ya/_sid d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa dA/_da ra du bi d+yA/_brah+ma No/_ma na du swA hA/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal 'jigs su rung ba skyi bung 
[\[140b.3\]]zhes byed pa na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi lus ngan dang /_yul 'khor srung dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_'phags skyes po bu dang bcas/_blon po dang bcas/_'khor dang bcas/_
[\[140b.4\]]mngag gzhug pa dang bcas/_pho nya dang bcas/_g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa kha dog 'phags pa dag nam phyed na lhags nas gros mthun par dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du dong ste/_rang bzhin gyi kha dog dang mthus 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la 
[\[140b.5\]]ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas rgyal po chen po bzhis 
[\[140b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/_'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gau tam khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/_/de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom 
[\[140b.7\]]ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad nas bstod pa/_'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gau tam khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/_/de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yul dang 'phrod lags sam/_'tsho ba dang ldan lags sam/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sku bde lags sam/_snyun mi mnga' lags sam/_nyam nga ba ma mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gnod pa mi mnga' 
[\[141a.2\]]lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_klu dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_gsang ba pa dang /_'byung po dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_srul po dang /_sha za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_rlung lha dang /_skem 
[\[141a.3\]]byed dang /_'tshe rgyu dang /_smyo byed dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_gyen du rgyu dang /_rgyu ba dang /_'dun pa dang /_ngan bgyid dang /_gzi byin 'phrog pa dang /_brjed byed dang /_rims drag po dang /_rims zhag gcig pa dang /_zhag gnyis pa dang /_zhag gsum 
[\[141a.4\]]pa dang /_zhag bzhi pa dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa sdang bar sems pa dang /_glags lta ba dang /_phan par mi 'dod pa dang /_gnod par bgyid pa dag las gnod par bgyid par sems pa lta ma mchis lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[141a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye rgyal po chen po dag nga la ni thams cad yod de/_yul dang yang 'phrod/_'tsho ba dang yang ldan/_lus kyang bde/_nad kyang med/_nyam nga ba yang med do/_/kye rgyal po chen po dag nga'i lus 
[\[141a.6\]]la ni gnod pa yang med do/_/kye rgyal po chen po dag ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang /_bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang mir bcas pa'i nang na gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[141a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gnod pa byed par sems pa yang dag par ma mthong ngo /_/kye rgyal po chen po dag de lta mod kyi/_khyod kyi 'khor rnams nga'i 'khor la gnod pa byed par sems so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol ba mchis te/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das nyid la zhu ba'i slad du bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[141b.2\]]sngar mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgon pa dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di dag na shin tu sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_klu dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_gsang ba pa dang /_'byung po dang /_
[\[141b.3\]]grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_srul po dang /_sha za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_rlung lha dang /_skem byed dang /_'tshe rgyu dang /_smyo byed dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_gyen du rgyu dang /_rgyu ba dang /_'dun pa dang /_ngan byed dang /_gzi byin 'phrog pa dang /_brjed 
[\[141b.4\]]byed dang /_rims drag po dang /_rims zhag gcig pa dang /_zhag gnyis pa dang /_zhag gsum pa dang /_zhag bzhi pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa sdang bar sems pa dang /_glags lta ba dang /_phan par mi sems pa dang /_gnod par bgyid pa dag mchis 
[\[141b.5\]]so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag kyang de na gnas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin nam srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar dag 
[\[141b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni nyung zad cig mchis par bas so/_/gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la ma dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni ches mang lags te/_de dag ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal 
[\[141b.7\]]zhing sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa rnams la gnod par bgyid par sems lags te/_de dag dgag pa'i slad du gnod sbyin ma rungs pa ma dad pa rnams dad par bgyi ba dang /_dad pa rnams slar zhing dad par bgyi ba dang /_'khor bzhi po rnams bde legs dang /_bde bar 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]gnas par bgyi ba dang /_ma lus par shin tu mnyam par gzhog par 'gyur ba'i slad du/_bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di bshad par 'tshal lo/_/mi ma yin pa sdang sems can/_/rgyal ba'i bstan la ma dad pa/_/de dag bdag gis bzlog par bya/_/
[\[142a.2\]]rgyal chen rnams ni bdag la nyon/_/mdo chen 'di ni thos nas kyang /_/mi rnams la ni gnod ma byed/_/gnod sbyin srin po klu rnams dang /_/nam mkha' lding dang gsang ba pa/_/phan par mi 'dod gang yang rung /_/de dag thams cad bzlog par bya/_/lha dang lha 
[\[142a.3\]]min rlung lha dang /_/lha mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba yi/_/gzhal med khang mdzes de dag ni/_/me dang 'dra bar 'od gsal zhing /_/nyi ma zla ba'i tshul 'dra ba/_/rin chen las byas shin tu snang /_/bsod nams byas pa dag gis gang /_/rab snang gdon rnams rnam 
[\[142a.4\]]par spangs/_/mi la gnod byed gang yin pa'i/_/'byung po grul bum srin po dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]srul po de dag gis/_/rmad byung de dag mi mthong ste/_/gzi byin ldan pa'i lha rnams kyi/_/grong khyer du yang de mi 'gro/_/'byung po chen po 'du ba na/_/de yang de dag 
[\[142a.5\]]'dur mi dbang /_/stan nam yang na chu yang rung /_/zas dang skom yang mi dbang ngo /_/lus ngan gyi ni pho brang du/_/nam yang de dag 'gro mi 'gyur/_/rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig_/'byung po gang zhig mi nyan pa/_/de yi kha nas khrag dron dag_/myur du rab tu 
[\[142a.6\]]'bab par 'gyur/_/de yi brla yi g.yas rol nas/_/phol mig dag kyang 'byung 'gyur te/_/de ni nad kyis 'chi 'gyur zhing /_/gnod sbyin gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur/_/'jig rten skyong gis bshad pa yi/_/mdo las gang zhig 'gal byed pa/_/'jigs pa 
[\[142a.7\]]thams cad de la 'ong /_/mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/_/rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig_/gnod sbyin gang dag mi nyan pa/_/'byung po srin po gang yod pa/_/ngan phreng lhag pa'i ngan phreng rnams/_/lcags las byas pa'i 'khor lo yi/_/mtshon cha spu gri'i so 'dra bas/_/
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]gnod sbyin de dag brlag par bya/_/rgyal po chen po dpal dang ldan/_/go cha sra zhing mtshon rno la/_/stan rnams la ni 'khod pa dag_/shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung /_/lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/_/nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang /_/byang phyogs na ni lus ngan 
[\[142b.2\]]po/_/de dag de na 'khod pa yi/_/nye 'khor gnod sbyin 'di rnams gnas/_/seng ge'i gzugs dang stag gi gzugs/_/mi sdug pa dag 'gro zhing rgyu/_/glang chen gzugs dang rta yi gzugs/_/kha cig ma he'i gzugs can la/_/dred mo dang ni wa yi gzugs/_/
[\[142b.3\]]lug dang spyang ki phag rgod rnams/_/rna ba 'phyang dang rna bo che/_/rna ba gcig pa tha dad pa/_/sgra cher 'byin cing 'jigs byed pa/_/sa gzhi rab tu g.yo bar byed/_/bong bu dang ni rnga mo khyi/_/cha lugs gzhan yang nye 'khor 'khod/_/rgyal po chen po stobs po che/_/
[\[142b.4\]]de dag phan tshun 'du ba na/_/lha yi shing rta bcas pa yis/_/nam mkha' las ni 'gro bar byed/_/gnod sbyin dag gi bdag po yang /_/mi rnams la ni bde legs byed/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_ba ka hu mu le/_ha shi Na sha shi Na/_ba na mu ha le sa mu hA le/_u du hA le/_
[\[142b.5\]]sa ma hA le/_pra sha ma mI/_rAk+Sha sa/_a ma nu Sh+yA/_bA re mi/_yak+Sha ni/_bA rA mi pre ta ma b+hi thai/_du ma nu Sh+yA/_ma sa pa ta ha d+ha mur nan/_su ti Sh+ya ti/_rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu/_/mi la zhon pa sder bcas pas/_/'di smras nas ni tshub ma langs/_/de bzhin ri yang g.yos 
[\[142b.6\]]par gyur/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu'i/_/rin chen shing rta bcas pa na/_/lha dang mi yi sgra skad grag_/rgyal po chen po 'chi ba na/_/dngos po rnams kyang 'bar bar 'gyur/_/srin po 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs/_/de yi mdun na rgyug par bgyid/_/mi ma 
[\[142b.7\]]yin pa'i gzugs rnams kyis/_/'jigs shing skrag pa bskyed par bgyid/_/che zhing gtum la mi bzad pa/_/drag cing mthong na mi sdug la/_/spu yang ring zhing sen mo ring /_/lag na ral gri tho ba thogs/_/so ni zangs can 'jigs par bgyid/_/sna che rnga mo stag gi 'dra/_/
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]drag cing lag pa khrag dmar ba/_/yan lag ma tshang phyed tshal lus/_/mig ser lus kyang shin tu ser/_/dri ma can la lus skem pa/_/skra brdzes lcags kyi mchu can la/_/mtshon cha tshabs cher 'debs par bgyid/_/rna ba gzhu rna gsus po che/_/sbrul gyi 
[\[143a.2\]]gzugs can be'u gzugs/_/phag gi gzugs can lto bo che/_/mgo bo che la lag ring ba/_/rna 'phyang ba la nu ma 'phyang /_/de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi/_/g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor/_/gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams/_/de dag ma ni 
[\[143a.3\]]lim log can/_/g.yog 'khor de dag lhan cig tu/_/bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchi/_/gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/_/chos bzhin mthun par blta zhing mchis/_/drag cing rgod la gtum pa dang /_/mgo bo che la skra ring ba/_/mi rnams dang ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_/
[\[143a.4\]]bya rnams gzi byin 'phrog par bgyid/_/me 'bar za dang mang du za/_/mig gcig pa dang mig ser dang /_/sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang /_/chad pa mang pos bcad pa dang /_/mgo ma mchis dang mgo bcad dang /_/lus kyang sgur la gnyer ma gdong /_/mig la 
[\[143a.5\]]me 'bar rkang med pa/_/mi rnams 'jigs par bgyid pa ste/_/'phel ka che la rgod bag can/_/de bzhin 'gro zhing rgyu bar bgyid/_/de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi/_/g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor/_/gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams/_/de dag ma ni rkun 
[\[143a.6\]]ma lags/_/g.yog 'khor de dag lhan cig tu/_/bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/_/gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/_/chos bzhin mthun par blta zhing mchis/_/bdag cag gi ni gnas rnams na/_/shing rta zhes bgyi srin mo mchis/_/de la bu pho stobs ldan 
[\[143a.7\]]pa/_/stong phrag bcu yi grangs snyed mchis/_/de dag bdag gi g.yog lags te/_/de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/_/gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/_/chos bzhin mthun par blta zhing mchis/_/bdag cag gi ni gnas rnams na/_/mgrin [{]rings [,]ring [}]zhes bgyi srin mo mchis/_/
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]srin mo shin tu gnag pa dang /_/srin mo nag mo zhes bgyi dang /_/srin mo rab gnag rnams mchis te/_/de dag gau tam mthun par blta/_/sa yi gnod sbyin bdag nyid che/_/de dag sa stengs gnas pa ste/_/g.yog 'khor de dag rnams kyis ni/_/yongs su 
[\[143b.2\]]bskor te 'dir mchis lags/_/de dag kun dang lhan cig tu/_/bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/_/gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/_/chos bzhin mthun par blta zhing mchis/_/bdag gi mdun na rgyug pa yi/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gnod sbyin srin po rnams/_/
[\[143b.3\]]lus chen shugs kyang drag po ste/_/so yang che la lto bo che/_/rna 'phyang 'jigs pa chen po ste/_/slo ma rna la rab tu 'phyang /_/yan lag drug pa so brtan pa/_/gur gum mdog can tho ba 'dra/_/so yang rtsub cing rno ba dang /_/mdung thung gsal zhing 'jigs par 
[\[143b.4\]]bgyid/_/glang chen mgo dang bum sna can/_/mgo bo stag dang seng ge 'dra/_/lcags kyi so can lcags kyi skra/_/gdon rnams rnam par skrag bgyid pa/_/lag na lcags kyi gtun bu thogs/_/lag na lcags kyi tho ba thogs/_/so rnon lag pa ring ba ste/_/'jigs 
[\[143b.5\]]pa'i gzugs can lcags kyi mchu/_/mgo bo che la skra g.yengs pa/_/gnag cing mig ser sna zhom pa/_/bum pa'i mgrin dang mig dmar dang /_/mig gcig pa dang lto bo che/_/mchu 'phyangs pa dang lag gcig pa/_/rkang gcig pa dang rkang gnyis pa/_/kha med kha gnyis 
[\[143b.6\]]drag po ste/_/mi rnams rab tu 'jigs par bgyid/_/lag na khar ba dbyug pa thogs/_/mdung rtse gsum pa skrag cing 'jigs/_/skrag cing 'jigs par byed pa ste/_/gdon rnams rnam par skrag bgyid pa/_/skrag par bgyid cing smra bar bgyid/_/sems kyang 'khrul 
[\[143b.7\]]bar bgyid pa ste/_/smyo bar bgyid cing rmongs par bgyid/_/de nas gzi byin 'phrog par bgyid/_/de dag 'jig rten 'jigs pa ste/_/stobs po che la bsten par dka'/_/stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi po/_/rgyal po chen po'i mdun na rgyug_/de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi/_/
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor/_/gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams/_/de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/_/gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/_/chos bzhin mthun par blta zhing mchis/_/sa ga lngas rtsen zla ba dang /_/seng ge sde dang rab gnon dang /_/
[\[144a.2\]]ma la sbyin brtson drag po dang /_/gang po dang ni nor 'dzin dang /_/tsan+dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang /_/sna tshogs sde dang gtor ma len/_/yid bzhin rab 'byor bzhin bzang dang /_/'dam bu can dang shin tu rgyal/_/'dod pa thams cad 'byor pa dang /_/dbang po rgyal ba khyu mchog 
[\[144a.3\]]dang /_/nor bu bzang sras rdzogs bzang dang /_/'dam bu sa mchog 'dam bu dga'/_/khab kyi spu can ring bzang dang /_/lag mchog skye dgu'i bdag po dang /_/'dam bu'i rgyud dang mdung ring dang /_/rig pa stobs can nor bu dang /_/'jog po nag po chen po dang /_/la 
[\[144a.4\]]ba can dang dre'u dang gnyis/_/klu yi rgyal po sa srung bu/_/yan lag chen po rdzu 'phrul che/_/nam mkha' lding ni shugs chen ldan/_/'dab chags kun gyi mchog gyur pa/_/bya yi gzugs kyis mchi bgyid cing /_/rgya mtsho kun tu 'khrug par bgyid/_/lha dang lha min 
[\[144a.5\]]dri za rnams/_/'jigs par bgyid dang dge ba'ang rung /_/ma dad pa dang dad pa rnams/_/de dag thams cad 'dir mchis te/_/gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/_/chos bzhin mthun par blta zhing mchis/_/'phrog ma zhes bgyi gnod sbyin mo/_/'jigs par bgyid pa stobs 
[\[144a.6\]]chen mo/_/de yi bu ni lnga brgya rnams/_/'jigs bgyid gnod sbyin mthu rtsal can/_/bdag nyid kyi ni g.yog lags te/_/de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/_/gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/_/chos bzhin mthun par blta zhing mchis/_/ma ga d+hA na thams cad mthong /_/
[\[144a.7\]]ka shi ka ni pad+ma 'chang /_/yangs pa can na rgyal mchog gnas/_/gyad yul na ni grags 'dzin gnas/_/rgyal po'i khab na ku be ra/_/ser skya'i gnas na drag po ste/_/ta ma la na 'byor pa gnas/_/mi ti la na kun tu rgyal/_/ma mo chen mo 'di brgyad ni/_/gnod sbyin 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]rnams kyi sde dpon mchog_/rdzu 'phrul chen po skal ba che/_/stobs chen de dag thams cad ni/_/yid dge dad pa'i sems dang ldan/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la skyabs mchis pas/_/de dag dang ni 'dus nas kyang /_/rgyal po chen po stobs chen gyis/_/yang dag 
[\[144b.2\]]rdzogs sangs rgyas bstan la/_/mi rnams la ni snying brtse'i slad/_/gnod sbyin 'byung po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_/sdang ba'i gdon rnams bzlog pa dang /_/mi ma yin rnams bzlog pa yi/_/bsrung ba 'di ni legs par bgyis/_/de nas rgyal po rnam thos bu/_/thal sbyar 'dug 
[\[144b.3\]]ste smras pa ni/_/khon dang 'jigs pa kun 'das pa/_/rnam grol zag pa mi mnga' ba/_/gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/_/chos bzhin mthun par blta zhing mchis/_/khyod la lha dang grub pa dang /_/bram ze thams cad phyag 'tshal te/_/gnod sbyin bye ba drug khri dang /_/
[\[144b.4\]]bzhi stong dag kyang lhags nas ni/_/kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas/_/thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags/_/bdag ni rgyal po rnam thos bu/_/byang phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/_/'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du/_/gnod sbyin rgyu skar smyo byed dang /_/brjed byed 
[\[144b.5\]]dang ni mi 'am ci/_/skem byed dang ni rims drag dang /_/de bzhin rims nad zhag bzhi pa/_/de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_u ha haM/_u ha haM/_ma hA haM/_u ha ma hA haM/_sa la mu dzi/_i lI mi li/_i lI mi li/_ki lI mi li/_tsi ri Ti/_u b+hi 
[\[144b.6\]]u tu b+hi/_pi ti li ye/_ma Ta ma li/_ma nan+da ye swA hA/_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu lus ngan lcang lo can gyi bdag po phyogs skyong bar gyur cig_/gnod sbyin dang /_rgyu skar dang /_smyo byed dang /_brjed byed dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_gyen du rgyu dang /_rgyu ba dang /_'dun pa dang /_
[\[144b.7\]]ngan byed dang /_gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig_/lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/_de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/_/de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/_/kun mkhyen kun gzigs 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]khyod la 'dud/_/yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/_/chos bzhin mthun par blta zhing mchis/_/de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung /_/thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/_/chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa/_/sangs rgyas dpal la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/
[\[145a.2\]]gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/_/chos bzhin mthun par blta zhing mchis/_/gau tam khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/_/de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to/_/srin po mthong na rab 'jigs pa/_/stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams/_/kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas/_/thal mo 
[\[145a.3\]]sbyar te 'khod gyur lags/_/bdag ni rgyal po yul 'khor srung /_/shar phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/_/'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du/_/srin po rnams dang sha za dang /_/dri za dang ni rlung lha rnams/_/de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_
[\[145a.4\]]i ti mi TI/_khu ra Te/_phu ra Te/_ma ti bi ma Ti/_u ma Ni ak+ke/_mak+ke/_nak+ke/_a Tu mi/_ba Tu mi/_ma b+he/_e ri Ti/_pi ri Ti swA hA/_rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung phyogs skyong bar gyur cig_/srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dri za dang /_rlung lha dang /_mi 'am 
[\[145a.5\]]ci dang /_gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig_/lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/_de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/_/de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/_/kun mkhyen kun 
[\[145a.6\]]gzigs khyod la 'dud/_/yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/_/chos bzhin mthun par blta zhing mchis/_/de nas rgyal po 'phags skyes po/_/thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/_/'jig rten mgon po skyabs mdzad pa/_/'jig rten kun la phan pa mdzad/_/gau tam 
[\[145a.7\]]dpa' bo khyod la ni/_/chos bzhin mthun par blta zhing mchis/_/grul bum [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]srul po rnams/_/stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams/_/kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas/_/thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags/_/bdag ni rgyal po 'phags skyes po/_/lho phyogs 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]skyong bar bgyid pa ste/_/'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du/_/'byung po rgyu ba gzi byin 'phrog_/grul bum [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]srul po rnams/_/de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_a le/_i le le/_ki le ki le le/_ku pa ku pa sa/_si le si le le/_
[\[145b.2\]]si li li li/_li li li li li/_hi hi si le/_ma ti su ma ti/_su su ma ti/_su su su su/_su su ma ti/_hi li Sha hi li Sha swA hA/_rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po phyogs skyong bar gyur cig_/grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_srul po dang /_'byung po dang /_rgyu ba dang /_
[\[145b.3\]]gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig_/lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/_de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/_/de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/_/kun mkhyen kun gzigs 
[\[145b.4\]]khyod la 'dud/_/yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/_/chos bzhin mthun par blta zhing mchis/_/de nas rgyal po mig mi bzang /_/thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/_/mun par gyur pa'i 'jig rten la/_/bcom ldan lam rnams ston mdzad pa/_/gau tam dpa' bo 
[\[145b.5\]]khyod la ni/_/chos bzhin mthun par blta zhing mchis/_/'jig rten dag na nyi zla 'dra/_/rin chen snying po stobs po che/_/klu dang mkha' lding gsang ba pa/_/stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams/_/kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas/_/thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags/_/
[\[145b.6\]]bdag ni rgyal po mig mi bzang /_/nub phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/_/'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du/_/klu dang mkha' lding gsang ba pa/_/lha min dbang po stobs po che/_/de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_dge dge/_su ba ti ye/_pa 
[\[145b.7\]]Te/_aT/_ka maT+Te/_bi ma bi da ma/_bi da da ma/_b+hi da da ma ni/_a b+hi na me/_gats+tsha b+hu te/_da la phi ye/_ba ra sur+t+ra tsi tsi le/_tsi li li li li li li swA hA/_rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang phyogs skyong bar gyur cig_/klu dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_gsang ba pa dang /_lha 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]ma yin dang /_gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig_/lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/_de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/_/de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/_/
[\[146a.2\]]kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/_/yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/_/chos bzhin mthun par blta zhing mchis/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[146a.3\]]'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing gros mthun pa dang /_tshig mthun pa dang /_skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bsrung ba ste 'khor bzhi po rnams la yongs 
[\[146a.4\]]su khyab pa lags so/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i bar du bzlog par bgyi ba dang /_'khor bzhi po rnams la srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed pa dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_bde bar gnas par bgyid pa lags so/_/de skad ces 
[\[146a.5\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye rgyal po chen po dag rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po bzung zin no/_/bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po ngas yongs su bzung zin no/_/kye rgyal po chen po dag gzhan yang ngas bsil 
[\[146a.6\]]ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po la rjes su yi rang ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo brjod kyis/_de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo/_/zhes rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa nyan to/_/
[\[146a.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rin po che g.yas pas na bza' chos gos phye nas 'byung po'i tshogs de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ngas 'di bstan par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la dbye bar bya'o/_/thams cad la go bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rig sngags 'di bka' stsal to/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_hi lI hi lI/_b+hi si ni/_bak+ke_/a ha ra ye/_ta ma ti/_ta ma ti/_ti la bak+ke/_ba lI ta ke/_da ri ti na/_da d+hi na da/_phu T+yi phu phu T+yi/_gu T+yi gu gu T+yi/_hi tsa kAn+ti/_nA mA/_
[\[146b.2\]]kAn tI swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di bka' stsal pa na sa 'di kun tu g.yos/_'byung po thams cad rab tu 'dar nas kye ma kye hud kye ma sdug bsngal lo zhes sgra chen po byung ngo /_/srin po rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras te/_'di ltar yang dag 
[\[146b.3\]]rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sems can kun la thugs brtse nas/_/'byung po kun 'jigs nyen pa yi/_/rig sngags 'di 'dra srung bar mdzad/_/de nas kun mkhyen ston pa po/_/sems can kun la thugs brtse bas/_/gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang /_/klu dang 
[\[146b.4\]]mkha' lding gsang ba pa/_/'byung po rgyu ba gzi byin 'phrog_/grul bum [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]srul po dang /_/lha min gshed byed ro langs dang /_/brjed byed dang ni mi 'am ci/_/skem byed dang ni rims drag dang /_/de bzhin bram ze srin po dang /_/smyo byed rims 
[\[146b.5\]]nad zhag gsum pa/_/de bzhin zhag ni bzhi pa rnams/_/skrag cing rab tu 'dar 'gyur te/_/phyogs bcur rgyug pa gzigs nas kyang /_/de dag la ni thugs brtse'i phyir/_/rig sngags 'di ni brjod par mdzad/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_hi ri ma kha/_ti ri kha kha/_
[\[146b.6\]]ka Ta ma TA/_sid d+ha ma hA/_ha ta ri/_u Ta ta ni/_da Ta da Ta/_da ti li/_da mat+te/_da mat+te/_d+hu d+hu ri/_da da ri/_da ra mi ra/_ki ri kI ye/_ka ta ba re Ni/_su su mA le swA hA/_gsang sngags chen po rig sngags chen po 'di las 'gal bar ma byed cig_/bcom ldan 
[\[146b.7\]]'das kyi gsung gi chos la yang dag par so sor rtogs shig_/khyed kun lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye zhing 'khor bar 'gro ba re/_de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]mo sngon ma thos pa 'di thos nas skrag cing dngangs te mi dga' la skyi bung zhes byed nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing gros mthun pa dang /_tshig mthun pa dang /_skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sdang ba'i 'byung 
[\[147a.2\]]po zad bgyid pa/_/rig sngags 'di ni legs par gsungs/_/mi yi 'jig rten bde bgyid pa'i/_/rig sngags bdag cag brjod par 'tshal/_/de la rig sngags 'di lags te/_/'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_u hu ha la/_ku li 
[\[147a.3\]]dzi ba a b+hu ya/_ma su ra be la/_ad d+yA bad d+yA/_ad d+yA ba te/_nad da bad d+ye/_ma ru d+h+ya/_ma ru d+h+ya/_ba de ma ru da d+ya pha la swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa 'di gzung bar gsol/_s+yAd ya the dan/_i li i li/_mi li mi li/_ki li ki li/_ba na ra/_
[\[147a.4\]]ni la pa ya/_b+hu b+hu b+hu ra/_thi rU phu phu phu ra/_ga sha lI/_rau kha da ya ma la/_khu li khu li ba ya swA hA/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni lo gcig gi bar du mtshams gcod pa dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa dang /_don thams cad grub pa lags so/_/de nas gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[147a.5\]]srin po dang /_dri za nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo sngon ma thos pa 'di yang thos/_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bsrung ba sngon ma thos pa 'di yang thos nas skrag cing dngangs la mi dga' ste/_skyi bung zhes byed nas sa la 
[\[147a.6\]]'dzul kun tu 'dzul/_kun tu rab tu 'dzul bar byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa gzhi rdo rjer sprul nas de dag phyogs bzhir rgyug go/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis phyogs bzhir me'i phung po chen po sprul to/_/de nas nam mkha' la rgyug go/_/de nas bcom 
[\[147a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' gser du sprul to/_/de nas 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu lha dang dri zas bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_steng gi bar snang la 'phags nas gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod par byed pa'i bar rnams gzhom pa dang /_sems can thams cad 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]la snying brtse ba dang /_'byung po thams cad bzlog pa dang /_'khor bzhi po rnams bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir rig sngags 'di brjod do/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_gi mi gi mi gi mi gi mi/_gi ni 
[\[147b.2\]]gi ni gi ni gi ni/_na khi mi na khi/_ni Sha ni Sha ni Sha/_u ba a/_di shwa di shwa/_bi di sha/_sarba di shwa/_a d+hi ba ti/_gi ra/_bi sa/_dza ni b+hu mi pa ti/_i li lI/_i li lI/_ki li lI/_ki li ki li lI/_ki li ki li lI/_ki li ki li lI/_ki li ki li lI/_ki li ki li li/_ki li li 
[\[147b.3\]]li li li li/_ki li li li li li li li li/_ad d+yi/_nad d+yi/_ku nad d+yi/_ma hA ku nad d+yi/_ku lad d+yi khu lad d+yi/_khu khu lad d+yi ma hA khu lad d+yi/_hu lu hu lu/_lu/_hu lu lu lu/_hu lu lu lu lu/_hu lu lu lu lu/_lu/_hu lu lu lu lu lu lu lu lu lu/_lu/_ha la ha la/_hi li hi li/_
[\[147b.4\]]la ha ha lu/_hu le/_i ha/_hu le hu le/_u lad t+yi/_hi le/_u ha hi le/_hi la hi le/_hu lu/_hi/_hu lu hu lu hu lu/_hu lu hu le/_ha ha ha ha ha ha/_swA hA/_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs skyong bar gyur cig_/lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba 
[\[147b.5\]]mchis te/_de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/_/de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/_/kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog_/shes rab chen po khyod la 'dud/_/
[\[147b.6\]]gau tam khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/_/de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to/_/yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/_/chos bzhin mthun par blta zhing mchis/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus la babs pa 
[\[147b.7\]]las gud du deng shig_/gal te ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus las myur du gud du ma dong na/_de dag la myur du 'jigs pa chen po dang /_nad drag pos 'debs par 'gyur la/_de'i rkyen gyis mgo bo dang /_snying tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te/_de'i mod la sdug bsngal 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]du ma 'byung ba dang brlag pa dang mtha' med par 'gyur ro/_/'brum bu'i gdon gang yin pa dang /_skya rengs 'char ka'i gdon gang yin pa dang /_grib gnon gyi gdon gang yin pa de dag kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di thos nas ming 'di zhes bya ba'i 
[\[148a.2\]]lus las myur du gud du deng shig_/gal te myur du gud du ma dong na de dag la myur du 'jigs pa chen po dang /_nad drag pos 'debs par 'gyur la/_de'i rkyen gyis mgo bo dang /_snying tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te/_de'i mod la sdug bsngal du ma 'byung ba dang /_
[\[148a.3\]]brlag pa dang mtha' med par 'gyur ro/_/gzi byin dang ni khrag za ba/_/nyin mtshan rgyu ba gang yin pa/_/de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i/_/mdo bshad thos nas gtang bar gyis/_/sha za lus 'phags skem byed dang /_/'byung po 'jigs byed srul po 
[\[148a.4\]]rnams/_/de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i/_/mdo 'di bshad pa thos nas thong /_/lha dang lha min rlung lha dang /_/dri za dang ni gdon gyi bla/_/'byung po dang ni sha za dang /_/de bzhin gnod sbyin srin po rnams/_/kun tu 'khrugs shing kun tu g.yos/_/
[\[148a.5\]]skrag cing kun tu rab tu 'gul/_/gdon sdang gnod pa byed pa rnams/_/ltung zhing rab tu pham par 'gyur/_/sa gzhi dag kyang rab tu g.yos/_/sgra bo che dag sgrogs par byed/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang ni grul bum rnams/_/sdang ba'i gdon ni zlog byed pa'i/_/mdo 
[\[148a.6\]]'di dag ni thos gyur nas/_/'jigs pa drag pos 'debs par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/_/dad pa'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa/_/de dag mgu zhing yid dga' nas/_/legs par rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi bar snang las 
[\[148a.7\]]babs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing /_gros mthun pa dang /_tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di rgyal po chen po bzhis zhabs la phyag bgyis pa dang /_'khor bzhi po rnams srung ba dang /_yongs su skyob pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams 'joms pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[148b.2\]]'das dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma gang la bsrung ba dang /_de dag gis kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di gzung bar bgyi/_bcang bar bgyi/_brjod par bgyi/_kun chub par bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/_
[\[148b.3\]]dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la bdag bsrung ba dang /_bdag sba ba dang /_gzhan bsrung ba dang /_gzhan sba ba'i slad du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_brjod pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa de la ni gnod 
[\[148b.4\]]sbyin dang /_srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams nye 'khor du yang gnas par mi 'gyur na/_gnod par bgyid pa lta ga la sems lags/_de gang du mtshan gcig tsam gnas pa der yang gnod sbyin dang /_srin po nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i bar rnams nye 'khor du yang gnas 
[\[148b.5\]]par mi 'gyur na/_de gang du rtag tu gnas pa der lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la mi ma lags pa'i gnod pas thebs pa de'i mdun du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di brjod na/_de myur ba kho nar bde legs dang /_nad ma mchis pa dang /_bde 
[\[148b.6\]]bar 'gyur zhing thar bar 'gyur la/_mi ma lags pa rnams de la log pa mi bgyid cing myur du gud du mchi bar 'gyur lags te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di de ltar don che ba lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge 
[\[148b.7\]]bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_brjod pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_sbyor bar bgyid pa de la ni dad pa can gyi gnod sbyin dge bsnyen rnams rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gnas su mchis nas ming smos par bgyid 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]de/_kye rgyal bo chen po dag dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma che ge mo zhig bdag bsrung ba dang /_bdag sba ba dang /_gzhan bsrung ba dang /_gzhan sba ba'i phyir bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin par byed/_'chang bar 
[\[149a.2\]]byed/_rjod par byed/_kun chub par byed/_sbyor bar byed do zhes sgrogs par bgyid lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dad pa can gyi gnod sbyin dge bsnyen rnams rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du mchis nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i mdun du gnod sbyin rnams 
[\[149a.3\]]'dus shing 'byung po thams cad tshogs pa'i nang du yang bsgrags nas/_der de dag mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/_dge 
[\[149a.4\]]slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la bdag bsrung ba dang /_bdag sba ba dang /_gzhan bsrung ba dang /_gzhan sba ba'i slad du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_brjod pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_sbyor bar 
[\[149a.5\]]bgyid pa de ni tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o/_/chang mi btung ba dang /_dran pa dang /_shes bzhin can du mchis pa dang /_zas rnam pa lnga la 'di lta ste/_bu ram dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_til dang /_sha dang /_nya sha rnams yongs su spang bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du 
[\[149a.6\]]zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin dang /_srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_brjod pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_sbyor ba de la de'i skabs kho nar brlag pa dang /_mtha' 
[\[149a.7\]]ma mchis par bgyid pa dag mchis te/_de dag gzhom pa'i slad du yi dam bgyi 'tshal lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]dang /_brjod pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_sbyor bar bgyid pa de la ni dad pa can gyi gnod sbyin dge bsnyen rnams gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_bro gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis spro ba bskyed par bgyid de/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[149b.2\]]ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan mu stegs can bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la ma dad pa dang /_mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_gnod par 'tshal ba dang /_sman par mi 'tshal ba dang /_
[\[149b.3\]]grub pa dang /_bde bar mi 'tshal ba gang la la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_brjod pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_sbyor bar bgyid pa de la ni don de 'grub par mi bgyid de/_mi ma lags pa rnams kyis bar ma dor 'gums 
[\[149b.4\]]pa dang /_sdug bsngal du ma 'byung ba dang /_brlag pa dang /_mtha' ma mchis par bgyid lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni de dag la gnod par 'tshal ba dang /_sman par mi 'tshal ba dang /_grub pa dang /_bde bar mi 'tshal ba lags pa'i slad du ste/_de dag 
[\[149b.5\]]la ni log par lta ba gang lags pa de brlag par bgyid lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na sems can rnams bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i slad du rgyal po chen po bzhis bsrung ba bgyis pa gang ci yang rung ba'i bsrung ba de dag gi nang na ni 'di mchog 
[\[149b.6\]]dang /_gtso bo dang /_rab mchog lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/mi mchog gang zhig mdo 'di dag_/yongs su rdzogs par bsrung ba dang /_/bde legs bgyid pa de la ni/_/srin po rnams 
[\[149b.7\]]kyang 'tshe mi bgyid/_/su yang rung ste mdo 'di dag_/mi mchog gis ni gsungs pa bzhin/_/yongs su rdzogs shing ma chad par/_/shin tu tshang bar 'chang bgyid na/_/de la gnod sbyin [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_/'byung po grul bum srin po dang /_/smyo byed rgyu ba klu rnams dang /_/
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]de lta bu dag 'tshe mi bgyid/_/de la mi ma lags dang gdon/_/myur du gud du mchi bar 'gyur/_/de la cis kyang mi tshugs te/_/de la 'tshe bar yong mi nus/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi po yis/_/bcom ldan phyag 'tshal zhes brjod de/_/sangs rgyas zhabs 
[\[150a.2\]]la phyag 'tshal nas/_/de nyid du ni mi snang gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i mtshan mo 'das te nam langs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la bzhugs te dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mdang sum rgyal po chen po bzhi bu dang bcas/_blon po 
[\[150a.3\]]dang bcas/_'khor dang bcas/_mngag gzhug pa dang bcas/_pho nya dang bcas/_g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa kha dog 'phags pa dag nam sros nas lhags nas gros mthun par dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du 'ongs te/_rang gi 'od kyis snang bar byas nas lus ngan dang /_
[\[150a.4\]]yul 'khor srung dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_'phags skyes po rnams nga ga la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/_nga'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_rgyal po chen po bzhis nga'i thad du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo 
[\[150a.5\]]chen po 'di brjod nas dong ngo /_/khyod kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dang /_dge 
[\[150a.6\]]slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di rgyas par bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma de dag yi rangs te/_bcom 
[\[150a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'di'i cho ga ni zas dkar gsum za ba dang /_legs par khrus byas pa dang /_smyung ba byas pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ldan pa dang /_bsam pa rgya chen po dang ldan pas rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gzugs ldong ros sam btsag gis 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]bris la/_spos thams cad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du brjod par bya'o/_/bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_dz+nyA na sid+d+hi dang /_shAkya pra b+ha dang /_lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes 
[\[150b.2\]]bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos te gtan la phab pa//_//phyis 'gos gzhon nu dpal gyis chag lo tsA ba'i phyag dpe las zhus so//[ {D563}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma hA man+t+ra a nu d+hA ra Ni sU tra/_
[\[150b.3\]]bod skad du/_gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin pa'i mdo/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun nyan thos dang bcas 
[\[150b.4\]]pa yang dag par song ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/_rig sngags 'di ni don du bsgrub/_/rig sngags 'di dag grub gyur cig_/gang phyir don du bsgrubs pa yi/_/don de yang ni grub par shog_/'di skad bdag gis 
[\[150b.5\]]thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang 
[\[150b.6\]]bcas pa dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo 
[\[150b.7\]]bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]rnams su dbang phyug la dbang bgyid pa lags te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'tshal na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bsrung ba dang yongs su skyob par bgyid/_yongs su bzung ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid lags so/_/btsun pa 
[\[151a.2\]]bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi mnga' bdag bcom ldan 'das ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su dbang phyug la mnga' mdzad pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bsrung ba dang /_yongs su skyob 
[\[151a.3\]]pa dang /_yongs su bzung ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad pa lags na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde 
[\[151a.4\]]legs su 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo /_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas gnas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur 
[\[151a.5\]]to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang bcas pa dang /_rgyal po chen 
[\[151a.6\]]po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_'phrog ma bu dang bcas g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams nga ga la ba der lhags te 'ongs nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa 
[\[151a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su dbang phyug la dbang bgyid pa lags te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'tshal na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bsrung bar bgyid/_yongs su skyob par bgyid/_yongs su bzung ba dang /_
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid lags so/_/btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi mnga' bdag bcom ldan 'das kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su dbang phyug la mnga' mdzad pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhed na stong 
[\[151b.2\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad lags na/_bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su 
[\[151b.3\]]bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol to/_/dge slong dag ngas kyang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas mi mjed kyi 
[\[151b.4\]]bdag po tshangs pas ngas cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin pa 'di ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang 
[\[151b.5\]]gsungs so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/da ltar byung ba na yang 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di nyid la phan par bya ba'i phyir da ltar nga nyid kyis bshad do/_/
[\[151b.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin pa 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/shod cig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/kun dga' 
[\[151b.7\]]bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin pa 'di ni 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba dang bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_u bud d+he/_ni bud d+he/_bi bud d+he/_sa ma bud d+he/_bi shwaSh+Ta bud d+he/_i ha bud d+he/_tat+t+ra bud d+he/_ni yaM ga me/_tsha bi la/_a phu la/_ta phu la/_
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]tA le mA le/_maM ga ga maM ga ma nan/_i ma/_ma bid+yA/_hu du me hu hu me/_pUr+b+ba pra ha re/_kun dga' bo yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gsang sngags stobs dang /_mthu rtsal dang ldan pa 'di 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[152a.2\]]kyis kyang gsungs so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/da ltar byung ba na yang 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di nyid la phan par bya ba'i phyir da ltar nga nyid kyis bshad do/_/ngas rig 
[\[152a.3\]]sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o/_/mtshams bcad do/_/shar phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams bcad do/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyi bar du yang rgyang grags gcig tshun 
[\[152a.4\]]chad mtshams bcad do/_/tad+ya thA/_sa mu tsa bi mu tsa/_pha la mu tsa/_dza ga d+ha ra/_ma da s+tha la/_na la ka ma ga_/sa mu shwa bA ti/_bi muk+ti/_yo ga_/hi na sa ga ma/_a ra da mu la/_bi haM ga mi/_i di tsi ri/_bi ta lA kha yo/_ma kha yo/_la ga b+hi d+ha ra Ni/_pra ti prA yo gi/_a tsakra pa ti/_sa ma sra ba 
[\[152a.5\]]ti/_i lA ya/_mi lA ya/_ba hu sad d+ya/_a na ta ma/_ar+tha ba ti ga ra ba ti/_ti khi ni ti be/_a ka na ti/_sa ka na ti/_sa mi di ma/_ba su ba Te/_a Te/_a Te/_taT+Ta/_kha ru smin/_kha ru smin/_la ha taM/_la hu taM/_sam+b+ha ra/_sam+b+ha ra/_bi ti ra na taM/_ni ru taM/_i la/_ta i la/_sa ra pha la/_ba hu pha la/_sa ta ma ta/_daMSh+Ti ma ta/_
[\[152a.6\]]kun dga' bo yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gsang sngags kyi stobs dang /_mthu rtsal dang ldan pa 'di dag ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[152a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/da ltar byung ba na yang ngas bshad do/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang bshad do/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang bshad do/_/rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang bshad do/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis kyang 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]bshad do/_/'phrog ma bu dang bcas g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas kyang bshad do/_/kun dga' bo dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa 'di bzung nas ji ltar bstan pa dang /_ji ltar kun 
[\[152b.2\]]chub par byas pa de bzhin du shes sam/_mthong ngam/_las su byed pa de la ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar 
[\[152b.3\]]byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bkas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o/_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung bar bya'o/_/yongs su zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o/_/
[\[152b.4\]]mtshams bcad do/_/shar phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams bcad do/_/de bzhin du nub phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams bcad do/_/lho phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams bcad do/_/byang phyogs su rgyang grags gcig 
[\[152b.5\]]tshun chad mtshams bcad do/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams bcad do/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po chen po bzhi'i lam dang lam ma yin pa na gnas pa bzhi yod de/_de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste bkra shis ldan dang /_kun 
[\[152b.6\]]bshes dang /_gang po dang dga' ba'i dpal rnams te/_gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang /_rus shes pa de la ni rgyal po chen po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang /_me'i 'jigs pa dang /_chu'i 'jigs pa dang /_mi'i 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[152b.7\]]mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/kun dga' bo lag na rdo rje'i phu bo lag myur zhes bya ba grong khyer khor yug ces bya ba na gnas pa yod de/_gang de'i ming shes pa dang /_rus shes pa de la ni des srung bar byed/_yongs su skyob par byed/_yongs su 'dzin par byed/_
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]chad pa zlog par byed zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar byed do/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba'i phyir lag na rdo rje'i phu bo lag myur la gsol lo/_/gsol ba 'debs so/_/'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 
[\[153a.2\]]bkas gang ming 'di zhes bya ba la skabs tshol ba dang /_glags lta ba'i gnod sbyin nam/_srin po'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_sha za'am/_grul bum mam/_srul po'am/_lus srul po rnams kyis bdag la glags rnyed par ma gyur cig_/bdag la klan ka rnyed par ma gyur cig_/
[\[153a.3\]]kun dga' bo srin mo chen mo bcu bzhi yod de/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na yang bsrung bsrung /_bltams pa'i tshe na yang bsrung bsrung /_bltams zin pa'i 'og tu yang bsrung bsrung /_sku 'khrungs pa na yang bsrung bsrung ste/_bcu bzhi 
[\[153a.4\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste stobs ldan dang /_dri med dang /_sgra chen dang /_rab mnyen dang /_'jigs byed ma dang /_'dzam bu'i mgrin dang /_mchog len dang /_bla ma dang /_grags ldan ma dang /_rmad grags dang /_'thab dga' dang /_rtse mo dga' dang /_sa 'dzin dang /_'thab 'jug rnams 
[\[153a.5\]]te/_gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang /_rus shes pa de la ni de dag gis srung bar byed/_yongs su skyob pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin par byed/_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar byed do/_/kun dga' bo srin mo brgyad yod de/_de dag ni skyes pa dang bud med gnyid log kyang rung /_ma log kyang rung ste/_
[\[153a.6\]]gzi byin 'phrog par byed do/_/de dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_rwa dang /_thub med dang /_ngan slob dang /_phra ma can dang /_bran mo dmar mo dang /_rab chen dang /_mig bzang dang /_brgyad pa ste 'jigs byed do/_/gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang rus shes pa de la ni de dag gis srung bar byed do/_/yongs su 
[\[153a.7\]]skyob pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang chad pa zlog par byed do/_/kun dga' bo srin mo bdun yod de/_de dag ni khrag gi dri tshor na dpag tshad brgyar yang rgyug go/_/de dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_gzi brjid mchog dang /_dga' brtsegs dang /_sna tshogs sbyin 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]spong dang /_bran mo dkar mo bzang dang /_'jug 'dod dang /_grong khyer khor yug dang /_bdun pa ste ri bsrung ngo /_/gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang /_rus shes pa de la ni de dag gis srung bar byed do/_/yongs su skyob pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur 
[\[153b.2\]]ba dang /_chad pa zlog par byed do/_/kun dga' bo srin mo nag mo chen mo zhes bya ba bu stong yod pa rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas pa mtshan gcig gis dpag tshad brgyad khrir phyin pa zhig yod de/_gang de'i ming shes pa dang rus shes pa de la ni des srung bar byed/_yongs su skyob pa dang /_

[\[153b.4\]]dang /_rjes su myos dang /_stobs kyis rgyags dang /_'od ma'i sbubs dang /_lnga pa ste 'byor ldan no/_/gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang /_rus shes pa de la ni de dag gis srung bar byed/_yongs su skyob pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 
[\[153b.5\]]'gyur ba dang /_chad pa zlog par byed do/_/de bas na bdag gis ming 'di zhes bya ba'i phyir srin mo lnga gnod sbyin 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun dang bcas pa de dag la gsol lo/_/gsol ba 'debs so/_/'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas

[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]pa byas pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba byas pa dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa bzlog par byas pa de la ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye 
[\[154a.2\]]dgu dang /_lha dang /_mir bcas pa dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na mi'am/_mi ma yin pa'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_srin po'am/_lha ma yin nam/_dri za'am/_klu'am/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_gsang ba pa'am/_
[\[154a.3\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_sha za'am/_ro langs sam/_byad stems sam/_gshed byed dam/_srul po'am/_lus srul po'am/_smyo byed dang /_brjed byed glags lta ba dang /_klan ka tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed pa'i sems can gang yang ngas yang dag par ma mthong ste de ni

[\[154b.1\]]dang /_gseb lam bsrung ba thams cad dang /_la gcan bsrung ba thams cad dang /_sho gam gyi gnas bsrung ba de dag thams cad myos par bya'o/_/rnam par myos par bya'o/_/rengs pa dang /_rmugs pa dang /_lag pa gzung ba dang /_rkang pa gzung ba dang /_sems gzung ba dang /_lce gzung

[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]gis 'jig rten du sems can brjed ngas pa med pa'i chos can byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni dus su yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no zhes bya ba dang /_kun dga' bo gzhan yang tshangs par spyod pa la phan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas tshigs su

[\[155a.4\]]'gyur ba dang /_ston par 'gyur ba yang yod de/_de dag bstan pa 'di la zhugs pa'i mi rnams kyi khar brjod na/_gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams kyang bran bzhin du las byed par 'gyur ro/_/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i tshig bden pa rnams la 'jig rten gyi tshig

[\[155a.6\]]skyi bung zhes byed pa med pa'o zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni dus su yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin te/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba la bde legs su gyur cig_/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub dang /_

[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]spyod pa mngon par spyad pa rnams kyi mchog 'di lta ste dge slong kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_'dod pa nyung ba dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas pa dang /_chog shes pa rnams kyi mchog 'od srung chen po dang shes rab che ba dang spobs pa che ba rnams kyi mchog sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu

[\[155b.3\]]gus pa rnams kyi mchog sgra gcan zin dang /_mal cha dang /_stan bsgo ba rnams kyi mchog gyad bu nor dang /_seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams kyi mchog b+ha ra dwa dza bsod snyoms len dang /_khyim pa dad pa bskyed pa rnams kyi mchog nag po 'char ka dang /_lha dang mis mchod pa rnams kyi mchog legs

[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o/_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang chad pa bzlog par bya'o/_/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis tshogs sam/_'dus pa'am/_mang po'am/_'khor ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gi nang

[\[157a.1\]{D564}]@##/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya mA rI tsI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags ma 'od zer can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom 
[\[157a.2\]]ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom 
[\[157a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lha mo 'od zer can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de nyi ma dang /_zla ba'i mdun dang mdun nas 'gro ste/_de [(]bltar [,]ltar [)]med/_gzung du med/_bcing du med/_dgag tu med/_brgal du med/_rmongs par 
[\[157a.4\]]byar med/_chad pas gcad du med/_mgo breg tu med/_gzhur med/_tshig par byar med/_dgra'i dbang du mi 'gro'o/_/dge slong dag gang gis kyang lha mo 'od zer can de'i ming shes pa de yang bltar med/_gzung du med/_bcing du med/_dgag tu med/_brgal du med/_rmongs 
[\[157a.5\]]par byar med/_chad pas gcad du med/_mgo breg tu med/_gzhur med/_tshig par byar med/_de dgra'i dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar bdag gis kyang lha mo 'od zer can gyi ming shes kyis bdag kyang bltar med par gyur cig_/gzung du med par gyur cig_/
[\[157a.6\]]bcing du med par gyur cig_/dgag tu med par gyur cig_/brgal du med par gyur cig_/rmongs par byar med par gyur cig_/chad pas gcad du med par gyur cig_/mgo breg tu med par gyur cig_/gzhur med par gyur cig_/tshig par byar med par gyur cig_/
[\[157a.7\]]dgra'i dbang du mi 'gro bar gyur cig_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di rnams yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_oM pa tA kra ma si/_pa rA kra ma si/_u da ya ma si/_nai ra ma si/_ar+k+ka ma si/_mar+k+ka ma si/_ur ma ma si/_ba na ma si/_gul ma ma si/_tsI ba ra ma si/_ma hA tsI ba ra ma si/_

[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]an tar d+h+waM na ma si swA hA/_oM lha mo 'od zer can bdag lam du skyobs shig_/bdag lam log pa las skyobs shig_/bdag skye bo'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag rgyal po'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag glang po che'i 'jigs 
[\[158a.2\]]pa las skyobs shig_/bdag chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag klu'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag seng ge'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag stag gi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag me'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/
[\[158a.3\]]bdag chu'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag sbrul gyi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag dug gi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra thams cad las skyobs shig_/'khrugs pa dang /_ma 'khrugs pa dang /_nyams pa dang ma nyams 
[\[158a.4\]]pa thams cad du bdag seng ge las srungs shig_/bdag stag las srungs shig_/bdag klu las srungs shig_/bdag sbrul las srungs shig swA hA/_bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrugs pa thams cad las srungs shig
