[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad las bdag la srungs shig_/srungs shig_/rgyal bar mdzad ma rgyal bar mdzod cig_/ta ra ta ra ta ra/_ma hA ba ta ra Ne/_ku Te ku Te/_mu ku Te/_badzra ku Te swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[189a.2\]]kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/_/sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde bar bya ba dang /_snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs te/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di smras pa ni 
[\[189a.3\]]sems can chen po lag na rdo rje khyod yang legs so/_/lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i lag na yod pa dang /_lus la yod pa dang /_glegs bam la yod pa dang /_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/_
[\[189a.4\]]gtsug lag khang ngam/_gnas khang ngam/_'chag sa'am/_dgon pa'i gnas na yod pa der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul de la srung ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mi 'ong 
[\[189a.5\]]ngo /_/mi ngas mi 'ong ngo /_/dgra mi 'byung ngo /_/sa phyogs der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas te/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul de la srung ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mi 'ong ngo /_/dgra mi 'byung ngo /_/sa phyogs der 
[\[189a.6\]]rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rgyu zhing der srung ba dang /_yongs su skyob pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_yongs su skyong ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spong ba dang /_mtshon cha spong ba dang /_dug 
[\[189a.7\]]gzhil ba dang /_dug bsad pa dang /_dug gzhig pa dang /_mi mdza' ba bzlog pa dang /_mtshams bcad pa dang /_sa bcing ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_ta pa ne/_ta pa ne/_ta pa ne/_pra ta pa ne/_pra ta pa ne/_pra ta pa ne/_d+hu ru me/_d+hu ru me/_d+hu ru me/_ma hA d+hu ru me/_bud+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/_
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]mu khe mu khe su mu khe/_sra la pra tis mA d+hi sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/_mA na si/_phu ru phu ru/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_bud+d+ha mA na si ke swA hA/_lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o/_/gsang ba'i gnas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen no/_/de bzhin 
[\[189b.2\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/lag na rdo rje mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di glegs bam la legs par bris te 'chang ngam/_lus la yod par byas te 'chang ngam/_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa 
[\[189b.3\]]dang /_me tog sna tshogs kyi rgyan rnams kyis de la bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed cing mchod na/_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu mi'i rgyal po de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing /_phyir rgol ba thams cad las srung bar byed 
[\[189b.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/mi'i bdag po dbang po de la dgra dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis glags mi rnyed do/_/yul der pha rol gyi dpung mi 'jug go/_/'jug na yang de dag la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bgegs byed par 'gyur te/_bgegs sna tshogs brgya dag dang /_bgegs sna 
[\[189b.5\]]tshogs stong dag byed par 'gyur ro/_/mi'i rgyal po de dag gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du gzhag par bya'o/_/gang du g.yul 'gyed dam/_dgra chen po dang 'thab pa der yang rig sngags 
[\[189b.6\]]kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di mgul du btags te g.yul ngor zhugs na/_der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de la gnod pa 'dis gnod par byed de/_de pham par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di su'i mgul du 
[\[189b.7\]]thogs pa de ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/_gtsug lag khang gang du nang 'go ba sna tshogs dang /_mi ngas mi bzad pa chen po byung ba der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di la me tog sna tshogs 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]kyi bla re bres la gtor ma'i cho ga gzhong khung bzhi ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bkang ste phyogs bzhir bzhag la/_de rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di bklags na der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas te gnod sbyin bye ba 
[\[190a.2\]]khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu nad 'go ba dang /_mi ngas de rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di'i gong na rig sngags ches stobs dang ldan pa'am/_gzi brjid che ba'am/_
[\[190a.3\]]rdzu 'phrul che ba'am/_mthu che ba ni gang yang ma mchis te/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog lags so/_/yul gang dag tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_badzre badzre/_a 
[\[190a.4\]]mi ta badzre/_dz+wa li ta badzre/_hu ta sha ni/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_dzam+b+ha ya/_dzam+b+ha ya/_stam+b+ha ya/_stam+b+ha ya/_sarba duSh+Ta gra hA nAM/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_gra sa gra sa gra sa/_pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/_ta Ta ta Ta ta Ta/_mu ru mu ru mu ru/_d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma/_dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/_khu khu re/_khu khu re/_khu khu 
[\[190a.5\]]re/_khu khu me/_khu khu me/_khu khu me/_g+ho ri/_g+ho ri/_g+ho ri/_badzra mA na si/_badzra hu ti/_phu ru phu ru phu ru/_gra sa gra sa gra sa/_sarba i ti te shi nAM/_su ru me/_mu mu le/_badzra pra ti pa ti/_sarba ba le phu swA hA/_a lu pa la ni tsu tsu re swA hA/_dza ye dza ye/_dza ya sam+b+ha be swA hA/_dza yot+ta me swA hA/_
[\[190a.6\]]dzaya bar de swA hA/_dza yan+d+ha re swA hA/_dza ya ma ni swA hA/_dza ya badz+wA ya swA hA/_a dzi ta badzrA ya swA hA/_ma hA badzra hu ta sha nA ya swA hA/_a mo g+ha badzra hastA ya swA hA/_de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[190a.7\]]'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsrung ba stsal bar bgyi ste/_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]chad pa spong ba dang /_mtshon cha spong ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_mi mdza' ba bzlog pa dang /_dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad dgag pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_khrag khrug thams cad dang /_'jigs 
[\[190b.2\]]pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o/_/mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_dza ye dza ye dza ye/_ma hA dza ye/_mi li mi li/_mA na si/_dz+hu dz+hu dz+hu/_dz+hu ru me/_mu ru mu ru/_tu Tu tu Tu tu Tu/_mu lu le swA hA/_mA rga ba tI d+hud+hu me be ge_/be ga d+ha ri Ni/_te dza ba ti/_'jigs pa dang /_
[\[190b.3\]]gnod pa thams cad dang /_dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs shing /_byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/_/
[\[190b.4\]]tad+ya thA/_bud+d+he bud+d+he/_bud+d+he bud+d+he/_bud+d+he bud+d+he/_ba tI/_bud+d+ha a ba b+hA sa ni/_d+harma ba tI/_sa ma hi te/_sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/_bud+d+ha a ti ga me bud+d+ha bi hA re/_d+harma a ba b+hA sa ne swA hA/_gang la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'gal bar bgyid na/_de'i mgo sid+d+ha ka bzhin 
[\[190b.5\]]du tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro/_/su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_rgyal po'i pho 
[\[190b.6\]]brang ngam/_gtsug lag khang du glegs bam gnas par bgyid na/_der tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rig sngags 'chang de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing dpag tshad brgya stong tshun chad du slar rgol ba dang /_dgra rnams las thams 
[\[190b.7\]]cad du bsrung ba dang /_mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/_/g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_khrag khrug dang /_'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/_/slar bzlog par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]po rnam thos kyi bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rgyal po chen po legs so legs so legs so/_/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_snying brtse ba dang /_bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni sems can chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa byed pa khyod yang 
[\[191a.2\]]legs so/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'dis su la bsrung ba byas pa dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs so/_/dug dang /_dbyig dug dang /_byad dang /_gshed 
[\[191a.3\]]byed dang /_rims nad nas gdon thams cad kyi bar gyis de la mi tshugs so/_/pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa yin no/_/lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi 
[\[191a.4\]]rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/lag na rdo rje phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po mdangs 'phrog pa drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/_
[\[191a.5\]]shin tu mi bzad pa dag dang /_chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i rgyal po tshe thung ba chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di sems kyi rgyud mi mnyam pa/_mi bzad pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dag dang /_sems can sdang ba 
[\[191a.6\]]thams cad kyi don dang /_tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs te phyag rgyas btab pa yin no/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 
[\[191a.7\]]chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba po'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya zhes bya bar zung shig_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[191b.2\]]kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon 
[\[191b.3\]]par bstod do//_//'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[191b.4\]{D568}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dza yab tI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya 
[\[191b.5\]]rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[191b.6\]]ces gsol to/_/sems can thams cad la sman pa dang /_mi'i rgyal po rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas bcom 
[\[191b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs pa/_byin gyis 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]brlabs pa/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_snying brtse ba'i phyir nga yang nga lhar 'chad pa 'di zung shig_/tad+ya thA/_dza ye dza ye/_ma hA dza ya ba tI ye/_bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te ye/_d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/_bud+d+ha a d+hi ga me dz+nyAn a ba b+hA se swA hA/_lag 
[\[192a.2\]]na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams te/_lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i tshig 'di dag gang gis lus la btags sam/_glegs bam la bris pa de'i lus dpag tshad stong tshun chad du phyir rgol 
[\[192a.3\]]ba'i gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mtshon dang /_dug dang /_dbyig dug gis mi tshugs so/_/rgyal po de'i yul der pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo /_/phyir rgol ba dag yul 'khor der mthus gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 
[\[192a.4\]]rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di yi ger bris te 'chang ba de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de'i lus la mtshon dang /_dug dang /_chu dang /_rims dang /_dug sbyar ma gzhan gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/de la dgra'i 'jigs pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_tho 'tsham pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[192a.5\]]rgyal po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_'thab mo'i nang du song yang de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi phog_/thams cad du yang de rgyal ba smra bar 'gyur/_gnod pa med cing ma snad la ma smas par rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di'i mthu dang /_gzi brjid dang /_
[\[192a.6\]]stobs dang /_byin gyi rlabs kyis rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_dza ye dza ye/_dza yot+ta me/_d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/_bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_bo b+ha ni/_bo d+ha ni/_bo d+ha ni/_ta thA ga ta/_a d+hiSh+Thi ti/_a ba ro ha Ni/_a ro bya ni/_dza ya ku su me/_swa re/_sa ra ba tI/_dr-i D+he dr-i D+he/_da dA dr-i D+he 
[\[192a.7\]]pA sha ri bad+d+he/_o ha ni/_mo ha ni/_dzam+b+ha ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_stam+b+hi ta/_sarba a hi tiSh+Thi NAM/_na mo b+ha ga ba ti/_bud+d+ha s+ya/_ma hA ka ru NAM/_bi ha ri ni/_sid+d+h+yan tu man+t+ra pa dA swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]rgyas kyi mthu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis bdag gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_dza ya dza ya dza ya/_pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/_dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/_badzra pra ha ra pra ha ra pra ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra 
[\[192b.2\]]d+ha ra/_ha ra ha ra ha ra/_b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/_dza ya ku su me/_ba la ba la/_tsakra tsakra/_pI Da ya pI Da ya/_a kra ma/_a kra ma/_bi kra me/_bi kra me/_a tsa le/_ma tsa le/_kha ga tsA ri Ni/_nI la ba tI/_badzra pra ha ra ni/_badzra sam+b+ha be/_badzra kA ye/_bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/_bud+d+ha 
[\[192b.3\]]rasmi ma hA pra b+he/_uts+tsha skan+d+he ma hA te dza ba tI/_ma tsa le/_ma tsa le/_d+hu na d+hu na d+hu na/_ka kaM re/_kA si ni/_sa mA hi te/_d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/_tsa ra tsa ra/_g+hu g+hu De/_badzra mA lA d+ha ri/_sa ra sa ra/_ka la ka la ba ri NI swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni 
[\[192b.4\]]sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa ste/_su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'da' bar bgyid pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'khus par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_lha'am/_klu 'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_srin po 'am/_yi 
[\[192b.5\]]dgas sam/_sha za 'am/_brjed byed dam/_gsod byed dam/_byad dam/_ro langs sam/_bkra mi shis pa'am/_ma mo'i gdon nam/_gong ma'i gdon nam/_skem byed dam/_skem byed kyi gdon nam/_dri za'i gdon de dag thams cad rmugs par bgyis so/_/rengs par 
[\[192b.6\]]bgyis so/_/tad+ya thA/_badzre badzre badzre/_ha na badzre ni ha na badzre/_khA da khA da badzre Na/_s+phA Ta ya/_s+phA Ta ya/_badzre Na/_i daM gr-i ha na/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_gra sa gra sa gra sa/_pA ta ya/_pA ta ya/_pA ta ya/_d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/_bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang /_gnod 
[\[192b.7\]]pa thams cad dang /_'thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad las srungs shig_/dza ya kA ri/_dza yaM ku ru/_ta ra ta ra ta ra/_ma hA ta ra Ne/_ku Te ku Te ku Te/_badzra ku Te swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]zhes bya ba byin te/_lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/_/lag na rdo rje sems can chen po khyod sems can rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs pa yang legs so/_/lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i lag tu song ste/_
[\[193a.2\]]lus la btags sam/_glegs bam la bris sam/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_gnas khang ngam/_'chag sa na spyod par 'gyur ba der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas pas grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_
[\[193a.3\]]grong rdal lam/_yul de bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/sa phyogs der mi ngas mi 'byung ngo /_/dgra ni 'byung ngo /_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang /_lhan 
[\[193a.4\]]cig der bsrung ngo /_/yongs su bskyab bo/_/yongs su 'dzin to/_/zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar byed do/_/chad pa spong ngo /_/mtshon cha spong ngo /_/dug gsod do/_/mi mdza' ba 'gog go/_/mtshams gcod do/_/sa gcod do/_/tad+ya thA/_ta pa ni ta pa ni/_pra ta pa ni/_d+hu ru 
[\[193a.5\]]me/_d+hu ru me/_bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/_mu khe/_mu khe/_su mu khe/_su mu khe/_pra la pra la te/_sa mA d+hi te/_sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/_sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/_mA na si/_phu ru phu ru phu ru d+hu ru/_bud+d+ha mA na si ke swA hA/_lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o/_/gsang 
[\[193a.6\]]ba'i gnas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/lag na rdo rje mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di glegs bam la legs par bris te 'chang ngam/_lus 
[\[193a.7\]]la btags te 'chang zhing de la spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_me tog sna tshogs kyi lhab lhub kyis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed na/_mi'i rgyal po de la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin phyi bzhin 'brang ba/_bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/mi'i rgyal po de la phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do/_/mthus yul der 'jug pa dang /_bgegs 'jug na yang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bgegs sna tshogs brgya dang /_
[\[193b.2\]]bgegs sna tshogs stong byed par 'gyur ro/_/mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du bkur bar bya'o/_/gang du g.yul dor 'jug gam/_dgra chen po dang 'thab pa der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen 
[\[193b.3\]]mo rgyal ba can 'di mgul du btags te/_g.yul dor zhugs na der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de pham par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i mgul du btags pa de rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje 
[\[193b.4\]]grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du gal te nad 'go ba sna tshogs dang /_mi ngas mi bzang pa chen po byung na der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di dang me tog sna tshogs dang /_cho ga dang /_gtor ma dang /_bum pa btung ba 
[\[193b.5\]]sna tshogs kyis bkang ba bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag ste/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di bklags na de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas shing /_gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu nad 'go ba dang /_mi ngas de rab tu zhi bar 
[\[193b.6\]]byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di las lhag pa'i rig sngags ches stobs dang ldan pa'am/_gzi brjid che ba'am/_rdzu 'phrul che ba'am/_mthu che ba gang yang ma mchis so/_/rig 
[\[193b.7\]]sngags thams cad kyi mchog rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di yul gang dang gang du spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_badzre badzre badzre/_a mr-i ta badzre/_dz+wa li ta badzre/_hu tA sha ni/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_dzam+b+ha/_stam+b+ha 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]ya/_sarba gra hA NAM/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_gra sa gra sa gra sa/_ba Ta pa Ta pa Ta/_ta Ta ta Ta ta Ta/_mu ru mu ru mu ru/_d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma/_dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/_khu khu me/_khu khu me/_g+ho ri g+ho ri g+ho ri/_badzra mA na si/_badzra hu ti/_hu ti ru/_phu ru phu ru/_gra sa gra sa/_
[\[194a.2\]]sarba a hi ti Shi NAM/_nA bu ru Ni/_mu mu le/_badzra bra dI pA ni/_tsi ma le phu swA hA/_A yuHpA la ni tsu tsu re swA hA/_dza ye dza ye/_dza ya sam+b+ha be swA hA/_dza yot+ta me swA hA/_dza ya ba re de swA hA/_dza ya n+d+ha re swA hA/_dza ya mA na si swA hA/_dza ya badzra swA hA/_a dzi ta badzrA ya swA hA/_ma hA badzra hu tA sha 
[\[194a.3\]]nA ya swA hA/_a mo g+ha badzra ha sta swA hA/_de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi 
[\[194a.4\]]rnam grangs 'di la bsrung ba stsal bar bgyi/_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug dgum pa dang /_mi mdza' ba dgag pa dang /_dus ma lags par 'gum pa dgag pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_
[\[194a.5\]]rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_khrag khrug dang /_'jigs pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o/_/mtshams dgum par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_dza ye dza ye dza ye/_ma hA dza ye/_mi li ma na si/_dz+he dz+he dz+he/_mu ru mu ru/_tu Tu tu Tu/_mu mu le/_mArga ba ti/_
[\[194a.6\]]d+hu d+hu me/_be ge be ga d+hA ri NI/_te dza ba tI/_bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa thams cad dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas 
[\[194a.7\]]bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa/_byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_bud+d+he bud+d+he/_bud+d+he bud+d+he/_bud+d+ha ba tI/_bud+d+ha a ba b+hA sa ni/_d+harma ba tI/_sa ma hi te/_sa mA d+hi gar+b+he bud+d+ha a ba b+hA sa ni/_bud+d+ha pa ri ha ri/_d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni swA hA/_su la la zhig rig sngags 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'da' bar bgyid pa de ni mgo bo si ta ka'i 'bras bu bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/_/su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di 'chang ngam/_klog gam/_mchod par bgyid dam/_yi ger 'dri 'am/_glegs bam la bris 
[\[194b.2\]]te/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ram/_gtsug lag khang du 'jog na/_der bdag tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas shing /_gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rig sngags 'dzin pa de'i slad bzhin 
[\[194b.3\]]du 'brang ste bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/dpag tshad brgya stong tshun chad du mtshams dgum par bgyi'o/_/slar rgol ba dang /_dgra dang /_g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/slar bzlog par 
[\[194b.4\]]bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rgyal po chen po legs so/_/sems can chen po khyod 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang /_sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang /_bde ba dang /_bstan pa 
[\[194b.5\]]bsrung ba'i phyir zhugs pa yang legs so/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'dis gang yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon dang /_dug dang /_byad dang /_gsod byed dang /_rims dang /_gnod pa thams cad 
[\[194b.6\]]kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o/_/lag na rdo rdo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/lag na rdo rje phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i 
[\[194b.7\]]dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na/_sems can drag shul dang ldan pa/_shin tu mi bzad pa/_mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin dang /_srin po rnams dang /_chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe thung ba chos ma yin pas yul 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]'khor skyong ba 'byung ba de'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di sems mi mnyam pa/_sems mi bzad pa de dag dang /_sdang ba dang /_rab tu sdang ba'i sems can thams cad kyi don du 'gyur/_tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 
[\[195a.2\]]chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs pa/_byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_phyag rgyas btab pa'o/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni lha thams cad kyis 
[\[195a.3\]]phyag byas pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje de'i phyir khyod 
[\[195a.4\]]kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang /_phyag rgya zhes bya bar zung shig_/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa rgyal ba can zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_
[\[195a.5\]]rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[195a.6\]{D569}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a b+hiShiny+tsa ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[195a.7\]]mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa bye ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i ma dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang /_bden pa'i smon lam dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sa yongs su bzung ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos 
[\[195b.2\]]'di dag sgoms shing /_/ston cig_/'di lta ste/_gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs ni/_yul na mi gnas/_phyogs na mi gnas na bcom ldan 'das gzungs 
[\[195b.3\]]gzungs zhes bgyi ba la/_bcom ldan 'das gzungs zhes bgyi ba 'di'i tshig gi don gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/_/shA ri'i bu khyod 'di ltar theg 
[\[195b.4\]]pa chen po la yang yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_theg pa chen po la mngon par brtson pa dang /_theg pa chen po la lhag par bya ba byed pa dang /_khyod gzungs yul na mi gnas/_phyogs na mi gnas par ston pa yang legs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu gzungs ni chos nyid 
[\[195b.5\]]kyis 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba ma yin te/_shA ri'i bu gzungs ni 'das pa zhes mi 'chad/_ma 'ongs pa zhes mi 'chad/_da ltar byung ba zhes mi 'chad/_dngos por mi 'chad/_dngos po med par mi 'chad/_mtshan ma dang /_mtshan ma med par mi 
[\[195b.6\]]'chad/_chos gang skye ba'i phyir ram/_'gag pa'i phyir mi 'chad mod kyi/_shA ri'i bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' la phan par bzhed pa'i phyir chos ston te/_gang 'di gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzungs ni gzugs med pa bya ba'i lam du gyur pa/_/rigs pa'i stobs kyis gnas 
[\[195b.7\]]ba/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan/_sangs rgyas kyi lhag par bya ba sgrub pa/_sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims/_sangs rgyas kyi bsdus pa/_sangs rgyas kyi mtshams sbyor ba/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das gzungs gang la gnas shing gzungs de thob na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /_dam bca' ba bzang ba dang /_chos la mi gnas pa dang /_bdag the tshom ma mchis pa 
[\[196a.2\]]dang /_slob dpon ma mchis pa dang /_rang gi lam la gnas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/_/shA ri'i bu gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[196a.3\]]dpa' ni sangs rgyas nyid du brjod do/_/shA ri'i bu gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs thob pa la bsti stang du byed dam/_bla mar byed dam/_rim gror byed dam/_mchod na des sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang byas par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag gis gzungs 'di thos pa 
[\[196a.4\]]dang /_gang dag mos pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzungs ni 'di yin te/_san+d+hA ra NI/_ud+d+hA ra NI/_saM pra tiSh+Thi ta/_ut+ta ma/_su pra tiSh+Thi tA/_bi dza ya ba lA/_
[\[196a.5\]]sarba pri ta dz+nyA A ro hA dz+nyA na ba ti/_uta pA da ni/_bi ni ma NI/_a b+hi Shany+tsa ni/_a b+hi bya hA rA/_shu b+ha ba ti/_a ni shri ta/_ba hu kum+b+ha/_a b+hi ba tsa/_shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi ming rnams te/_'das pa rnams dang /_ma 'ongs pa rnams 
[\[196a.6\]]dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams dang /_legs par gnas pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' gang gis legs par bzung ste 'chang ba de myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir bskal pa brgya dang /_bskal pa stong dag smon lam gyis zad par byed par 'gyur/_de la mtshon 
[\[196a.7\]]gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/_me dang srog chags mi srun pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shA ri'i bu gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum mo/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las stong gsum 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]gyi stong chen po grangs med pa bcu mthar chags su gang ba'i sangs rgyas rnams la na bza' dang /_zhal zas bzang pos bskal pa grangs med par gzung ba byas pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis gzungs 'di las tha na tshig gcig tsam bzung ba de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/
[\[196b.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu dbang bskur ba'i gzungs 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_
[\[196b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas 
[\[196b.4\]]gtan la phab pa//[ {D570}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya hi ra N+ya ba tI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig 
[\[196b.5\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas 
[\[196b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gnas la bka' stsal pa/_legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin par mi 'dod pa des/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da 
[\[196b.7\]]ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ngo /_/ma thos so/_/ma myong ngo /_/gang gis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_myong ba des gzungs thob bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag gis 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]bsod nams byas so zhes mi 'dzin/_bdag gis bsod nams ma yin pa dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba byas so zhes mi 'dzin to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzungs 'dzin par mi rtog_/
[\[197a.2\]]rnam par mi rtog go/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs thob pa ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la dngos por ram/_mtshan nyid du mi rtog_/yongs su mi rtog ste/_rkyen du ma yin/_rkyen med par ma yin/_'gro bar ma yin/_
[\[197a.3\]]'gro ba med par ma yin/_'chi 'pho bar ma yin/_skye bar ma yin/_stong par ma yin/_mi stong par ma yin/_mtshan mar ma yin/_mtshan ma med par ma yin/_smon par ma yin/_smon pa med par ma yin/_skye bar ma yin/_'gag par ma yin no/_/legs par 
[\[197a.4\]]gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mtha' 'dis spyod pa de ni ye shes la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/gang gi tshe ye shes la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/_/gang gi tshe mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs len 
[\[197a.5\]]cing kun chub par byed la 'dzin te/_don dang tshig 'bru yang yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshul khrims can yang yin te/_bden pa'i tshul khrims dang /_rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims can no/_/ma brtags pa'i chos can yin te/_bden pa'i chos 
[\[197a.6\]]can dang /_rnam par dag pa'i chos can no/_/gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi chos la zhugs so/_/sangs rgyas la lhag par bya ba byas pa'o/_/rig pa'i cho ga la zhugs pa'o/_/legs par gnas de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags so/_/mi 
[\[197a.7\]]'chad do/_/mi 'grol lo/_/legs par gnas gang gi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags/_mi 'chang /_mi 'grol ba de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang /_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan gyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams kyis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob bo/_/tad+ya thA/_ku Ti ku Ti/_ku tsA la/_e lA i mi ri to/_/ko thA lA/_i re ri/_i mi ri Ni/_legs par gnas 'di dag ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[197b.2\]]'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no/_/ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no/_/legs par gnas/_dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[197b.3\]]'das rnams kyi yum mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'das pa'i don la mi gnas/_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i don la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/legs par gnas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa des sangs rgyas 
[\[197b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bsgrags pa dang /_khong du chud par byas pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[197b.5\]]byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin no/_/legs par gnas/_dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mnyes par byas/_bsnyen 
[\[197b.6\]]bkur byas/_mchod pa byas so/_/bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do/_/snyam du shes par bya'o/_/su zhig bsam pa gang gis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa de la de nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/_shes rab 'dod pa la shes rab dang /_gzungs 'dod pa la 
[\[197b.7\]]gzungs dang /_dbyig 'dod pa la dbyig dang /_thos pa 'dod pa la thos pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_zla ba yar gyi ngo la nyi ma shar kar 'bras sA lu'i chan dang 'o mar sbags te bza'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags 'di dag dang /_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan dag rgyun du yid la bya'o/_/'on kyang gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gi mthus gang dag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i lha ma yin nam/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_mi 'am ci'am/_
[\[198a.2\]]lto 'phye chen po 'am/_gnod sbyin nam/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_grul bum mam/_sha za 'am/_mi 'am/_mi ma yin pa de dag de la sems dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bar chad byed par mi 'gyur/_rtag tu yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[198a.3\]]dga' bzang dang /_yangs pa chen po dang /_lag na rdo rje dang /_yongs su dga' ldan dang /_ri dben pa la gnas pa dang /_gangs ri la gnas pas kyang yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/'og min gyi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang 'di lta ste/_dbyig dang ldan pa'i 
[\[198a.4\]]gzungs kyi mthus 'jigs pa 'am/_dgon par de la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/_de la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs shing /_de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[198a.5\]]dpa' chen po legs par gnas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar 
[\[198a.6\]]gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D571}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dzi gu li nA ma bid+yA/_bod skad du/_
[\[198a.7\]]'phags pa dug sel ces bya ba'i rig sngags/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i tshe nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/_gangs kyi ri yi byang ngos na/_/spos ngad ldan pa'i ri bo la/_/ri yi rgyal po'i sul gnas tshe/_/gzhon nu bsod nams brgya yi 
[\[198b.2\]]mtshan/_/e na ya yi pags gyon la/_/sbrul gyis brgyan pa'i ska rags can/_/gdug pa'i sbrul gyis mgo rgyan byas/_/mthong na gdug pa'i rna rgyan can/_/dug gi me tog rnams za zhing /_/ma lu ta yi lcug khu 'thung /_/nga la de 'bod du 'jug_/bu khyod tshur shog nga las 
[\[198b.3\]]nyon/_/nga la dug sel ces bya ba/_/dug 'jig rig sngags dam pa yod/_/dug rnams gang yin de kun ni/_/nga yi ming gis 'jig par 'gyur/_/tad+ya thA/_oM i li mit+te/_ti li mit+te/_i li ti li mit+te/_dum+be/_dum bA lI ye/_dusme/_dusma li ye/_tar ke/_ta ka ra Ne/_
[\[198b.4\]]marme/_marme ra Ne/_kash+mi ri/_kash+mI ra/_mug te/_a g+he/_a g+ha Ne/_a g+ha na g+ha Ne/_i lI a lI e/_a khA/_I e/_a byA/_i e/_shwe te/_sha ta/_duN+De/_a nu rag+te swA hA/_dge slong dag nga'i dug sel gyi rig sngags 'di ni sbyin pa thams cad dkar po ste/_sus rig 
[\[198b.5\]]sngags 'di lan cig thos pa de la lo bdun gyi bar du sbrul gyis mi za'o/_/de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs so/_/sbrul gang zhig de la 'dzin na de'i mgo shing ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/_/gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag sbrul gyi mdun du brjod par mi bya'o/_/de 
[\[198b.6\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_sbrul de 'chi ba'i phyir ro/_/tad+ya thA/_i la lA/_tsi la lI/_tsakra bak+ko/_/kau Da/_ko De Di/_ku ru ta/_ku ru Da ti/_po DA ti/_bu ru dA/_pu ru de ti/_mo De ti/_ni ku ru De/_ni ku ru De/_ni ma mu ru ta/_ni ma mu ru De te/_pu ru de/_phut+ta re ha/_phut+ta phuT+TaT+TaM Da ra he/_nA ga rA 
[\[198b.7\]]he/_na gad+ta da ta N+Da ra he/_sarba ra he/_sarba tat+ta da ra ha/_ats+tshi ats+tshi/_pu ru Ta ta/_tsa la bi She/_shI te/_shI tA/_ban+d+ha le/_mA tA le/_ha le ha le/_ha la ha la/_ha la le/_e la le/_ke pa tsa le/_mi la le/_taN+Di haN+Di/_ta Ta ta Ta/_s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/_phaT Ta phaT Ta/_ha ra bi shwa swA hA/_
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]dge slong dag de ltar na dug sel gyis 'byung po 'dus pa thams cad la rig sngags gang brjod cing bsnyad pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin no/_/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin no/_/yang dag pa'o/_/bden pa'o/_/ma nor ba'o/_/phyin ci ma log pa'o/_/dug 'di mi 
[\[199a.2\]]gdug par gyur cig_/sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song shig_/'dzin pa'i gan du song shig_/me'i nang du song shig_/chu'i nang du song shig_/thang la song shig_/ka ba'i nang du song shig_/rtsig pa'i nang du song shig_/nam mkha' la song shig_/sa'i nang du song shig_/zhi 
[\[199a.3\]]bar gyur cig swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_/'phags pa dug sel ces bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs so//_//
[\[199a.4\]{D572}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sid+d+ha pa Thi ta b+ha ga wa tI Ar+ya ang+gu li nA ma bid+yA rA dz+nyI/_bod skad du/_bklags pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun 
[\[199a.5\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de ltar dge slong rnams ri dri rgyal na gnas te de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang de na bzhugs te/_des bdag la smras pa/_bu sngags kyi tshig 'di nyon cig_/klu'i dbang po rnams kyi dug med par byed/_sbrul gyi dug med par byed/_g.yog 
[\[199a.6\]]rnams dang /_srin po rnams dang /_'byung po rnams dang /_sha za rnams dang /_sems can stobs po che rnams dang /_grul bum rnams dang /_sems can phra mo rnams dang /_phra men pha dang /_phra men ma dang /_chu srin dang /_stag dang /_grul bum dang rwa can 
[\[199a.7\]]dang /_mche ba can gyis de ltar sngags kyi tshig drag shul chen po a~M gu li yang dag par thos na sngags kyi gtso bo sems can gdug pa rab tu 'jil bar byed pa ste/_sngags can gang gis de shes na lha rnams kyi gdug pa yang dag par med par byed do/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti ar+ya aM gu li/
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]tad+ya thA/_oM klu'am/_klu mo'am/_sbrul lam/_sbrul mo'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_gnod sbyin mo'am/_'byung po'am/_'byung mo 'am/_phra men pha 'am/_phra men ma'am/_gdug pas zin pa'am/_gdug pas ma zin pa yang rung ste/_pha pha pha/_ha re ha re ha re/_
[\[199b.2\]]re dza re/_be sha be/_nA ga re/_sarba re re/_ha ra ha ra/_ma ra ma ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_bi d+ha ra bi d+ha ra/_ma ra ma ra/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_ma Ta ma Ta/_mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/_shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM/_la g+hu la g+hu/_A na ya A na ya/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_g+hur+N+Na g+hur+N+Na/_g+hur+NaN pa ya g+hur+N+Na 
[\[199b.3\]]pa ya/_dpag tshad stong brgyad cu na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyi gdug pa med par mdzod cig_/klu thams cad chings shig_/sod cig_/thar bar mdzod cig_/oM hu lu hu lu/_ha la ha la/_ha la bi shaM/_bcom ldan 'das ma grub pa'i rgyal mo aM gu lis bka' stsal pa/_tak+ke/_
[\[199b.4\]]Tak+ke/_Tak+ke ni/_Tak+ke ni/_shi ra shi ra/_tsan+d+ra ke sha ro hi Ni/_bgegs thams cad sel bar mdzad pa can/_las stong can/_bcom ldan 'das ma grub pa a~M gu li ta thA bi ga ta/_klu mo'i tshogs sum cus mchod pa/_dza ya dza ya sid+d+ha/_rgyal bar mdzad pa/_mi mgo'i thod kyi 
[\[199b.5\]]phreng ba can hU~M k+Sha skad cig thang cig yud tsam nyin par gyi bar du dug sel ba/_a su ra de bi ta dang /_da na pa'i stobs 'joms par byed pa can/_bgegs 'joms par mdzad pa can/_lha'i yum khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod swA hA/_sngags kyi tshig drag shul can sbrul 
[\[199b.6\]]gyi mdun du bklag par mi bya ste/_'chi ba dang /_klad pa 'gas shing tshal pa brgyar 'gyur ro/_/sngags kyi tshig drag shul can chen mo sbrul gyis thos na thams cad tshig par byed do/_/oM ki li ki li/_ma hA ki li/_kA la rU pi ni/_bgegs thams cad zlog shig_/pha pham 
[\[199b.7\]]pha rol pham par mdzod cig swA hA/_bklags pas 'grub pa aM gu li'i snying po dang bcas pa'o/_/tad+ya thA/_oM d+hu ne d+hu ne/_d+hu ni d+hu ni/_sat+ya/_tAT+Ta hA si ni d+hu d+hu ni/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_rdo rje'i gzungs mang pos bka' stsal pa/_'jog po'i dug 'dor du 'jug la/_dza ya dza ya/_mu dza 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]mu dza/_muny+dza muny+dza/_thong shig_/glog dang rlung zhes bya ba mgyogs pa'i shugs can/_ro langs chen mo bcom ldan 'das ma shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'byung ba'o/_/mu ya muny+tsa muny+tsa swA hA/_bklags pas 'grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags 
[\[200a.2\]]ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo rdzogs so//[ {D573}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA sarba d+ha rma mA tr-i kA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_/bod skad du/_'phags ma chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[200a.3\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i 
[\[200a.4\]]phyag rgya'i gzungs/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa ste/_nga yang da ltar 'chad pa zung shig_/tad+ya thA/_a brte a brte/_bi brte bi brte/_b+ha ga ma shud+d+he/_pra b+hA swa re tA ra Ne/_uka kha le/_mug kha le/_sarba d+harmA pA shi ba ta 
[\[200a.5\]]ni swA hA/_de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis gzungs 'di'i snying po brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ats+tshe/_a na le/_e lu le/_e lu phe/_mUrta a nu ga te sarba d+harma a d+hi pa ta ye/_
[\[200a.6\]]prAp+te dz+yosna ka ra/_a d+hi ga ta dz+nyA ne bi shud+d+he pa ti swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//
[\[200a.7\]]chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D574}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tsU Da ma Ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'phags 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]pa nyan thos dang /_/rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' yas pa ma lus par khyab pa mchog tu rmad du byung zhing rnam par dag 
[\[200b.2\]]pa'i thugs mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/_phongs pa thams cad las yongs su skyob par mdzad pa/_'jigs pa thams cad 
[\[200b.3\]]las rnam par thar bar mdzad pa/_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pa/_mi mthun pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/_sdig pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/_'byung po dang /_ro langs 
[\[200b.4\]]dang /_gshis ngan du 'chi ba dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_bgegs kyi log 'dren thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pa/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_mu ge dang /_mya ngan gyi 'jigs pa thams cad bzlog par mdzad pa/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri 
[\[200b.5\]]za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dun par mdzad pa/_/dug dang /_'brum phran dang /_thor bu dang /_gshed byed dang /_byad dang /_ro langs dang /_bkra mi shis pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pa la 
[\[200b.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/gshed byed thams cad sel bar byed/_/sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa nyid/_/nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel mdzad pa/_/bdag gi bu dang tsha bo dang /_/g.yog 'khor rtag tu mang gyur pa/_/phyir bzlog pa 'di brjod par bya/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed tshe/_/
[\[200b.7\]]brgya byin lha min rnams las pham/_/de nas rings pa kho nar ni/_/'jig rten dbang gi drung 'ongs te/_/de nas snying ni rab skrag pas/_/'di skad kyis ni tshig gsol to/_/lha min bdag pham 'jig rten dbang /_/ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi/_/'jig rten dbang po bdag 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]la ni/_/lha yi gzigs pas rtag tu gzigs/_/brgya byin gyi ni tshig gsan nas/_/dbang phyug gis ni 'di skad gsungs/_/lha yi dbang po nga la nyon/_/khyod la ngas ni bsrung ba sbyin/_/lha'i dbang po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[201a.2\]]khams 'jig rten gyis rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od las ngas gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir zlog pa de bzhin gshegs pa bye bas gsungs pa bzung ngo /_/mkhas pa 
[\[201a.3\]]gang gis rig sngags 'di/_/bris nas spyi bor 'dogs pa'am/_/'don tam 'on te klog na yang /_/de yi 'jigs pa kun med de/_/rtag tu srung zhing sba ba dang /_/g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar byed/_/sdig dang rmi ngan zhi ba dang /_/bsod nams bkra shis rab tu 'phel/_/
[\[201a.4\]]lha yi dbang po de bas na/_/gang zhig rgyal bar 'gyur 'dod pas/_/bris te spyi bor gdags par bya/_/yid la rtag tu dran par gyis/_/g.yul 'gyed 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_/'di ni rtag tu sdig pa 'phrog_/bud med rnams la bu pho skyed/_/mngal na gnas pa yongs su skyong /_/
[\[201a.5\]]phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed/_/sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig_/'di ming phyir zlog byed ces bya/_/yan lag rnams la phyir 'bab byed/_/lha'i dbang po phyir zlog pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/_lha ma yin rnams 
[\[201a.6\]]pham par byed pa/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zung shig_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub 
[\[201a.7\]]sems dpa' dag dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM dza ya ka ri/_yud d+ho t+ta ra Ni bi tsi tra mu khi/_sarba maM ga la d+hA ra NI/_dzI mU te sa ha sra b+hu dze/_sa ha sra ne tre/_sa ha sra shir se/_nA nA lang+kA rA b+hi b+hU Shi te/_ma Ni kuN+Da la saM nA ha san+na d+he/_bi tsi tra mau li d+ha re/_tsan+d+ra sUr+ya/_
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]a ti re ke/_A kA sha ga ga na tsa ri Ne/_maM ga la shi re dzI mU te/_pa bI tra kr-i ta maM ga l+ye/_b+hU ri ma d+h+ri ka ra Ne/_tsu ru tsu ru/_shwe te da ste/_mu ru mu ru/_shwe te/_a ba nat+te/_hu ru hu ru/_pa bi tra mu khi/_ku ru ku ru/_tsan+d+ra mu khi/_A di t+ya pa sha brti ni/_dzaM b+ha ni/_maM ga la 
[\[201b.2\]]d+hA ra Ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_sarba bid+yA d+ha ra mA te/_mo ha ne/_a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste/_sarba b+ha ya bi mo tsa ni/_rA dza tsau ra/_a g+ni bi Sha u da ka b+ha ya pra sha ma ni/_kakhorda ni bAr Ni/_oM hi ri hi ri/_dza ya ka ri/_ba la ka ri/_d+ha na ka ri/_te dza ska ri/_bi bA da pra sha ma ni/_yud+d+ha ni bA ra Ni/_
[\[201b.3\]]pa ra tsa kra pra sha ma ni/_pa ra sai n+ya bi nA sha ni/_yud+d+hot+ta ra Ni/_pra b+hU ta be la/_ma Ni ma Ni/_ma hA ma Ni/_ma nyA ma Ni/_ma NI na d+ha ri/_tri lo ka A lo ka ka ri/_tri pu ra na ga ra bi d+h+wan+sa ni pa ra sai n+ya bi dra ba ni/_sarba kr-i t+ya karma Ni sU da ni/_sarba byA d+hI nAM pra sha ma ni/_oM tsi le mi le swA hA/_tsi le 
[\[201b.4\]]mi le swA hA/_mi li mi li swA hA/_tsi li tsi li swA hA/_tsa khi li tsa khi li swA hA/_tsaN+Da li mi Ti ni swA hA/_Ur d+ha ke shi pid+ga le/_pid+ga lA k+She dan+te mu khi swA hA/_oM ka ra ka ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_muny+tsA pa ya/_muny+tsA pa ya/_pra sha ma ya/_pra sha ma 
[\[201b.5\]]ya/_yud+d+hot+ta ra Ni phaT/_tsit+ta nir ma la ka ri phaT/_a su ra ni r+g+ha ta ni phaT/_dza ya ka ri phaT/_pri ti ka ra phaT/_sa ha sra shi ra se phaT/_sa ha sra b+hu dze phaT/_sa ha sra ne tre phaT/_sarba bid+yA d+ha ra d+ha ra na ma skr-i te phaT/_sarba sha truM nA sha ni phaT/_sarba b+ha ya bi mo k+Sha Ni phaT/_pa ra tsakra ni bar 
[\[201b.6\]]Ni phaT/_pa ra sai n+ya bi dra ba Ni phaT/_sarba kr-i t+ya karma sU da ni phaT/_sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma ni phaT/_sarba gra ho ta sA da ni phaT/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_sa man+ta bi trA nAM/_so bsta ya kA nAM/_sa pa ri bA rA NAM/_te dzasaM ma ma sha rI raM/_sarba b+ha yo pa dra beb+h+yaH/_sarba yud+d+he b+h+yaH/_sarba 
[\[201b.7\]]gra he b+h+yaH/_sarba byA d+hi b+h+yaH/_sarba duskr-i te b+h+yaH/_sarba kr-i t+ya ka kho rde b+h+yaH/_sarba bi She b+h+yaH/_sarba kA ya bAk+tsit+ta bi rA d+he b+h+yash+tsa/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/_gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir zlog pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_thams cad du zhi bar 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]byed pa/_bsod nams thams cad sogs par byed pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par ston par byed pa/_rnam pa thams cad du dpal du byed pa ste/_yi ge bris pa dang /_ston pa dang /_bklags pa dang /_bzung bas bdag dang gzhan bsrung 
[\[202a.2\]]ba'o/_/de bzhin du khrus bya ba dang /_sbyin sreg gis yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/_/'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye 
[\[202a.3\]]shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D575}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya Sha Da k+Sha ra bid+yA/_bod skad du/_'phags pa yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag 
[\[202a.4\]]gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[202a.5\]]gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa/_yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di kun dga' bo khyod kyis zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/tad+ya thA/_dan+ti le/_kan+ti le/_da N+Di ma ti/_ma d+hu ma ti/_ma raN+Di/_ko ra N+De/_drA bi ti/_ko shA ri/_tsha Ta dze/_
[\[202a.6\]]du du ma ni/_ke tu ma ti/_tsu dun+d+he/_kau Ta da na te/_ta hu ra re/_e na ni ge/_hu ta ba hu ni/_kun dga' bo 'di ni yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags te/_klad pa na ba dang /_mig na ba dang /_rna ba na ba dang /_so na ba dang /_sna na ba dang /_lce na ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_lto na ba dang /_rgyab na ba dang /_rtsib 
[\[202a.7\]]logs na ba dang /_chu so na ba dang /_byin pa na ba dang /_rkang pa na ba dang /_yan lag na ba dang /_nying lag na ba dang /_zas ma zhu ba dang /_sbos pa dang /_mngal du thogs pa dang /_rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]pa dang /_rims drag po dang /_nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa dang /_rims yud tsam pa dang /_nyin mo'i rims dang /_mtshan mo'i rims kyis btab pa las yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags 'dis bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba 
[\[202b.2\]]dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_chus gtor ba dang /_srad bus bcing ba byas pa las gang zhig 'gal bar byed na/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du mi 'gas pa ni 
[\[202b.3\]]kun dga' bo ngas lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo /_/tad+ya thA/_aN+Da re/_paN+Da re/_ka re te/_ke yU re/_b+hU taM ga me/_b+hu ta gra he/_b+hu

[\[202b.6\]]phrag brgya pa'i gzungs/_bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ta d+ya thA/_oM mu ni d+harme/_saM gra ha d+harme/_a nu gra ha d+harme/_bi muk+ti d+harme/_sA rA nu gra ha d+harme/_bai shra ba Na pa ri brta na d+harme/_sarba kAr+ya pa ri pra ma Na d+harme/_sa man+tA nu pa ri brta ni d+harme swA hA/_oM pradz+nye 
[\[202b.7\]]shru tismr-i ti ma ti bi dza ye swA hA/_d+hIHd+hA ra NI swA hA/_oM pradz+hA pA ra mi tA ba la swA hA/_'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/_/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]pa stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D577}]@#/_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs/_bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM pradz+nyApradz+nye/_pradz+nyA a ba b+hA se/_pra dz+nyA ba lo ka ti sarba d+ha rma

[\[203b.1\]]rdzogs so//[ {D580}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sbyin pa'i snying po 'di lan cig thos pas sbyin pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/oM na ma stai b+ha ga ba ti dA nA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/_tshul khrims kyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_ma hA ka nA da ma kA 
[\[203b.2\]]nAM/_na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai/_shI la pa ri pUr+Na sha rI yai shI laM me/_sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/_kin tiSh+Tha saM bud+d+ho b+ha ga ban d+harma s+ya/_sa mA dz+nyA na pa ya ti swA hA/_bzod pa'i snying po 'di lan cig thos pas bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya/_a tsin+ta go tsar+ya/_na mo k+ShAn+ti ye ba hu b+hiH/_ta thA ga ta na b+hu ta ko Ti b+hi ba ri ba

[\[204a.1\]]traM/_hu lu hu lu mu lu mu lu swA hA/_'di lan cig brjod pas btang snyoms thob par 'gyur ro/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya/_a nu ga te/_oM ku ruM gi ni swA hA/_tshad med pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D583}]@#/_/bcom ldan 'das

[\[204a.6\]]shing kha ton du byas par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya rnams kyang shes par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i snying po rdzogs so//[ {D586}]@#/_/dkon mchog

[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D587}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM pi shu ni swA hA/_'di bzung na 'phags pa rma bya chen mo'i snying po gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa rma bya chen mo'i snying po rdzogs so//[ {D588}]@#/_/dkon mchog

[\[204b.3\]]so//[ {D589}]@#/_/'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/blo gros chen po sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_oM pad+me pad+me de bai/_hi ne hi ne hi ne/_tsu lu tsu lu tsu lu/_hu le hu le hu le/_yu le yu le yu le/_/pa le pa le pa le/_muM ts+tshe da na de/_b+hin+de b+han dz+wa/_man de pra ma 
[\[204b.4\]]de/_di na ka re swA hA/_blo gros chen po rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed na/_lha'am/_lha mo'am/_klu'am/_klu mo'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_gnod sbyin mo'am/_lha ma yin nam/_lha ma yin mo'am/_

[\[204b.7\]]lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad bklags par 'gyur ro/_/sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis srin po la sogs pa rnams bzlog pa'i phyir gsungs so/_/'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad bklags par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags rdzogs so//_//
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]{D590}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa trA nA ma a pa rA dzi ta pra t+yaM gi ra ma hA bid+yA rA dz+nyI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig 
[\[205a.2\]]sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo'o/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lha'i 'dun sa 
[\[205a.3\]]na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas/_gtsug tor rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[205a.4\]]la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi dbus nas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byung ngo /_/na mo b+ha ga ba te uSh+NI ShA ya shud+d+he bi ra dze bi ma le swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor thogs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs 
[\[205a.5\]]rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byams pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams 
[\[205a.6\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten na yang dag par song ba 
[\[205a.7\]]rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha'i drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i drang srong dmod pa'i mtshon cha can dmod pas phan 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das legs ldan drag po dka' thub zlog ma'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chu lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das legs 
[\[205b.2\]]ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das legs ldan dga' byed dbang phyug nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa kha che zhing dur khrod chen po na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa dang lhan cig 
[\[205b.3\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 
[\[205b.4\]]'das rgyal po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das las kyi gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom 
[\[205b.5\]]ldan 'das gti mug gi gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das chags pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 
[\[205b.6\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

[\[209b.4\]]phaT/_ma he shwa rI ye phaT/_brah+ma NI ye phaT/_ag+nI ye phaT/_ma hA kA lI ye phaT/_kA la da N+Di ye phaT/_in+d+rI ye phaT/_rau drI ye phaT/_tsA muN+DI ye phaT/_bA rA hI ye phaT/_ma hA bA rA hI ye phaT/_rA trI ye phaT/_kA la rA trI ye phaT/_ya ma daN+DI ye phaT/_ka pA lI

[\[209b.6\]]kr-iSh+Na sha ba rI ye phaT/_ya ma dU tI ye phaT/_ni sa di bA tsa re b+h+yaHphaT/_trisan d+h+yArtse b+h+yaHphaT/_d+ha ra NI ye phaT/_a d+hi muk+ti kasmI ra ma hA sma shA nI bA si nI ye phaT/_i ti b+h+yaH/_sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/_sarba da Shi b+h+yaHphaT/_o~M hU~M Sh+ToM b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha sarba duSh+TA na rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba sa twAM sh+tsa swA hA/_gang su dag bdag 
[\[209b.7\]]'khor dang bcas pa dang /_sems can thams cad la sdang ba sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_drag shul drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_sdig pa sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_'khrug pa 'khrug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_mi

[\[212b.7\]{D591}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa trA a pa rA dzi ta ma hA pra t+yaM gi ra par ma sid+d+ha nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen mo mchog 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis mi thub pa gtsug tor rgyal mo la phyag 'tshal

[\[213b.1\]]legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

[\[213b.4\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das

[\[213b.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog gi

[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ut+pala'i dri'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[214a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis 'byung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa/_gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zlog pa/_
[\[214a.3\]]sems can gsod pa dang /_bcings pa thams cad las grol bar byed pa/_sdang ba dang /_rmi lam ngan pa ltas ngan pa thams cad zlog pa/_gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gdon thams cad 'jig par byed pa/_gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'jig par byed pa/_rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dga' bar byed pa/_
[\[214a.4\]]gza' chen po brgyad 'jig par byed pa/_dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/_ma rungs pa dang /_sdang ba dang /_rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/_dug dang /_mtshon thams cad dang /_me dang chu las zlog par byed pa/_ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams 
[\[214a.5\]]cad las sgrol ba ste/_gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/_/gtum pa chen mo stobs chen mo/_/'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che/_/dkar chen 'bar phreng gos dkar mo/_/'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can/_/rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags/_/pad+ma'i 
[\[214a.6\]]mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshan/_/gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can/_/rdo rje'i mchu can rnam sgeg mo/_/zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod ma/_/zhi ba gser gyi phreng ba can/_/dkar chen 'bar ba gos dkar mo/_/'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo/_/rdo rje lu gu rgyud 
[\[214a.7\]]gzhan dang /_/rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin ma/_/lag na rdo rje'i rigs gser phreng /_/le brgan rtsi dang rin chen ma/_/snang mdzad rdo rje gtsug tor grags/_/phyag rgya dang sngags kyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_sems 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]can thams cad bsrung du gsol/_o~M sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/_dzam+b+ha na ka rIhU~M drUM hIHSh+ToM/_stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/_mo ha na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/_sam+b+hak+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/_ban+d+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/_pa ra biSha b+hak+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/_sarba 
[\[214b.2\]]duSh+TA pra duSh+TA NAM stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/_sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa gra hA NAM bid+h+waM sa na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/_sarba pa ra bibyA ts+tshe da na ka rI hU~M drUM hrA~MHSh+ToM/_tsa tu rA shi tI nAM gra ha sa ha srA nAM bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/_aSh+Ta biM sha tI nAM nak+Sha trA NAM pra sA d+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM/_aSh+TA nAM ma hA gra 
[\[214b.3\]]hA NAM bid+h+waM sa na ka rI hU~M drUMhrIHSh+ToM/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba satwAMsh+tsa/_bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo/_phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/_dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/_spyan bye 
[\[214b.4\]]ba brgya stong mnga' ba/_mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/_rdo rje yangs pa chen mos sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag dang sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig_/rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang /_/gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ma/_/rdo rje 
[\[214b.5\]]sgros dang dkar mo dang /_/pad+ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang /_/sangs rgyas dpal dang de bzhin spyan/_/rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od dang ni/_/de bzhin zla ba rdo rje 'dzin/_/rig pa dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kun 
[\[214b.6\]]nas bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/_oM r-i Shi ga Na pra shasta sarba ta thA ga toSh+Ni Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M drUM/_dzam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM/_stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM/_ma hA bid+yA sam+b+hak+Sha na ka rI hU~M drUM/_pa ra bi d+yA sam+b+hak+Sha na ra ka rI hU~M drUM/_sarba duSh+Ta NAM stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM/_sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa 
[\[214b.7\]]gra hA NAM bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hU~M drUM/_tsa tu rA shi tI nAM gra ha sa ha srA NAM bid+h+waM sa na ka rI hU~M drUM/_aSh+TA biM sha tI nAM na k+Sha trA NAM pra sA d+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M/_aSh+TA NAM ma hA gra ha NAM bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hU~M drUM/_hU~M hU~M phaT phaT rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug

[\[218a.3\]]bgyi'o/_/mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_oM a na le a na le/_kha sa me kha sa me/_bI ra bI ra/_sau [{]mye [,]me [}]sau /[{]mye[,]me[}]/_shAn+te shAn+te/_dAn+te dAn+te/_bi Sha de bi Sha de/_bai re bai re/_de bi badzra d+hA ri ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni badzra pA Ni phaT/_o~M hU~M drUM hrIHSh+ToM phaT swA hA/_o~M badzra pA Ni ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badzra pA she na

[\[218a.5\]]lus sam mgul du thogs sam klog par byed na de la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/_mtshon gyis mi tshugs/_me yis mi tshugs/_chus mi tshugs/_dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/_dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/_byad kyis mi tshugs/_dus ma yin par 'chi 
[\[218a.6\]]ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/gdon thams cad dang /_bgegs thams cad dang /_log 'dren thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams dang grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyis kyang de la rtag tu mthun par

[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]du yang gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po nyid du mi 'gyur ro/_/mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po

[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]gnas su gzugs so/_/'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog ma chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rim gro cher byas te btsugs na btsugs ma thag tu g.yul zhi bar byas par 'gyur ro/_/yams kyi nad dang /_'tshe ba dang /_gnod pa dang /_

[\[219a.7\]]so//_//paN+Di ta pa ra hi ta b+ha dra dang /_lo ts+tsha ba gzu dga' rdor gyis kha che'i bdud rtsi 'byung gnas kyi gtsug lag khang gi dpe rnying la gtugs nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D592}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]si tA ta pa tre a pa rA dzi ta nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'

[\[220a.1\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/

[\[220b.6\]]na ka rI hU~M drU~M/_aSh+Ta biM sha tI nA~M nak+Sha trA nAM pra sA da na ka rI hU~M drU~M/_aSh+Ta nA~M ma hA gra hA NA~M bi d+h+wa~M sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/_bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo/_phyag stong mnga' ba chen
