[\[222a.1\]]s+phu Ta bi kA si tA ta pa tre/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_khA da khA da/_da ra da ra/_bi da ra bi da ra/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/_b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/_hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_he he phaT/_ho ho phaT/_a mo g+he phaT/_a pra ti ha tA phaT/_ba ra pra dA phaT/_pra t+yaM gi ri phaT/_a su ra bi drA 
[\[222a.2\]]ba ka phaT/_sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba ma ru te b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba ga ru De b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba gan+d+harbe b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba kin+na re b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba ma ho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba rAk+Sha se b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba 
[\[222a.3\]]pre te b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba pi shA tse b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba b+hU teb+h+yaHphaT/_sarba kuM b+hAN+De b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba pU ta ne b+h+yuHphaT/_sarba ka Ta pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba skanan+d+ha d+he b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba un mA de b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba ts+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba a pa smA re b+h+yaHphaT/_
[\[222a.4\]]sarba o stA ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba durlad+g+hi te b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba duShadre k+Shi te b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba kr-i t+ya karma NA ka kho rde b+h+yaHphaT/_ki ra Na be tA De b+h+yaHphaT/_tsits+tsha pre Sha ka dush+tsatshardi te b+h+yaHphaT/_dur+b+huk+te b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba r+thi tIr+thi ke b+h+yaH
[\[222a.5\]]phaT/_sarba shra ma Ni b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba bid+yA d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/_dza ya ka ra/_ma d+hu ka ra/_sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ke b+h+yo bid+yA tsA re b+h+yaHphaT/_tsa tur b+h+yo b+ha gi nI b+h+yaHphaT/_badzra kau mA rI ye b+h+yaHphaT/_bad+yI rA dz+nyI ye b+h+yaHphaT/_ma hA pra t+ya~M gi re b+h+yaHphaT/_badzra 
[\[222a.6\]]shr-iM kha lA ya pra t+ya~M gi ra rA dzA ya phaT/_ma hA kA lA ya ma tr-i ga Na na ma skr-i tA ya b+h+yaHphaT/_biSh+Na bI ye phaT/_brAh+ma NI ye phaT/_a g+ni ye phaT/_ma hA kA lI ye phaT/_kA lA da~M DI ye phaT/_in+dI ye phaT/_rau drI ye phaT/_kau ma rI ye phaT/_bA rA hI ye 
[\[222a.7\]]phaT/_tsa muN+DI ye phaT/_rA trI ye phaT/_kA la rA trI ye phaT/_ya ma daN+DI ye phaT/_ka pA lI ye phaT/_a d+hi muk+ti sma sA na bA si nI ye phaT/_sems can gang su dag bdag la sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_drag shul gyi sems dang ldan 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]pa rnams dang /_mdangs 'phrog pa rnams dang /_zas su mngal za ba rnams dang /_zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang /_zas su zhag za ba rnams dang /_zas su sha za ba rnams dang /_zas su tshil za ba rnams dang /_zas su rkang za ba rnams dang /_
[\[222b.2\]]zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang /_srog 'phrog pa rnams dang /_zas su skyugs pa za ba rnams dang /_zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang /_zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang /_zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang /_zas su lhag ma 
[\[222b.3\]]za ba rnams dang /_zas su mchil ma 'thung ba rnams dang /_zas su snabs za ba rnams dang /_zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang /_zas su rnag za ba rnams dang /_zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang /_zas su phreng ba za ba rnams dang /_zas su dri 
[\[222b.4\]]za ba rnams dang /_zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang /_sems 'phrog pa rnams dang /_zas su me tog za ba rnams dang /_zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang /_zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang /_zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang /_sdig pa'i 
[\[222b.5\]]sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang /_srin po'i gdon rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gdon rnams dang /_sha za'i gdon rnams dang /_
[\[222b.6\]]'byung po'i gdon rnams dang /_grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang /_srul po'i gdon rnams dang /_lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang /_skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang /_smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang /_grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang /_brjed byed kyi 
[\[222b.7\]]gdon rnams dang /_gnon po'i gdon rnams dang /_mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang /_nam gru'i gdon rnams dang /_gshin rje'i gdon rnams dang /_bya'i gdon rnams dang /_ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang /_kun du 'breng ba'i 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]gdon rnams dang /_tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams dang /_rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang /_nyin gnyis pa rnams dang /_nyin gsum pa rnams dang /_nyin bzhi pa rnams dang /_nyin bdun pa rnams dang /_rtag pa'i rims rnams 
[\[223a.2\]]dang /_rims mi bzad pa rnams dang /_rims ldang dub pa rnams dang /_'byung po'i rims rnams dang /_rlung las gyur pa rnams dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang /_bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang /_
[\[223a.3\]]rims nad thams cad dang klad pa na ba bsal du gsol/_gzhogs phyed na ba dang /_yi ga 'chus pa dang /_mig nad dang /_sna nad dang /_kha nad dang /_mgul nad dang /_snying nad dang /_lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang /_rna ba na ba dang /_so na ba 
[\[223a.4\]]dang /_snying na ba dang /_klad pa na ba dang /_ske na ba dang /_rtsib logs na ba dang /_rgyab na ba dang /_lto na ba dang /_rked pa na ba dang /_chu so na ba dang /_brla na ba dang /_rje ngar na ba dang /_lag pa na ba dang /_rkang pa na ba dang /_yan lag 
[\[223a.5\]]na ba dang /_nying lag na ba bsal du gsol/_gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang /_ro langs dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_rims dang /_shu ba dang /_g.yan pa 
[\[223a.6\]]dang /_'brum bu phra mo dang /_mdze dang /_pho la mig dang /_bas bldags dang /_me dpal dang /_g.ya' ba dang /_lhog pa dang /_skem pa dang /_skrag pa dang /_dbyig dug dang /_dug sbyar ma dang /_byad stems dang /_me dang /_
[\[223a.7\]]chu dang /_mi ngas dang /_dgra dang /_gnod pa dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /_sbrang bu t+r+ye mkhu ka dang /_trai la tA ka dang /_sdig pa dang /_sbrul dang /_sre mo dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_dom dang /_dred dang /_chu srin dang /_bung 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]ba lta bus gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o/_/gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan gyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_oM a na le a na le/_be Sha de bi Sha de/_bai ra bai ra/_badzra d+ha ri 
[\[223b.2\]]baM d+ha baM d+ha ni/_badzra pA Ni phaT hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_hU~M drU~M ban+d+ha phaT ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/_sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po 'di gro ga 'am/_ras sam/_shing shun 
[\[223b.3\]]la bris te/_lus sam/_mgul du thogs na/_de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/_mtshon gyis mi tshugs/_me yis mi tshugs/_chus mi tshugs/_dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/_dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/_byad kyis mi tshugs/_
[\[223b.4\]]dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/gdon thams cad dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang de la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab 
[\[223b.5\]]pa dang /_sbed par byed de/_de rnams kyi yid du 'ong bas dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/nam du yang gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po nyid du mi 
[\[223b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan 
[\[223b.7\]]gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po 'di 'chang na tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/_/thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ro/_/mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen gnas ma byas pa yang bsnyen gnas byas par 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/smyung ba ma byas pa yang smyung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang sdig pa byang bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med bu 'dod pa gang la la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[224a.2\]]pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa chen po 'di 'chang na bu 'dod pa des de rnyed de/_tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs rnams kyang rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 
[\[224a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/mi nad dang /_phyugs nad dang /_gnag nad dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_'tshe ba dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_gnod pa dang /_'khrug pa dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung 
[\[224a.4\]]pa'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/_rim gro cher byas te/_mchod pa chen po byas la/_grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo 'am/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs 
[\[224a.5\]]sam/_dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so/_/gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po 'di rim gro cher byas te/_btsugs ma thag tu g.yul zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/yams kyi nad dang /_'tshe ba dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_gnod pa dang /_'khrug pa dang /_pha 
[\[224a.6\]]rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_oM Sh+ToM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/_oM hU~M Sh+TA+oM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badzra ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha badzra pA Ni hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a nA ba lo ki ti mur+d+ha ni te dzo rA shi/_oM hU~M dz+wa la dz+wa la/_d+ha ka 
[\[224a.7\]]d+ha ka_/da ra da ra/_bi da ra bi da ra/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/_b+hin+da b+hin+da/_hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha hU~M phaT swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_oM a na le a na le/_kha sa me kha se me/_bai re bai re/_sau me sau me/_sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+NA na ad+hiSh+Thi ta 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]sarba ta thA ga toSh+NISha si tA ta pa tre hU~M phaT/_hU~M ma ma hU~M ni swA hA/_sangs rgyas rnal 'byor du bya'o/_/klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis kyang dus dus su char 'bebs so/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can 
[\[224b.2\]]gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D593}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tra nA ma a pa rA dzi ta d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs 
[\[224b.3\]]pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas na/_chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[224b.4\]]lha'i 'dun sa na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/_gtsug tor rnam par lta ba'i 
[\[224b.5\]]ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi dbus nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag byung ngo /_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/

[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/legs ldan drag po dka' thub las zlog pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/legs ldan

[\[225a.6\]]bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[225a.7\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das

[\[225b.3\]]gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis 'byung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa/_gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod pa/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba las zlog pa/_sems can bcings pa thams cad 'grol ba/_sdang

[\[225b.5\]]sdang ba dang /_rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/_dug dang mtshon dang me dang chu las sgrol ba ste/_gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/_/gtum pa chen mo stobs chen mo/_/'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che/_/dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo/_/'bar ba'i

[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]grags/_/rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang /_/gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba/_/rdo rje sgros dang dkar mo dang /_/pad+ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang /_/phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag la bsrung du gsol/_bsrung du gsol/_oM 
[\[226a.2\]]r-i Shi ga Na pra shA stA ya/_sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M drU~M/_dzam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM/_stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM/_ma hA bid+yA sam b+hA k+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drUM/_pa ra bid+yA sam b+ha k+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drUM/_sarba duSh+TA nAM stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drUM/_sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa gra hA NAM pid+hAn+sa na ka rI hU~M drUM/_tsa tu rA shI trI 
[\[226a.3\]]nAM/_gra ha sa ha srA NAM/_bid+h+wa na sa na ka rI hU~M drUM/_aSh+Ta biM sha tI nAM/_nak+Sha trA nAM pra sAd na ka rI hU~M drUM/_aSh+Ta nAM ma hA gra hA NAM bi d+h+wa na sa na ka rI hU~M drUM/_rak+Sha maM/_bsrung du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po 
[\[226a.4\]]can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo/_phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/_dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/_spyan bye ba brgya phrag stong mnga' ba chen mo/_mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can rdo rje yangs pa chen mos/_sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pa chen mo/_kun nas

[\[226a.6\]]dang /_dgra'i 'jigs pa dang /_nad kyi 'jigs pa dang /_lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang /_sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang /_skar mda' ltung ba'i 'jigs pa dang /_rgyal po'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_lha'i 'jigs pa dang /_klu'i 'jigs pa 
[\[226a.7\]]dang /_glog gi 'jigs pa dang /_nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang /_gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang /_lha'i gdon dang /_klu'i gdon dang /_lha ma yin gyi gdon dang /_rlung lha'i gdon dang /_nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang /_dri za'i gdon dang /_mi 'am ci'i gdon dang /_lto 'phye chen 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]pa'i gdon dang /_gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang /_srin po'i gdon dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gdon dang /_mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang /_sha za'i gdon dang /_'byung po'i gdon dang /_grul bum gyi gdon dang /_srul po'i gdon dang /_lus srul po'i gdon dang /_skem byed kyi gdon dang /_

[\[226b.7\]]bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/phur bus gdab bo/_/nam mkha' lding yang dag pa dang /_lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/phur bus gdab bo/_/nag po chen po dang /_ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]phur bus gdab bo/_/mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/phur bus gdab bo/_/rgyal bar byed pa dang /_sbrang rtsir byed pa dang /_don kun grub pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/phur bus gdab bo/_/sring mo bzhis byas

[\[227a.3\]]phur bus gdab bo/_/dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/phur bus gdab bo/_/'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/phur bus gdab bo/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/
[\[227a.4\]]phur bus gdab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag la bsrung du gsol/_bsrung du gsol/_oM a si tA na lA rkA pra b+hA s+phu Ta/_bi ka si tA ta pa tre/_dz+wa 
[\[227a.5\]]la dz+wa la/_khA da khA da/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_bid+ha ra bid+ha ra/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/_bin+da bin+da/_hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_he he phaT/_ho ho phaT/_a mo g+he phaT/_a pra ti ha tA phaT/_ba ra pra dA phaT/_pra t+yaM gi re phaT/_a su ra bi drA ba ka phaT/_sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba 
[\[227a.6\]]nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba ma ru te b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba ga ru De b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba gaM d+harbe b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba kin na re b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba ma ho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba rA k+She se b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba pi shA tsi b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba b+hU te b+h+yaHphaT/_
[\[227a.7\]]sarba kum b+hAN+De b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba pU ta ni b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba ka Ta pU ta ni b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba skan+b+he b+h+yaHphaT/_sarbon+mA de b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba ts+tshA ye b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba a pa smA re b+h+yuHphaT/_sarba oM stA ra ke b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba durlaM gi te b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba duSh+pe k+Shi te b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHphaT/_

[\[227b.1\]]sarba kr-i t+ya karma kA kho rde b+h+yaHphaT/_ki ra Na be tA De b+h+yaHphaT/_tsits+tsha pre Sha ka dush+ts+tsher di te b+h+yaHphaT/_dur b+huka te b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba tir+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba shra ma Na b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba bid+yA d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/_dza ya ka ra/_ma d+hu ka re b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba ar+tha sAd+ha ke b+h+yo bid+ya tsa re b+h+yaHphaT/_tsa tu ra 
[\[227b.2\]]b+h+yo b+ha gnI b+h+yaHphaT/_sarba kau mA rI ye b+h+yaHphaT/_bid+yA ra dz+nyI ye b+h+yaHphaT/_ma hA pra t+yaM gi re b+h+yaHphaT/_badzra shr-id+kha lA ya/_prat+yaM gi ra rA dzA ya phaT/_ma hA kA lA ya ma tr-i ga Na na ma skr-i ta ye phaT/_biSh+Na bi ye phaT/_brah+ma NI ye phaT/_ag+ni ye phaT/_ma hA kA lI ye phaT/_kA lA 
[\[227b.3\]]daN+DI ye phaT/_in+d+rI ye phaT/_rau drI ye phaT/_kau mA rI ye phaT/_bA rA hI ye phaT/_tsA muN+DI ye phaT/_ra trI ye phaT/_kA la rA trI ye phaT/_ya ma daN+DI ye phaT/_ka pA lI ye phaT/_a d+hi mu ka ti sma shA na bA si nI ye phaT/_sems can gang su dag bdag la 
[\[227b.4\]]sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams dang /_zas su mdangs za ba rnams dang /_zas su mngal za ba rnams dang /_zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang /_zas su zhag za ba

[\[228a.1\]]dang /_zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang /_zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang /_zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang /_sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_lha'i gdon rnams dang /_klu'i

[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]dug gis mi tshugs/_dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/_byad kyis mi tshugs so/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/gdon thams cad dang /_bgegs dang /_rnam par log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang

[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]{D594}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra NI kal paM sa hi ta/_bod skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[230a.2\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mchog na nye bar 
[\[230a.3\]]bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal ba nad kyis gzir ba'i sems can tshe thung ba yod de/_de rnams kyi phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/_
[\[230a.4\]]kun du gzigs pa'i dpal gyi mtshan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bcang ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa ni tshe ring ba sgrub par byed pa'i ched du'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[230a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes 
[\[230a.6\]]bya ba'i gzungs bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs te/_kun du gzigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[230a.7\]]thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/_oM na mo b+ha ga wa te sarba trai lo kya pra ti bi ShiSh+TA ya bud d+hA ya te na maH/_tad+ya thA/_oM b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/_a sa ma sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa s+pha ra Na ga ti/_ga 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]ga na swa b+hA pa bi shud d+he/_a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mAM/_sarba ta thA ga tAHsu ga ta ba ra ba tsa na/_a mr-i ta a b+hi She kai ra/_ma hA mu drA man+t+ra pa deH/_A ha ra A ha ra/_ma ma A yuHsan d+hA ra Ni/_sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya//_ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he/_uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri 
[\[230b.2\]]shud d+he/_sa ha sra ra smi saM tso di te/_sarba ta thA ga ta a wa lo ki ni/_ShaT pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni/_sarba ta thA ga ta mA te/_da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Thi te/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_mu dre mu dre ma hA mu dre/_badzra kA ya saM ha ta na/_pa ri shud d+he/_sarba karma A wa ra Na bi shud 
[\[230b.3\]]d+he/_pra ti ni bar ta ya/_ma ma A yur bi shud d+he/_sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya a d+hiSh+ThA na/_id+hiSh+Thi te/_oM mu ni mu ni/_ma hA mu ni/_bi mu ni bi mu ni/_ma hA bi mu ni/_ma ti ma ti/_ma hA ma ti/_ma ma ti/_su ma ti/_ta thA tA/_p+hU ta ko Ti/_pa ri shud d+he/_bi s+phu Ta/_bud d+hi shud d+he/_he 
[\[230b.4\]]he/_dza ya dza ya/_bi dza ya bi dza ya/_sma ra sma ra/_s+pha ra s+pha ra/_s+phA ra ya s+phA ra ya/_sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_shud d+he shud d+he/_bud d+he bud d+he/_badzre badzre/_ma hA badzre/_su badzre/_badzra gar+b+he dza ya gar+b+he/_bi dza ya gar+b+he/_badzra dz+wA lA gar+b+he/_badzra ud b+ha be/_badzra saM b+ha be/_badzre

[\[230b.7\]]gzungs 'di ni ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/_sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/_bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro ba/_ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]kyis gsungs pa/_byin gyis brlabs pa/_rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ste/_sems can thams cad bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba dang /_ngan 'gror lhung ba rnams bzlog pa dang /_sems 
[\[231a.2\]]can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi gnas thams cad du sdug bsngal zhing nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams dang /_sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor ltung ba'i sems can rnams rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o/_/
[\[231a.3\]]de bzhin du sems can tshe thung zhing skal ba chung ba smad pa dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skye bar ltung ba rnams dang /_bsam pa nyams pa dang /_sems can lam las nyams pa rnams kyi don du gzungs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du sems can rnams la gzungs 'di dang /_phyag 
[\[231a.4\]]rgya dang /_sngags yongs su gtad pa yin no/_/de'i phyir lha'i dbang po khyod kyis yang dag par gzung bar bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di lan cig thos ma thag tu bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/skye bar skye ba sna 
[\[231a.5\]]tshogs pa sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul dang /_lha ma yin gyi ris dang /_'di lta ste/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po dang /_brjed 
[\[231a.6\]]byed dang /_khyi dang /_rus sbal dang /_sbrul dang /_gcan gzan khro bo dang /_bya dang /_sbrang bu dang /_sbrang ma dang /_sdig sbrul dang /_grog sbur la sogs pa srog chags kyi rigs rnams su phyis mi skye bar rig par bya'o/_/gzhan du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa dang /_byang 
[\[231a.7\]]chub sems dpa'i rigs su skye ba dang /_rigs chen por skye ba ste/_de la rigs chen po ni 'di lta ste/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/_tshong dpon gyi 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skye'o zhes nga smra'o/_/lha'i dbang po de ltar na gzungs 'di'i mthus byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du skye ba yongs su dag pa chen po 'thob ste/_lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di ni de ltar mthu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_mthu stobs che ba/_
[\[231b.2\]]dge ba shis pa yin te/_lha'i dbang po sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba 'di bzhag go/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po shin tu dri ma med pa nam mkha' ltar yongs 
[\[231b.3\]]su dag pa 'od gsal ba ni 'od zer gyi snang bas 'bar zhing 'dug go/_/lha'i dbang po de bzhin du sems can de yang gos pa med par shes par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_dper na 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser shin tu dri ma med pa/_yongs su dag pa/_shin tu mnyen pa/_shin tu 
[\[231b.4\]]sdug pa'o/_/lha'i dbang po de bzhin du sems can chen po de yang shin tu yongs su dag par rig phar bya ste/_tshe rabs gzhan du yang de bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po gang na gzungs 'di rab tu ston pa dang /_bye brag tu na yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_
[\[231b.5\]]'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_kha ton du byed pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_'dzin par 'gyur ba de 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur 
[\[231b.6\]]ro/_/lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di yi ger bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor gzhag par bya/_ri mthon po'am/_khang pa mthon po'am/_mchod rten gyi nang du gzhag par bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen 
[\[231b.7\]]ma'am/_de las gzhan pa rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor gzhag pa mthong ngam/_de dang nye bar gnas par gyur na/_tha na de'i grib mas phog gam/_de'i rdul rlung gis btab pa phog na yang lha'i dbang po sems can de 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]la sdig pa thams cad dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha ma yin gyi ris thams cad du mi skye bar rig 
[\[232a.2\]]par bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bya na/_lha'i dbang po shing bzo byed pa la yang phan yon chen por 'gyur na/_mchod pa dang /_
[\[232a.3\]]rim gror byed cing /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_spos dang /_rgyan rnams kyis brgyan par byed pa dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten byas la gzungs 'di gzhag la/_
[\[232a.4\]]thal mo sbyar ba'am/_phyag 'tshal ba'am/_skor ba byed pa lta ci smos te/_lha'i dbang po sems can 'di ni sems can chen po yin par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su rig par bya'o/_/chos kyi gnas su rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[232a.5\]]pa'i mchod rten du rig par bya'o/_/de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje de'i nub mo de nam langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog dang /_gos dang /_rgyan la sogs pas mchod pa dang /_bsti stang du byas nas des bcom ldan 
[\[232a.6\]]'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing sman yon che ba lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can de'i 
[\[232a.7\]]slad bzhin 'brang zhing /_dus kun du bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o/_/sems can dmyal ba thams cad las de bzlog par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byas pa gzo bar bgyid kyi byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyid do/_/de nas 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di'i cho ga zhib mo dang /_bgyi ba'i cho ga'i tshul rgyas par bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal 
[\[232b.2\]]po chen po bzhi po dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nyon cig dang gzungs 'di'i bya ba'i cho ga'i tshul bshad par bya'o/_/sems can tshe thung ba'i don gyi phyir rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i zla ba la khrus byas te/_gos gtsang ma gyon nas smyung 
[\[232b.3\]]ba byas te/_lan stong bzlas brjod byas na de sems can tshe zad pa de yang phyir nur ro/_/nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[232b.4\]]tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags bya'i rna lam du yang gzungs 'di'i sgra bsgrags par bya ste/_des ni de'i ngan 'gro 'di nyid tha ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/gang zhig nad chen pos btab ste sman pa rnams kyis bye brag phye ste bor ba yang de ltar na nad de las 
[\[232b.5\]]yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de ni ngan 'gror skye ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nyid de'i mngal gyi gnas tha ma yin par shes par bya'o/_/de gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der pad+ma'i 
[\[232b.6\]]snying po kho na las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs thams cad du yang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/sems can sdig pa byed pa gang dag 'chi ba'i dus byas pa/_de dag gi don du gzungs 'di yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su brjod de/_de dag gi rus gong 
[\[232b.7\]]rnams kyi steng du gtor na de dag sems can dmyal ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_de las gzhan pa'i ngan 'gro rnams su skyes par gyur kyang rung ste/_de dag gzungs 'di'i mthus ngan 'gro de dag las thar 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag las thar nas kyang lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/su zhig 'di nyin gcig bzhin du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig yongs su brjod pa de 'jig rten pa chen po rnams kyis mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/nad med 
[\[233a.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu spro ba dang ldan pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa tha dad du 'gro bar 
[\[233a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/der yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang 
[\[233a.4\]]'jig rten la snang ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya bcing ba ni sor mo bcu'i thal mo la sdigs mdzub gnyis bkug ste mthe bong gnyis dang sbyar la/_de nas gzungs 'di dran par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te me tog sna tshogs bkram la sna tshogs 
[\[233a.5\]]pa'i bdug pas bdug cing /_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dmigs la phyag bya zhing /_de nas gzungs brgyad brgya bklag par bya'o/_/de ltar lan cig bklags pa tsam gyis bye ba khrag 
[\[233a.6\]]khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing bsnyen bkur dang ri mor byas pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/de kun 
[\[233a.7\]]gyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par 'gyur ro/_/sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid las skyes pa'i sras su rig par bya'o/_/sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing byang chub chen po'i sems kyi rgyan dang mnyam pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]de la gzungs bsgrub pa'i cho ga'i thabs 'dis ni lha'i dbang po 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan 'gro las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi 'gro ba thams cad kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po song 
[\[233b.2\]]la lha'i bu blo gros shin tu brtan pa la gzungs 'di rjes su ston la sgrogs shig_/lha'i dbang po des na zhag bdun na lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag cing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs che bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin 
[\[233b.3\]]gshegs pa las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs te/_de'i gnas su phyin nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa la gzungs 'di byin no/_/de nas lha'i bu des nyi ma bdun pa'i bar du nyin drug mtshan drug tu gzungs 'di la brtson par byas nas/_de'i bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs 
[\[233b.4\]]te/_'di lta ste/_ngan 'gro las ni yongs su thar/_bde ba'i lam la yang gnas/_tshe ring bar yang gyur nas/_a la la sangs rgyas/_a la la chos/_a la la gzungs 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ste/_des bdag 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su thar to/_/zhes 
[\[233b.5\]]ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa 'khor che ba rnams kyis me tog dang /_dri dang /_bdug pa dang /_phreng ba dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gos kyi rgyan bzang po'i bla re dang /_lha'i 
[\[233b.6\]]tshogs kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin te thad du phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyan la sogs pa nye bar mkho ba'i mchod pa brgya stong phul te bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste/_de bzhin du ched du 
[\[233b.7\]]brjod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste chos nyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa dbugs phyung nas chos ston par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi bar du lung ston to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs 'di ni 'chi ba chen po'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa ste/_dag byed sdig pa 'joms par byed pa 'di gro ga'am/_gzhan zhig la bris te/_mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag la rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pas 
[\[234a.2\]]mchod de bskor ba stong phrag brgya byas na mchog gi tshe dang blo rno ba sbyin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar byas pas zhag bdun pa'i tshe ni lo bdun thub bo/_/lo bdun pa'i tshe ni lo bdun cu thub bo/_/de ltar mchog gi tshe thob cing dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_nad med pa dang /_skye ba 
[\[234a.3\]]dran par 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol te/_mgo la bcings na nad chen po las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gos sam shing shun la gi wang gis rang gi ming dang bcas par gzungs bris te/_tsan+dan gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol nas/_
[\[234a.4\]]rang gi khyim du bzhag la rgya che ba'i stong gis mchod pas mchod de/_zla ba re re zhing brgya phrag brgyad kyis bzlas pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga byas na nad las grol zhing lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/_/med na 'dam pa'i rang bzhin la yang bya'o/_/yang gos gtsang ma la sna tshogs rdo 
[\[234a.5\]]rje la gnas pa'i mchod rten bris la/_rdo rje phreng bas bskor bas brgyan pa de'i nang du rang gi ming dang gzungs kyi tshig 'di gi wang gis bris la/_kham por kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhugs su gsol te rang gi khyim du bzhag la mchod pa rgya chen pos mchod pa byas na rtag tu bsrung 
[\[234a.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang cho ga ni sa la ma lhung ba'i lci bas maN+Dal gru bzhir byas la me tog dkar po bkram ste/_mtshams bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi bzhag la/_a ga ru dang du ru ska'i bdug ba byas la/_de bzhin du dri'i chus gang ba'i snod me tog dkar 
[\[234a.7\]]pos brgyan te/_gzungs kyi snying po can gyi mchod rten nam sku gzugs dbus su bzhugs su gsol la/_de la g.yon pa'i lag pas reg ste g.yas pa'i lag pa phreng ba 'dzin pas nyi ma re re zhing lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig dus gsum du bzlas pa byas la/_de'i 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]chu khyor ba gsum 'thungs na nad med pa dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_dgra yongs su nyams pa dang /_'dzin blo rno ba dang /_ngag btsun par 'gyur ro/_/skye ba nas skye bar skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/de'i chus khang pa dang /_phyugs kyi rab 'am/_rta'i rab 'am/_rgyal po'i khab 
[\[234b.2\]]tu gtor na/_rkun ma dang /_sbrul dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing nad kyis yongs su gdungs par mi 'gyur ro/_/mgo la gtor na de nad de las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar tshe dpag tu med pa'i phan yon che ba'i gzungs 'ang gang dang 
[\[234b.3\]]gang du rab tu sbyar na/_de dang de ru zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te/_'chos na nad med pa dang /_blo rno ba dang /_tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/chu khyor ba gsum la dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te 'thungs 
[\[234b.4\]]na nad thams cad las yongs su grol zhing yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa la bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[234b.5\]]'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos mchod rten gyi las ji ltar bya/_sku gzugs la sogs pa bsgrub pa ji ltar bya/_'dir sbyin sreg kyang ji ltar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dri ba legs par smras pa ni/_/dpa' bo chen po legs so 
[\[234b.6\]]legs/_/sems can kun la phan brtse'i phyir/_/'dir ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du 'od dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[234b.7\]]gzungs 'di gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste/_o~M a mi te/_a mi tod+b+ha be a mi ta saM b+ha we/_a mi ta bi krAn te/_a mi ta gA dre/_a mi ta gA mi ni/_a mi ta A yurda de/_ga ga na kIrti ka re/_sarba kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri ye swA hA/_zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'dis mchod rten byed pa'i 'jim pa 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]blang ba dang /_byug pa la sogs pa dang /_gdugs gdags pa'i bar ji snyed rdzogs par bya'o/_/'di'i cho ga ni/_mchod rten cho ga mchog gyur pa/_de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/gser dang /_in+d+ra nI la dang /_dngul dang /_pad+ma rA ga la sogs 
[\[235a.2\]]pa'i rang bzhin mang po'i rin po ches spras pa'i sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa/_de'i logs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi lag na rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/_/me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri la ga na bzung ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha 
[\[235a.3\]]rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lag na gdugs bsnams pa dang /_g.yas dang g.yon gyi logs gnyis na spyan ras gzigs dang /_rdo rje 'chang gnyis rnga yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa gnyis bya'o/_/de lta bu'i cho gas mchod rten la g.yas bskor gyi sbyor bas pad+ma'i 'dab 
[\[235a.4\]]ma la bri bar bya'o/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bris la de'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can du byas te/_dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chus gtor zhing dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod la/_stong phrag gcig gis mchod 
[\[235a.5\]]pa byas te/_dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad kyi nyin zhag la smyung bar gnas shing /_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i blos tshe dang blo ster ba'i yon byin te stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o/_/zla ba re re zhing byas na zla ba drug gis tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[235a.6\]]rtag tu lo gcig tu byas na tshe lo 'bum thub par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu byas na tshe lo mi zad pa thub cing stobs dang ldan pa dang /_gang gis kyang mi thub cing lha dang lha ma yin dang mi mnyam pa'i mkha' spyod kyi gtsug tor mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzhan yang cho ga ni rab 
[\[235a.7\]]tu dge ba'i gnas su sa blangs la dri zhim pos bsres la mchod rten bya'o/_/stong phrag gcig nas brtsams te ji srid lnga'am gcig gi bar du'o/_/nyi ma re re zhing mchod rten du gtogs pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba yang dag par bzhugs su gsol la/_ji skad gsungs 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]pa'i mchod pha rgya chen po byas la stong phrag gcig nas brtsams te lan bdun gyi bar du bklag par bya'o/_/nyi ma re re zhing tshe dang blo ster bar byed pa'i gzungs kyi ched du byas te/_sems can thams cad la thun mong du dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin par bya'o/_/sems can rnams la bcing 
[\[235b.2\]]ba dang brdung ba la sogs pa spang bar bya'o/_/zla ba gzhan re re la mchod pa nyis 'gyur du byas la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya ba ni rang dam rang dang 'dra bas bya'o/_/cho ga 'di yis ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad med par 'gyur ro/_/blo rno ba dang /_nad med pa dang /_tshe lo brgya 
[\[235b.3\]]thub cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang /_skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de'i tshe sbrul shun pa brjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus por te mdzes pa'i lus bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yang de nyid dmyal ba dang /_
[\[235b.4\]]byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i bu gar dmyal ba'i sgra yang thos par mi 'gyur na 'bras bu smin par lta ga la 'gyur/_'di rnams kyi gnas su 'gro ba med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med 
[\[235b.5\]]pas gzhan yang sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal pa/_gang gis sems can tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ba dang nyam nga ba'i 'khor ba las grol bar byed pa ni gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa tshad dang ldan pa mdzes pa'i ras mkhas pas bya'o/_/de nas gtsug tor rnam 
[\[235b.6\]]par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs tshon sna ma lus pas gzungs kyi yi ge las sprul pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bri bar bya'o/_/tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer stong gi phreng ba can pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa/_ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od can/_rgyan thams cad kyis 
[\[235b.7\]]brgyan pa/_zhal gsum pa/_spyan gsum gsum pa/_phyag brgyad pa/_g.yas pa'i zhal zhi ba gser gyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'o/_/g.yon pa ni mche bas ma mchu mnan pa mi bzad pa ut+pal sngon po'i 'od zer gyi 'od dang ldan pa'o/_/dbus ma ni sgeg pa dang 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]bcas shing dkar ba'o/_/g.yas pa'i phyag gis snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje'o/_/de bzhin du pad+ma la gnas pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa dang /_mda' dang ma tshog sbyin pa'o/_/g.yon du sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang /_de bzhin du gzhu dang /_
[\[236a.2\]]mi 'jigs pa dang /_bum pa'o/_/yang mgo bor mchod rten la gnas pa'i oM dang /_mgrin par AHdang /_snying gar hU~M ngo /_/dpral bar tra~M ngo /_/lte ba'i phyogs su hrIH'o/_/rkang pa gnyis la aM aH/_yi ge 'di rnams bkod la rak+Sha swA hA dang bcas pa 'di'i nang du rang gi ming 
[\[236a.3\]]dang sbel ba'o/_/de'i logs gnyis su pad+ma dang /_rdo rje 'chang gnyis rnga yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa'o/_/steng du bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun 'bebs bzhin pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis so/_/logs bzhir khro bo mi g.yo ba dang /_'dod pa'i rgyal po dang /_dbyug 
[\[236a.4\]]pa sngon po can dang /_stobs po che zhes bya ba ste/_ral gri dang /_lcags kyu dang /_dbyug pa dang /_rdo rje bsnams pa'o/_/g.yon pa na gdug pa can 'jigs pa'i sdigs mdzub phyed du byed pa'o/_/de ltar 'bad pas rdzogs par byas/_ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i 
[\[236a.5\]]mchod rten la smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa chen po stong phrag gcig gis mchod pa byas la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas bzung ste ji srid [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du stong bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas snga bar nam nangs pa dang bcom 
[\[236a.6\]]ldan 'das ma zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas ji ltar dngos grub 'dod pa ster ro/_/yang na ni thang ka de dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chus byugs pa'i phyogs gcig tu yang dag par bzhugs su gsol la mchod pa rgya chen po bya zhing nyi ma re re zhing brgyad brgya bzlas pa bya'o/_/
[\[236a.7\]]yang zla ba re re la stong stong gi mchod pa bya zhing stong stong gi bzlas pa byas na tshe dpag tu med pa dang /_stobs dpag tu med pa gnon pa dang /_nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_nad chen po med par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyis nyi ma re re tshigs bcad stong 'dzin 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]pa'i phyin ci ma log pa'i ngag tu 'gyur ro/_/yang na kha cig gis de lta bu byed par mi nus na de yis rang gi khyim du dri zhim po dang bsres pas sa'i char bzhugs su gsol la/_ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byed la zla ba 'ong 'ong ngo cog gi tshes brgyad la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya zhing nyi 
[\[236b.2\]]ma re rer dus gsum du nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig brjod na blo rno ba dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_shes rab dang ldan pa dang /_nad med pa dang /_skyid pa dang /_lo brgya 'tsho ba dang /_skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/yang na rang gis ma nus na de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na tshe ring ba dang /_blo 
[\[236b.3\]]rno bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi cho ga sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir nye bar bshad par bya ste/_khru gang gi tshad kyi thab khung zlum po rdo rje'i phreng bas brgyan pa/_tsan+dan dkar po 'am sa dkar gyis byugs la me tog dkar po bkram ste/_logs 
[\[236b.4\]]bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi bzhag la/_bdug spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la/_phyogs bzhir mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa rab tu mdzes pa gos dkar pos g.yogs pa yal gas kha brgyan pa dgod par bya'o/_/'o ma can gyi yam shing la me 
[\[236b.5\]]spar la der me lha bkug ste dgang blugs gsum byin la bsang gtor byas te gshegs su gsol lo/_/de nas che dpag tu med pa gsal por thab khung gi dbus su bsams la gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bzlas shing dgang blugs gsum dbul lo/_/yang na oM a 
[\[236b.6\]]mr-i ta A yurda te swA hA/_zhes bya bas tshe dang /_blo rno ba dang bcas pas brgyad brgya dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o/_/gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba lan bdun du bzlas pa byas na tshe ring ba dang /_blo rno ba dang /_skyid pa dang /_nad med par 'gyur ro/_/yang na zla ba re re'i 
[\[236b.7\]]dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la dus gsum du tshe lo stong thub par 'dod pas sbyin sreg byas na mchog gi tshe ring ba dang /_blo rno ba sbyin par byed do/_/sems can rnams la smad par mi bya'o/_/cho ga 'dis rang gi lus nad kyis gos par 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/lo brgya lnga bcur 'tsho ba dang /_dgra las rgyal ba dang /_blo rno bar 'gyur ro/_/dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro/_/gal te rang gis ma nus na de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzhan yang sgrub par 'dod na gtsug 
[\[237a.2\]]tor gyi rgyal po chen po tshe dang blo rno ba dang bcas par 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas te/_dang po dang mthar stong stong gi mchod pa byas la yang 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas na tshe lo 'bum phrag gcig thub par 'gyur ro/_/bye ba byas na bye ba thub bo/_/de ltar 'di'i cho 
[\[237a.3\]]ga'i rim pas tshe lo dpag tu med par 'gyur te/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_dpa' ba dang /_dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/dpal 'dod na dpal 'bras 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpal chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po 'dod na pad+ma 'bum phrag gcig 
[\[237a.4\]]sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/bye ba gcig byas na 'khor los sgyur ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang na ral gyi la sogs pa grub par 'dod na ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du thang sku bkram la stong gi mchod pa chen pos mchod la bzlas pa 
[\[237a.5\]]'bum byas te/_yang lcags lnga'i rang bzhin gyi ral gri la bzlas pa 'bum byas te lag pa g.yas par bcangs na yid kyis 'gro ba dang /_'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang /_stobs che zhing gzhan gnon pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi gcig tu 'dren pa por gyur 
[\[237a.6\]]nas sman pa chen po'i mchog tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rdo rje dang /_'khor lo dang /_rtse gsum la sogs pa la yang bsgrub par bya'o/_/de ltar phan yon dpag tu med pa'i gzungs chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa mchog tu rnyed 
[\[237a.7\]]bar dka' ba 'di ji lta ji ltar sbyar ba de lta de ltar las 'grub par byed do/_/gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyi ma re re la dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig bzlas pa bya zhing /_mchod rten chen po 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]byas te yang dag par bcangs la gzhan la yang rgya cher gsal bar byas na/_de skyid pa 'thob cing stobs dang ldan pa dang /_nad med pa dang /_lo brgya thub pa dang /_blo rno ba dang /_skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i tshe/_sbrul shun pa brjes 
[\[237b.2\]]pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus bor te bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dmyal ba'i sgra rna bug tu yang thos par mi 'gyur na 'bras bu smin par lta yang ga la 'gyur/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de ru skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de 
[\[237b.3\]]skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug 
[\[237b.4\]]tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so//_//paN+Dita chos kyi sde dang /_khams pa lots+tsha ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D595}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sarba ta thA ga toSh+NISha bi 
[\[237b.5\]]dza ya nA ma d+hA ra NI kalpa sa hi ta/_bod skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus 
[\[237b.6\]]gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mchog na nye bar bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags 
[\[237b.7\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal ba nad kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems can tshe thung ba yod de/_de rnams kyi phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/_kun du gzigs pa'i dpal gyi mtshan de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bcang ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa ni tshe ring ba sgrub par byed pa'i ched du'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras 
[\[238a.2\]]gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bde bar gshegs pas 
[\[238a.3\]]bstan du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/_kun du gzigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal 
[\[238a.4\]]ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/_o~M na mo b+ha ga wa te sarba trai lo kya pra ti bi shiSh+Ta ya bud+d+ha ya te na maH/_tad+ya thA/_o~M b+h+rUM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/_sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/_a sa ma sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa s+pha ra Na ga ti/_ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he/_uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri 
[\[238a.5\]]shud d+he/_a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mAM/_sarba ta thA ga tAHsu ga ta ba ra ba tsa na/_a mr-i ta a b+hi She kai ra/_ma hA mu dra man+t+ra pa dai/_A ha ra A ha ra/_ma ma A yuHsan d+hA ra Ni/_sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/_ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he/_uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud d+he/_
[\[238a.6\]]sa ha sra ra smi sany+tso di te/_sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ni/_Sha Ta pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni/_sarba ta thA ga ta mA te da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Thi te/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/_a d+hi Sh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_mu dre mu dre/_ma hA mu dre/_badzra kA ya saM ha ta na/_pa ri shud d+he/_sarba karma A wa ra Na bi shud 
[\[238a.7\]]d+he/_pra ti ni brta ya/_ma ma A yur bi shud d+he/_sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/_a d+hiSh+ThA na/_a d+hiSh+Thi te/_o~M mu ni mu ni/_ma hA mu ni/_bi mu ni bi mu ni/_ma hA bi mu ni/_ma ti ma ti/_ma hA ma ti/_ma ma ti/_su ma ti/_ta thA tA/_b+hU ta ko Ti/_pa ri shud d+he/_bi s+phu Ta/_bud d+he 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]shud d+he/_he he/_dza ya dza ya/_bi dza ya bi dza ya/_sma ra sma ra/_s+pha ra s+pha ra/_s+phA ra ya s+phA ra ya/_sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_shud d+he shud d+he/_bud d+he bud d+he/_badzre badzre/_ma hA badzre/_su badzre/_badzre gar+b+he/_dza ya gar+b+he/_bi dza ya gar+b+he/_badzra dz+wA lA gar+b+he/_badzra ud b+hu be/_
[\[238b.2\]]badzra saM b+ha be/_badzre badzri ni/_badzram+b+ha ba tu/_ma ma sha rI raM sarba sa twA nAny+tsa kA ya pa ri shud d+hi ra b+ha ba tu/_me sa dA sarba ga ti pa ri shud d+hi sh+tsa/_sarba ta thA ga tA sh+tsa mAM sa mA shwA sa yan+hu/_bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/_sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha ya/_mo tsa yam tsa ya/_bi mo 
[\[238b.3\]]tsa ya bi mo tsa ya/_sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/_sa man+ta mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/_sa man+ta rasmi pa ri shud d+he/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_mu dre mu dre/_ma hA mu dre ma hA mu drA man+t+ra pa daiHswA hA/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug 
[\[238b.4\]]tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs 'di ni 'chi bdag chen po'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa ste/_dag byed sdig pa 'joms par byed pa 'di gro ga'am gzhan zhig la bris te/_mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag la/_rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pas mchod de bskor ba stong phrag brgya 
[\[238b.5\]]byas na mchog gi tshe dang blo rno ba sbyin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar byas pas zhag bdun pa'i tshe ni lo bdun thub bo/_/lo bdun pa'i tshe lo bdun cu thub bo/_/de ltar mchog gi tshe 'thob cing dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_nad med pa dang /_skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten 
[\[238b.6\]]la bzhugs su gsol nas mgo la bcangs na nad chen po las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gos sam shing shun la gi wang gis rang gi ming dang bcas pa'i gzungs bris te/_tsan+dan gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol te rang gi khyim du bzhag la rgya che ba stong gi 
[\[238b.7\]]mchod pas mchod cing zla ba re re zhing brgya phrag brgyad kyi bzlas pa'i mchog mchod pa'i cho ga byas na nang las grol zhing cho lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/_/med na 'dam pa'i ring bzhin la yang bya'o/_/yang gos gtsang ma la sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i mchod rten bris la rdo rje'i 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]phreng bas bskor bas brgyan pa de'i nang du rang gi ming dang gzungs kyi tshig 'di gi'u wang gis bris la kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhugs su gsol la/_rang gi khyim du bzhag ste mchod pa rgya chen po mchod pa byas na rtag tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang 
[\[239a.2\]]chog ni sa la ma lhung ba'i lci bas maN+Dal gru bzhir byas la me tog dkar po bkram ste/_mtshams bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi bzhag la/_a ga ru dang du ru ska'i bdug pa byas la de bzhin du dri'i chus gang ba'i snod me tog dkar pos brgyan te/_gzungs kyi snying po can 
[\[239a.3\]]gyi mchod rten nam sku gzugs dbus su bzhugs su gsol la/_de la g.yon pa'i lag pas reg ste/_g.yas pa'i lag pa phreng ba 'dzin pas/_nyi ma re re zhing nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig dus gsum du bzlas pa byas la de'i chu khyor ba gsum 'thungs na nad med pa dang /_tshe 
[\[239a.4\]]ring ba dang /_dgra yongs su nyams pa dang /_'dzin blo rno ba dang /_dag btsun par 'gyur ro/_/skye ba nas skye bar skye bar skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/de'i chus khang pa dang /_phyugs kyi ra ba'am/_rta'i ra ba'am/_rgyal po'i khab tu gtor na rkun po dang /_sbrul dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[239a.5\]]dang /_srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing nad kyis yongs su gdungs par mi 'gyur ro/_/mgo la gtor na de nad de las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar tshe dpag tu med pa'i phan yon chen po'i gzungs 'di gang dang gang du rab tu sbyar na de dang de ru zhi ba chen por 
[\[239a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te 'chos na nad med pa dang /_blo rno ba dang /_tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/chu khyor ba gsum la dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te 'thungs na nad thams cad las yongs su grol zhing yun ring 
[\[239a.7\]]du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa la bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]mchod rten gyi las ji ltar bgyi/_sku gzugs la sogs pa bsgrub pa ji ltar bgyi/_'dir sbyin sreg kyang ji ltar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dri ba legs par smras pa ni/_/dpa' bo chen po legs so legs/_/sems can kun la phan brtse'i 
[\[239b.2\]]phyir/_/'dir ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du 'od dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste/_o~M 
[\[239b.3\]]a mr-i te/_a mr-i tod b+ha be/_a mr-i ta bi krAn+te/_a mr-i ta ga te/_a mr-i ta gA mi ni/_a mr-i ta A yurda te/_ga ga na kIrti ka re sarba kle sha k+Sha yaM ka rI ye swA hA/_zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di mchod rten byed pa'i 'jim pa blang ba dang /_byug pa la sogs pa dang /_gdugs 
[\[239b.4\]]gdags pa'i bar ji srid rdzogs par bya'o/_/'di'i cho ga ni/_mchod rten cho ga mchog gyur pa/_/de nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/gser dang /_in+d+ra nI la dang /_dngul dang /_pad+ma rA ga la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mang po'i rin po ches spras pa sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad 
[\[239b.5\]]pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa/_de'i logs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi lag na rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/_/me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri lag na bzung ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lag na gdugs thogs pa dang /_
[\[239b.6\]]g.yas dang g.yon gyi logs gnyis na spyan ras gzigs dang /_rdo rje 'chang gnyis rnga yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa gnyis bya'o/_/de lta bu'i cho gas mchod rten la g.yas bskor gyi sbyor bas pad+ma'i 'dab ma la bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[239b.7\]]gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bris la/_de'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can du byas la dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chu gtor zhing dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod la/_stong phrag gcig gi mchod pa chen po byas te/_dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad kyi nyin zhag 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]la smyung bar gnas shing /_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i blos tshe dang blo ster ba'i yon byin te stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o/_/zla ba re re zhing byas na zla ba drug gis tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu lo gcig tu byas na tshe lo 'bum thub par 
[\[240a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/rtag tu byas na tshe lo mi zad pa thub cing stobs dang ldan pa dang /_gang gis kyang mi thub cing lha dang lha ma yin dang bcas mi mnyam pa'i mkha' spyod kyi gtsug tor mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzhan yang cho ga ni rab tu dge ba'i gnas su sa blangs la/_dri zhim pos bsres 
[\[240a.3\]]la mchod rten bya'o/_/stong phrag gcig nas brtsams te ji srid lnga 'am gcig gi bar du'o/_/nyi ma re re zhing mchod rten du gtogs pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba yang dag par bzhugs su gsol la/_ji skad gsungs pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po byas la stong phrag gcig nas brtsams 
[\[240a.4\]]te/_lan bdun gyi bar du bklag par bya'o/_/nyi ma re re zhing tshe dang blo ster bar byed pa'i gzungs kyi ched du byas te/_sems can thams cad la thun mong du dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin par bya'o/_/sems can rnams la bcing ba dang brdung ba la sogs pa spang bar bya'o/_/zla ba 
[\[240a.5\]]gzhan re re la mchod pa nyis 'gyur du byas la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya ba ni rang ngam rang dang 'dra bas bya'o/_/cho ga 'di yis ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad med par 'gyur ro/_/blo rno ba dang /_nad med pa dang /_tshe lo brgya thub cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang /_
[\[240a.6\]]skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i tshe sbrul shun pa brjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus bor te/_mdzes pa'i lus bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yang de ni dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 
[\[240a.7\]]'jig rten gyi ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rna ba'i bu gar dmyal ba'i sgra yang thos par mi 'gyur na 'bras bu smin par lta ga la 'gyur/_'di rnams kyi gnas su 'gro ba med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pas gzhan yang sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]ba/_gang gis sems can tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ba dang nyam nga ba'i 'khor ba las grol bar byed pa ni gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud ba la tshad dang ldan pa'i mdzes pa'i ras mkhas pas bya'o/_/de nas gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs tshon snam lus 
[\[240b.2\]]pas gzungs kyi yi ge las sprul pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bri bar bya'o/_/tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer stong gi phreng ba can/_pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa/_ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od can/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_zhal gsum pa/_spyan gsum 
[\[240b.3\]]gsum pa/_phyag brgyad pa/_g.yas pa'i zhal zhib gser gyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'o/_/g.yon pa ni mche bas ma mchu mnan pa mi bzad ba ut+pal sngon po'i 'od zer gyi 'od dang ldan pa'o/_/dbus ma ni sgeg pa dang bcas shing dkar ba'o/_/g.yas pa'i phyag gis 
[\[240b.4\]]snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje'o/_/de bzhin du pad+ma la gnas pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa dang /_mda' dang /_mchog sbyin pa'o/_/g.yon sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang /_de bzhin du gzhu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_bum pa'o/_/yang mgo bor mchod rten la gnas 
[\[240b.5\]]pa'i o~M dang /_mgrin par AHdang /_snying gar hU~M ngo /_/dpral bar tra~M ngo /_/lte ba'i phyogs su hrI'o/_/rkang pa gnyis la aM aH/_yi ge 'di rnams bkod la rak+Sha swA hA dang bcas pa 'di'i nang du rang gi ming dang spel ba'o/_/de'i logs gnyis su pad+ma dang rdo rje 'chang gnyis rnga 
[\[240b.6\]]yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa bya'o/_/steng du bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun 'bebs bzhin pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis so/_/logs bzhir khro bo mi g.yo ba dang /_'dod pa'i rgyal po dang /_dbyug pa sngon po dang /_stobs po che zhes bya ba ste/_ral gri dang lcags kyu dang /_
[\[240b.7\]]dbyug pa dang /_rdo rje bsnams pa'o/_/g.yon pa gdug pa can 'jigs pa'i sdigs mdzub ched du byed pa'o/_/de ltar 'bad pas rdzogs par byas la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa chen po stong phrag gcig gis mchod pa byas la 'bum phrag 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]gcig bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas bzung ste/_ji srid [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du stong stong bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas snga bar nam langs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ma zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas ji ltar dngos grub 'dod pa ster ro/_/
[\[241a.2\]]yang na ni thang ka de dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chus byugs pa'i phyogs gcig tu yang dag par bzhugs su gsol la/_mchod pa rgya chen po byas te nyi ma re re zhing brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya'o/_/yang zla ba re re la stong stong gi mchod pa byas shing stong stong gi bzlas pa byas na tshe dpag tu med pa 
[\[241a.3\]]dang /_stobs dpag tu med pas gzhan gnon pa dang /_nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_nad chen po med par byed do/_/sems can thams cad kyis nyi ma re re zhing tshigs bcad stong 'dzin pa'i phyin ci ma log pa'i ngag tu 'gyur ro/_/yang na kha cig gis de lta bu byed par mi nus na de 
[\[241a.4\]]yis rang gi khyim du dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i sa'i char bzhugs su gsol la/_ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas la zla ba 'ong ngo cog gi tshes brgyad la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya zhing /_nyi ma re re la dus gsum du nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig brjod na blo rno ba dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_shes 
[\[241a.5\]]rab dang ldan pa dang /_nad med pa dang /_skyid pa dang /_lo brgya 'tsho ba dang /_skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/yang na rang gis ma nus na de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na tshe ring ba dang blo rno bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi cho ga sems can thams cad la phan ba'i phyir nye bar 
[\[241a.6\]]bshad par bya ste/_khru gang gi tshad kyi thab khung zlum po rdo rje phreng bas brgyan pa/_tsan+dan dkar po'am sa dkar gyis byugs la me tog dkar po bkram ste/_logs bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi bzhag la bdug spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la/_phyogs 
[\[241a.7\]]bzhir mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa rab tu mdzes pa gos dkar pos g.yogs la yal gas kha brgyan pa bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/'o ma can gyi yam shing la me spar la me lha bkug la/_dgang blugs gsum byin la bsang gtor byas te gshegs su gsol lo/_/de nas 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]tshe dpag tu med pa gsal por thab khung gi dbus su bsams la/_gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bzlas shing dgang blugs gsum dbul lo/_/yang na/_o~M a mr-i ta A yur dat+te swA hA/_zhes bya bas tshe dang blo rno ba dang bcas pas brgyad brgya dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o/_/
[\[241b.2\]]gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba lan bdun du bzlas pa byas na tshe ring ba dang /_blo rno ba dang /_skyid pa dang /_nad med par 'gyur ro/_/yang na zla ba re re'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la dus gsum du tshe lo stong thub par 'dod pas sbyin sreg byas na 
[\[241b.3\]]mchog gi tshe ring ba dang /_blo rno ba sbyin par byed do/_/sems can rnams la smad par mi bya'o/_/cho ga 'dis rang gi lus nad kyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing lo brgya lnga bcu 'tsho ba dang /_dgra las rnam par rgyal ba dang /_blo rno bar 'gyur ro/_/dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[241b.4\]]gal te rang gis ma nus na de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzhan yang sgrub par 'dod na gtsug tor gyi rgyal po chen po tshe dang blo rno ba dang bcas pas 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas te/_dang po dang mthar stong stong gis mchod pa byas la yang 
[\[241b.5\]]'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas na tshe lo 'bum phrag gcig thub par 'gyur ro/_/bye ba byas na bye ba thub bo/_/de ltar 'di'i cho ga'i rim pas tshe la dpag tu med par 'gyur zhing nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_dpa' ba dang /_dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/dpal 
[\[241b.6\]]'dod na 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpal chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po 'dod na pad+ma 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/bye ba gcig byas na 'khor los sgyur ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang na ral gri la sogs ba sgrub 
[\[241b.7\]]bar 'dod na ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du thang sku bkram la stong gis mchod pa chen pos mchod la bzlas pa 'bum byas la/_yang na lcags lnga'i rang bzhin gyi ral gri la bzlas pa 'bum byas te/_lag pa g.yas par bcangs na yid kyis 'gro ba dang /_
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang /_stobs che zhing gzhan gnon pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi gcig tu 'dren pa por gyur nas sman pa chen po'i mchog tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rdo rje dang /_'khor lo dang /_rtse gsum la sogs pa yang 
[\[242a.2\]]bsgrub par bya'o/_/de ltar phan yon dpag tu med pa'i gzungs chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di ji lta ji ltar sbyar ba de lta de ltar las grub par byed do/_/gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par 
[\[242a.3\]]rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyi ma re re la dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig bzlas pa bya zhing mchod rten chen po byas te yang dag par bcangs la gzhan la yang rgya cher gsal bar byas na de skyid pa 'thob cing stobs dang ldan pa dang /_nad med pa dang /_lo brgya thub pa dang /_
[\[242a.4\]]blo rno ba dang /_skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de'i tshe sbrul shun pa brjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus bor te bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dmyal ba'i sgra rna bug tu yang thos par mi 'gyur na 'bras bu smin par lta yang ga la 
[\[242a.5\]]'gyur/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de ru skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[242a.6\]]gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so//[ {D596}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma 
[\[242a.7\]]d+hA ra NI kalpa sa hi ta/_bod skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa bde ba can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mchog na nye bar bzhugs so/_/de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[242b.2\]]dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/_kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo sdug bsngal ba nad kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems can tshe thung ba rnams yod de/_de rnams kyi phyir sems can thams cad la kun du gzigs pa'i mtshan 
[\[242b.3\]]gyi dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyid 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir yun ring por gnas par bsgrub pa'i ched du bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 
[\[242b.4\]]gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs te/_kun du gzigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/_oM na mo b+ha ga wa te sarba trai lo kya pra ti bi shiSh+TA 
[\[242b.5\]]ya bud d+hA ya te na maH/_tad+ya thA/_o~M b+h+rUM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/_sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_bi sho d+ha ya/_bi sho d+ha ya/_a sa ma sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa s+pha ra Na ga ti/_ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he/_uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud d+he/_a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mAM/_sarba ta thA ga ta su ga ta bar ba tsa na/_a mr-i ta a b+hi 
[\[242b.6\]]She kair/_ma hA mu dra man+t+ra pa daiH/_A ha ra A ha ra/_ma ma A yuH/_san d+ha ra Ni/_sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_pi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/_ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he/_uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud d+he/_sa ha sra ra smi sany+tso di te/_sarba ta thA ga ta a wa lo ki ni/_ShaT pA ra mi tA pA ri pU ra Ni/_
[\[242b.7\]]sarba ta thA ga ta mA te da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Thi te/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_mu dre mu dre/_ma hA mu dre/_ma hA mu dre/_badzra kA ya saM ha ta na/_pa ri shud d+he/_sarba karma A wa ra Na bi shud d+he/_pra ti ni brta ya/_ma ma A yur bi shud d+he/_sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya a 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_o~M mu ni mu ni/_ma hA mu ni/_bi mu ni bi mu ni/_ma hA bi mu ni/_ma ti ma ti/_ma hA ma ti/_ma ma ti/_su ma ti/_ta thA tA b+hA ta ko Ti/_pa ri shud d+he/_bi s+phu Ta/_bud d+hi shud d+he/_he he/_dza ya dza ya/_bi dza ya bi dza ya/_sma ra sma ra/_s+pha ra s+pha ra/_
[\[243a.2\]]s+phA ra ya s+phA ra ya/_sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_shud d+he shud d+he/_bud d+he bud d+he/_badzre badzre/_ma hA badzre/_su badzre/_badzra gar+b+he/_dza ya gar+b+he/_bi dza ya gar+b+he/_bi dza ya gar+b+he/_badzra dz+wA lA gar+b+he/_badzra ud b+ha be/_badzra saM b+ha be/_badzre badzrI ni/_badzram+b+ha ba tu/_ma ma sha 
[\[243a.3\]]rI raM sarba satwA nAny+tsa kA ya pa ri shud d+hir b+ha ba tu/_sa dA me sarba ga ti pa ri shud d+hish+tsa/_sarba ta thA ga tA mAM sa mA shwA sa yan+tu/_bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/_sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha ya/_mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/_bi mo tsa ya bi mo tsa ya/_sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_bi 
[\[243a.4\]]sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/_sa man+tA na mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/_sa man+ta ra smi pa ri shud d+he/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/_a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_mu dre mu dre/_ma hA mu dre ma hA mu drA man+t+ra pa daiHswA hA/_gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong 
[\[243a.5\]]ba/_ngan song thams cad rgyun gcod pa 'di yi ger bris te/_mchod rten gyi srog shing gi steng du bzhag la/_zla ba nya ba'i tshe khrus byas te lan stong rtsa brgyad brjod na tshe zad pa las tshe phyir nur bar 'gyur ro/_/ngan song las myur du thar te/_sgrib pa rnams dag nas 
[\[243a.6\]]bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro rnams kyis thos na yang de rnams ngan song gi tha ma yin te/_byang chub ma thob kyi bar du mtho ris rgyal po'i rigs sam/_bram ze'i rigs sam/_tshong dpon gyi rigs sam/_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la 
[\[243a.7\]]chen po lta bu'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten de'i grib mas phog gam/_rdul gyis btab kyang rung ste ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so//[ {D597}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni u Sh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma 
[\[243b.2\]]d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba zhig sum cu rtsa gsum gyi 
[\[243b.3\]]lha rnams kyi nang chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lha'i 'dun sa na gnas te/_lha'i gzhal yas khang chen po na lha'i longs spyod chen po dang /_lha'i bu mo'i tshogs chen pos bskor nas rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod de/_de lha'i longs spyod myong ba las mtshan mo sgra zhig thos pa/_lha'i bu shin tu 
[\[243b.4\]]brtan pa zhag bdun gyi nyin par 'chi ba'i dus byed de/_de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du skyes te/_der yang 'gro ba bdun po myong bar 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba bdun po myong nas sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya la nam zhig mir skyes par gyur na 
[\[243b.5\]]yang der dbul por 'gyur zhing dmus long du 'gyur ro zhes des thos so/_/de nas lha'i bu des sgra de thos nas 'jigs skrag dngangs te spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/_de rings pa rings par lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[243b.6\]]gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_brtabs par smra zhing de kyi hud kyi hud ces smre sngags 'don bzhin du lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i dbang po gsan du gsol/_lha'i dbang po bdag deng lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor te/_lha'i longs spyod kyi 
[\[243b.7\]]dga' bas rtse zhing bde ba myong ba las sgra zhig thos pa/_lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/_'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der yang 'gro ba bdun myong nas sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya la nam zhig mir skyes 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]bar gyur na yang der de dbul por 'gyur zhing dmus long du yang 'gyur ro/_/zhes thos na lha'i dbang po de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i tshig de thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur 
[\[244a.2\]]te/_lha'i bu 'dis 'gro ba bdun po gang dag myong bar 'gyur snyam du sems shing cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /_'gro ba bdun ni phag gi skye gnas dang /_khyi dang /_wa dang /_spre'u dang /_sbrul gdug pa dang /_bya rgod dang /_bya khwa ste/_'gro ba bdun po de dag shin tu mi gtsang 
[\[244a.3\]]ba za ba myong bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'gro ba bdun po de dag mthong nas 'di snyam du e ma lha'i bu 'di sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po myong bar 'gyur na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs 
[\[244a.4\]]par de'i skyabs dang /_rten dang /_dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba su yod snyam du bsams so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin nub mo de'i srod la spos dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa sna tshogs dang /_gos dang /_rgyan sna tshogs la sogs pa khyer nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[244a.5\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas mchod pa chen po byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba bdun po dag bcom ldan 'das la zhib tu gsol 
[\[244a.6\]]to/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'gro ba bdun po de dag gsol ma thag tu/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas 'od zer sna tshogs byung ste/_des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas thams cad kun nas snang bar byas te slar log nas bcom ldan 
[\[244a.7\]]'das kyi zhal gyi sgor zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i dbang po gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/_ngan 'gro 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/_sgrib pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar skye ba thams cad 'jig par byed pa/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/_bde 'gro'i lam du 'jog pa yod de/_lha'i 
[\[244b.2\]]dbang po de lta bas na gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba thos ma thag tu sgrib par 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin sna tshogs shin tu mang po 'jig par byed do/_/skye ba yongs su dag pa'i rgyud thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 
[\[244b.3\]]rabs thams cad du yang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i 'jig rten nas lha'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur te/_lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po de brjod 
[\[244b.4\]]ma thag tu tshe zad pa yang tshe phyir nur bar 'gyur ba'i las thob par 'gyur ro/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las yongs su dag pa bsags pa bde bar reg pa la gnas pas gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang de la gzigs so/_/de dag de la 
[\[244b.5\]]rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de la sems par 'gyur/_brjod pa tsam gyis sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten 
[\[244b.6\]]dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul thams cad skems par 'gyur/_rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/_rnam par 'thor bar 'gyur/_rnam par sel bar 'gyur/_stongs par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /_lha'i gnas thams cad dang /_byang chub 
[\[244b.7\]]sems dpa'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo rnams phye bar 'gyur ro/_/de gang 'dod pa der 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs de bka' stsal du gsol/_sems can thams 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]cad kyi srog la sman gdags pa bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas gzungs 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_oM na mo b+ha ga wa te sarba trai lo kya pra ti bi shiSh+TA ya bud 
[\[245a.2\]]d+hA ya te na maH/_tad+ya thA/_oM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/_sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/_a sa ma sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa s+pha ra Na ga ti/_ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he/_a b+hiShiny+tsan+tu mAM/_sarba ta thA ga ta su ga ta ba ra bA tsa na/_a mr-i ta a b+hi She kai ra/_ma hA mu dra/_man+t+ra pa daiH/_A ha ra 
[\[245a.3\]]A ha ra/_ma ma A yuHsan b+hA ra Ni/_sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/_ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he/_uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud d+he/_sa ha sra ra smi sany+tso di te/_sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ni/_ShaT pA ra mi tA ba ri pU ra Ni/_sarba ta thA ga ta mA te da shab+hA mi pra tiSh+Thi te/_sarba 
[\[245a.4\]]ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_mu dre mu dre/_ma hA mu dre/_badzra kA ya saM ha ta na/_pa ri shud d+he/_sarba karma A wa ra Na bi shud d+he/_pra ti ni brta ya/_ma ma A yur bi shud d+he/_sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Thi te/_o~M mu ni mu ni/_ma hA mu ni/_bi mu ni bi mu ni/_ma hA bi mu 
[\[245a.5\]]ni/_ma ti ma ti/_ma hA ma ti/_ma ma ti/_su ma ti/_ta thA tA/_b+hU ta ko Ti/_pa ri shud d+he/_bi s+phu Ta/_bud d+he shud d+he/_he he/_dza ya dza ya/_bi dza ya bi dza ya/_sma ra sma ra/_s+pha ra s+pha ra/_s+phA ra ya s+phA ra ya/_sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_shud d+he shud d+he/_bud d+he bud d+he/_badzre badzre/_ma 
[\[245a.6\]]hA badzre/_su badzre/_badzre gar+b+he/_dza ya gar+b+he/_bi dza ya gar+b+he/_badzra dz+wA la gar+b+he/_badzra ud b+ha be/_badzra saM b+ha be/_badzre badzri Ni/_badzram+b+ha ba tu/_ma ma sha rI raM sarba sa twA nAny+tsa kA ya pa ri shud d+hir b+ha ba tu/_sa dA me sarba ga ti pa ri shud d+hi sh+tsa/_sa man+tA na mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/_a d+hiSh+ThA na/_sarba ta 
[\[245a.7\]]thA ga tA sh+tsa mAM sa mA shwA sa yan+tu/_bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/_sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha ya/_mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/_bi mo tsa ya bi mo tsa ya/_sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/_sa man+ta ra smi pa ri shud d+he/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_mu dre mu dre/_
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]ma hA mu dre ma hA mu drA man+t+ra pa daiHswA hA/_lha'i dbang po gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/_sdig pa dang /_las dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/_bde 'gro'i lam thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_ngan 'gro thams cad
