[\[245b.2\]]rnam par 'jig par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa/_byin gyis brlabs pa/_rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab 
[\[245b.3\]]pa ste/_sems can thams cad bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba dang /_ngan 'gror lhung ba rnams bzlog pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi gnas thams cad du sdug bsngal zhing nyam nga bar gyur pa 
[\[245b.4\]]rnams dang /_sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems can rnams rnam par 'grol bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o/_/de bzhin du sems can tshe thung zhing skal ba chung ba/_smad pa dang /_bsam pa nyams pa dang /_sems can lam las nyams pa rnams kyi don du gzungs 
[\[245b.5\]]'di 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag go/_/lha'i dbang po khyod kyis gzungs 'di zung la lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa la sgrogs shig_/bsgrags nas kyang gdon pa dang /_kha ton du bya ba dang /_bsam pa dang /_bsgom pa dang /_dran par bya ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_
[\[245b.6\]]kun chub par bya ba la de sbyor bar gyis shig dang /_de ltar lha'i gnas thams cad na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang /_'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags 'di dag khyod la gtad do/_/
[\[245b.7\]]de'i phyir lha'i dbang po khyod kyis gzung bar bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/skye bar skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul dang /_lha ma yin gyi ris dang /_'di lta ste/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po dang /_brjed byed dang /_khyi dang /_rus sbal dang /_sbrul dang /_
[\[246a.2\]]gcan gzan khro bo dang /_bya dang /_sbrang bu dang /_sbrang ma dang /_sdig sbrul dang /_grog sbur la sogs pa'i srog chags kyi rigs su phyis mi skye bar shes par bya'o/_/gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su skye ba ni ma 
[\[246a.3\]]gtogs so/_/de rigs chen po 'di lta ste/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/_tshong dpon gyi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skye'o zhes nga smra'o/_/lha'i dbang po de ltar na gzungs 'di'i mthus byang chub kyi snying po 
[\[246a.4\]]la mthar thug gi bar du skye ba yongs su dag pa chen po 'thob ste/_lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di ni de ltar mthu che ste/_lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di ni 'di ltar mthu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_mthu stobs che ba/_dge zhing shis pa yin te/_lha'i dbang po sems can rnams 
[\[246a.5\]]kyi don gyi phyir/_gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba 'di bzhag go/_/'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po shin tu dri ma med pa nam mkha' ltar yongs su dag pa 'od gsal ba ni 'od zer gyi snang bas 'bar 
[\[246a.6\]]zhing 'dug go/_/lha'i dbang po de bzhin du sems can de yang gos pa med par shes par bya'o/_/'di lta ste dper na 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser ni dri ma med pa/_shin tu yongs su dag pa/_shin tu mnyen pa/_shin tu sdug pa'o/_/lha'i dbang po de bzhin du sems 
[\[246a.7\]]can de yang shin tu yongs su dag par rig par bya ste/_tshe rabs gzhan du yang de bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po gang na gzungs 'di rab tu ston pa dang /_bye brag tu na yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_kha ton du byed 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_'dzin par 'gyur ba der 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur/_sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di yi ger bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor gzhag 
[\[246b.2\]]par bya/_ri mthon po'am/_khang pa mthon po'am/_mchod rten gyi srog shing gi steng du gzhag par bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_de las gzhan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 
[\[246b.3\]]rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bzhag pa mthong ngam/_de dang der nye bar gnas par gyur na/_tha na de'i grib mas phog gam/_de'i rdul rlung gis btab pas phog na yang lha'i dbang po sems can de la sdig pa thams cad dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung 
[\[246b.4\]]ngo /_/sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha ma yin gyi ris thams cad du mi skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan cing /_bla na med pa 
[\[246b.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed cing me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rgyan rnams 
[\[246b.6\]]kyis brgyan par byed pa dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten byas te/_gzungs 'di bzhag pa la thal mo sbyar ba'am phyag 'tshal ba'am skor ba byed pa lta ci smos te/_lha'i dbang po sems can de ni sems can chen por rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su 
[\[246b.7\]]rig par bya'o/_/chos kyi gnas su rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du rig par bya'o/_/de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje nub mo nam langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog dang /_gos dang /_
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]rgyan la sogs pas mchod pa dang /_bsti stang byas nas/_des bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba 
[\[247a.2\]]lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can de'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing kun du bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o/_/sems can dmyal ba thams cad las de bzlog par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[247a.3\]]ni byas pa gzo bar bgyid cing /_byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyid do/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di'i cho ga zhib mo dang /_bgyi ba'i cho 
[\[247a.4\]]ga'i tshul rgyas par bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nyon cig dang gzungs 'di'i bya ba'i tshul bshad par bya'o/_/sems can tshe thung ba'i don gyi phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos tshes 
[\[247a.5\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i zla ba nya ba la khrus byas te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na des sems can tshe zad pa de'i tshe phyir nur nas nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan 'gro thams cad 
[\[247a.6\]]las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags bya'i rna lam du gzungs 'di'i sgra bsgrags par bya ste/_des ni de'i ngan 'gro'i tha ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/gang zhig nad chen pos btab ste sman pa rnams kyis bye brag phye ba de yang nad 
[\[247a.7\]]de las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i ngan 'gror skye ba thams cad kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nyid de'i mngal gyi gnas tha ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der pad+ma'i 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]snying po kho na las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs thams cad du yang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/sems can sdig pa byed pa gang dag shi ba'i dus byas pa de dag gi don du gzungs yungs kar dag la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su brjod de/_de dag gi rus gong rnams 
[\[247b.2\]]kyi steng du gtor na de dag dmyal ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten na ma/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_de las gzhan ngan 'gro rnams su skyes par gyur kyang rung ste/_de dag gzungs 'di'i mthus ngan 'gro de dag las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag las thar 
[\[247b.3\]]nas kyang lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/su zhig 'di nyin gcig bzhin du lan nyi shu rtsa re re yongs su brjod pa de 'jig rten mang po'i mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu spro ba dang ldan pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa chen po 
[\[247b.4\]]thob par 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa sna tshogs su yongs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/der yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang phrad par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[247b.5\]]cad kyis kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang 'jig rten la snang bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po thabs 'dis ni 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems can dmyal 
[\[247b.6\]]ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis 'gro ba thams cad kyang yongs su dag cing tshe ring bar yang 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po song la lha'i bu blo gros shin tu brtan pa la gzungs 'di rjes su ston la sgrogs shig_/lha'i 
[\[247b.7\]]dbang po des na zhag bdun na lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag cing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs che bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs te/_de'i gnas su phyin nas lha'i bu 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]shin tu brtan pa la gzungs 'di byin no/_/de nas lha'i bu des nyi ma bdun pa'i bar du nyin drug mtshan drug tu gzungs 'di la brtson par byas pa na de'i bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta ste/_ngan 'gro las ni yongs su thar/_bde 'gro'i lam la 
[\[248a.2\]]yang gnas/_tshe ring bar yang gyur nas/_a la la sangs rgyas/_a la la chos/_a la la gzungs 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ste/_des bdag 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su thar bar gyur to zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/'phags pa ngan 'gro thams cad yongs 
[\[248a.3\]]su sbyong ba gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D598}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_
[\[248a.4\]]sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha bi dza yanA ma d+hA ra NI kalpa/_bod skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i rtog pa/_gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 
[\[248a.5\]]'das bde ba can na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug chen po'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]tshal bde ba la nye bar bzhugs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[248a.6\]]chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu sems can sdug bsngal dang nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir cing tshe thung ba yod de/_de rnams kyi don du tshe ring bar nye bar bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[248a.7\]]kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gzung bar bya/_gzhan rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas bcom 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs bstan du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 
[\[248b.2\]]gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs te/_kun du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal to/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te sarba trai lo kya pra ti bi shiSh+TA ya/_bud+d+hA ya te na 
[\[248b.3\]]maH/_tad+ya tA/_o~M b+h+rUM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/_sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/_a sa ma sa man+tA ba b+hA sa s+pha ra Na ga ti/_ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he/_a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mAM/_sarba ta thA ga tA/_su ga ta ba ra ba tsa nA mr-i tA b+hi She kai rma hA mu drA man+t+ra pa daiH/_o~M A ha ra A ha ra/_ma ma A yuHsan+b+hA ra Ni/_
[\[248b.4\]]sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_bi sho d+ha ya bi she d+ha ya/_ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/_uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud d+he/_sa ha sra ra smi saM tso de ti/_sarba ta thA ga tA ba lo ki ni/_ShaT+pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni/_sarba ta thA ga ta mA te/_da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Thi te/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da yA d+hiSh+ThA nA d+hiSh+Thi te/_o~M mu dre mu dre ma hA mu 
[\[248b.5\]]dre badzra kA ya saM ha ta na pa ri shud+d+he/_sarba karma A wa ra Na bi shud+d+he pra ti ni bar+t+ta ya ma mA yurbi shud+d+he/_sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma yA d+hiSh+ThA nA d+hiSh+Thi te/_o~M mu ni mu ni/_ma hA mu ni/_bi mu ni/_bi mu ni/_ma hA bi mu ni/_ma ti ma ti/_ma hA ma ti/_ma ma ti/_ma ma ti/_ma hA ma ma ti/_su ma ti su ma ti/_ma hA sum 
[\[248b.6\]]ti/_ta thA tA b+hA ta ko Ti pa ri shud+d+he/_bi s+phu Ta bud+d+hi shud+d+he/_o~M he he dza ya dza ya/_bi dza ya bi dza ya/_sma ra sma ra/_s+pha ra s+pha ra/_s+phA ra ya s+phA ra ya/_sarba bud+d+hA d+hiSh+ThA nA d+hiSh+Thi te/_o~M shud+d+he shud+d+he/_bud+d+he bud+d+he/_badzre badzre/_ma hA badzre/_su badzre/_badzra gar+b+he/_dza ya gar+b+he/_bi dza ya gar+b+he/_badzra dz+wA lA gar+b+he badzrod+d+ha 
[\[248b.7\]]be/_badzra saM b+ha be badzre badzrI Ni badzram+b+ha ba tu me sha rI raM sarba sa twAnAny+tsa/_kA ya pa ri shud+d+hir+b+ha ba tu me sa dA/_sarba ga ti pa ri shud+d+hi sh+tsa/_sarba ta thA ga tAsh+tsa mAM sa mA swA sa yan+tu/_o~M bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/_sid+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha ya/_mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/_bi mo tsa ya bi mo 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]tsa ya/_sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/_sa man+tA na mo tsa ya mo tsa ya sa man+ta ra smi pa ri shud+d+he/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da yA d+hiSh+ThA nA d+hiSh+Thi te/_o~M mu dre mu dre ma hA mu dre ma hA mu drA man+t+ra pa daiHswA hA/_rigs kyi bu gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[249a.2\]]gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_'chi ba'i dbyug pa chen po 'dzin pa/_sdig pa zhi bar byed pa'i dag byed do/_/gang su dag tshe ring bar 'dod pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas bklag par bya'o/_/sa phyogs yangs ba kha cig tu sa dang ba byung gis nye 
[\[249a.3\]]bar byugs la/_dri bzang gi chab kyis chag chag gdab par bya'o/_/steng du bla res kyis bres shing 'phyang du bcug nas/_de'i dbus su rdul tshon dkar pos 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa shin tu brgyan par gdab par bya'o/_/gang de'i dbus su/_rang bzhin gyi snying po 'byung 
[\[249a.4\]]ba'i gtsug tor ro/_/de ltar rim pa ji lta bar shar la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams su nam mkha' ltar 'dus pa'i bza' ston 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_sa'i snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_nor bu'i snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_ro bcud kyi snying po 'byung ba'i 
[\[249a.5\]]gtsug tor dang /_snying po dpag med 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_gzi brjid snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_rnga'i sgra dbyangs 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_ser bu 'byung ba'i gtsug tor te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs su gsol lo/_/de'i yang phyi rol nyid du 
[\[249a.6\]]pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa legs par bri bar bya'o/_/'dab ma so so re rer rim pa ji lta bar thig le bcu drug las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs su gsol lo/_/nang stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_phyi stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_phyi nang stong 
[\[249a.7\]]pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug gtor dang /_mi dmigs pa stong 
[\[249b.2\]]pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_rang gi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /_dngos po med pa'i rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i gdan gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[249b.3\]]byas nas dus ji lta ba'i me tog gi rnam pa dbul bar bya'o/_/de'i phyed kyi steng du khri btsugs te chu'i snod du rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i mchod rten bzhugs par bya'o/_/shog bu 'am lo ma la sngags kyi yi ge sgrub pa po'i ming can yang bzhugs par bya'o/_/bum pa chu yis bkang 
[\[249b.4\]]ba yang gzhag par bya'o/_/pad+ma'i phyi rol phyogs bzhir bum pa bzhi yang bzhag par bya'o/_/dar gyi lda ldi dang gdugs dang ba dan gyis nye bar mdzes par byas nas/_yang shar du bgegs rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang /_lhor 'chi ba rab tu 'joms 
[\[249b.5\]]pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang /_nub tu nyon mongs pa rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang /_byang du phung po'i nad rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang /_mer rdo rje phreng ba tshe sbyin ma dang /_bden bral du sgyu ma chen mo 
[\[249b.6\]]dang /_rlung du gser 'od ma dang /_dbang ldan du gser gyi phreng ba can tshe sbyin ma'o/_/snod bzhi chu dri bzang dang bcas pas bkang ste/_me tog gi phreng ba 'phyang du gzhug par bya'o/_/'di'i mthar re khA gsum rdul tshon gyis bri bar bya'o/_/phreng ba dang po la skra la sogs pa 
[\[249b.7\]]med pa'i 'jim pa rlon pa la byas pa'i sats+tsha stong phrag gcig bsgrig par bya'o/_/ma grub na brgya nges par bzhugs par bya'o/_/phyogs bzhir bkur sti dang bsti stang chen po'i mchod pa byas nas/_tshig gzhan mi smra ba'i dam bca' 'dzin pa'i chos smra ba rnams kyis gzungs 'di 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]bklag par bya'o/_/lan re re zhing mchod rten gyi dbur mchod cing rab tu gnas par bya'o/_/stong phrag gcig tu klog pas dbus kyi mchod rten gyi dbur lag pa bskyod cing mchod par bya'o/_/me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_mar me dang /_dri chab dang /_lha bshos la 
[\[250a.2\]]sogs pa mchod pa thams cad stong phrag so sor mchod rten gyi phreng ba'i rnam par byas nas mchod pa bya'o/_/ji srid yongs su ma rdzogs pa de srid du mar me'i phreng ba rlung gis mi nyams pa sbar bar bya'o/_/mnyam par gzhag cing gtsang sbras rab tu 'jug par bya'o/_/de ltar byas 
[\[250a.3\]]na zhag bdun pa'i tshe lo bdun du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/lo bdun pa'i tshe ni de ltar tshe mchog 'thob cing nad las rnam par grol nas lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba yang thams cad du rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu'i nye bar spyod pa'i rim pa las gzhan du 
[\[250a.4\]]byas na de yis 'grub pa ma yin no/_/rab tu byed pa dang po'o//_//rtog pa 'di yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdom brtson dam pa 'dul ba'i gtsug lag la zla med par smra ba ne'u mkhan po'i gsung bzhin du/_mang du thos pa'i lots+tsha ba gnas brtan dpal nyi 
[\[250a.5\]]ma rgyal mtshan bzang pos dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du rang gis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D599}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sa man+ta mu kha pra be sha rash+mi bi ma loSh+NI Sha pra b+hA sa sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya sa ma ya bi lo ki te nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_
[\[250a.6\]]kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi lha'i 
[\[250a.7\]]gnas na/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /_zham ring ba lha'i tshogs chen po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_'khor mang po tshogs pa la bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]drug dang ldan pa'i chos ston par mdzad de/_'di lta ste/_ji ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab pa dang /_lhun gyis grub pa'i gter chen po bskyed 
[\[250b.2\]]bar 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_tshangs pa dang /_lhar skye ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ji ltar lha'i 
[\[250b.3\]]gzugs yid du 'ong ba lta bas chog yi shes pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ji ltar brtson 'grus rtsom pa lta ba dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_rga shi dang /_skye ba las grol ba 
[\[250b.4\]]dang /_brdzus te skye ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ji ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'thob pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[250b.5\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ji ltar shes rab dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po dang /_thos pa rgya mtsho bsags pa dang /_mang du thos pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de nas lha'i bu de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 
[\[250b.6\]]chos kyi sgo 'di nyid nyin mtshan du rjes su sems shing rjes su spyad de dka' ba chen po'i phyir sgom par yang byed do/_/de nas lha'i 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba g.yog lha'i bu bye ba phrag stong dang ldan pa/_lha'i bu 
[\[250b.7\]]mo khri brgyad stong gis bskor ba/_lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i rtsig pa brtsigs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]skyed mos tshal sna tshogs dang /_lha'i me tog gis mdzes par byas pa'i rdzing gis legs par brgyan pa dang ldan pa zhig yod de/_
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de lha'i bu mo'i mchog me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang lhan cig dga' ba chen po mang po dang ldan zhing lha'i bde ba la ni chags/_rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i sgo bzhi dang ldan pa'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]nang na 'dod pa'i yon 
[\[251a.2\]]tan lnga 'byor cing rgyags pa dang /_nga rgyal gyis dregs te snyems shing nyal lo/_/de nas nam phyed tsam na lha'i bu de gnyid kyis log cing lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgra bskyungs te nyal bar gyur to/_/de nas gnas mchog de na lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda' gdong zhes 
[\[251a.3\]]bya ba zhig gnas pa des lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de la bskul nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa longs longs/_khyod gnyid la dga' zhing chags pas ci zhig bya/_dga' ba la goms par byed cing chags par gnas pas ci zhig bya/_
[\[251a.4\]]lha'i longs spyod dpag tu med pa la spyod pas ci zhig bya/_da ste zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/_lha'i longs spyod dang bral zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po myong bar 'gyur na/_khyod kyi gnas gzhal med khang dam pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa ci dgos/_
[\[251a.5\]]khyod kyi srog ni yong med kyis/_/thabs ni myur du rnam par soms/_/zhes de skad smras nas lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda' gdong mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pas tshig mi snyan pa de thos nas brgyal te mal nas khas bub tu sa la lhung ngo /_/
[\[251a.6\]]de nas lha'i bu mo'i tshogs de dag kyang skra ni bshig_/rgyan rnams ni lhung /_gos ni bsnyil/_kha ni khrag dang gsher bag ni chad nas mchu dang /_rkan dang /_mid pa dang /_lce ni bskams la/_smre sngags stong phrag du ma ni smre ste ngu zhing cho nges 'debs la/_kyi hud kyi hud 
[\[251a.7\]]ces 'dzer cing /_lha'i rin po che'i snod nas spos chu dang /_tsan+dan gyi chu grang mos 'thor zhing /_kha cig ni mgul nas 'ju/_kha cig ni lag pa nas 'ju/_kha cig ni de'i skra la'o byed/_kha cig ni rkang pa nas 'ju/_kha cig ni mgo la 'ju/_kha cig ni brgyal 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]te 'gyel/_kha cig ni sa'i steng na chu med pa'i nya bzhin du 'gre ldog_/kha cig ni lus la mes 'tshig pa bzhin du 'gre ldog_/kha cig ni smre sngags du ma 'don cing kyi hud kyi hud ces zer cing ngu'o/_/de nas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de brgyal ba las sangs 
[\[251b.2\]]te/_dran pa thob nas/_kha nas khrag skyug cing sdug bsngal chen po drag po nyams su myong nas shugs ring du phyung ste/_lus 'dar zhing shing rlung gi shugs kyis btab pa bzhin du g.yo bar gyur la/_sgra bskyungs pa'i snying gis rings pa rings par lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga 
[\[251b.3\]]la ba der song ste phyin nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rkang pa la gtugs te/_rkang pa gnyis la 'jus nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la bskyab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po che ba'i bdag nyid can bskyab tu gsol/_lha'i 
[\[251b.4\]]gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda' gdong gis bsgo ba thos nas bdag dgung bdun na 'gum pa'i dus bgyid do/_/zhes mchi zhing sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba soms shig ces mchin lha'i dbang po thabs gang gis bdag 'chi bdag gi dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_ngan 'gror 
[\[251b.5\]]mchi bar mi 'gyur bar 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i gnyen po bka' stsal du gsol/_lha'i dbang po ci nas kyang bdag 'chi bdag gi sgo nas thar pa'i cho gas bdag la bskyab tu gsol/_de nas lha'i dbang bo brgya byin gyis tshig de thos nas snying rab tu sdug bsngal bas 
[\[251b.6\]]lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu ma 'jigs shig_/gang gis 'chi bdag pham par 'gyur zhing sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ba/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na lha dang mi rnams 
[\[251b.7\]]kyi ston pa/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan las brgal ba bla na med pa'i sman pa yod de/_de ni khyod kyi skyabs dang /_rtsa lag bzang po dang /_dpung gnyen dang pha ma lta bur gyur pa yin no/_/de ni ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]par mdzad pa yin gyi 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs pa der bdag cag myur du 'dong ngo /_/de nas de'i tho rangs lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang lha dang lha'i bu mo stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig dga' ldan ga la ba der dong nas bcom 
[\[252a.2\]]ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rnam par dman pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[252a.3\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di la lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda'i gdong gis bskul te de dgung bdun gyi gdugs la nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di 'chi bdag gi sgo'i dbang du 'gyur ro zhes mchi na bcom 
[\[252a.4\]]ldan 'das de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi tshig gsan nas 'dzum pa mdzad de 'dzum pa bstan pa des zhal nas kha dog du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od zer byung ste/_'od zer byung ba des 
[\[252a.5\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas te/_'od zer gyi snang ba des lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po thams 
[\[252a.6\]]cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byas nas bskul te/_bskul nas kyang 'od zer de slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor zhugs so/_/zhugs ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad 
[\[252a.7\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i dbang po lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di zhag bdun gyi nyin par 'chi bdag gi sgo'i 'jigs par 'gyur ba de nyon cig_/'di gal te 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur na/_sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa chen po drag po chen po'i tshor 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]ba sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong bar 'gyur ro/_/thog mar ni grong khyer chen po bA rA Na sIr smyig ma mkhan gyi phyis khung gi 'dam rdzab kyi nang du sha za mo phag mgo can du skye bar 'gyur te/_phyis khung de na bshang gci za'o/_/phyis khung de nyid kyi nang 
[\[252b.2\]]na srog chags bye ba brgya stong gnas te de dag dus gsum du phag mo de'i sha za zhing keng rus 'ba' zhig lus par byed do/_/de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus kun rdzogs par gyur te lo bdun 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/_de nas 
[\[252b.3\]]dgon par rus sbal gyi skye gnas su skye la de na chu'i ming yang mi grag cing shing grib kyang med de nyi tshan gyis lus gdungs shing tshig la bye tshan za zhing bya rog dag gis lus btogs nas lus dum bur 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus byung nas zhig par 'gyur 
[\[252b.4\]]te lo lnga tshang bar de ltar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te bA rA Na sI de nyid du 'bab chu chen po'i nya chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang las kyi dbang gis gang na chu med pa der 'phangs nas lus chen po de la sbrul gdug pa dang /_bya rog dang /_sre 
[\[252b.5\]]mo dang /_khyi dang /_gzig dang /_dred dang /_ce spyang la sogs pas za'o/_/srog chags sna tshogs pa gzhan dag gis kyang za'o/_/de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus byung zhing za bar 'gyur te lo gsum du de ltar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang 'chi ba'i dus 
[\[252b.6\]]byas nas khyim bdun du skye zhing 'dzam bu'i gling gi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/_mdze can gyi khyim dang /_dbul po'i khyim dang /_g.yung po'i khyim dang /_shan pa'i khyim dang /_rigs ngan gyi khyim dang /_gdol pa'i khyim dang /_dmus long gi khyim 
[\[252b.7\]]du skye ste lo drug cu'i bar du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal de dag myong nas de nas shi 'phos te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug tu bskal pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhir sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po de lta bu'i sdug bsngal 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]chen po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste brgya la mi'i lus thob na yang dbul ba dang yan lag ma tshang ba dang /_shes rab chung ba dang /_yi ge mi shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang bral ba dang /_'jig rten thams 
[\[253a.2\]]cad kyis dmad pa dang /_rtag tu skom pa dang /_bkres pa sems pa dang /_tshe thung zhing nad mang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa'i gtam ngan thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shin tu 'jigs skrag ste yid mi 
[\[253a.3\]]dga' nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag re ba ma mchis par gyur to/_/bdag la skyabs bgyid pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i dbang po 'chi bdag gi chad pa chen po'i gnyen po yod kyi de bas na re ba med par 
[\[253a.4\]]ma byed cig_/des phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sems can de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/dran pa tsam gyis sgrib pa thams 
[\[253a.5\]]cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe ring por 'gyur ro/_/shin tu yongs su dag pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de 
[\[253a.6\]]logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das re ba 'phel bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das lha thams cad bskyab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das skye dgu'i 'jig rten thams cad bsgral 
[\[253a.7\]]du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa zhi bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa bsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das ci chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje dgug tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das gling 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]bzhi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dbugs dbyung du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas la gzigs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 
[\[253b.2\]]kyi phyag rgya chen pos gdab tu gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnyen po ston pa chen po bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/_de nas 
[\[253b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de skad ces gsol pa thugs su chud nas/_rnam pa kun tu rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rnam pa kun zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 
[\[253b.4\]]gtsug tor gyi dbus nas byung nas/_des phyogs kun tu snang bar byas te/_rin po che'i gdugs lta bur nam mkha' la 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de gzigs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i dbang 
[\[253b.5\]]po kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags zung shig_/phyag rgya 'di ni gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma 
[\[253b.6\]]snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/gzungs sngags 'di mthong ba dang thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par 
[\[253b.7\]]grol bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing /_sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang 'jig par 'gyur te/_dper na me yis rtswa bsregs pa/_/rlung gis thal ba myur du ded/_/de bzhin tshe rabs snga ma la/_/bsags 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]pa'i sdig pa thams cad sreg/_/dper na char pa 'bab 'gyur te/_/ri la 'bab chu babs pa yis/_/sa yi steng gi phyag dar dang /_/nyal nyil thams cad 'ded par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gzungs 'di mthong ba dang /_/thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa 'byang /_/dper 
[\[254a.2\]]na me yis gser sbyangs pa/_/sos gcad rung bar snyi bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin bzlas brjod byas tsam gyis/_/lus sbyong 'gyur te the tshom med/_/dper na nyi ma shar gyur na/_/'od zer kun du rab tu 'byung /_/de bzhin su zhig gzungs 'chang ba/_/de yi lus kyang 
[\[254a.3\]]rnam par mdzes/_/dper na skam por nya 'gre ldog_/chu dang bral bas 'chi sgor 'gro/_/la las slar yang chur bor bas/_/de na gnas shing yang rtse'o/_/de bzhin dran pa tsam gyis kyang /_/mi rnams tshe ni zlog par byed/_/lha'i dbang po gzungs sngags bstan 
[\[254a.4\]]gyis nyon cig_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_oM ma hA tsin+tA ma Ni dz+wa la na/_sA ga ra gam+b+hi re/_A kar+Sha ya/_A kar+Sha ya/_A yun+d+ha ra/_A yun+d+ha ra/_san+d+ha ra/_san+d+ha ra/_k+Sha Na k+Sha Na/_k+She Ni k+She Ni/_k+Shu Nu k+Shu Nu/_sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma ya/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ma hA b+hu ba na/_
[\[254a.5\]]sA ga ra/_saM sho d+ha ya/_mAM sarba satwAMsh+tsa/_b+ha ga ba ti/_sarba pA paM bi ma la/_dza ya dza ya/_dza ya lab+he/_s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_bi ga ta A ba ra Ni/_b+ha ya ha ra Ni/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_/mr-i t+yu daN+Da d+ha re/_a b+ha ya pra de/_uSh+Ni Sha bya ba lo ki te/_sa man+ta mu She/_sa man+ta 
[\[254a.6\]]bya ba lo ki te/_ma hA mA yi/_ma hA pA sha d+ha re/_a mo g+ha bi ma le/_A kar+Sha ya/_A kar+Sha ya/_A kaD+D+ha ya/_A kaD+D+ha ya/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra/_in+d+ri ya bi sho d+ha ni/_b+hU Shi ta b+hu dze/_ma hA mu drA bi lo ki te/_dza ya ja ya/_sid+d+he sid+d+he/_bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/_bod+ha ni bo d+ha ni/_saM bo d+ha 
[\[254a.7\]]ni saM bo d+ha ni/_sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/_saM sho d+ha ni saM sho d+ha ni/_bi sho d+ha ni bi sho d+ha ni/_ha ra ha ra/_ma ma sarba pA paM/_sarba ta thA ga ta ku la b+hu dze/_sa ma ya tiSh+The/_pra sa ra tu ma ma puN+ye/_bi na sh+yan+tu pA paM/_sarba kilbi Shaha re/_ma Ni bi shud+d+he/_sho d+ha ya bi ma le/_bi kA si ta pad+me/_
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]gab tsaMta b+hudze/_ShaD+pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni/_sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha bi lo ki te swA hA/_sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_A yurda de swA hA/_pu N+ya da de swA hA/_pu N+ya bi li ki te swA hA/_pu N+ya a ba lo ki te swA hA/_mr-i t+yu daN+De swA hA/_ya mad N+DeswA hA/_
[\[254b.2\]]ya ma dU te swA hA/_saM ha ra Ni swA hA/_sam+b+ha ra Ni swA hA/_san+d+ha' ra Ni swA hA/_pra ti sa ra Ni swA hA/_o dzo ba te swA hA/_te dzo ba ti swA hA/_dza ya ba ti swA hA/_sarba ta thA ga ta mu drA a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_lha'i dbang po gzungs sngags 'di lha'i bu nor bu'i 
[\[254b.3\]]snying po dri ma med pa la rjes su ston cig_/des ni khyod kyis lha'i bu de la yun ring por phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ro/_/kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba'i 
[\[254b.4\]]gzungs sngags 'di bris la mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug go/_/mchod rten sar pa'am rnying pa bcos pa yang rung ste de'i nang du gzhug go/_/spos dang /_byug pa yang phul la gzungs kyi rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dran par bya zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsgom par bya'o/_/
[\[254b.5\]]nyin zhag gcig la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par bya'o/_/de nas nyi ma shar ba dang shar phyogs su bltas te spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la/_nyi ma logs su me tog gis gtor ro/_/a ka ru dang /_du ru ska'i bdug pas bdugs te/_de 
[\[254b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/_/mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad btab pa la rig sngags kyi snying po 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug nas dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag na gang gA'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[254b.7\]]'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung dang ring bsrel mchod rten re re'i nang du bcug par 'gyur ro/_/ring bsrel gyi snying por yang 'gyur ro/_/snying po 'di bris la gzhug go/_/oM na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_sarba 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya gar+b+he dz+wa la dz+wa la/_d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he saM b+ha ram ma A yuH/_saM shoDa ya/_saM sho d+ha ya/_ma ma sarba pA paM/_sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+toSh+NI Sha bi ma la bi shud+d+he/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_a~M baM saM dzaHswA hA/_kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 
[\[255a.2\]]'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di la gus par byas te mchod rten gyi las byas na tshe zad pa las slar nur te tshe ring por sbyong bar byed do/_/gal te shi 'phos na yang sbrul gyi pags 
[\[255a.3\]]pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phyin chad nam yang 'chi ba'i tshor ba myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phyin chad sems can dmyal ba dang /_
[\[255a.4\]]dud 'gro dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro zhing skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phyin chad sems can dmyal ba pa'i sgra rna lam du yang grag par mi 'gyur na 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/_/de nas lha'i 
[\[255a.5\]]dbang po brgya byin gyis rig sngags 'di bcom ldan 'das las bzung nas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang lhan cig tu nam langs pa dang rang gi gnas su song ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i lung bzhin du cho ga [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du mchod rten 
[\[255a.6\]]gyi las byas nas/_bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yang byas pa dang /_byas ma thag tu lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi nas sdig pa thams cad dang bral te/_lus rnam par dag nas pags pa'i mdog ni gser gyi kha dog lta bur 
[\[255a.7\]]gyur/_skra dang mig ni mthon mthing lta bur gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mngon du mthong /_nam mkha'i dbyings nas de bzhin gshegs pas legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i gsung ni phyung ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu de sgrib pa dang bral ba'i lus 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]su gyur par mthong nas ya mtshan cher bzung ste rab tu dga' nas/_a la la sangs rgyas/_a la la rig sngags/_a la la chos/_'bras bu 'phral du ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa/_thugs rje mchog tu che ba yid bzhin 
[\[255b.2\]]gyi nor bu lta bu de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas lha'i bu de rang gi gnas su song nas lha'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa sna tshogs blangs te/_lha'i gos 
[\[255b.3\]]dang /_spud pa dang /_rgyan kyang blangs nas g.yog 'khor thams cad dang /_lha'i bu mo dang /_lha'i tshogs dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa dang /_dga' ldan gyi gnas su dong ste/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_
[\[255b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chan po byas te lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gnod 
[\[255b.5\]]sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das/_sug las gang gis lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la mi bzad cing shin tu tsha ba'i 
[\[255b.6\]]'bras bu rnam par smin pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa dag legs so legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa dag legs par dris so/_/de'i phyir nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje sngon byung ba 
[\[255b.7\]]'das pa'i dus na lho phyogs kyi rgyud na yangs pa 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i grong khyer yod de/_de na bram ze dri ma med pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa/_byang ba/_gsal ba/_yid gzhungs pa/_gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_mdog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]dad pa dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i bsam pa can rig pa smra ba zhig gnas te/_de rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rjes su sems shing sgom la mang du byed de/_sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod do/_/de nas grong khyer de nyid na khyim bdag rab 
[\[256a.2\]]snang zhes bya ba phyug pa/_nor che ba/_longs spyod che ba/_g.yog 'khor mang ba zhig gnas te/_khyim bdag de ni dad pa dang mi ldan zhing gzhan mu stegs can la dad do/_/bram ze de ni khyim bdag de la yang dang yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di snying po dang bcas 
[\[256a.3\]]pa sgrogs kyang khyim bdag de ni de la dad pa'i sems mi skyed kyi/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_ngas bram ze 'di dum bu dum bur gtubs la nya dang rus sbal bsregs pa bzhin du bor te khar ngan skyugs kyis dgang ngo snyam mo/_/des 'di snyam du bsams ma 
[\[256a.4\]]thag tu khyim bdag de la sha bkra dang /_mdze'i nad kyis btab bo/_/de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas 'chi kar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po myong ste/_shi nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes nas/_der bskal pa'i tshad du sdug bsngal 
[\[256a.5\]]gyi tshor ba myong ngo /_/de nas shi 'phos nas nya dang /_phag dang /_rus sbal gyi nang du bskal par sdug bsngal myong ngo /_/de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba thig nag tu skyes te/_der yang bskal pa'i tshad du sdug bsngal chen po myong ngo /_/
[\[256a.6\]]de nas shi 'phos nas grong khyer de nyid du dmus long gi khyim du skyes te/_dmus long du gyur nas phan tshun du slong mo la song ba dang /_gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin pa na/_de na dge slong snying rje la gnas pa zhig 'dug ste/_des de mthong nas byams pas rgyas par 
[\[256a.7\]]byas te zas byin no/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di yang bsgrags so/_/dmus long des gzungs sngags 'di thos pa dang tshe rabs dran par gyur nas bram ze de yang dran te/_rjes su sems shing kye ma'o mi bzad pa'i las byas so snyam nas ngo tsha dang /_khrel yod 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]par gyur te/_'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang gzungs sngags 'di'i mthus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du skyes te/_gzhal med khang chen po'i nang na lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor cing lha'i longs spyod chen po myong bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag dmus 
[\[256b.2\]]long du gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za 'am yid gnyis su gyur na de ltar mi blta ste/_lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di nyid do/_/lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sdom pa gsum gyis bsdam par bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje las des 'bras 
[\[256b.3\]]bu rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba 'di lta bu myong ngo /_/lha'i bu 'dis byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du las kyi 'bras bu tha ma 'di myong ngo /_/lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze dri ma med par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod dogs 
[\[256b.4\]]shing the tshom mam yid gnyis su gyur na/_de ltar mi blta ste/_lag na rdo rje khyod nyid do/_/dmus long la gzungs sngags 'di sgrogs pa'i dge slong de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong du gyur to/_/
[\[256b.5\]]de nas lha'i 'khor mang po des sngon byung ba 'di thos nas rmad du byung bar gyur/_dga' ba thob par gyur te/_ca co dang ga zha'i sgra chen po phyung nas/_a la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig sngags 'di'i mthu ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'o zhes 
[\[256b.6\]]ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas 'khor de las lha'i bu khri nyis stong ni phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag 'bum ni bud med kyi dbang po dang bral nas skyes pa'i dbang po byung ste phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[256b.7\]]'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi tshig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni mthu che ba/_phan yon che ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]na sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur zhing /_gang gis sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[257a.2\]]ba/_lag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di'i phan yon dang /_sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di nyon cig_/'di ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen mas 
[\[257a.3\]]rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di dus gcig tu dran par bya'o/_/ring bsrel gyi snying po'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyi mchod rten la bskor ba bya'o/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis kyang dus gcig tu dran par bya'o/_/des 
[\[257a.4\]]ni gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams kyang yongs su byang bar 
[\[257a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe ring por 'gyur ro/_/sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pa'i 
[\[257a.6\]]phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/phyin chad mngal gyi gnas kyi dri mas mi gos par 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der brdzus te skye zhing pad+ma las skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/rtag 
[\[257a.7\]]tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lta 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gal te cho ga bya bar 'dod na des khrus byas la gos sar pa bgos te/_spos kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o/_/
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]snying po'i rig sngags gro ga la bri bar bya'o/_/mchod rten lnga gdab par bya'o/_/rig sngags 'di yang mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug par bya'o/_/mchod rten bzhi ni grwa bzhir gzhag go/_/gcig ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag go/_/shing bu 
[\[257b.2\]]btsugs te ba dan dmar po dpyang bar bya'o/_/me tog gis gtor ro/_/bum pa gang ba lnga gzhag go/_/grwa bzhi dpog por bzhi nas du ru ska dang /_a ka ru dang /_tsan+dan dang /_gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug par bya'o/_/spos kyi mchod yon gyi 
[\[257b.3\]]snod bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/_/snying po'i sngags brjod cing dkyil 'khor la bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/nad kyis btab pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad tshabs che ba 
[\[257b.4\]]dang /_tshe zad pa dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis skrag pa dang /_bu 'dod pa dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs par gzhag go/_/rma bya'i sgro lngas byab par bya'o/_/mchod rten gyi 
[\[257b.5\]]dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya'o/_/cho ga 'di lan cig byas na bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dang bral nas sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 
[\[257b.6\]]'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song thams cad dang /_'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa dang /_
[\[257b.7\]]gdug pa thams cad tshe rabs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de/_byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/tshe zad pa yang phyir nur zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/yun ring du nad kyis brnyongs te sha zad pa yang lus 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/lus shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/bsam pa yang yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/phyin chad 'chi bdag gi sgo'i sdug bsngal mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sbrul gyi pags 
[\[258a.2\]]pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der pad+ma las skye bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/skye ba 
[\[258a.3\]]thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bzhin du nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas na de'i sdig pa'i sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/bzlas 
[\[258a.4\]]brjod cho ga bzhin du lo gcig tshang bar byas na 'jigs pa med par lta ba kun nas sgo'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/dri ma med par 
[\[258a.5\]]rnam par dag pa 'bar ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 
[\[258a.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnams su yang shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'gro 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin 
[\[258a.7\]]du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi bdag gi sgo mi mthong zhing rmi lam lta bur kun tu shes so/_/tshes brgyad dam/_bcu bzhi 'am/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po'i 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]gzungs sngags 'di gnyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas shing ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la bskor ba byas na bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis 'phral du mchod rten la sgra 'byung ste/_legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/'phral du sdig pa'i 
[\[258b.2\]]sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi dri ma dang /_ser sna dang /_phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/lus dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa'am/_bud 
[\[258b.3\]]med dam/_khye'u'am/_bu mo gang dang gtam byas pa de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa rnams las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba la smras na yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[258b.4\]]bya'i tshogs thams cad la smras na yang bya'i tshogs thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/tha na khyi dang /_rus sbal dang /_sbrul dang /_byi la dang /_sre mo dang /_srog chags sna tshogs la smras na yang thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur 
[\[258b.5\]]ro/_/bye ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te dur khrod du gtor na/_gang gi rus pa la phog pa de dag sems can dmyal ba gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de nas yongs su thar te mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag mtho ris su 
[\[258b.6\]]skyes pa de dag gi lus la me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/gcan gzan dang /_bya sna tshogs gang dag dur khrod der 'gro ba de dag thams cad kyang bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/ri la gtor na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya rgyu ba de dag thams cad 
[\[258b.7\]]bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na/_gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dag mnar med par lhung nas gdung bas 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]bsregs pa las 'phral du yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/_gal te mgul nas thag pas btags te khrid pa yang gshin rje'i gnas nas 'phral du ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su grol 
[\[259a.2\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang rnam par zhi zhing rnam par 'jig par 'gyur te the tshom med do/_/chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje yang bran bzhin du sems shing 'dug go/_/lus bsam gtan gyi lam bzhin nam/_sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa 
[\[259a.3\]]bzhin du lus bor nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du mngon par dga' zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi bdag gi sdug bsngal mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'bum bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na/_'bum tshang nas mchod rten thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[259a.4\]]bdag kyang 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/nges par 'phral du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[259a.5\]]bskyed cing lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mchod rten chen po gcig gi nang du bcug ste shing bu bsgreng ba byas na dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po 'bum gyi mchod rten zhes bya'o/_/gang dag de las bya ba rnams byed pa 
[\[259a.6\]]de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa rnams dang /_gzhan yang srog chags kyi rigs sna 
[\[259a.7\]]tshogs gang dag der 'dong ba de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/tha na grib mas phog na yang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na bkur sti mang du byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_'di'i yon tan dang phan yon ni brjod par mi nus so/_/de nas 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha'i bu de dag dang /_brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i 
[\[259b.2\]]bu rnams dang /_lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang /_de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba 
[\[259b.3\]]btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags mthu chen po 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bur mthong ba dang /_thos par dka' ba lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[259b.4\]]cag lhan cig tshogs nas slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gzung bar bgyi'o/_/rgyas par bgyi'o/_/sems can thams cad la bsgrag par bgyi'o/_/'di 'dzin pa'i sems can chen po de'i slad 
[\[259b.5\]]bzhin 'brang zhing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bgyi'o/_/bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis 
[\[259b.6\]]de ltar gyis shig_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di ngas khyod la gtad do/_/'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la 
[\[259b.7\]]rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]{D600}]bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/_a pra ti ha ta/_shA sa nA nA~M/_oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/_hU~M hU~M/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_phaT phaT/_sarba dur ni mit+te/_duHswap+na 
[\[260a.2\]]shIn+ta~M ku ru swA hA/_sangs rgyas stong gi sngags 'di ni/_gtsug tor 'bar bzhes grags te/_las rnams gang dag stong phrag ni/_brgyad cu dang ni dgu phrag lnga/_rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams dang /_bkra shis dpal grags thams cad byed/_rmi lam 
[\[260a.3\]]ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/_lan cig bzlas pas sel bar byed/_gtsug tor 'bar bzhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D601}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sarba pradz+nyAn+ta pA ra mi ta sid+d+ha tsai t+ya nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_shes pas thams cad mthar phyin par grub pa'i 
[\[260a.4\]]mchod rten zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul dang /_'dul ba dang /_rnam 
[\[260a.5\]]par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal dus gsum sangs rgyas la/_/phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum dge la/_/mi 'khrugs pa dang 'od dpag med/_/spyan ras gzigs la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/rigs gsum la yang phyag 
[\[260a.6\]]'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ri rab chen po sna lnga las grub pa/_gzhi nyid mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i steng na/_rin po che sna tshogs pa'i khang pa dang /_tshad med pa'i mchod rten bzhi 
[\[260a.7\]]dang /_rang bzhin gyi mchod rten chen po'i gnas yin pa'i phyir rtse mo'i dbyings kyang mchod rten du gyur pa'i gnas na lag na rdo rje dang /_'jam dpal dang /_spyan ras gzigs dang /_byams pa la sogs pas bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa gtsang ris kyi mgon po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i gtsug tor dang /_thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'u la sogs pa rnams nas 'od zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa bye 
[\[260b.2\]]ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu snyed cig bkye ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing brjod kyis mi lang ba thams cad 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang zhing khyab par mdzad pas mtha' yas 
[\[260b.3\]]pa'i sems can thams cad long ba rnams kyis gzugs mthong ba dang /_'on pa rnams kyis sgra thos pa dang /_dig pa rnams kyis smra shes pa dang /_theng po rnams dang /_zha bo rnams 'gro zhing yan lag rangs pa dang /_nad pa rnams nad dang bral ba dang /_dmyal 
[\[260b.4\]]ba rnams tshe phri nas rim gyis sdug bsngal las thar ba dang /_gzhan yang 'gro ba sems can rnams rim gyis dran pa rnyed par byas nas/_nam mkha'i khams thams cad yid kyi mchod rten chos kyi skus gang zhing rgyas par byas te/_'od zer de dag slar bcom ldan 'das 
[\[260b.5\]]kyi dbu'i gtsug tu 'dus pa las chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan du gyur to/_/de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la bla re dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_'phan dang /_gdugs dang /_rnga yab dang /_dril bu dang /_
[\[260b.6\]]dar dpyangs dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_mar me dang /_bshos dang /_rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i mgon po 
[\[260b.7\]]thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di ni/_rigs kyi 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_bris sam/_klog gam/_ming nyan par byed na/_de mtshams med pa lnga dang /_mi dge ba bcu dang /_sdig pa'i las ci byas pa thams cad ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[261a.2\]]bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i rig pa chen mo'i mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga 'di'o/_/oM trai ya d+hA+e sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya gar+b+he/_dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/_sa~M ha ra Na A yuHsa~M sho d+ha ya/_pA pa~M sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta uSh+NA+eSha bi ma le bi shud+d+he swA hA/_rig pa chen mo 'di gsungs ma thag tu 
[\[261a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rig pa chen mo 'di gro ga'am/_ras sam shing shun la bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/_lha dang mi la sogs pa thams cad kyis mchod cing phyag bya ba dang /_bkur sti bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur 
[\[261a.4\]]ba dang /_rig pa chen mo 'di lus sam mgul du thogs na/_de lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin pa la sogs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid du blta bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid ri brag gam/_tshal lam/_dgon pa'am/_sa phyogs gang du 'gro ba'i tshe rig pa 
[\[261a.5\]]chen mo 'di brjod na ri dang sa phyogs thams cad mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/oM trai ya d+h+we sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya gar+b+he/_dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/_sa~M ha ra Na A yuHsa~M sho d+ha ya/_pA pa~M sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta uSh+NI Sha bi ma le bi shud+d+he ma hA bi ra dze ra gam+b+hI ra si/_d+harma d+hA tu 
[\[261a.6\]]gar+b+he/_bi bi sAr a a laM swA hA zhes brjod na/_sa gzhi thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid chu'am/_chu bo'am/_mtsho'am/_rgya mtsho la sogs pa gang la rgal ba na yang rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab na chu de thams cad kyang 
[\[261a.7\]]mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/oM trai ya d+h+we sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya gar+b+he/_dz+wa la d+harma d+hA ta gar+b+he/_sa~M ha ra Na A yuHsa~M sho d+ha ya/_pA pa~M sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta/_bi ma la u Sh+NI Sha bi shud+d+he/_ma hA bi ra dze ra gam+b+hI ra si/_d+harma d+hA tu bi bi sA ra a ma ma ki swA hA/_zhes 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]brjod na/_chu thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' gang nas gang khyab par rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di btab na/_nam mkha' thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/oM trai ya d+h+we sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya 
[\[261b.2\]]gar+b+he/_dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/_sa~M ha ra Na/_A yuHsa~M sho d+ha ya/_pA pa~M sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta/_bi ma la uSh+NI Sha bi shud+d+he/_ma hA bi ra dze ra gam+b+hI ra si/_d+harma d+hA tu bi bi sA ra a a e kha~M ya swA hA zhes brjod na/_nam mkha'i khams thams cad mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 
[\[261b.3\]]'gyur te/_phyag bya ba dang /_bskor ba bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bzlas te/_'byung ba chen po lnga po gang la yang mchod rten btab na nyon mongs pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad dag par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang sa dang /_
[\[261b.4\]]shing dang /_rdo dang /_'jim pa dang /_'bi 'bi gang yang rung ba la rig pa'i sngags 'dis btab ste/_mchod rten btab na rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur te/_oM rat+na tsai t+ye pany+tsa ye bi bi sA ra swA hA/_zhes brjod nas ba'i lci ba la sogs pas byugs 
[\[261b.5\]]na thams cad rin po che'i mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/_/rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di ma btab na/_gang zhig gser dang /_dngul dang /_baiDUr+ya la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun las mchod rten bzhengs su gsol yang rdo dang /_shing dang /_kham pa dang 'dra bar 
[\[261b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di nyid rdzas kyi rang bzhin las snying po dang gsang sngags byin gyis brlabs pa ma bzhugs pa'i phyir ro/_/rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te btab na/_'byung ba chen po gang la mchod rten btab kyang bskal pa dpag tu med 
[\[261b.7\]]pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i dri ma dag nas/_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa chen po 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/_rdo dang /_shing leb la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na/_de gdon mi za bar 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes nas sa bcu rim gyis bgrod de/_bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyis thob par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na/_
[\[262a.2\]]de gdon mi za bar rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab na mchod rten gcig btab na yang bye ba btab par 'gyur ro/_/rig pa chen mo 'dis ma btab na bye ba btab kyang gcig 
[\[262a.3\]]dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gong ma bzhin no/_/rig pa chen mo de'i sngags ni 'di yin te/_tad+ya thA/_sUk+Sh+me/_sUk+Sh+me/_shAn+te shAn+te/_nir ku le/_ya sho te dzo/_sarba bud+d+he/_a d+hiSh+ThA na/_a d+hiSh+Thi te/_a nu mi de swA hA/_'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_
[\[262a.4\]]'jim pa'i gong bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_mchod rten gcig btab na bye ba btab par 'gyur ro/_/brgya btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/_stong btab pa'i grangs dang 
[\[262a.5\]]phan yon ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/_/khri btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/_/'bum btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[262a.6\]]rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/_/de bas na mchod pa'i rten lnga man chad gdab pa'i mchod pa'i cho gar bya ba ni thog mar mchod rten brtsig pa'i gnas sam/_mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i gnas sam/_mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i gnas gang nas blangs pa'i gnas 
[\[262a.7\]]der sa bdag byin gyis brlab cing sa la gnas pa'i gdon bgegs bsam sbyor ngan pa mchod rten dang /_dge ba la bar chad byed pa rnams mtshams gcad par bya ste/_thig skud la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis gdab ste/_oM badzra sU tra hU~M phaT/_ces brjod nas 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]thig skud de nyid rdo rje'i skud par dmigs nas mchod rten gyis khyon ji tsam ran pa dang 'jim pa'i sa khyon ji tsam ran pa thig gis sa bcad/_de bzhin du sa bcad nas gzhi de nyid mchod rten gyi rgyu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas sa de nyid la 
[\[262b.2\]]seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di gdab par bya ste/_oM badzra kI li kI li kI la ya sarba duSh+Ta na hU~M phaT/_ces bya ba 'di lan bdun pa zlas te/_rdo rje phur bur dmigs te dbus dang grwa bzhi ra gdab bo/_/de bzhin du btab na mi dang /_
[\[262b.3\]]mi ma yin pa las bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/_/seng ldeng gi phur bu ni mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa ji tsam dgos pa ma blangs kyi bar du mi dbyung bar gzhag go/_/de nas til dang yungs kar la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/_
[\[262b.4\]]oM a mr-i te ha na ha na hU~M phaT/_ces lan bdun bzlas te/_sa'i phyogs su gtor bas/_sa'i phyogs de nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas dpag tu med par 'gyur/_de ltar sa gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas su byin gyis brlabs te/_bgegs 
[\[262b.5\]]kyi bsam sbyor ngan pa las mtshams bcad de/_spos dang /_me tog dang /_gtor ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang sa phyogs de na gnas pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams la mchod cing bsngos te/_bim la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bklags na/_
[\[262b.6\]]sa phyogs de yang shin tu bkra shis shing byin chags par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa brko ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di bzlas te brko bar bya'o/_/oM badzra kha na kha na hU~M phaT/_ces bzlas shing sa gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lngar gyur par dmigs te 
[\[262b.7\]]brkos na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/de nas sa gtsang ma blangs pa de dag gnas gtsang ma gcig tu bzhag nas sa brdung ba'i cho ga ni tho ba la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya rdo rje rtse gsum pas mnan te/_rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]ste/_brdung ngo /_/badzra mung+gar A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hU~M phaT/_ces lan bdun bzlas te/_rdo rje'i tho bar dmigs shing brdungs na nyon mongs pa dang /_bag chags thams cad ma lus par byang zhing bcom par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jim pa brdzi ba ni spos chab 
[\[263a.2\]]la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyas gtugs te/_spos chu de'i nang du yang chos nyid kyi yi ge a zhes bya ba dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od dang bcas par dmigs te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer chen po des spos chu de khyab par gyur nas/_spos chu nyid bdud rtsi'i rang 
[\[263a.3\]]bzhin du gyur par dmigs nas rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/oM a mr-i te hU~M phaT/_ces bya ba lan bdun bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas/_de nyid kyang bdud rtsi chen po'i chu rgyun dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jim pa brdzi ba'i sngags 
[\[263a.4\]]chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/_/oM badzra pra ma rda nA ya hU~M phaT/_ces lan bdun brjod de/_'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlab pa ni 'jim pa de 
[\[263a.5\]]nyid la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/_rig pa chen mo'i gzungs 'di brjod par bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sUk+Sh+me sUk+Sh+me/_shAn+te shAn+te/_dAn+te dAn+te/_ni rA ku le/_ya sho ya sho/_ba ti te dzo shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/_sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na/_a 
[\[263a.6\]]d+hiSh+Thi te/_A na maHte hi te swA hA/_zhes bdag nyid kyis rig pa chen mo 'di lan bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs na 'jim pa nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer sna lnga phyogs bcur 'phros par 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcur 
[\[263a.7\]]'phros nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don ji ltar 'dul bar byas par 'gyur ro/_/'od zer de dag slar 'dus pas kyang 'jim pa nyid rin po che sna lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu rkyen dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]ltar yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de nas 'bi 'bi byed pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya ste/_oM badzra A yu She swA hA/_zhes lan bdun bzlas te byin gyis brlabs na/_'bi 'bi nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[263b.2\]]mtha' yas par 'phros shing khyab ste/_'gro ba mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro/_/'od zer gyi sprin phung de dag slar 'bi 'bi'i nang du 'dus pas kyang de nyid ye shes rin po che'i rang bzhin shel sgong ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs 
[\[263b.3\]]so/_/de nas 'bi 'bi'i nang du bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i snying po mu dra'i phyag rgyar byas pa'am/_gro ga'am/_ras sam/_shog shog gam/_shing shun la sngags bris pa dang /_de'i nang du rigs lnga so so'i snying po/_oM hU~M trA~M hrIHAH/_de rnams phrugs su sbyar te/_mu 
[\[263b.4\]]dra'i phyag rgyar byas pa'am/_yi ger bris pa'am gang yang rung ste nang du stsal na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/nang du stsol ba'i tshe rig pa'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/oM badzra gar+b+he swA hA/_zhes bya ba bzlas na de bzhin 
[\[263b.5\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ye shes de'i nang du 'dus shing zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de nas tsai t+ya'i phor bu'i nang du yungs kar ram/_til mar gyis bsku ba'i sngags rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/_oM a ra dze bi ra dze 
[\[263b.6\]]swA hA/_zhes lan gsum bzlas shing byin gyis brlabs na de nyid thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de nas mchod rten 'debs pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[263b.7\]]oM badz+wa mung+gar A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hU~M phaT/_ces bzlas shing mchod rten btab na dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel pa las chos kyi sku'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro/_/de nas bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i snying po gang nas byung bas kyang mchod rten btab na dbyings 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel pa las chos kyi sku'i mchod rten 'byam klas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mchod rten phor bu'i nang nas 'byung ba'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod la dbyung ngo /_/oM d+harma d+hA tu ye swA hA/_d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/_
[\[264a.2\]]zhes lan bdun bzlas te mchod rten phyung na thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par 'brel pa las mchod rten chos kyi sku 'byam klas pa 'byung ste/_'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi don 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du phun sum tshogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[264a.3\]]du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de nas mchod rten snod nas byung ba la 'khor lo gzugs pa'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/oM pra ma na ye swA hA/_zhes bzlas nas 'khor lo btsugs na rin po che'i gdugs dang /_rin po che'i tog dang /_rin po 
[\[264a.4\]]che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rin po che'i shar bu dang /_dar gyi lhab lhub la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan te/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/_'gro ba'i don yid bzhin du mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs 
[\[264a.5\]]so/_de nas mchod rten na bza' gsol ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di bzlas la gsol to/_/oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he d+harma te swA hA/_zhes lan mang du bzlas te btab na chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i don dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mchod rten 
[\[264a.6\]]btab pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod rten lngar btab na dkyil 'khor yang phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya 'am/_stong ngam gang btab pa de'i grangs dang mchod rten gyi shong tshad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi re'u mig rdo'i stegs bu 
[\[264a.7\]]brtsigs pa ni sa'am/_rdo leb bam/_shing la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis te/_'og gi khri yang seng ge'i khri'am/_/rin po che'i khri'am/_pad+ma'i khri stegs su byas la de'i steng du gom yaM dang /_spos chus chag chag btab ste/_dbus dang phyogs 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]bzhir mchod rten bzhugs pa'i sa kun du gur gum dang /_tsan+dan gyi chus zlum por bskus la/_srad bus thig btab la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/_dkyil 'khor bri ba yang mchod rten lngar btab na dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o/_/de 
[\[264b.2\]]bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya'am/_stong gang btab pa de'i grangs kyi mchod rten gyi shong tshad kyi dkyil 'khor re'u mig rdo rje dra ba'i thig gis sa gcad par bya'o/_/mchod rten gzhag pa'i sa gzhi thams cad pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bri bar bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[264b.3\]]mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod la bzhugs su gsol lo/_/oM su pra tiSh+Tha stu pe swA hA/_zhes lan gsum bzlas te mchod rten bzhag na bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par spyod par 
[\[264b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas mchod rten dgod pa'i rim pa ni dang po dbus su dgod/_de nas shar du dgod/_de nas lhor dgod/_de nas nub tu dgod/_de nas byang gi bar du rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o/_/dgod pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod 
[\[264b.5\]]par bya'o/_/oM badzra pad+ma sa ma ye swA hA/_zhes lan gsum du bzlas la rdo rje dang pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol/_/zhes byas las gzhi dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rgya mtsho'i mjing thams cad mchod rten gyis gang bar yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/
[\[264b.6\]]gzhan yang mchod rten re re btab nas thal byung dkyil 'khor steng du bzhugs la/_spos dang /_me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod cing bzhugs su gsol/_mchod rten gyi kha dog la sogs pa bsku ba ni zhi ba'i dkar po/_rgyas pa'i ser po/_
[\[264b.7\]]dbang gi dmar po/_bsrung ba'i ljang gur dmigs te/_na bza' yang de de bzhin du gsol la yid kyis kyang de bzhin du dmigs so/_/de nas mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge raM dmar po gnas pa las rig 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/_hU~M raM swA hA/_zhes lan gsum bzlas pas de nyid ye shes kyi me dpung chen por rab tu 'bar nas gnas de dag gi rtog pa rnam par sbyangs te/_dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i 
[\[265a.2\]]dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de nas dkyil 'khor le'u tshe lnga'am/_brgya'am/_stong ngam/_gang bris pa'i dbus rnams su yi ge a dkar po gnas pa las rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/_oM a tsan+d+ra 
[\[265a.3\]]maN+Da la hU~M phaT/_ces grangs ji tsam ran par bzlas na mchod rten gyi gdan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re rer 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de nas mchod rten gyi cho ga mdzad pa'i tshe kha shar nub gang bder bltas la/_bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku 
[\[265a.4\]]phyag rgya chen por ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgyur te/_snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa ye shes kyi 'od dpung 'phro ba gnas par byas la/_sku dang ba spu'i gseb thams cad nas kyang ye shes kyi 'od zer dang /_sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas 
[\[265a.5\]]pa'i sprin phung bzhin du mthar 'byam klas par 'phros shing sems can gyi khams thams cad du byin gyis brlabs shing don mdzad nas slar sku'i nang du thim par 'gyur te/_de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de nas mchod rten gyi gzhal yas khang bskyed pa ni 
[\[265a.6\]]mchod rten dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa la rdo rje dbyings ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas mchod rten gyi steng du reg par byas la/_rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/oM badzra d+hA tu a d+hi tiSh+Tha hU~M/_zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang 
[\[265a.7\]]gi nang na rin po che'i sa gzhi dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na zla ba'i gdan gyi dbus na mchod rten bzhugs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/de ltar du mchod rten re re btab ste/_bzhag nas/_de la mchod pa'i rnam pas mchod 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]nas ni seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang /_'bras chan dang /_spyan gzigs sna tshogs dang 'dra zhing dgod pa dang /_bla re dang /_'phan dang /_gdugs dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_mar me dang /_spos dang /_mchod pa'i rnam pa rnams rnam par dag 
[\[265b.2\]]par sbyang ba'i rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/_/oM sarba pU dza puSh+pe swA hA/_zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas kun du bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin phung phun sum tshogs pas rnam par 'khrigs shing char gyi rgyun bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 
[\[265b.3\]]yid kyis kyang dmigs so/_/mchod rten mchod pa rnam pa lnga po cha re res mchod cing /_yon du dar bu chung dang /_'phan la sogs pa'i bla re dang /_gdugs bu chung yang rung ste re re dbul lo/_/de ltar cho ga bzhin du btab pa lags na dgongs pa rgyud kyi ting nge 
[\[265b.4\]]'dzin gsal bar bya ba ni mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dang /_rgyan dang /_cha lugs dang /_'khor phun sum tshogs pa tshul bzhin du dgongs te dmigs par bya'o/_/ye shes lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten de yang rang bzhin 
[\[265b.5\]]gyis rnam par dag cing gsal ba de dag gi bum pa'i dbus su bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs kyi snying po dang /_rigs lnga so so'i snying po 'bru re kha dog gser btso ma bzhin du dngas shing 'tsher ba gcig tu dmigs la/_de dag las ye shes kyi 'od zer sna tshogs 'byam 
[\[265b.6\]]klas par rigs lnga phyogs bcur 'phros pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i sprin gyis nam mkha'i mthas klas shing chos kyi dbyings kyi mur thug par brgyan cing grub par gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/_'gro ba thams cad kyi don 'di mdzad 
[\[265b.7\]]cing re ba bskang nas slar 'dus te/_de nyid kyi dbu'i gtsug dang /_thugs kar phog_/phrin las kyi sgrib pa la sogs pa rnam par dag ste/_sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs rdo rje nyid du gyur par dmigs la/_dung phor gyi nang du spos chab dang /_dri sna tshogs sbyar 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]ba'i ar+g+has gsol to/_/ar+g+ha'i phyag rgya bcings la de'i steng du dung phor bzhag la spos chu'i nang du a dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i 'od zer gyis spos chu nyid ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par dgongs shing dmigs te/_
[\[266a.2\]]mchod pa 'bul ba'i reg pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/_/oM a mr-i te ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/_zhes bzlas nas dbu'i spyi bor lan gsum du bdugs shing sbrengs te phul bas 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ro/_/tshig tu yang 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par 
[\[266a.3\]]gyur cig ces kyang brjod do/_/de nas phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis dbu'i gtsug tu bkram ste ye shes kyi sku'i nang du 'dus shing phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang thams cad bskur bar dmigs so/_/de nas bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bklag cing lan ci mang du brjod par byas
